avibhāvaniyamāt hetvābhāsāstatopare   tu bhrāntatve satyapi pratibandhavaśāt prāmāṇyaṃ    śabdādijñānasya tvevaṃprāmāṇyebhyupagamyamānenumānentarbhāvādapakṣadharmasyāgamakatvādarthānarthavivecanāśrayatvamanumānasyaiva nanu pratibandhavaśādanumānasya prāmāṇye nityādivikalpasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃsyāt kṣaṇikādyarthe pratibandhād  athādhyavasitārthapratibandhena prāmāṇyaṃ maṇiprabhāyāmmaṇijñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ syāt  tadapi hyadhyavasitena maṇinā sambaddhantasmāt satyapi pratibandhe yaddeśādisambandhitayā yorthodhyavasitastaddeśādisambandhitayāsantānaikatvādhyavasāyāt tamarthaṃ prāpayadanumānajñānaṃ pramāṇameva  na sarvaṃ jñānaṃ arthānarthavivecanaṃ cādhigamarūpamākāronumānampramāṇatvāt  yadvā liṅgamevānumānamatorthānarthavivecanasyānumānāśrayatvaṃ  tadvipratipatteriti tasminnanumānesammohāt  tadvyavasthāpanāya tasyānumānasya vipratipattyapanayanenāvasthāpanāyāhasūtra kā raḥ pakṣadharma ityādi yadyanumānaṃ vyavasthāpyaṃ kasmāt pakṣadharma ityādinā hetumeva vyavasthāpayatīticet  adoṣoyaṃ hetuvipratipattidvāreṇānumāne vipratipattestadvayutpattidvāreṇaivatasya vyavasthāpanaṃ anumānajñānaṃ ca trirūpaliṃgādutpadyamānaṃ lokapratītamevātovipratipattiḥ pratītyaiva nirākriyate yadvānumānaśabdena yadā liṅgamevocyate tadā tadvipratipatterhetumeva vyavasthāpayatītyadoṣaḥ atra śloke liṃgasya lakṣaṇaṃ saṃkhyāniyamaḥ saṃkhyāniyamakāraṇamvipakṣanivṛttiracoktā pakṣadharmastadaḍaśena vyāpta iti lakṣaṇaṃ tasya pakṣasyāṅśaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭo dharmastena vyāpta evetyavadhāraṇaṃ   tridhaiveti saṃkhyāniyamaḥ  avinābhāvaniyamāditi saṃkhyāniyamakāraṇaṃ triṣvevāvinābhāvasya niyatatvādityarthaḥ  hetvābhāsāstatopara iti vipakṣanivṛttiḥ tasmāddhetutrayādanye hetvābhāsā  hetucintānanu yadi tadaṃśavyāptirdṛṣṭānta eva gṛhyate tadānumānasyotthānanna syāt sādhyadharmiṇi sādhyadharmeṇa hetorvyāptyagrahāt  tadā ca pakṣadharmo heturiti vyarthaṃlakṣaṇamagamakatvāt sarvopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptigrahaṇepinānumānasya prāmāṇyaṃvyāptigrāhakapramāṇaṃpratipannaviṣayatvenasyāt pakṣadharmoheturiti ca na vaktavyantadaṅśavyāptivacanenaiva gatatvāt  tadaśavyāptibalena bca pakṣadharmasya gamakatvanna pakṣe sattāmātreṇa tatrasthasya gardabhāderagamakatvāt  tasmānnapakṣadharmo heturiti pṛthag lakṣaṇamvaktavyaṃ smṛtirūpatvāt taduktam anyathānupapannatvaṃ yatra tatra trayeṇa kiṃ nānyathānupapannatvaṃ yatra tatra trayeṇa kimi ti kiṃ cānupalabdhestāvanna pakṣadharmatvamanyopalabdheḥ puruṣadharmatvāt  svabhāvahetoścadhamirūpatvāt kāryahetorapi svātantryeṇa dharmyanapekṣatvāt  na ca kalpitasyapakṣadharmasya kāryasvabhāvahetutvaṃ sādhyavyāptiśceti na pakṣadharmo heturiti vaktavyaṃ tathā yadi hetutvena tritvaṃ vyāptantadā hetutvasyāniyatatvādanyatrāpi saṃyogyādiṣu hetutvamanivāritameveti tridhavetyavadhāraṇaṃ na yujyate atha hetutvaṃ tritvena vyāptantadā tritvasya hetāvaniyatatvāt kāryādīnāmapyahetu tvantataśca kāryādereva hetutvamiti na ghaṭate kiṃ ca  yadyanupalambhasya sādhyapratibandho nāsti tadāpratibaddhopi heturgamakaiti tridhaiva sa iti niyamo na ghaṭate atha pratibandhosti tadā kāryasvabhāvayorevāntarbhāvāt tridhaiva sa heturititathāpi na yujyate  hetvābhāsāstatopara iti na yuktaṃ hetvantarasyātyantaparokṣatvānnatadabhāva pratyakṣādirniścita ityayuktamuktaṃ  pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetustriṣaiva saḥ avinābhāvaniyamāddhetvābhāsāstatopara iti atrocyate  yadyapi sādhyasādhanayorvyāptiḥ sarvopasaṃhāreṇa pratipannā tathāpina vyāptigrahaṇamātrādiha sādhyadharmiṇīdānīṃ sādhyadharma iti viśeṣeṇa niścayobhavatyanumānāttu syāt  tasmād pratipannaviśiṣṭadeśādisambandhisādhyārthapratipādakatvena pramāṇamevānu mānantacca pakṣadharmatve satyeva bhavati nānyathā  yatonānyadeśādisthena sādhyadharmiṇānyadeśādistha sādhanadharma sambaddhoto viśiṣṭadeśāviśiṣṭadeśādyavacchinnasādhyapratītirevādyavacchinnasādhanāvagatisāmarthyādevanumānaṃ    na tu dhamamātrādagnimātrapratītistasyā vyāptigrāhakapramāṇaphalatvāt nāpi yatra sādhanadharmastatra sādhyadharma ityaviśeṣeṇāvagamepi sādhanasyapakṣadharmatvaṃ sidhyati sādhyadhamidharmatayā viśeṣeṇāpratīte sāmānyenābhidhānāt tasmād viśiṣṭadeśādyavacchinnasādhyapratipattaye pakṣadharmatvandarśanīyaṃ tena yaduktaṃ yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgnirityanenaiva pakṣadharmasyoktatvāt pradeśaviśeṣegnisiddhyarthandhūmaścātreti na vaktavyamuktārthatvādi ti tadapāstaṃ nanvevamanumānasya prāmāṇyepakṣaghamaṃmapyanumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ syādapratipannādhigamāt  yathādhastāntadīpūrandṛṣṭvoparivṛṣṭyanumānaṃ  tathā śiśurayaṃ brāhmaṇaḥmātāpitrorbrāhmaṇyāditi  taduktaṃnadīpūropyadho deśe dṛṣṭaḥ  sannuparisthitāṃ niyamyo gamayatyeva  vṛttāṃ vṛṣṭi niyāmikāṃ evaṃ  pratyakṣadharmatvaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ hetvaṅga  miṣyate tatpūrvoktānyadharmatvadarśanād vyabhicāryate pitrośca brāhmaṇatvena putrabrāhmaṇa tānumā sarvalokaprasiddhā na pakṣadharmamapekṣate kleśena pakṣadharmatvaṃ yastatrāpi prakalpayet na saṃgaccheta tasyaitallakṣyeṇa saha lakṣaṇaṃ yathā lokaprasiddhaṃ ca lakṣaṇairanugamyate lakṣyasya lakṣaṇamevaṃ syāt  tadapūrvanna sādhyata iti atrocyate kasmāduparyeva vṛṣṭya numānaṃ nānyatra  pūrasya tatsambandhitvādi  ti cet  yadyevaṃ yatoyaṃ nadīpūra āyātastatra vṛṣṭyanumānannānyatra vyabhicārāt  parasya ca tatsambandhitvaniścaye sati gamakatvamanyathā  naikāntikatvaṃsyāt  tathā śiśurayaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ mātāpitrorbrāhmaṇyādityatrāpi yasyaiva śiṃśobrahmaṇyaṃ sādhyantasyaiva mātāpitṛbrāhmaṇyalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ sambandhī gamako na mātāpitṛbrāhmaṇyamātramanyasambandhimā tāpitṛbrāhmaṇyasyāgamakatvāt tenāsyāpipakṣadharmatve sati gamakatvamato na kleśena pakṣadharmatvakalpanā  yadvā ya evāvyabhicāre nimittaṃ sa eva heturyathā dhūmasyāgnikāryatvaṃ brāhmaṇabhūtamātāpitṝjanyatvaṃca śiśorbrāhmaṇyanimittamiti tadeva heturyuktonyasya tatkalpanā kleśena syāditi tathā na candrodayāt samudravṛddhyanumānaṃ candrodayāt pūrvaṃ paścādapi  tadanumānaprasaṅgāt  candrodayakāla eva tadanumānantadaiva vyāptergṛhītatvā diti cet yadyevantatkālasambandhitvameva sādhyasādhanayoḥ  tadā ca sa eva kālo dharmītatraiva ca sādhyānumānaṃ candrodayaśca tatsambandhīti kathamapakṣadharmatvam  athakālo neṣyate na tadā tarhyetadanumānamvyabhicārād  atha bauddhā nāmetadanumānannāsti kālābhāvāt   tadayuktaṃ  pūrvāhlādipratyayaviṣayasya mahābhūtaviśeṣasya kāla ityabhiṣeyasyābhyupagamāt  evamanyatrāpi pakṣadharmatvaṃ yojyaṃ nanu bhavatu pakṣadharmatve satyanumānasya prāmāṇyantathāpi pakṣadharma iti pṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ na karttavyantadaśavyāptavacanenaiva gatatvāt satyaṃ  kintvapakṣadharmasyāpi sādhyavyāptasya hetutvanirāsārthaṃ kṛtaṃ  mahānasādidṛṣṭadhūmādi codadhāvagnyanumāne nanu vyāptasya liṅgatvaṃ na ca mahānasādigato dhūma udadhau sādhyenāgnināvyāptaḥ   satyaṃ    kevalaṃ vyāpto heturityetāvanmātrakeṇa lakṣaṇavacanena yatraiva vyāpyadharmastatraiva vyāpakadharmānu māna  mityetana labhyate  tataścānyatrāpi sādhyānumānāśaṅkānivṛttyarthaṃ pakṣadharmavacanaṃ  anupalabdherapi pakṣadharmatvamastyeva  yadā hyanyasyabhūtalāderupalambhajananayogyataivānyānupalabdhistadā yogyatānyabhūtalādisvabhāvetikathannānupalabdheḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ  kṛtakatvāderapyevaṃ śabdādidharmatvaṃ  puruṣadharmarūpāyāapyanupalabdheranyabhūtalādikāryatvameva paramārthatastaddharmatvantadāyattatvāt  dhūmāderapi kāryasyaivaṃ pradeśādidharmatvaṅkevalamvikalpena teṣāṃ sambandhisvarūpamevapakṣasyamayaṃ dharma iti vyavasthāpyate hetutvaṃ ca dhūmāderavinābhāvena vyāptamajñātāvinābhāvasyāgamakatvena T hetu btvāt  avinābhāvaśca kāryasvabhāvābhyāṃ vyāptaḥ  vidhipratiṣedhayośca sādhyatvesatyarthāntaravidhāne kāryahetoḥ svabhāvahetoḥ pratiṣedhe cānupalabdhestena hetustritvena vyāptotosau trividha eva bhavati  na tu trividho hetureva kāryāderapyajñātasyāhetutvāt  kāraṇavyāpakānulabdayorapi pratibandhādeva gamakatvaṃ tathā hi  yata eva pratibandhāt kāryavyāpye kāraṇavyāpake gamayataḥ  tata evapratibandhāt kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhī kāryavyāpyābhāvaṅgamayataḥ  svabhāvānupalabdhāvapi yadā ghaṭāderupalambhajananayogya ātmā upalabdhirucyatenyahetusākalyecopalambhāvyabhicārādupalabdhi sattā tadānayostādātmyantenātrāpi pakṣe pratiapakṣo dharmī prayojanābhāvādanupacāra iti cet  na  sarvadharmidharmapratiṣedhābandhanibandhanameva gamakatvaṃ  na cānupalabdheḥ kāryādihetāvantarbhāvaḥ svasādhyepratibandhānapekṣatvāt  hetośca sakāśāt sādhyapratītistadāyattatve sati syāt na ca saṃyoge sati tadāyattatvamasaṃyuktānāṃ saṃyogābhāvāt  saṃyuktānāmapi nasaṃyogatastadāyattatānyata eva saṃyuktānāmutpatteḥ  evaṃ samavāyepi vācyaṃ  tasmāttadāyattatvantādātmyatadutpattibhyāntena kāryasvabhāvānupalambhabahirbhūtānāṃ saṃyogyādīnāmahetutvantadāyattatvābhāvenāvinābhāvābhāvāt atha tadāyattatvamasti tadeva tarhi gamakatve nimittamiti sa hetustridhaiveti siddhaṃ nanu tathāpi kathamanumānasyotthānanirvikalpakapratyakṣeṇa dharmadhamitatsambandhāgrahāt svātantryeṇa vastudvayādhigateḥ ucyate  savikalpakenāpi dhūmapradeśādīnāṃ dharmaṃghabhibhāvagrahaṇamuparyuparibhāvapratibhāsa  eva  saca nirvikalpakepyasti kevalaṃ vikalpetarayorjñānayorullekhānullekhakṛto viśeṣa  tacca nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ yathāgṛhītaviṣayamevedamihāstīdaṃ nāstīti vidhipratiṣedhaṃ janayat pramāṇamiṣyate  tena dharmadharmiṇoḥsvarūpaniścayaḥ sambandhaniścaya   pratyakṣakṛta   eva bhavatīti pakṣadharma ityuktaṃ  sūtre pakṣadharmaśca dharmadharmasamudāyaḥ  na ca prativādinaṃprati samudāyadharmatvaṃ hetoḥ siddhantena sa sarvo heturasiddha syāt  siddhau vānumānasyavaiyarthyamityāha pakṣo dharmoti  avayave samudāyopacārāt  ekadeśatvaṃ ca samudāyopacāranimittantena na dṛṣṭāntadharmī pakṣa ucyate ī śva ra se naḥ prāha  dharmidha mma heturityetāvad vaktavyaṃ pra   yojanābhāvādanupacāra iti  tadāha  prayojanetyādi  netyādinā pratiṣedhati  na prayojanasyābhāvaḥ kathaṃ sarvadhamidharmapratiṣedhārthatvādupacārasyetyapekṣyate  asatyupacāredharmidharma iti nirdeśaḥ kārya  tathā ca dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇopi dharmo hetuḥ syāt  upacāretu sarvasya dharmiṇo dharmaḥ pratiṣiddho bhavati  katha miti cedāha  tadekadeśatvādi sādhyadharmī ca tadekadeśatvāt pakṣasyāvayavatvāt pakṣopacārayogyastasya yo dharmastatpratipattyarthamupacārakaraṇaṃ  tathā cetyupacārayogyarṣāmipratipattau cākṣuṣatvādiparihāraḥ  ādiśabdāt kākasya kā  rṣyādityādi rthatvāt  tadekaveśatvāt  tadupacārayogyadharmapratipattyartham  tathā ca cākṣuṣatvādityāviparihāraḥ dharmavacanenāpi dharmyāśraya parigraha siddhau dhamidharmavacana sāmarthyāt pratyāsatteḥsādhyadharmasiddhiriti cet  na  dṛṣṭāntardhārmiṇopi pratyā  satte    tadaṃśavyāptyetidṛṣṭāntadharmaṇi sattvasiddheḥ dharmidharmavacanāt sādhyadharmiṇa eva parigraha itinanu yadi cākṣuṣatvāditi  cakṣuvijñānaviṣayatvāditi hetvarthastadāyaṃ heturanaikāntikatvāt tadaśavyā ptivacanenaiva nirasta iti kimupacāreṇa  athacakṣurvijñānajanakatvāditi hetvarthastadāpi tajjanakatvaṃ sattvameva    tacca śabda pyastīti na dṛṣṭāntardhāmadharma evāyamiti kaścit tadayuktaṃ  cakṣurvijñānajanakatvaṃ hi sattvaviśeṣa sa ca ghaṭādīnāmeva dharmo naśa bdasyātastannivṛtyarthamupacāra  karaṇaṃ  na tvasatyapyupacāre vyāptasya liṃgatvaṃ   na ca śabdānityattvena cākṣuṣatvaṃ vyāptantatkathamasya liṅgatvaṃ naiṣa doṣaḥ  anityatvamātreṇa hyasya vyāptatvantacca śabdepyastīti kathamahetutvaṃ syāt dharmavacanenetyādi  dharmastadaṃśena vyāpta iti kevalena dharmavacanenāpi dharmiparatantratvād dharmasyāvaśyamasau dharmiṇamākṣipati    tena dharmiṇa āśrayaṇamātra yaḥ parigrasta  sya siddhau satyāṃ yadetaddhamidharma ityatra dharmigrahaṇantasya sāmarthyātpratyāsattiriha vivakṣiteti gamyate  vyāptivivakṣāyāṃ dharmigrahaṇamanarthakaṃsyāt  tasmād dhamivacanasāmarthyāt pratyāsattiḥ siddhā  pratyāsattiścasādhyadharmiṇa eva tatra prathamaṃ hetūpadarśanāt  tayā pratyāsattyā sādhyadharmaparigrahobhaviṣyati  na pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmaparigrahaḥ kuto    dṛṣṭāntardhārmiṇopi nakevalaṃ sādhyadharmiṇaḥ pratyāsatteḥ  kadācid vyāptidarśanapūrvake prayoge dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇopi prathamaṃ hetusadbhāvopadarśanāt yadi na pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadhamisiddhiḥ pāriśeṣyātahi bhaviṣyati  yatastavaṃśavyāptyā hetubhūtayā dṛṣṭāntadharmaṇi dharmasya sattvasiddhiḥ  na hi dṛṣṭāntamantareṇahetoḥ sādhyena vyāptiḥ pradarśayituṃ śakyata iti manyate  tato dharmigrahaṇād vyatiricyamānāt sādhyadharmiṇa eva parigrahaḥ  tadaṃśeneti ca tacchabdena dharmavaca nākṣiptodharmī sambadhyata iti tatsambandhanārthamapi dharmigrahaṇaṃ nāśaṅkanīyaṃ yatra prayojanānantaraṃ na sambhavati sa pāriśeṣyasya viṣayo dharmivacanasya tvanyasiddhau niyamā rthamapi vacanamāśaṃkyate  sajātīya eva sattvamiti vijātīyādvyatirekāsiddhasya sādhyābhāvesattvavacanaṃ yathā  sāmarthyādarthapratipattigauravaparihārārthamapipakṣa dharma vacanam dapi prayojanaṃ sambhāvyata iti manyamānaḥ siddhāntavādyāha  siddhe tadaśavyāptyādṛṣṭāntardhāmaṇi sattve punarddhamiṇo vacanandṛṣṭāntadharmiṇa eva yo dharmaḥ sa heturitiniyamārthamāśaṃkyate  tataśca cākṣuṣatvādiya eva hetavaḥ syurna kṛtakatvādaya ityaniṣṭameva syāt  tasmādupacāraḥ karttavya iti kiṃ punaḥ kvacit ta karka śā stre dṛṣṭaṃ niyamārthamvacanamityata āha  sajātīyaevetyādi  tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvedhā cāsaṃstadatyaye sa heturityatrā cārthī yehetulakṣaṇe  sajātīya eva sattvamityavadhāraṇena siddhepi vijātīyād vipakṣāddhetob vyaṃtirake yadeta dasaṃstadatyaya iti sādhyābhāvesattvavacanaṃ tamniyamārthamā cā ryeṇavyākhyātamasatyeva nāstitā yathā syānnānyatra na viruddha iti  tathehāpi dharmivacanambhāvaniyamārthamāśaṃkyate nanvapakṣadharmasyāhetutvānna niyamārthā śaṅkā  yato vyāptasya hetutvaṃ na cānyadharmasthena sādhyadharmeṇānyadharmistha sādhanadharmo vyāptastasmāttadaṃśavyāptahetuvacanasāmarthyādeva sādhyadharmaparigraho bhaviṣyatītyata āha  sāmarthyādityādi anantaroditāt sāmarthyādarthasya sādhyadharmaparigrahalakṣaṇasya bhavati pratītiḥpaṭudhiyāṃ śrotṛṇāṃ kintvaśabdakamarthaṃ svayamanusaratāṃ pratipattigauravaṃ syāt  ataupacāramātrāt svayamaśabdakārthābhyūharahitād dharmidharma ityanena pakṣadharma itisamānanirdeśāt pratipattigauravaṃ ca parihṛtambhavati  ca śabdenaitadāha  ye paropade śamākāṃkṣanti tairayamartho lakṣaṇavacanād boddhavya iti yathālakṣaṇaṃ pratīterapakṣadharmo na heturiti kuta iyamāśaṅkā  tatasteṣāṃ lakṣaṇānusāriṇāṃ niyamāśaṃkāparihārārthañcopacārakaraṇamiti  iha vyavacchedaphalatvācchabdaprayogasyāvaśyamevāvadhārayitavyaṃ    ṣaṣṭhīsamāsācca pakṣadharma iti nānyassamāsassambhavati  tathā ca pakṣasyaiva dharmma ityevamavadhāraṇāt tadaṃśavyāptivirudhyata iti viruddhalakṣaṇatāmudbhāvayannāha pakṣasya dharmatve tampakṣaṃ viśeṣaṇamanyato vyavacchedamapekṣata iti  tadviśeṣaṇāpekṣasya dharmasyānyatra pakṣīkṛtādanyasmin sapakṣenanuvṛttiḥ  tathā hi yaḥpakṣadharmatve taṃ viśeṣaṇamapekṣate anyatrānanuvṛtteḥ asādhāraṇatā syāditi cet na  ayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇāt  yathā caitro dhanurdhara iti  nānyayogavyavacchedena yathā pārtho dhanurdhara iti ākṣepsyāmaḥ  tadā hi vakturabhiprāyavaśāt napakṣeṇa viśeṣyate sa pakṣasyaiva bhavati  yathā devadattasya putraḥ  tatonyatrānnu vṛtterasādhāraṇatā sādhāraṇatā na syāt  tadaśavyāptivirodha iti yāvat sādhāraṇatayā tadaṃśavyāptipratipādanāt  tato yadi pakṣadharmo na tadaṃśavyāptirathatadaṃśavyāptinaṃ pakṣadharma iti vyāhataṃ lakṣaṇamiti nanu yadi sādhyadharmaṇi sādhanadharmasya sādhyavyāptirna gṛhītā tadā hetoranaikāntikatvamatha gṛhītā kiṃ dṛṣṭānte heto  ranvayena kathañca pakṣadha  rmasya tadaṃśa vyāptivirudhyate sādhyadharmiṇyapi vyāpteḥ pratipannatvāt  sarvapadārthasya  kṣaṇikatvesādhye sattvalakṣaṇasya vā hetoḥ ko dṛṣṭāntenvayaḥ  tasmāt svasādhyapratibandhāddhetustena vyāptaḥ sidhyati  sa ca viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā sādhyadharmiṇyapisidhyatīti na kiṃcidanyatrānvayāpekṣayā  tatkathamidamāśaṃkitamanyatrānanavṛtterasādhāraṇateti  sattyaṃ yadyapi sādhyadharmaṇi hetoḥ   sādhyavyāptimantareṇa nānumānasyotthānantathāpi dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādhanayo  pratibandhagrāhakapramāṇamantareṇa na sādhyadhammiṇyapi vyāptiḥ sidhyatīti tadarthamidamāśaṃkitaṃ yattūcyate kāryahetvapekṣayā svabhāvahetuviśeṣāpekṣayaitadāśaṃkitaṃ tattu kṣaṇikatvānumāne sattvāpekṣayā  tasya hi vipakṣabādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva gamakatvā  dititadetaduttaratra nirūpayiṣyā  maḥ  tasmāt pūrvagṛhītapratibandhasādhakapramāṇasmṛtayehetoranyatra vṛttirape kṣaṇīyā etatpariharati netyādinā  na anyatrānanuvṛttiḥ  kutaḥ  ayogosambandhastadvyavacchedena viśeṣaṇāt pakṣasya  na hyanyayogavyavacchedenaiva viśeṣaṇambhavati kintvayogavyavacchedenāpi  yatra dharmiṇi dharmasya sadbhāvaḥ sandihyatetatrāyogavyavacchedasya nyāyaprāptatvāt  atra dṛṣṭānto yathā caitro dhanurdhara iti   caitre hi dhanurdharatvaṃ sandihyate kimasti nāstīti  tataścaitro dhanurddhara ityuktepakṣāntaramadhanurddharatvaṃ śroturākāṃkṣopasthāpitaṃ nirākarotyayogavyavacchedotra nyāyaprāptaḥ parābhimatavyavacchedaṃ nirācikīrṣannāha  nānyayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇāatadekadeśastadaṃśaḥ  pakṣaśabdena samudāyāvacanād   vyāptaṃ padaṃ vyāptiḥ  vyāptaṃ hi tatra vyāpakasya bhāva eva nāpi vyāpyasya tatra bhāva eva  etena b cānvayavyatirekaniścayāvapi  uktau  danyatrānanuvṛtterasādhāraṇateti sambandhaḥ  atrāpi dṛṣṭānto yathā pārtho dhanurddharaiti sāmānyaśabdopyayaṃ   dhanurddharaśabdaḥ prakaraṇasāmarthyādinā prakṛṣṭaguṇavṛttirihapārtho hi dhanurddharatvaṃ siddhameveti nāyogāśaṅkā  tādṛśantu sātiśayaṃ kimanyatrāpyasti nāstītyanyayogaśaṃkāyāṃ śroturyadā pārtho dhanurddhara ityucyate tadā sātiśayaḥpārtha eva dhanurddharo nānya iti pratīyate  tenātrānyayogavyavacchedo nyāyaprāptaḥtathā ki pakṣestyayaṃ dharmo na veti saṃśaye pakṣadharma  ityukte pakṣasya dharma eva nādharmaḥ dharmaścāśritatvād viśeṣaṇantenāyogo vyavacchidyate nānyayogaḥ  tadaṃśavyāptyānyayogasya pratipādanena dṛṣṭānte sandehābhāvāt  ākṣepsyāma iti nirdekṣyāmaicaturthe paricchede tadaṃśastaddharma iti tacchabdena pakṣaḥ parāmṛśyate na dharma    dharmasya dharmāsambhavāttasya pakṣasyāṃśastasyaiva sādhyo dharmaḥ  ekadeśe rūḍhoṅśaśabdaḥ kathaṃ dharmaṃ pratipādayatīti cedāha  vakturabhiprāyavaśāditi  na vastubalena śabdānāṃ vācakatvaṃ kintuvaktuvivakṣāvaśānta tadekadeśastadaṃśa iti prakṛtena sambandha   kiṃ punarevamiti cedāha  pakṣaśabdena samudāyāvacanāditi  yadi pakṣaśabdenasamudāyobhihitaḥ syāt tadā dharmadharmasamudāyātmakasya pakṣasyaikadeśo dharmātmakośobhavati  upacaritena tu pakṣaśabdena dharmyevābhidhīyate  tasya caikātmakasya kutaekadeśaḥ vyāptaṃ padamvyāptirityādinā vyācaṣṭe  tasya pakṣadharmasya sato vyāptiyoṃvyāpnoti yaśca vyāpyate vyāpyavyāpakadharmatayā pratīteḥ  yadā vyāpakadharmatayāvivakṣyate tadā vyāpakasya gamyasya bhāva eveti sambandhaḥ  tatreti saptamyartha pradhānametannādhārārthapradhānaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmāntaratvābhāvāt  tenāyamartha    yatra dharmaṇi vyāpyamasti tatra sarvatra vyāpakasya bhāva eveti vyāpakadharmo vyāptiḥ na tvevamavadhāryate bnāśritamavyāpyasyāpi tatra bhāvāt  nāpi vyāpyasya tatra bhāva evetyavadhāryate sapakṣaikadeśavṛtterahetutvaprāpteḥ  sādhāraṇasya ca hetutvaṃ syāt prameyatvasya nityeṣvavaṃśyambhāvāditi  vyāpakasya dṛṣṭantāvatānāntyāvasthāprāptena tatra liṅgigrahaṇāt prāgeva kāryasya pratyakṣatvāt  apratyakṣatvevāntyāvasthāniścayāyogādanumānaṃ  na ca yastān niścetuṃ śakṣyati tasyānumānamantyakṣaṇānāmarvāgdarśanenāniścayāt  yaḥ kāryotpādonumīyate sa hetoḥ svabhāvovarṇitaḥ kutorthāntarānapekṣatvāt  tenāyamarthaḥ kāryotpādanayogyatāmātrānubandhitvātsvabhāvabhūtā nanu yadāntyāvasthāpekṣaḥ kāryotpādastadā kathamanyānapekṣa ityāha  asāvapītikāryotpādaḥ yathāsannihito yādṛśaḥ sannihitaḥ  kāraṇakalāpaḥ  tādṛśātsannihitānnānyamarthamapekṣata iti tādṛgmātrānubandhī svabhāvaḥ  kasya bhāvaḥ samagrasya kāraṇakalāpasya    santānāpekṣayaitad ucyate na kṣaṇāpekṣayā  janakaḥ kāraṇakalāpasantānonapekṣa ityarthaḥ ayadyapyanapekṣaḥ kāryotpādastathāpyarthāntaratvāt kathaṃ svabhāva ityāha  tatretyādi yasmāttatra samagreṣu kāraṇeṣu samagrāt kāraṇālliṅgāt kāryotpatti sambhava  stathānumīyate  sambhavatyasmāditi sambhavaḥ  kāryotpādanayogyatānumīyata ityarthaḥ etadeva vyanakti  samagrāṇāṃ kāryotpādanayogyatānumānāditi  yogyatā catpādanayogyatānumānāt  yogyatā ca sāmagrīmātrānubandhitvāt svabhāvabhūtavānumitā kiṃ punaḥ sāmagrayāḥ kāryameva nānumīyata iti sāmagrīphalaśaktīnāṃ pariṇāmānubandhini anaikāntikatā kārye pratibandhasya sambhavāt  na hi samagrāṇītyeva kāraṇadravyāṇi svakāryaṃ janayanti  sāmagrījanyaśaktīnāṃpariṇāmāpekṣatvāddhi kāryotpādasya  atrāntare pratibandhasambhavāt na kāryānumānam yogyatāyā dravyāntarānapekṣatvāt na virudhyatenumānam  uttarottaraśaktipariṇāmena nānā kāryotpādanasamarthā śaktipariṇāmapratyayasyānyasyāpekṣaṇīyasyāb bhāvāt   pūrvasajātimātra hetukaśaktiprasūtitvāt  sāmagrīyogyatā hyananyāpekṣisāmagrīmātrānubandhinī kāraṇāntarānapekṣatvāt yadi tarhi kāryotpādanaśaktistanmātrānubandhinī niyatastarhi kāryotpādaiti sa eva kasmānānumīyata iti paraḥ pṛcchati  ki punaḥ sāmagryāḥ sakāśātkāryamevānumīyata ityatrāha sāmagrītyādi  sāmagryāḥ phalañca tāḥ śaktayaścetisāmagrīphalaśaktayaḥ  tathā hi pūrvasmāt samagrāduttarasya samarthasya kṣaṇasyotpattistasyacātmātiśayaḥ śaktiriti sāmagrī phalaṃ śaktistāsāṃ pariṇāmaḥ  uttarottaraprabandhenotpattistadanubandhini tadapekṣiṇi kārye  kāraṇenānumātavyenaikāntikatā kiṅkāraṇaṃ  pratibandha sya  sambhavāt tadvayācaṣṭe  na hotyādi  samagrāṇītyeva sannihitānītyeva kāraṇadravyāṇisvakārya janayanti  kiṅkāraṇaṃ  sāmagrītyādi  sāmagryāḥ sakāśājjanmayāsāṃ śaktīnāntāsāmuttarottarapariṇāmaḥ  pūrvvapūrvvakṣaṇāduttarottaraviśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādo yastadapekṣatvāt kāryotpādasya  atrāntare ceti santānapariṇāmakāle pratibandhasambhavāt nanu yogyatāpyuttarottarakṣaṇapariṇāmapratibaddhā tatrāpi ca pratibandhasambhavāt kathantadanumānamapītyāha  yogyatāyāstvityādi  dravyāntarānapekṣatvātsannihitakāraṇakalāpavyatirekeṇa kāraṇāntarānapekṣatvānna virudhyatenumānaṃ tadevānumānamāha  uttarottaretyādi  pūrvapūrvakṣaṇamupādāyottarasamarthakṣaṇotpādauttarottaraśaktipariṇāmaḥ  tena hetubhūtena kāryotpādanasamartheti sādhyanirdeśaḥ iyaṃ kāraṇasāmagrīti dharmī śaktipariṇāmapratyayasyānyasyāpekṣaṇīyasyābhāvāditi hetuḥ śakteḥ pariṇāmasya yoparaḥ sahakāripratyayastasyāpekṣaṇīyasyābhāvāt  anupalabdhicintāṇītyucyate yā tayaṃ akāryakāraṇabhūtenānyena rasādinā rūpādigatiḥ evaṃ cet sāpi  ekasāmagryadhīnasya rūpāderasato gatiḥ hetu dharmānumānena dhūmendhanavikāra vat kutastahi śakte prasava ityāha  pūrvetyādi  pūrvasajātiḥ sadṛśaḥ pūrvakāraṇakalāpastāvanmātraṃ heturyasyāḥ śaktiprasūteḥ sā tathā  tadbhāvastasmāt ataḥ kāraṇāt sā yogyatānanyāpekṣiṇītyucyate nanu kāryaṃ prati kāraṇasya yogyatā yadi śaktirucyate tadā kāryavyabhicāreyogyatāyā api vyabhicāra iti kathametadanumānaṃ  atha yogyatāsambhava ucyatetadāyamartha syāt kāryaṃ syādvā na veti  tathāpi kathamasyānumānaṃ sandehāditi atrocyate  pareṇa hi kathametadanumānantrividhahetujanyamiti codyate  yadyetadanumānampareṇa samarthyate tadā trivighaliṅgajamevetyā cā ryeṇa pratipādyate  na tvetatparamārthatānumānamityevamparametadityeke  athavā yadyekāntena kāryotpādana byogyatānumīyate  tadā vyabhicārādanumānaṃ na syāt  yadā tu kadācit kāryaṃ syādityevaṃrūpaḥ sambhavonumīyate tadā kathamasya vyabhicāraḥ  tenāyamartha uttarottarapariṇāme yadi prabandhābhāvastadā kāryaṃ syādanyadā tu nāstīti  parokte tvekāntenakāryānumāne vyabhicāra eva anye tu pariṇāmavatyāṃ sāmagrayāṃ pratibaṃndhakābhāve satyekāntena kāryotpādanayogyatā bhavatīti saivānumīyate  kāryotpādanayogyatāpratītiśca kāryamapi viśeṣaṇatvenākṣipatīti na pṛthak kāryānumānaṃ kriyata iti manyante  kevalaṃ sāmagrīmātrātkāryānumāne vyabhicāra ucyate pratibandhakābhāvaḥ kathampratipanna iti cet   satyaṃ  yo hi taṃ jñātuṃ śaknoti tasyaitadanumānaṃ yo hi dhūmasyāgnijanyatvaṃ jñātuṃśaknoti tasya dhūmādagnyanumānaṃ nānyasya tadvat yā tarhotyādinā punarapi tridhaiva sa ityasya vyāghātamāha akāryakāraṇabhūtena  anumeyādarthādanyenāsvabhāvena rasādinā  ādiśabdād gandhādinārūpādigatiḥ  atrāpyādiśabdāt sparśādigrahaṇaṃ  andhakāre hi mātuluṅgādirasamāsvādya  campakagandhamāghrāya  heca sparśamanubhūya  teṣāṃ rūpasāmānyamanumīyate tathā vahnirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatsparśaḥ  sā kathantrividhe hetāvantarbhavatītiprakṛte na cāpramāṇamiyantato liṅgāntaraprasaṃga ityāha  sāpītyādi  sāpi gatiriti sambandha  rūpādeḥ kimviśiṣṭasyaikasāmagryadhīnasya  rasasya janikā yāsāmagrī tasyāmeva sāmagryāmāyattasya rasato liṅgādyā gatiḥ  sā he tudharmānumānena  rasasya yo hetuḥ pūrvamapādānantasya yo dharmo rūpajanakatvantasyānumānena tenāyamartho rasāt sakaśāt taddhetorasasamānakālabhāvi rūpajanakatvanniścīyate evaṃ hi tasya rasasamānakālabhāvi rūpajanakatvaṃ niścīyate  yadi samānakālabhāvino rūpasyāpi niścayaḥ syāttenātītaikakālānāmekaiva gatiḥ kāryaliṅgajā nanvanabhihitād rasahetoḥ sakāśāt paścātsamānakālasya rupasyānumānaṃ hetoḥkāryānumāne vyabhicārāt  kāryotpādanayogyatānumāne ca na rasasamānakālasyarūpasyānumānaṃ syāt anumitānumānapratīterabhāvācca  tena yaducyate yadātītānāṃ gatistadā kāryaśca talliṅgaśca  tasmājjāteti kāryaliṅgajāyadā tu samānakālānāṅgatistadā kāryaṃ liṅgaṃ yasya hetudharmānumānasya tatkāryaliṅgantasmājjātā kāryaliṅgajeti tadapāstaṃ  tatra pare mā cāvayavidravyerūpādayo guṇā vyavasthitāstena tatra rūpāderasato gatiryuktā  na bauddhānāṃ rūpādivyatirekeṇāvayavinonabhyupagamāt na dharmiṇobhāvāt  dharmiṇamantareṇa cānumānea rasato rūpāde sarvatrānumānaprasaṅgāt   asamudāyaśca sādhya syāt  apakṣadharmaścahetuḥ syāt  nāpi hetudharmānumānaṃ yujyate rūpādikāryatvena rasāderapratipannatvāt na ca kṣaṇikapakṣamaniścityaivamucyate  kṣaṇikatve hi rūpāde samānajātīyakāryatvaṃsyānna rasādikāryatvaṃ pratibandhagrāhakābhāvāt  na kṣaṇānāmanumānānumeyavyavahāraḥsambandhāniścayāt  santānāśrayeṇa tvanumānādivyavahāre rūpādisantā nānāṃ naparasparaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratipanna iti kathamanumānānumeyavyavahāra iti evammanyate  na sarvatrarasāde rūpādyanumānamapi tvāmrādau dharmiṇi  tatra carūpādīnāṃ parasparāvinirbhāgarbhāga    niyama pratīyata eva    sa ca pratibandha konyathā ghaṭapaṭādīnāmapi parasparāvinirbhāganiyama syāt  pratibandhaścateṣāṃ na tādātmyaṃ bhedena pratīter  nāpi tadutpattiḥ samānakālatvāt  na caikārthasamavāyasteṣāṃ yato na tāvadasamavetānāṃ samavāyabalādekārthasamavāyaḥ samavāyasyaivābhāvāt  atiprasaṅgācca  samavetānāmapi ki samavāyena svahetubhya eva tathāniṣpatteḥ  tathā niṣpattyaiva vācyābhiṣānād gamakatvam  tasmādekasāmagryadhīnatvaṃpratibandhaḥ  niścitapratibandhasya cānyasmin kālenumānaṃ  yadyapi cātrāvayavīna vidyate tathāpyāmrādipratyayaviṣayasya dhamitvantena tatra rasato rūpādigatiḥ nanu tathāpi kathameṣāmekasāmagryadhīnatvaṃ  yato yai   yenai  va svabhāvena rūpaṃ anupalabdhicintārūpaṃ janayati na tenaiva rasādikaṃ janayati teṣāṃ parasparābhedaprasaṃgāt  nāpyanyenānyaṃjanayati tasya svabhāvabhedaprasaṃgāt naiṣa doṣo yasmāt  na tatra rūpasya pūrvvameka kāryajanakatvaṃ yenāyandoṣaḥkintvekakālamanekakāryajanakatvameva  tatastasyaivotpattidarśanāt syāt na ca kāraṇasya kāryābhāva eva kāraṇatvaṃ yenānekamekasmādutpadyamānamekaṃ prasajyetakintu kāryotpattau prāgbhāva eva tasya kāraṇatvaṃ loke  yathā caikakāryotpattau tasyaprāgbhāvakāraṇatvantathā kalāpotpattāvapi dṛṣṭatvāt  yadvā yenaiva svabhāvena rūpaṃrūpaṃ janayati tenaiva rasādikamapi svarūpabhedastveṣāmupādānabhedakṛto na sahakārikṛtaḥ tathā hi vāyau sparśasadbhāvepi rūpādyabhāvād rūpādyanutpattiḥ  agnau ca rūpādisadbhāvepi rasābhāvād rasānutpattiḥ  apsu rasādibhāvepi gandhābhāvād gandhānutpattistena rasādeniyataṃ kāraṇaṃ rasādirevāvasīyate  niyataṃ ca kāraṇamupādānakāraṇaṃ samānajātīyamabhinnasantānavatti vā  tasmādupādānakāraṇabhedād rūpādīnāṃ svabhāvabhedaḥ yatpunarucyate  tatrānekaśaktīnāṃ samuccayaḥ  tena rūpamekayā śaktyā rūpaṃjanayatyanyānyayā rasādikamiti tadayuktam  anekaśaktidvāreṇāpye kasyāne kāryakāraṇābhyupagamenekatva bprasaṅgonivārita eva bhāvasyānekaśaktīnāmevānekasvabhāvatvāt  abhinnatvāccaśaktīnāṃ śaktibhede rūpasya bhedaprasaṅgaḥ  bhede vā śaktīnāṃ rūpasyākārakatvaprasaṅgāt na ca śaktiyogāt kārakatvamaśaktasya śaktiyogābhāvāt  śaktasyāpiki śaktiyogena svarūpeṇaiva kārakatvācchakteśca kārakatvaṃ na syācchaktiyogābhāvāt  atha śaktitvānna sā śaktimapekṣate  bhāvopi tarhi śa f  ktatvātkimiti śaktimapekṣate yopi mī māṃ sa ko manyate  bhāvasya svarūpātiśaya eva śaktiḥ sā ca bhinnābhinnā  yato bhāve gṛhyamāṇe śaktirna gṛhyateto bhāvād bhinnā  kāryānyathānupapattyā tu sā bhāvasyābhinnānyathā bhāvasya kārakatvanna syāt  taduktaṃ    śaktayaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ kāryārthāpattikalpitā iti   sopi nirastaḥ  ekasyāḥ śaktebhinnābhinnarūpatvavirodhāt  kiṃ cārthāpattyā kāryāt prāgbhāvina eva bhāvasyābhinnā śaktiḥ kalpyatāṃ iti prāgbhāvaeva śakti    sa ca pratyakṣasiddha iti kathaṃ na śaktiḥ pratyakṣā  kevalaṃ sā kārya darśanānniścīyate tasmāt kāryād rasādeḥ kāraṇa dharmānumānād asya kāryahetāvantarbhāvaḥ  dhūmesghanavikāravaditi  yathā dhūmādagnyādisāmagryanumitau bhasmātatra hetureva tathābhūtonumīyate  tasya hetuḥ  tathā hiśaktipravṛttyā na vinā rasaḥ saivānyakāraṇam ityatī taikakālānāṃ gatistat  kāryaliṅgajā pravṛttaśaktirūpopādānakāraṇasya sahakāripratyayo rasaṃ janayati  indhanavikāra viśeṣopādānahetusahakāripratyayaḥ san dhūmajananatulyavat  tathā hiśaktipravṛttam  svakāraṇasya phalotpādanābhimukhyena vinā na rasa  utpadyatesaivānyakāraṇam  rūpopādānahetūnāṃ pravṛttikāraṇam  rasopādānakāraṇapravṛttirapirasopādānakāraṇapravṛtteḥ sahakāriṇī  tasmāt yathābhūtāddhetorutpannastathābhūtamanumāpayan rūpamanumāpayati ṅgārādīndhanavikārānumiti  tadvat nanu ca rasakāryeṇānumitāt kāraṇāt sakāśāt samānakālina kāryasyānu mānamidaṃ na tu hetudharmānumānamityata āha  tatreti  rasād rūpe pratipattau heturevatathābhūta iti rūpajananasambandhonumate  yasminnanumīyamāne kāryāntaramapitadviśeṣaṇanniścitambhavati  na tvanumitāt kāraṇāt paścāt kāryāntaramanumeyaṃ kuta ityāha  hi yasmāt  pravṛttā na pratibaddhā śaktiryasya tat pravṛttaśakti tathābhūtaṃ ca tadrūpopāvānakāraṇaṃ ceti tathoktaṃ  tasya sahakāripratyayaḥ san  rasahetū rasaṃjanayati  tathābhūte ca hetāvanumiterthād rūpānumānaṃ rūparasayorekasāmagryadhīnatvāt indhanavikāraviśeṣo bhasmāṅgārādiḥ tasyopādānaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ tasya sahakāripratyayogniḥ tasya yathā dhūmajananantena tulyantadvad rūparasayorekasāmagryadhīnatvaṃ tathā hotyādinā samarthayate śaktipravṛtteti sūtraṃ   asya vyākhyānaṃ svakāraṇasyetyādi  svakāraṇasyeti rasasya yat svakāraṇantasya phalotpādanaṃ pratītirasotpādanaṃ pratyābhimukhyenānuguṇyena vinā na rasa utpadyate  saṃveti śaktipravṛttaḥ anyakāraṇamityasya vyākhyānaṃ rūpopādānetyādi  rūpasya ya upādānahetavaḥ pūrvalakṣaṇasaṅgṛhītā rūpaparamāṇavasteṣāṃ rūpajananampratyābhimukhyaṃ pravṛttistasyāḥ kāraṇaṃ b rasahetunaiva sahakāriṇā rūpopādānasya svakāryaṃ pratyābhimukhyāt  sāpi ra sopāvānakāraṇapravṛttī rūpopādānakāraṇasya rūpajananamprati yā pravṛttistayā saha kattuṃśīlaṃ yasyā rasopādānakāraṇapravṛttaḥ sā tathoktā  yata evantasmād yathābhūtāddhetoriti pravṛttaśaktirūpopādānakāraṇasahitāt pūrvakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītād rasāiti tatrāpi atītānāmekakālānāṃca gatiḥ nānāgatānāṃ vyabhicārāt tasmādiyamapi kāryaliṅgajā  tena nānyo heturgamakaḥ  apratibaddhasvabhāvasyāvinābhāvaniyamābhāvāt lliṅgatvenābhimato rasa utprastathābhūtameva hetumanumāpayan gamayan samānakā laṃrūpaṃ gamayati  tenāyamartho hetuniścaya evedṛśo nānyaḥ na punaranumitāt kāraṇāt paścāt kāryānumānaṃ  yataśca kāryajanakatvenaivahetuṣarmaniścayo nānyathā tenaivāha  iti tatrāpītyādi  iti anena dvāreṇa  tatrāpirasāde rūpādyanumānetītānāmekakālānāṃ ca gatiḥ  rasopādānasamānakālabhāvinotītāḥ  liṅgabhūtarasasahabhāvina ekakālāsteṣāṅgatiḥ  nānāgatānāmvarttamānena liṃgenānumānaṃ vyabhicārāt  anāgataṃ hi kāraṇāntarapratibaddhatatra pratibandhavaikalyasambhavānna bhavedapi  yaccādyodayāt śvaḥ sūryodayādyanumānannatadanumā niyāmakaliṅgābhāvāt  adya gardabhadarśanāt śvaḥ sūryodayānumānavat tasmādiyamapi rasāde rūpādigatiḥ kārya liṅgajetyanumānaṃ  yataśca sādhyāyattatvena heturgamakastena kāraṇena trividhāddhetornānyo hetuḥ saṃyogyādirgamakosti  kasmāttādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ liṅginya pratibaddhasvabhāvasyāvinābhāvaniyamābhāvāt etaduktambhavati  na tāvadaśliṣṭānāṃ saṃyogosti  śliṣṭānāmapi ki saṃyogenasvahetubhyaḥ eva śliṣṭānāmutpatte  tasmānna saṃyogavaśād gamakatvamapratibaddhatvāt  ghaṭaghaṭayoriva  tathā pṛthaksiddhānānna samavāyaḥ  apṛthasiddhānāmapiki samavāyena svahetubhya evoparyuparibhāvena niṣpattestena na samavāyenāpi gamakatvaṃ sādhyāyattatvābhāvānna ca samavāyostīti vakṣyati  ata evaikārthasamavāyinorabhāva iti pūrvamevoktaṃ rasāyanumāne  virodhī cānupalabdhāvantarbhāvitaḥ yacca nai yā yi koktaṃ pūrvavaccheṣavatsāmānyato sandigdhasya nairātmyasyāpya vyāpticintāabhyupagamāt siddhamiti cet  kayamidānīmātmasiddhiḥ  anyasyāapramāṇikākathaṃ nairātmya siddhiḥ  abhyupagamena hi sātmakānātmakau vibhajyatatra bhāvenagamakatvaṃ kathayatāpi āgamikatvamātmani pratipannaṃ nānumeyatvam  tasmādadarśane nāpi ātmano nivṛttyasiddhe  rnāsti kutaścit tatrivṛttiḥ  nivṛttāvapiprāṇādīnāṃ sambandhābhāvāt sarvatra nivṛttyasiddheḥ na gamakatvam yāpyasiddhiyojanā tathā sapakṣe sanasannitye vamādiṣvapi yathāyogamudāhāyaṃmityevamāvi  sāpi na vācyāsiddhiyojanā siddhiriti yāvat bauddhana nairātmyamabhyugatamatobhyupagamānnirātmakatvaṃ ghaṭādeḥ siddhamiti cet yadi bauddhābhyupagamaḥ pramāṇaṃ kathamidānīmātmasiddhirjīvaccharīre  tadapi bauddhenanirātmakamiṣṭaṃ  jīvaccharīre nairātmyābhyupagamopramāṇakastatosyātmā sādhyataiti  yadyevaṃ parasyāpi jīvaccharīrādanyasyāpi ghaṭāderapramāṇikā kathaṃ nairātmyasiddhiḥ  na hi bauddhasyābhyupagamaḥ kvacitpramāṇaṃ kvacinneti  kiṃ cābhyupagamenakevalena sātmakānātmako vibhajya ghaṭādayaḥ pareṇāsmābhiścānātmakā abhyupagatāḥ  tenānātmakāḥ  jīvaccharīraṃ sātmakamasmābhirabhyupagatantvayā tu nirātmakamevamvibhajya tatra nirātmakeṣu prāṇādīnāmabhāve nātmaviṣaye gamakatvaṃ kathayatāpareṇāgamikatvamātmani pratipannaṃ nānumeyatvaṃ  tasmādātmano ghaṭādā vadarśanepyadṛśyasvabhāvasyātmano nivṛttya siddhernāsti kutaścinni rātmakāt prāṇādennivṛ attirityagamakatvaṃ  etattāvannaivātmanaḥ kutaścinnivṛttiḥ siddhā  abhyupagamyatūcyate  tannivṛttāvapyātmanivṛttāvapi kvaciditi dṛṣṭe ghaṭādau nivṛttāvāpe prāṇādonāmapratibandhādātmanā saha sambandhābhāvāt  sarvatrādṛṣṭeṣvapi ghaṭādiṣvātmanivṛttyā prāṇādīnāṃ nivṛttyasiddheḥ sandigdhavyatirekitvād na gamakatvaṃ adarśanamātrād vyatirekābhyupagame satyayamaparo doṣa ityāha  yāpītyādi kā puna setyāha  tathā kāraṇaṃ nivarttamānaṃ kāryamavaśyaṃnivarttayati  yadyapi vāsagṛhādāvagnikāraṇa nivṛttāvapi na dhūmasya nivṛttistathāpidṛṣṭakāraṇavyatirekeṇa nānyasmādasyotpattirabhipretetyartha  ata evāha  siddhastvityādi  siṃddhastu kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kāryasya svabhāvaṃ kāraṇe niyamayati  satitasminbhavatyasati na bhavatītyevantadavyabhicāriṇaṃ karoti  ubhayatheti tādātmyenatadutpattyā vā yaḥ svabhāvapratibandhastasmādeva  sādhyanivṛttyā hetonivṛttiḥ anyatheti yadi pratibandho neṣyate  ekasyāpratibandhakasya sādhyasya nivṛttyānyanivṛttiḥ  apratibaddhasya sādhanadharmasya nivṛtiḥ kathambhavet    naiva  yasmānnāśvavānityaśvarahita iti kṛtvā matyena manuṣyeṇa na bhāvyaṃ gomatāpi kiṃ sannidhānāttathaikasyeti svabhāvenāsambaddhasya hetoḥ sannidhānāt kathamanyasya sādhyasyasannidhinaiva sannidhānaṃ  yasmād   gomānityeva martyena bhāvyamaśvavatāpi ki tasmāt svabhāvapratibandhādeva hetuḥ sādhyaṃ gamayati  sa ca tadbhāvalakṣaṇastadutpattilakṣaṇo vā avinābhāvākhyaḥ tābhyāṃ pradaryate  tasmād vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte neṭovaśyamihāśrayaḥ tadbhāve  ca tannati vacanādapi tadgateḥ yataḥ tadbhā va hetubhāvau hi dṛṣṭānte tadavedinaḥ khyāpyetedṛṣṭānte hi sādhyadharmasya tadbhāvaḥ tanmātrānubandhena tatsvabhāvatvena khyāpyate yata evantasmāt svabhāvapratibandhādeva sādhyābhimate vastuni pratibaddhatvādevahetuḥ svasādhyaṅgamayati  na tu sambandhāt  kāryakāraṇayorasahabhāvena vyāpya vyāpakayoścaikatvena dviṣṭhasambandhābhāvāt  sa ceti svabhāvapratibandhaḥ  tadbhāvalakṣaṇa iti sādhyasvabhāvalakṣaṇastadutpattilakṣaṇo vā  sa eva svabhāvapratibandhosvinābhāvākhyaḥ sādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ pradaśyate etaduktambhavati  sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratibandhagrāhakameva pramāṇaṃ vyāptigrāhakantenaiva sādhanasya sādhyāyattatāgrahaṇāt sādhyābhāvebhāvo gṛhīta eva kevalantadavinābhāvagrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ vismṛtatvād dṛṣṭāntābhyāmupadarśyate  yataśca pramāṇakhyāpanādevāvinābhāvasmṛtyā sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāvo niścito bhavati   tasmād vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte  tadviṣayevaśyaṃ niyamena iha hetau kāryasvabhāvalakṣaṇaāśrayo vastubhūto dharmī neṣṭaḥ svabhāvānupalambhe tviṣṭa eva tatra hi viparyayeṇopalambhaḥ khyāpanīyaḥ  kiṅkāraṇam  āśrayo neṣṭa ityāha tadabhāve cetyādi  tadabhāve vyāpakakāraṇayorabhāve taddyāpyakāryākhyaṃ liṅgaṃ netina bhavatītyevaṃ vaidharmyavacanād ayyāśrayarahitāttadgatervyatirekagate   bkiṅkāraṇaṃ  yata ityādi  svabhāvahetau sādhyasya tadbhāvaḥ sādhanavyāpakatvaṃ  kāryahetau sādhyasya hetubhāvaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ syāpyate  tadavedina iti tadbhāvahetubhāvāvedinaḥ puṃsaḥ taddyācaṣṭe  dṛṣṭānte hotyādi  sādhyadharmasya tadbhāvaḥ sādhanasvabhāvatvaṃkhyāpyate tanmātrānubandhena  sādhanamātrānubandhena  kṛtaka tva niṣpattāvevaniṣpannasyānityatvasya kṛtakamātrānubandhena yā tatsvabhāvatā sādhanasvabhāvatātayā  evaṃbhūtayā tadbhāva syāpyate  na tu nimittāntarāt paścād utpadya vyāpticintāyaḥ kṛtakaṃ svabhāve janayati sonityarūpameva santaṃ janayatīti pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntena khyāpyate anyathā ekadharmasadbhāvāt tadanyenāpi bhavitavyamiti niyamābhāvātvyabhicārāśaṃkā syāt  tena ca pramāṇena sādhyadharmasya tanmātrānubandhaḥ khyāpyatesvakāraṇādeva tathā jāto naśvaraḥ kṣaṇasthitidharmā  anyataḥ tadbhāvaniṣedhāt hetubhāvo vā satyeva bhāvāditi pradarśyaterthāntarasya tathā tadbhāvahetubhāve prasiddhe sati anitya tvābhāve kṛtakatvābhāvaḥ  bdahanābhāvepi dhūmaḥ  evaṃ svabhāvo hetuśca cet kathaṃ svaṃ svabhāvaṃ hetuṃ cāntareṇamānenānityatvena  yathaike vipratipannā iti  tanmātravatvameva darśayannāha  yaityādi  yo hetuḥ kṛtakaṃ svabhāve janayati sonityarūpameva santaṃ janayatītyarthaḥ iti anena dvāreṇāvinābhāvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntena syāpyate  na tu darśanārśanamātraṃ  anyatheti yadyevaṃ pramāṇaṃ nopa darśyate  tadaikadharmasadbhāvāt sādhanadharmasadbhāvāt  tadanyenāpi sādhyadharmeṇāpi bhavitavyamiti niyamābhāvāt sādhanasyasādhyavyabhicārāśaṃkā syāt yadi nāma dṛṣṭāntena pramāṇamupadarśanīyantathāpi kiṃ siddhamityāha  tena capramāṇena tanmātrānubandha iti sādhanamātrānubandhaḥ  kathaṃ khyāpyata ityāha  kṛtakasya yatkāraṇantasmādeva kṛtakastathā jāto jāto yo naśvaraḥ kṣaṇasthitidharmā kṣaṇikatvenaiva naśvaro na tu kālāntaraṃ sthitvetyarthaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ svahetoreva tathotpanna ityāha  anyata iti svahetoranyasmādvināśahetoḥ  tasya kṛtakasya tadbhāvaniṣedhād anityatāsvabhāvaniṣedhād vakṣyamāṇakāt  hetubhāvo vā  tena ca pramāṇena khyāpyata iti sambandhaḥ  sādhyadharmasyasādhanaṃprati hetubhāvo vā kāraṇa tvamvā khyāpyate tasmin satyeva sādhanasya bhāvādityanena prakāreṇa pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntena pradarśyate  kasya punaḥ sādhyasya hetubhāva pradaryata ityāha  arthāntarasya sādhanād vyatiriktasya  tathā dṛṣṭāntopadarśitenapramāṇena prasiddhe tadbhāvahetubhāve  svabhāvasya sādhyasya tadbhāve  sādhanasvabhāvatve kāraṇasya hetubhāve prasiddhe sati  dahanābhāve dhūmo na bhavatīti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ sa ityanityasvabhāvo vahniśca  tasyeti kṛtakatvasya dhūmasya ca yathākramaṃ svabhāvoheturvā  vā śabdaḥ samuccaye  yata evaṃ kathamasau kṛtako dhūmo vā svaṃ svabhāvamanityaṃhetuṃ cāgnimantareṇa bhavet    naiva bhavedityevamanuddiṣṭarūpe viṣaye vyatirekeT Bampo gñispa dvitīyamāhikaṃ bampoSlokasbhavet  evaṃ āśrayamantareṇāpi vaidhayaṃdṛṣṭānte vyatirekaḥ prasidhyati yeṣāṃ tadbhāvahetubhāvī prasiddhau teṣāṃ viduṣāṃ vācyo hetureva hi kevalaḥ yadartha dṛṣṭāntavacanaṃ sortha siddha eveti tadā ki tadvacanena  tatpradarśanepiki vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāśrayeṇeti manyamāna ācārya āśrayaṃ pratikṣipati tenaiva jñātasambandhe dvayoranyataroktitaḥ arthāt dvitīyepi smṛtiḥ samupajāyate yadāha arthāpattyānyatareṇa vā ubhayapradarśanāt iti  tatrāpi dṛṣṭāntenakathyamāne āśrayamaṃntareṇāpi vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte prasidhyati vyatirekaḥ tena yaducyate bhaṭṭo dyotakarā bhyāṃ vyatirekopi liṃgasya vipakṣānnaiva labhyate abhāve sa na gamyeta niścitānvayavyatirekakāle yadapi mūḍhaṃ prati dṛṣṭāntapradarśanaṃ kriyate tadā tatpradarśanepi dṛṣṭāntapradarśanepivaidharmyaṃ  vināpyāśrayeṇa yathoktavidhinā sidhyatyeva vyatirekaḥ  tataḥ kimvaidhayaṃdṛṣṭāntāśrayeṇeti manyamāna ācārya āśrayaṃ pratikṣipati nyāyamu khā dau tathā hi tatraivaṃ coditaṃ yadā tarhyākāśādikaṃ nityantā  vada  bhyupaiti prativādī tadā kathannityāt kṛtakatvasya vyatireka iti  tatrā cā rya āśrayaṃpratikṣipannāha  tadā sandeha eva nāsti tadabhāvāttatrāvṛtteriti etaduktambhavati  gṛhītapratibandhasya tatrākāśādau vyāpakābhāvād vyāpyābhāvasiddheḥ  anityābhāvaśca nityasyāsa tvāt siddha iti yāvat  yasmādadṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ pratibandhaḥ kathyate  tena kāraṇena jñātasambandhe hetau sati dvayoḥ sādhamayaṃvaidharmya dṛṣṭāntayoranyataroktitaḥ  dvitīyepi tābhyāmevānyatarasminnanuktepismṛtiḥ samupajāyaterthāpattyā  vyāpticintātadbhāvahetubhāvapradarśanaṃ manyamānorthāpattyā ekasya vacanena dvitīyasya siddhimāha tathā hi  yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityamevetyukte anarthāntare vyaktamayamasya svabhāvaḥtanmātrānubandhī pramāṇadṛṣṭa iti niścitaṃḥ tadbhāvaniyamāt etadapyācāryavacanena saṃsyandayannāha  yadāhetyādi  nyāya mu khe cāyaṃgranthaḥ vāśabdastatraiva pūrvavikalpāpekṣī anyatareṇeti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntena vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntena vā  ubhayapradarśanād anvayavyatirekapradarśanāt  tatrāpi granthe  vṛṣṭāntenasvabhāvahetau kāryaṃhetau ca yathā kāraṇamavaśyambhavati  na ca tattasya svabhāva ityata āha anarthāntara iti  kathantanmātrānubandhītyāha  tadbhāvaniyamāditi  kṛtakabhāve vaśyamanityatābhāvādityarthaḥ nanu na kṛtakamātrānubandhī svabhāvo nityatvasya pratyakṣaniścitaḥ kṣaṇikoyamityaniścayāttatkathaṃmucyate pramāṇadṛṣṭa iti  atha kṛtako vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣatvāttadbhāvaniyata ityanumānadṛṣṭa   tadayuktaṃ  yato nirhetukepi pūrvakamiti kathaṃ kramapratītiḥ  yo hi pūrvaIivastupratipatyanantaramaparasya grāhakaḥ sa kramagrāhī syāt tathā vā kṣaṇikatvamasyasyāt  yasya ca bauddha sya kāla eva nāsti tasya kathaṃ kramagrahaḥ  bhinnakālavastvagrahāt kālābhāve cānekavasturūpa eva kramaḥ  tathā ca nityasyāpi kramakartṛtvaṃna virudhyate  yathā ca nityasya kramakartṛtvādanekarūpatvantathā kṣaṇasyāpi syāt atha kṣaṇavad dvitīye kathaṃ sattvasya kṣaṇikasvabhāvatvamiti śaṃ ka ra prabhṛtayaḥ bhavatu vā prakārāntarābhāvāt kramayogapadyābhyāṃ sattvasya vyāptistathāpi nityeṣu na pratyakṣādinā kramākramāyogaḥ siddho dhūmo nāstītiarthād vyatirekasiddhiḥ  tathā vaidharmyeṇa abhāvāsiddheḥ anvayasmṛtiḥ vyatirekaḥsyāt  ekasadbhāvenyaprasiddhyarthaṃ tadabhāvesambhavāt dṛṣṭāntena yathokta svabhāvapratibandhoyameva tasyapratiṣedhahetuḥ  pratiṣedha viṣayavyavahārasya heturiti taddheturityuktaḥ  tathābhūtānupalambhasya svayaṃ pratiṣedharūpatvāt kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhī ityubhayaṃ hetuḥ itīyaṃ trivi  dhāpyuktā tasmāttadutpattyaivārthāntarasyārthāntareṇāvinābhāvaḥ anyathetyāsatyāntadutpattau paraiḥ sādhyābhimataiḥ parasyānātmābhūtasya ligasyakovaśyambhāvaniyamaḥ  anarthāntare tu liṅge tanmātrānubandhitvaṃ bhinnahetuko vā tatsvabhāvo yuktaḥ  ayameva bhedo bhāvānāṃ kāraṇabhedo viruddhadharmādhyāsakāraṇabhedau vā tau ced na bhedakau tadā na kasyacit kutaścidapi bheda iti ekaṃ dravyaṃ viśvaṃsyāt  tataśca sahotpattivināśau sarvasya ca sarvatropayogaḥ syāt  anyathā eka mityeva na syāt  nāmāntaraṃ  vā arthamabhyupagamya tathābhidhānāt tvasyeṣyate tasmin vā dharmevaśyambhāvaniyamaḥ kaḥ  kimiva vāsasi rāgavat niṣpanne vāsasi kusumbhādi nimitto yo rāgaḥ paścādbhāvī tatra yathā nāvaśyambhāvaniyamastadvadanityatvasyārthāntarahetutva iṣyamāṇe nakevalamayandoṣoyamaparo doṣa ityāha  api cetyādi  arthāntaranimitto nityatvākhyo dharmaḥ syādanya eva  tasmāt svabhāvabhūtāt kṛtakādestathāhi sādhyadharmasyārthāntaranimittatvābhyupagame dvayamiṣṭaṃ sādhananiṣpattāvaniṣpattibhi nahetukatvaṃ ca  etacca nāntareṇa svabhāvabhedaṃ ghaṭate  yasmānna hi tasmin sādhanasvabhāveniṣpannepyaniṣpanno bhinnahetuko vā sādhyadharmastatsvabhāvo yuktaḥ  pūrvaniṣpannasyabhinnahetukasya ca liṃṅgasya svabhāvo yukto yasmādayameva khalu lokapratīto bhedobhāvānāṃ yo viruddhadharmādhyāso viruddhadharmayogaḥ  niṣpattyaniṣpattī cātra viruddhaudharmau tathāyameva bhedaheturbhedasya janako yaḥ kāraṇabheda sāmagrībhedaścātra kāraṇabhedo draṣṭavyaḥ  etena bhedasvarūpabhedakāraṇañcoktaṃ bhedapratibhāsastu bhedagrāhakaḥ  tau ced biruddhagharmādhyāsakāraṇabhedau na bhedakāviśye  ye  te  tadā na kasyacidvastunaḥ kutaścidarthād bheda ityekandravyaviśvaṃsamastañjagat syāt  traiguṇyasyāviśeṣādaikyaṃ sarvasyeṣṭameveti cedāha  tataścetyekatvāt sahotpattivināśau  ekasyotpāde sarvasyotpādo vināśe ca syāt  bahūnāmekamiti saṃjñā kṛtā syāt kiṅkāraṇama  arthaṃ parasparabhinna mabhyupagamya tathābhidhānāt  ekamityabhidhānāt  MinthadadparSaddonanu anarthāntarahetutvepi bhāvakālenityatāniṣpatteḥ nīlapratibhāse kṣaṇapratibhāsa ucyate  Pramāavārtika    vyāpticintāmkṣaṇāpratibhāsanācca na santānarūpasya nīlasya pratibhāsaḥ  atha nīlamātrapratibhāse sati kṣaṇikatvapratibhāsaḥ  tadayuktaṃ  pratibhāsāpratibhāsābhyāṃ hi pratyakṣasya grahaṇāgrahaṇe nānyathā  tadāha  tad yadapi gṛhṇāti tatpratibhāseneti na ca kṣaṇānāṃ pratibhāsa ityuktaṃ yadi ca nīlādyavyatiriktaṃ kṣaṇikatvantadā nīlaniścaye kṣaṇikatvasya niścitatvādanumānasya vaiyarthyaṃ syāt  yastvāha  ekajñānaviṣayatvameva kṣaṇikatvaṃpūrvottarajñānaviṣaya tvavyāvṛttasyaiva cedānīntanajñānaviṣayatvasya pratibhāsanāt   pūrvāparakṣaṇavilakṣaṇa eva kṣaṇa pratyakṣeṇānubhūtaniścitonumānena tu pratyakṣavṛttamevaparāmṛśyata iti nānumānasya vaiyarthyamiti tadayuktaṃ  yato yadyekajñānasyākṣaṇikatvantadārthasyāpyakṣaṇikatvaṃ vivekapratibhāsaḥsumerubhinnapratibhāsavat  sa ca kṣaṇasyāpyastye veṃti kathaṃ na vivekapratibhāsaḥ dṛṣṭo dṛśyata iti pratīteśca  anyo hi dṛṣṭaḥ svabhāvonyaśca dṛśyamānaḥ tathā hiprathamadarśī dṛśyamānameva svabhāvambhāvasya paśyati na tu dṛṣṭamityanayorbheda eva kevalamekāntasadṛśayoḥ pūrvāparakṣaṇayorabhāvenāvyavadhānād ghaṭapaṭādivad vibhāgapratipattinaṃ bhavati  nāpi svarūpapratibhāsaevānyasmāda vivekapratibhāsaḥ  tathaikasyāpi kṣaṇasya syāta  kevalaṃ pūrvaḥ kṣaṇaḥkasmānna vibhāgena smaryaṃta iti yadi paraṃ codyaṃ syāttatra coktameva sadṛśāparotpattivipralabdhairna smaryata iti nanu tathāpi kṣaṇo na pratibhāsate  ekāṇvatyayakālatvenaiva bhāvasyāpratīteḥna tu yadyekasmin kṣaṇesyāpratibhāsaḥ kathamakṣaṇikasya pratibhāsaḥ pratikṣaṇamapratibhāsanāt utpadyamānasya ca bhāvasya pūrvāpararūpaviviktasya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇātkathaṃ kṣaṇikatvagrahaḥ  nāpyakṣaṇika pratīyate pūrvāparakālayorapratibhāsādeva tatsamvandhitayedānīṃ pratyakṣepratibhāsanāt pūrvakālasambandhisvabhāvasyedānīmapratibhāsaeva vināśonyasvabhāvasya pratibhāsa evotpāda iti kathamucyate pūrvottarakṣaṇānāṃvināśotpādāpratibhāsanād akṣaṇika iti  nāpyanekakṣaṇarūpa idānīntanaḥ kālonekakṣaṇasambhave gṛhītādirūpatāsya syāt na vyarthatā na hi pratyakṣabhāvinā niścayenedānīmevedamastīti niścīyate  kintahīṃdānīmastīti  anumānena tvidānīmevāstīti kathaṃ bhrāntistadāha bhaṭṭaḥ nityaṃ sadṛśa eveti yatra rūḍhā matirbhavet sa iti pratyabhijñānaṃ bhrāntistatrāvakalpate iha nityaṃ sa eveti vijñānaṃ jāyate dṛḍhaṃ tadastitvātirekācca prāmāṇyantasya yujyate deśakālādibhedena tatrāstyavasaro mitaḥ idānīntanamastitvaṃ na hi pūrvadhiyo gataṃ  na ca sarvadānumānena sadṛśaniścayaḥ  pratyakṣapratyabhijñābādhitatvāt pratyabhijñāyā anumānotthānābhāvāt katha manena kṣaṇikatvānumānabādhā byadvā vastunaḥ pūrvakālasambandhitvamidānīmasadeva  pūrvakālābhāvāt  sattvevāsya varttamānakālasambandhitvameva syānna pūrvakālasambandhitvaṃ virodhādityuktaṃ kathamanumānabādhā  yatra cākṣavyāpārastadgrāhakaṃpratyakṣamutpadyate  na ca pūrvakālāstitvedhunā kva vyāpārosannihitatvāt  nāpitadabhedena tatkathaṃ pūrvottarakālāstitvayoraikyagrāhakaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt  yadā cabālādyavasthāyāṃ dṛṣṭa vṛddhāvasthāyāṃ pratyabhijñāyate  na tatra vā pratyabhijñānenityatvaṃ pratibhāsate  kevalaṃ sa evāyamiti tattvamadhyavasīyate  na ca tattvambālavṛddhāvasthayorbhedāt  nāpināpi tattvagrahaṇānyathānupapattyā nityatvādikalpanā sadṛśāparotpattibhrāntinimittādapyutpattisambhavāt  lūnapunarjātaṣviva keśeṣu na cātra keśatvasāmānyād bhinnāt pratyabhijñānaṃ  tadiheti buddhyutpādaprasaṅgāt nāpyabhinnādanyatrānugame vānugatavyā vṛttarūpayoḥ  paramparāsaṃśleṣeṇaikāntabhinnatvāt  tataśca ta evāmī keśā iti pratyabhijñā sadṛśāparotpattinimittaivātaeva bhrāntiḥ  tathā ghaṭādiṣvasyā bhrāntatvāśaṃkayānumānasyotthānaṃ yujyata eva nāpītaretarāśrayatvaṃ yato nānumānena pratyabhijñāyā aprāmāṇyaṃ kriyatepi tujñāyate svahetuta evāpramāṇarūpāyā niṣpatteḥ  dṛṣṭo dṛśyata iti grahāt dṛṣṭatvaṃ hi na pūrvambhāvasthāsti  tadā dṛśyamānaikarūpatvāt  nāpyaghunāta eva nāpi pūrvakālasambandhitvaṃ dṛśyamānasyedānīṃ pūrvamabhāvāt  tasmād dṛṣṭatvamāropya grāhikā pratyabhijñā bhrāntatvādapramāṇaivotpadyate  nāpyasyā aprāmāṇyanimittamanumānasyotthānamapi tu sādhyapratibandhanimittamataḥ pratyabhijñāyā bādhakaṃ vistarastvayaṃ pratyabhijñābhaṅgavicāro nai rā tmya siddhau kṛta iti tatraivāvadhāryaḥ tasmāt sthitametat    tāṃ punaḥ kṣaṇasthitidharmatāṃ svabhāvampaśyannapisadṛśāparotpattivipralaṃbdha pūrvakṣaṇavināśāviniścayānna vyavasyatīti kathaṃ punargamyate sadṛśāparotpattyā vipralabdho na vyavasyatītyata āha  antyetyādi  sadṛśakṣaṇāntarāpratisandhāyī kṣaṇontyakṣaṇasta haśināṃ naṣṭa iti niścabvatvamapi  kāryādarśane kāraṇadarśanepi anityena tatsvabhāvena kāryadarśanāt tathāpratītiḥ  anyathānyanimittattve vānimittatava yuktā  anityatārthāntaramevasyāt  tathā ca bhāvayogo na syāt tatrānapekṣāṇāṃ  athāpekṣate tarhi saiva tasyasvātmabhūtasya anityatāstīti kimapareṇa  svabhāvato niścalasya hi arthāntareṇasahāpi tatsvabhāvasya anaucityāt anityatā dharmāntaraṃ vā tadapyarthāntarasambhūtaṃ cet kāraṇaṃ vā bhavet kāryaṃ vā kāryakāraṇabhinnasya pratibandhābhāvāt  tasyāḥ sattānumānāsaṃbhavāt  tatra paścād bhāvānna hetutvaṃ phalepyekāntatā kutaḥ tadvastusiddheḥ paścādarthāntarādutpāde kathanaṃ tasya kāraṇam  kāryasya cakāraṇevaśyaṃ bhāvāt tad gamakaṃ nimittaṃ aniścitamevāsti  tasmāt tadanyanimittasya dharmasya hi vastuni nāvaśyaṃbhāvāt nānumānam  atha cet darśanādarśane anvayavyatirekapratīteḥ nāśrayaḥ kathaṃ tahi dhūmād agnervyabhicāraḥ itipratītijñānam evam kāryaṃ dhūmo hutabhujaḥ kāryadha mānuvṛttitaḥ tallakṣaṇabhūtānupalambhāt yadupalambha catena ekābhāve ca yasyāyāt  avagamyate prāgapyayampratikṣaṇameva naśyati kevalaṃ yathoktādeva vipralambhahetorna niścīyate nanvantyakṣaṇadarśinopi kathannaśvaratvaniścayo yāvatā tadāpi sattopalambhosti  na hi sattāyāmevopalabhamānastadabhāvamavaitītyāha  paścādityādi  nabrūmontyakṣaṇadarśanamātrānniścayo bhavatīti kintvantyaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā paścād viXXXa  bhavati  tadā nopalabhyate tattasya kāryaṃ  na cāgnikāṣṭādisannidhāne bhavatodhūmasyāpanīteśvādau anupalambhosti  agnyādau tvanīte bhavatyanupalambhaḥ  evamparasparasahitau pratyakṣānupalambhāvabhimateṣveva kāraṇeṣvasandigdhaṃ kāraṇatvaṃsādhyata iti  tacceti yathoktaṃ kāryalakṣaṇaṃ dhūmesti tasmādagnereva dhūmo bhavati sarvakālaṃ cāgnisannidhāne bhavato dhūmasyānagnijanyatvaṃ kadācitsadasatorajanyatvānupalambhaḥ  tat tasya kāryam  tacca dhūmesti dahetutvādadṛśyahetutvādvocyate  tatra na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣa iti tṛtīye paricche deaśaktaṃ sarvamiti cedi tyatrāntare  pravā     vakṣyāmaḥ  nāpyahetutvamiti tatraivavakṣyati  nāpyadṛśyahetutvaṃ dhūmasya  agnyādisāmagryanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt atha syād  adṛśyasyāyaṃ svabhāvo yadagnyādisannidhāna eva dhūmaṃ karpūrādidāhakāle sugandhādiyuktaṃ ca karoti nānyadeti  tatkimagnimantareṇa kadācid dhūmotpattirdaṣṭā yenaivamucyate  neti cet  tatkathannāgnikāryo dhūmastadbhāvebhāvāt  dhūmotpattikāle cāgniḥ sarvadā pratīyamānopi kākatālīyanyāyenāvasthita ityalaukikoyaṃ vyapadeśaḥ athavā sa evādṛśyasya svabhāvo yadyagninā nopakriyate tatkimagnyādisannidhāna eva dhūmaṃ karoti na pūrvanna paścāt  tasmādagnyādisannidhāna evāsvabhāvo dhūmajanako bhavati mānyadeti tatrāpi pāramparyeṇa dhūmasyāgnijanyatvamevasyāt cakiñca  yathā deśakālādikamantareṇa dhūmasyānutpattestadapekṣā pratīyate tathāsarvadāgnimantareṇānutpattidarśanādagnyapekṣāsya kena vāryeta  tadapekṣātatkāryataiva  yathā cādṛśyabhāva eva dhūmasya bhāvāttajjanyatvamiṣyate tathā sarvakālamagnibhāve bhāvadarśanādagnijanyatvaṃ kinneṣyate  yāvatāṃ ca sannidhāna evotpadyamāno bhāvo dṛśyate tāvatāmeva hetutvaṃ sarveṣāṃ prāgbhāvasya tulyatvāt  tathācāgnyadṛśyādisāmagrījanyatvaṃ dhūmasyeti kutognivyabhicāraḥ anyastvāha  bhavatvagnidhūmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvatastathāpi na tayorekenajñānena grahaṇambhinnakālatvāt  nāpyanena pūrvakeṇa hi nirvikalpakena pūrvakamvastumātraṃ gṛhītaṃ na tu kāraṇarūpaṃ kāryasya bhāvitvenāpratyakṣatvāt  uttareṇāpyuttaramvastumātraṃ gṛhyate na tu kāryarūpaṃ kāraṇasyātītatvenāgrahāt  nāpi savikalpakenatatrāpyasya codyasya tulyatvāt  tenedamasmādutpannamiti na kenacid gṛhītamata eva na smaraṇenāpi gṛhyatenubhavābhāvāditi atrocyate kāryasya tāvadanutpannāvasthāyāmasattvādeva na kāraṇasambandhitvaṃniṣpannāvasthāyāmapyevaṃ  nirapekṣatvāt    tathā kāraṇamapi kāryaniṣpattyaniṣpattyavasthāyāṃ kāryāsambandhyeva  nāpyanayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sambandho bhinna kāla btvāt kevalamasyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ceti kalpitoyaṃ vyapadeśaḥ  tena hetoḥ sakāśāt svarūpalābha evaṃ kāryatvaṃ  kāraṇasyāpi kāryaṃ prati prāgbhāva eva kāraṇatvaṃsa cātmalābhaḥ prāgbhāvaśca bhāvasyābhinnatvāt pratyakṣagṛhīta eva ceti kathaṃ na pratyakṣagrāhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kevalaṃ kāryadarśane satīdamasya kāryakāraṇaṃ ceti vyavahriyate yato nākāryakāraṇayoḥ kāryakāraṇa bhāvaḥ sambhavati  nāpi kāryakāraṇabhāvayogāttayoḥ kāryakāraṇatābhinnā kartuṃ śakyate virodhāt  nāpi bhinnā tayoḥsvarūpeṇākāryakāraṇatā prasaṅgāt  svarūpeṇa kāryakāraṇayorapi ki kārya kāraṇabhāvenārthāntareṇa kalpitena svarūpeṇaiva kāryakāraṇarūpatvāt  tasmāt pūrvottarabhāvaeva tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ  tena pūrvake vastuni gṛhya māṇe kārya pratyānantaryakāraṇātmakaṃ gṛhītameva  uttareṇa ca jñānenottaramvastu kāraṇānantaraṃ gṛhyamāṇaṃ kāryātmakameva gṛhyate  tadānantaryasya tadabhinnasvabhāvatvāt  ata evāsmādanantaramidambhavatīti smaraṇamapi bhavatyānantaryasyānubhūtatvāditi aviddhaka pūrṇa stvāha  avinābhāvitvaṃ ekaṃ dṛṣṭvā dvitīyādidarśane satisidhyati  na ca kṣaṇikavādino draṣṭurar    vasthānamasti  na cānyenānubhūterthenyasyāvinābhāvitvasmaraṇamastyatiprasaṅgādi  ti tadayuktaṃ  prathamāderarthakṣaṇasya prathamādijñānakṣaṇena grahaṇādekasantatipatitānāṃkāryakāraṇabhāvena smaraṇasambhavācca  yathā ca kṣaṇikapakṣe kāryakāraṇabhāvastathokta meva vakṣyatica nanvevamapi kṣaṇānāmaniścayena kathaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayo na ca santānenatanniścayastasya santānibhyo bhinnasyābhāvāt kevalaṃ santānina evaṃ pūrvāparakālabhāvina    tatra ca yadaika kṣaṇo na tadānya iti ekakṣaṇāvabhāsa eveti kathaṃsantānāvabhāsaḥ  tadabhāvāt kathaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāva iti   tadayuktam  ekaparamāṇvātmakasya vastuno bhāvāt sthūlātmanāṃ santānināṃnairantaryapratibhāsa eva santānapratibhāsastatra ca kṣaṇavivekānavadhāraṇena sādṛśyenacaikatvādhyavasāyādekasantativartināṃ kṣaṇānāṃ na kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayaḥ  bhinnasantānavartināṃ tu santānapravṛttyā vijātīyatvād bhavati tanniścayastenāgnisantānapūrvakasya dhūmasantānasya pratīteragnidhūmasantānayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścaya ucyataiti yatkiñcidetat adhya ya na stvāha svalakṣaṇayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇe sati kathaṃ sāmānyayorgamyagamakabhāvo bhinnatvāditi tadapyayuktam anekasvalakṣaṇātmakasya sāmānyasyābhyupagamāt  taduktam sabha vaṃstad  bhāve pi hatumattāṃ vilaṃghayet sakṛdapi tathā darśanāt kārya sidhyati   akāraṇāt sakṛdapi abhāvāt atadrūpaparāvṛttavastumātraprasādhanāt sāmānyaviṣayaṃ proktaṃ liṅgaṃ bhedāpratiṣṭhiteri ti   pra sa tena svalakṣaṇānāṃ sambandhagraha eva sāmānyānāṃ sambandhagraho na tvanyaḥ nanvanumānavādinā bauddhe na yāvanti svalakṣaṇāni trailokye  tāni sarvāyagni vyāptāni gṛhītavyānyekasyāpyagrahīte naivānaikāntiko hetuḥ syāt  na caivaṃ pratyakṣaṃkartuṃ śaknoti sannihitaviṣayatvāt  na vānyeṣāṃ svalakṣaṇānāmanumānataḥ sādhyadharmeṇavyāptigrahaṇamanavasthāprasaṅgāditi tadayuktaṃ yataḥ    pratyakṣamagnibhedasannidhāna eva dhūmabhedāt pratipat eṣvadhūmavyāvṛttaṃ rūpaṃ dhūmamanagnivyāvṛttāgnimātrakāryamevetyavadhārayati   yathātra tathānyatrāpi deśā  dāvetad rūpamagnijanyameveti cāvadhārayatyanyathātrāgnisambandhitayā na pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate  evamagnyanagnikāryatvesyobhayasambandhitayāpratītiḥ syānnāgnisambadhitayaiva  pratīyate ca    tasmādanyatrāpyetadrūpamagnereva bhavatīti niścayāt kuto dhūmasyāgnivyabhicāraḥ  yaśca deśādāvāgnisambadvadhūmavyaktiviśiṣṭasya dhūmasāmānyasya grahaṇaṅkenacit pramāṇena sambhavati nāpi mahānasādāvagnisambaddhadhūmavyaktiviśiṣṭaṃ dhūmasāmānyaṃ pratipannamanyatrānuyāyivyakterananvayāt  yacca dhūmasāmānyamanuyāyi tannāgnyavyabhicāri tasmāt sāmānyavyāptigrahaṇavādinopi kathaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dhūmasāmānyaṃ sarvatrāgnināvyāptaṃ pratipannamiti tulyaṃ codyaṃ atha dhūmasyānyatrāgnijanyatve na tasmāt sadapi na kevalaṃ bhūyastathādarśanādityanantaroktāt pratyakṣānupalambhāta kāryasya hi svakāraṇābhāve akāraṇameva syād  na hi yad yadabhāvebhavati tat tasya kāraṇam  tad agnimantareṇāpi dhūmasya bhāvāt taddhetunaṃsyāt anyahetukatvāt nāhetukatvamiti cet  naṃtadevam  tatrāpi tulyatvāt tadabhāvepi agnau bhavatīti tadapyanyat syāt  atajjananasvabhāvatvāt evaṃ bhavaneva bhavet etena vyāptiḥ kathitā bhavati ca dhūmognimantareṇa vyabhicāravādinaḥ anenaca pakṣadharmaḥ kathitaḥ  taviti tasmādagnimantareṇa bhāvānna taddheturnāgnihetustathācāhetu syāditi bhāvaḥ anyahetukatvādi ghūmajananasvabhāvalakṣaṇatvād vahneḥ etaccottaratrābhidhāsyate na vai sa evetyādi vyabhicāravādī  athavāgnijanito dhūmaḥ sa evānyatobhavatītyevaṃ nocyate  yadi sa evānyataḥ syād bhavedahetutvantādṛśasya vahnijanitadharmasvabhāvatulyasyānyato bhāvāt anyādṛśādityādi siddhānta vā  tatki kāryasadṛśaṃ kāraṇamiṣyateyenaivamucyatenyādṛśād bhavan kathantādṛśa iti  nānyārthatvāt  yo hi dhūma janako vahnidṛṣṭastato visadṛśād bhavan dhūmaḥ kathantādṛśo bhavati vahnijanitadharmatulyasvabhāvo bhavati etaduktambhavati  yathā dhūmabhedānāntārṇaparṇādīnāṃ parasparāpekṣayā tādaśatvansathāgnibhedānāmapi tāṇapārṇādīnāṃ dhūmajanakānāntādasatvaṃ parasparāpekṣayaiva  vyāpticintāna vai sa eva tādṛśasya bhāvāt iti cet  anyādṛśād bhavat kathaṃ tādṛśa iti tādṛśāddhi bhavan tādṛśaḥ syāt  anyādṛśādapi yadi tādṛśo bhavet tacchaktiniya mābhāvāt na hetubhedo bhedaka iti akāraṇaṃ viśvasya  vaiśvarūpyaṃ syāt  sarvaṃ vāsarvasmājjāyeta  tasmāt kāraṇasya bhedābhedābhyāṃ kāryasya bhedābhevo na syātām tad dhūmadṛṣṭākāra vijātīyādaryādutpadyamāne ahetukatvaprasaṅgāt naitadevam nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā  heto ranyānapekṣaraṇāt tena yādṛśo dhūmabheda ekasmādagnibhedādutpadyamāno dṛṣṭastādṛśasya dhūmabhedasya tādṛśādevāgnibhedādutpattiḥ  yastvanagnerutpanna sonyādṛśa eva  vāṣpādivat nanvagnijanyena dhumakṣaṇena tādṛśo dhūmakṣaṇajanyo dhūmakṣaṇastenānyādṛśādapitādṛśo bhavatīti cet    na  agnijanyasya hi dhamakṣaṇasyāgnijanya evānyodhūmakṣaṇastādṛśo bhavati nānyaḥ  na hi vāṣpādīnāntādṛśatvādhyavasāyepi tādṛśatvambhavati  dhūmakṣaṇajanyasyāpi dhūmakṣaṇasyānyo dhūmakṣaṇajanya eva dhūmakṣaṇastādṛśobhavati nānyaḥ  tasmāttādṛśādeva tādṛśotpattiriti kuto vyabhicāraḥ  tena kṣaṇikatve kathambhāvāḥ kvacidāyattavṛttayaḥ prasiddhakāraṇābhāve yeṣāmbhāvastatonyataḥ tataścānagnito dhūmād yathā dhūmasya sambhavaḥ śakramūrdhnastathā tasya kena vāryeta sambhava iti nirastaṃ  prathamasya hyagnijanyasya dhūmakṣaṇasyāparognijanya eva dhūmakṣaṇastādṛśodhūmakṣaṇajanyasya dhūmakṣaṇasya dvitīyasyānyo dhūmakṣaṇajanya eva dvitīyo dhūmakṣaṇastādṛśobhavati  tathā tṛtīyādikṣaṇeṣvapīti kṣaṇāpekṣayāpyavyabhicārastādṛśasya etamevāha  tādṛśāddhi bhavastādṛśaḥ syāt  anyādṛśādapyavahnisadṛśādapi yaditādṛśo bhaved vahnijanitadhūmatulyasvabhāvo bhavet  tacchaktiniyamābhāvāt sadaśāsadṛśayoḥ kāraṇayoryā śaktistasyā yo niyamaḥ sadṛśī sadṛśameva janayatyasadṛśī kādācitkatvasambhavaḥ sa hi dhūmaḥ kāraṇamantareṇa bhavet cet  tarhi apekṣāvirahāta na kadācinnabhavet  tadbhāve vaikalyābhāvāt  iṣṭakālavat  tadāpi ca na bhavet  abhāvakālāviśeṣāt  apekṣayā hi bhāvāḥ kādācitkā bhavanti  bhāvābhāvakālayoḥtadbhābayogyatāyogyatābhyāṃ yogāt  deśakālayoḥ tulyayogyatāyogyatayohi tadvatetarayoniyamāyogāt sāca yogyatā hetubhāvatonyā cet  tasmād deśakālayoḥ kvacit paritathā cetyahetukatve sati nityaṃ satvamasattvamvā dhūmasya syāt  kiṅkāraṇam   ahetorbhāvasya svaniṣpattāvanyānapekṣaṇā  t  kāraṇāntarānapekṣaṇāt  kāraṇāntarānapekṣatvepi kādācitkaṃ svabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti cedāha  apekṣāto hīti etaduktambhavati  aniṣpannasyāsattvādeva kathaṃ svabhāvataḥ kādācitkatvaṃniṣpannasya tvasti svabhāvaḥ kevalaṃ saiva niṣpattiḥ kathaṃ kvacid bhavatīticodyate  sa hotyādinaitadeva vyācaṣṭe  na kadācinna bhavet sarvakālambhavet kiṅkāraṇantadbhāve dhūmasvabhāvasya bhāve  kāraṇānapekṣatvena vaikalyābhāvāt iṣṭakālavat  tadāpi ceti dṛṣṭakālepi dhūmo na bhavet  dhūmābhā vakālāviśeṣāt paścādarddhamvibhajannāha  apekṣayā hoti  yogyadeśakālāpekṣayā  yasmātkāryasya yo bhāvābhāvakālau tayoryathākramantadbhāvasya kāryotpādasya ye yogyatāyogyate tābhyāṃ yogāt  kālagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇaparamevaṃ deśadravyayorapi vācyaṃ  athaivaṃneṣyate  tadā tulye yogyatāyogyate yayoḥ kāryabhāvābhāvavatodaṃśakālayostayostadvattetarayoniyamāyogāt  kāryakālasyaiva tadvattā  kāryavattā  tadanyasyetarā akāryavattetyasya niyamasyāyogāt  dvāvapi tau kāryabhāvābhāvakālau kāryavantausyātāṃ yogyatāsādṛśyāt  na vā  tulyatvādayogyatāyāḥ  tasmāt tadbhāvakālasyaiva yogyatā  tāṃ vāpekṣamāṇa    bhāvāḥ kādācitkā bhavanti bhavatu nāmeṣṭasya deśakālāderyogyatā  na tāvatā hetubhāva ityata āha sā cetyādi  yata evamahetutve nityaṃ sattvāsattvaṃ syānna ca bhavati tasmādityādi  yatparihāreṇa pravarttate tadanapekṣaḥ  yatra ca varttate tatsāpekṣaḥ yadi nāma kvacid deśādau vṛttastathāpi kathantatsāpekṣa iti cedāha  tathā hoti tathā vṛttirityekaparihāreṇānyatra vṛttiḥ  deśādikamapekṣata eva bhāva    tena tudeśādinā na tasyopakāraḥ kriyata iti cedāha  tatkṛtopakāretyādi  tanniya vyāpticintāhāreṇa anyatra deśakālayoḥ sadbhāvena tatsāpekṣa iti bhavati  tathā hi tathā vṛttirapekṣata eva  tatkṛtopakārānapekṣasya hi tanniyamāyogāt  tad deśakālaniyamāt yatra dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛd vaikalye ca na dṛṣṭaḥ tasya hi tajjanyaḥ svabhāvaḥ  anyathākadācidapyabhāvāt sa tatpratiniyatonyatra kathaṃ bhavet  bhavan vā na dhūmaḥ syāt  btajjanitaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣo dhūmaḥ  tathā heturapi tathābhūtakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ yadi tasyānyato pi bhāvaḥ tadā na sa svabhāva iti sakṛdapi na dhūmaṃ janayet  na casa dhūmaḥ adhūmajananasvabhāvād bhāvād  tatsvabhāvatve ca sa eva neti avyabhicāraḥ asvibhāvaḥ śakrasya mūrddhā yadyagnireva saḥ agnisvabhāvosau dhūmastatra kathaṃ bhavet yamāyogāditi  tasminnaiva deśādau tena na bhāvyamiti niyamāyogāt    tadititasmād deśakālagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ dravyasyāpi parigrahaḥ  yatreti deśādau dṛṣṭa sakṛditi yathoktena pratyakṣeṇa yeṣāṃ sannidhāne dṛṣṭasteṣāmevānyataravaikalye ca punarna dṛṣṭaḥ anyatheti yadi tajjanyosya svabhāvo na syāt sa iti dhūmastatpratiniyatognyādikasāmagrī hi yataḥ agneranyatra kathambhavennaiva bhavet  bhavan vā na dhūmaḥ syāt yasmāt tajjaniṃto hyagnijanito hi svabhāvaviśeṣo dhūma iti  tathā heturapivahnistathābhūtakāryajananasvabhāvo dhūmajananayogyatāsvabhāvo dhūmarahitāvasthāyāmapyastyeva yogyatā kāraṇabhūteti  tena nāṃḍavyāpi lakṣaṇaṃ  evamagnidhūmayoḥ cbparasparāpekṣayā niyatasvabhāvatve pratyakṣavyavasthāpite yadi tasya dhūmasyāgne ranyatopi bhāva iṣyate tadā na sa dhūmajananaḥ svabhāvastasyāvahnaḥ  tathā hyanagneryadā dhūmasyotpattistadānagnereva dhūmajananaḥ svabhāvo jātaḥ yaścānagneḥ svabhāvaḥ sa kathamagne syāt  tataścādhūmajananasvabhāvatvādagneḥsakṛdapi na dhūmaṃ janayet  dhūmasyāpi dhūmasvabhāvatā na syādityāha  nacetyādi  agneranyato bhavanna vā sa dhūmaḥ    kiṃ kāraṇam  adhūmajananasvabhāvādanagnerbhāvādutpatteḥ  tatsvabhāvatve cānagnerapi dhūmajananasvabhāvatve cābhyupagamyamāne  sa evāgnirdhūmajanakarūpatvādasya ityanena dvāreṇāvyabhicārodhūmasya sukhagrahaṇārthaṃ agnisvabhāva ityādi ślokadvayamāha dhūmahetusvabhāvo hi vahnistacchaktibhedavān adhūmatomasya māvesa syādhetukaḥ  iti saṃgrahaślokau kathamidānoṃ bhinnāt sahakāriṇaḥ kāryasyotpattiḥ  yathā cakṣuṣo rūpādeviṃjñānam na vai kiñcit tatsva  bhāvaṃ ekaikaṃ janakam  kintu sāmagrī janikā tatsva agnisvabhāva iti dhūmajananasvabhā vo yadotyarthaḥ  agnireva sa śaṛmūrddhādhūmajananasvabhāvatvāt  athānagnisvabhāvosau śakramūrddhā  tatreti śamūrddhani kasmānna bhavedityāha  dhūmetyādi  hi yasmāt  dhūmahetusvabhāvo yasyeti vigrahaḥ kuta etat tacchaktibhedavān  tayā dhūmajanikayā śaktyā karaṇabhūtayā vastvantarātkhadyotāderbhedavān visadṛśaḥ  adhūmahetorityavahnisvabhāvād dhūmasya bhāveutpādebhyupagamyamāne sa dhūmaḥ syādahetukaḥ  yathoktaṃ prāk kathamityādi paraḥ  idānomityekasya dhūmādevijātīyādutpattyanabhyupagame kathambhinnāt parasparavijātīyāt  sahakāriṇaḥ sakāśādekasya kāryasyotpattiḥ kathamityāha  yathetyādi  ādiśabdād ālokamanaskārādayaḥ  evañca sati cakṣuḥsvabhāvādapyutpadyate vijñānama cakṣuḥsvabhāvādapi rūpamanaskārāderna cedamahetukaṃ evaṃ dhūmopyagnerutpadyatāmanagneśca śakramūrdhnaḥ  na cāhetuko bhaviṣyatīti codakomanyate na ghai kiṃcidityādinā pratividhatte  cakṣurādiṣu tatsvabhāvaṃ janakasvabhāvaṃsadekakaṃ parasparānapekṣaṃ na vai janakaṃ    yadi hi syāt tadā pratyekaṃ kāraṇavyabhicārādahetukaṃ syāt  kintu sāmagrī janikā  tatsvabhāvā jana kasvabhāvā  sāmagrījaniketyetāvataiva tatsvabhāvatvaṃ labdhamatatsvabhāvasyājanakatvāt tatki svabhāvetipṛthagucyate  satyaṃ kintvavadhāraṇārthamuktaṃ  sāmagryavasthāyāmeva tatsvabhāvatā  napūrvanna paścānna pṛthagiti  svahetusāmarthyaniyatasannidhītyekasmin kārye samastāvanyekāraṇāni heturiti samudāyārthaḥ kecittu vā śabdaṃ paṭhanti  sāmagrī janikā tatsvabhāvā veti  atra tuvāśabdasya na kiṃcit prayojanamitya  pa  pāṭha evāyaṃ  yadi sāmagrītyuktvāsāmagryantarādapi cakṣurvijñānaṃ syāttadā bhinnādutpāderahetukatvambhavet  saiva sāmagryanumīyate  kāryeṇa na pratyekaṃ kāraṇādanyato nāsti vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ syādetada agnyādisāmagrayā ādya eva dhūmakṣaṇo janito na ca tasya liṅga vyāpticintābhāvā  saivānumīyate  saiva ca sāmagrī svabhāvasthityākāryasya āśrayaḥ  ata evasahakāriṇāmaparyāyeṇa jananam tvantasyāniścayāt yaśca dhūmapratibandho gṛhyate sa pūrvadhūmahetureva    kathantatomyādisāmagryā anumānamityata āha  saiva cetyādi kāryaprabandhasyasvabhāvasthiteḥ  āśraya ādyaṃ kāraṇaṃ  sāmagrīmantareṇa dhūmasantānasyaivābhāvāt tato dhūmasantānamagnikāryatvenaikīkṛtya dahanādisantate kāraṇabhūtāyā anumānaṃ na hi kṣaṇavibhāgenārvāgdarśanasya vyavahāraḥ sambhavatīti syādetad  atīva eva vahniranumīyate  na ca tenārthakriyārthinaḥ kiṃcit prayojanamityetadapi codyamānenaiva parihṛtaṃ  tadā cāyamartha   saiva ca sāmagrīprabandhena pravarttamānā kāryasvabhāvasthiteḥ kāryaprabandhavṛtterhetuḥ pūrvapūrvamagnyādikṣaṇaṃpratītyottarottarasya dhūmakṣaṇasyotpatteḥ  na hyayaṃ niyamo yadeka eva dhūmakṣaṇogninājanyo nāpara iti  yāvadindhanasya na sarvathā bhasmībhavanantā vad dhūmakṣaṇānāmutpattiraviruddhā tasmāduttarottaradahanakṣaṇajananamarthenaprabandhapravṛttenāgninā yathābhūto dhūmaprabandho janitaḥ kāryamutpadyatenyathāsamagrāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthyāt kāryabahutvamparyāyeṇa caikakāryajanakatvaṃ syānna ca bhavati tasmāt kathamekaṃjanakṛtvamityāśaṃkyāha saiva cetyādi  saiva ca sāmagrīti samagrā eva sāmagrī śabdenocyante  kiṃkāraṇaṃ  svabhāvasthityā svarūpasannidhānena kāryasyāśrayo bhavati yataḥ evammanyate  yadi sāmagryā eva kāryotpattistadā samagrāṇāmakārakatvaṃ syāt tathā ca pratītibāṃdhā  samagrāṇāmapi kārakatve sutarāṃ kāryabahutvaṃ syāt  paryāyeṇacaikakāryajanakatvaṃ syāt  na ca sāmagrībalātteṣāmekarūpatā  sāmagryā evābhāvaprasaṅgāt  tasmāt te samagrāḥ svahetubhya evaikakāryakaraṇe tathābhidhānepi svabījaprabhavāt astyeva svabhāvabhedaḥ  hetusvabhāvabhedāt  yathā kadalyā bījakandodbhavāyāḥ  sphuṭaṃ evaivaṃ loke bhinnākāradvāreṇa vibhāgaḥ  itthaṃsuvivecitākāraṃ kāryaṃ hi kāraṇāvyabhicāri anvayavyatirekā yo yasya dṛṣṭonuvartakaḥ svabhāvastasya taddheturato bhinnānna sambhavaḥ tasmāt sakṛdapi darśanādarśanābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddheḥnanyithā anvayavyatirekyorniḥśeṣadarśanādarśanāyattatvāt iti saṃgrahaślokaḥ  tataḥ tatpratipattiniḥśeṣaṃ kvacityatkiñcidetat  yataśca sāmagrījanikāta eva sahakāriṇāmaparyāyeṇa jananaṃ paripāṭyā jananaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ yadapītyādinā vijātīyādutpattimāśaṃkya pariharati  nānyādṛśāttādṛ śa  ntasyotpattiriti yaduktantadevātra darśayatītyarthaḥ  ādiśabdād gośṛṅgāccharob gomayād vṛścika   tatrāpīti vijātīyāt kāryotpattāvapi  tathābhidhānepītivijātīyotpannasya śālūkāde śālūkādirityabhidhānepi svabījācchālūkādilakṣaṇāt prabhava utpattiryasya tasmāt svavījaprabhavācchālūkādeḥ sakaśādastyevasvabhāvabhedaḥ kiṅkāraṇaṃ    hetusvabhāvabhedāt  hetoḥ sāmagrīdvayalakṣaṇasyasvabhāvabhedāt  bījāt kandāccodbhavo yasyāḥ kadalyāḥ sā tathā  sā cahetutvabhedāt parasparabhinnā na cāyambhedaḥ sādhanīya ityāha  sphuṭamityādi  vivecayati bhede vā bhāvasyeti suvivecitākāraṃ bhrāntirhetubhyaḥ sadṛśākārebhyo vibhāgena niścitākāraṃ tadbhāva eva bhāvonvayaḥ  tadabhāve cābhāva eva vyatirekaḥ  anvayo vyatirekaścānvayavyatirekantasmāt  yaḥ kāryasvabhāvo yasyānu varttanīyasya kāraṇasyānuvarttako dṛṣṭastasyānuvarttakasya svabhāvastaddhetuḥ sonuvarttanīya kāraṇāt sā hetu ryasyeti vigrahaḥ  yadā tu kāraṇāpekṣayocyate tadā svabhāvastasyānuvarttanīyasyāgnyādestaddhetustasya kāryābhimatasya dhūmāderhetuḥ  yataścaivaṃ paramparāpekṣayā kāryakāraṇayo svabhāvaniyamaḥ  ataḥ kāraṇād bhinnād vijātīyānna sambhavaḥ tasmāt sakṛdapi darśanādarśanābhyāmiti yathoktābhyāṃ  pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃkāryakāraṇabhāvasiddheḥ kāraṇād bhavati    tataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhitaḥ tatpratipatiranvayaṃ vyatirekapratipattirnānyatheti kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayantyaktvā kevalābhyānda sāmānyacintānityatvasya darśanepi anyatra anyathā dṛṣṭaḥ kvacit nityatvābhāvepyadṛṣṭasya dṛṣṭeḥ  sāmānyacintākāryasya hi tasmādutpatteḥ hetvavinābhāvo bhavatu nāma svabhāve kathamavinābhāvaḥ svabhāveṣyavinābhāvo bhāvamātrānurodhini tadabhāve svayambhāvasyābhāvaḥ syādabhedataḥ rśanādarśanābhyāṃ nānvayavyatirekayoḥ pratipattiḥ  kiṅkāraṇaṃ    niḥśeṣidarśanādarśanāyattatvād darśanamātrapratibaddhāyā anvayavyatirekapratipatteḥ  evaṃ hi darśanamanvayaṃsādhayati yadi niḥśeṣe sapakṣe hetordarśanaṃ syāt  evamadarśanamapi vyatirekaṃ sādhayet yadi niḥśeṣe sādhyavyatireke hetoradarśanaṃ syāt  yathaikatra dhūmavyaktau sakṛdapikāryatvasiddhyā sarvatra tathābhāvaḥ    evaṃ kvacit sapakṣāsapakṣayordarśanādarśanātsarvatrānvayavyatirekaniścayo bhaviṣyatītyapi mithyā  yasmāt kvacid amūrtatveākāśādigate nityatvasya darśane  paraprasiddhyā caitaducyate  anyatra sukhādau anyathetyanityatve hetoramūrttatvasya dṛṣṭeḥ kāraṇādekatra darśanaṃ na sarvatra tathābhāvasādhanamato darśanamanvaye vyabhicāri  tathā kvacid ghaṃṭādau nityatvābhāvepyadṛṣṭasyāmū rttatvasya punanityatvābhāva eva sukhādī dṛṣṭerato vipakṣaikadeśādarśanamasādhanaṃvyatirekaniścaye tasmāddhetuphalabhāvaniścayādevānvayavyatirekayoniścayaḥ svabhāva ityādi paraḥ  idānīmiti kāryahetāvavinābhāve sādhite saṃpratisvabhāvahetau kathaṃ sādhyenāvinābhāvaḥ nanu svabhāve bhāvopi bhāvamātrānurodhini heturityādinā prāgeva svabhāva ahetāvavinābhāvaḥ sādhitaḥ satyaṃ  evantu manyate  yathābhūte svabhāve tanmātrabhāvinyavinābhāvovaṇṇitastatra pratijñārthaṃkadeśatā prāpnotīti  siddhāntavādyapyanantareṇānyāpohaprasādhanena pratijñārthaikadeśatāparihārammanyamānaḥ tanmātrānurodhinyevāvinābhāvaṃpūrvoktamanuvadati svabhāvepyavinābhāva ityādi  svabhāvepi svabhāvahetāvapyavinābhāvaḥ  kasmin sādhye  bhāvamātrānurodhini  yo hotyādyasyaivavyākhyānaṃ  avinābhāvo bhāvasyeti kṛtakatvāde  yasmāt tadabhāve bhāvamātrānurodhisādhyadharmābhāve āvasya hetutvenopāttasyābhāvaḥ syāt  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ   yohi bhāvamātrānurodhisvabhāvepi avinābhāvaṃ bhāvasya vāñchati tadabhāve hi svabhāvasya abhāva syāt abhedataḥ  ya eva bhāvaḥ bhāvamātrānurodhīsvabhāva ityucyate  sa eva svayaṃ vastutoḥ bhāvaḥ  sa ca ātmānaṃ parityajya kathaṃbhavet ya eva tahi bhedābhāvāt kṛtakaḥ sa evānitya iti pratijñārthaṃkadeśaḥ hetuḥsyāt naiṣa doṣaḥ sarve bhāvā svabhāvena svasvabhāvavyavasthiteḥ svabhāvaparabhāvābhyāṃ yasmād vyāvṛttibhāginaḥ sādhyasādhanayorabhedataḥ  abhedameva ya evetyādinā vyācaṣṭe  ya evānityādikobhāvaḥ kṛtakabhāvamātrānu rodhī svabhāva ityucyate sa eva svayamanyanimittānapekṣatayā vastutaḥ paramārthato bhāvaḥ kṛtakatvaṃ sa ca bhāva ātmānaṃ svabhāvabhūtamanityatvamparityajya kathambhavet ya evaṃ tahīti paraḥ  pakṣanirdeśa pratijñā   tasyā artho dharmadharmasamudāyastasyaikaveśaḥ sādhyadharmātmako hetuḥ syāt  tathā hi yāvaduktamanityaḥ śabdonityatvāditi tāvad anityaḥ kṛtakatvāditi tathā cāsiddho heturiti bhāvaḥ naiṣa doṣa iti siddhānta vā dī  yasmāt sarve bhāvā ityādi  atra prathamayākārikayā dharmakalpanābījaṃ  dvitīyayā dharmakalpanā  tṛtīyayā pratijñārthaṃkadeśatāparihāraśca kathyate iti samudāyārthaḥ  sarve bhāvāḥ svabhāvaparabhāvābhyāṃ vyāvṛttimbhajanta iti ghinuṇ  sarvabhāvāḥ svabhāvena svarūpeṇa na pararūpeṇa govyaktyantarād bhinna iti  evamādiparamāṇvantobhedo jātyādiviśeṣaṇakṛtaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ na svabhāveneti atrocyate  na jātyādinā tāvad bhāvānāmabhinnānāmbhedaḥ kriyate  bhinnābhinnabhedakaraṇe tatra sarve bhāvā bhinnā iti yadyetadanumānavṛttantadāśrayāsiddho hetuḥ sarvabhāvānāṃpratyakṣāviṣayatvād  ata eva naitat pratyakṣavṛttaṃ parāmṛśyate anyastvāha  yadyapi bhāvāḥ svabhāvena bhinnāsteṣāntu jātyādayo dharmāssantyeva pratīyamānatvāt  tathāpi nirvikalpakantu vijñānaṅgavādiṣu sattāmātraṃgṛhṇāti na bhedaṃ  anyasmād viśeṣagrahaṇameva hi bhedagrahaṇamviśeṣaśca nāvikalpyagṛhyata iti savikalpakasya viṣayo na nirvikalpasya  taduktaṃ viśeṣāstu pratīyante savikalpakabuddhibhiḥ te ca kecit pratidravyaṃ kecid vahuṣu saṃsthitāḥ tānakalpayadutpannaṃ vyāvṛttānugamātmanā gavāśve cābhāva  pratyakṣagrāhyo  na hi gavyaśvostīti pratyakṣaṃ paricchinattyataḥ sattāmātrasyaiva grāhakaṃ pratyakṣamiti taduktaṃ ma ṇḍa ne na āhuvidhātṛ pratyakṣaṃ na niṣedya vipaścitaḥ naikatva āgamastena doṣa iti cedāha  no cetyādi  bhrāntinimittena sadṛśāparotpattyādinā kāraṇabhūtena vikalpabuddhayā saṃyojyeta samāropyeta guṇāntaraṃ sthiratvādi vā śabda ivārthe  śuktāviva rajatākāra  saṃyojyeta sarvadā prasaṅgāt  apratipattau vā vivekena dvitvakalpanāyogāt atiprasaṅgācca paśyan śuktirūpaṃ viśiṣṭameva paśyati  niścayapratyayasāmānyāt aniścikapramāṇapravṛttāvaparasyāpravṛttiḥ syādeveti saṃyojyeta  nāropyeta  yathā śuktauviśiṣṭarūpeṇa gṛhītāyāmapi śuklasādharmyād rajatākāraḥ saṃyojyeta  tadāsyādanavakāśā pramāṇāntaravṛttiḥ   syānmataṃ    na śuktau viśiṣṭarūpagrahe rajatasamāropaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣarūpeṇa śavalābhāsāyāḥ pratipatteḥ sarvadā prasaṅgāt  apratipattau vā vivekeneti idaṃ sāmānyamayaṃ viśeṣa ityevamvivekena vibhāgenāpratipattau dvitvavikalpāyogāt śuktau dve rūpe iti teṣāntu vyavacchedaphalānāṃ nāpratītasya vastvaṃśasyapratyāyane pravṛttiḥ  anaṃśasya ekadeśena darśanāyogāt  tasya dṛṣṭatvāt tasmād dṛṣṭasya bhāvasya dṛṣṭa evākhilo guṇa bhrānterniścīyate neti niścayajñānaṃ jāyate  tat kathaṃvyavacchedaviṣayaṃ bhavatīti cet  samāropaviṣayebhāvāt  yatrāsya samāropo natatra bhede sthira  sātmaka iti vā niścayo bhavati tadiṣṭamevāsmākaṃ
