syādavastutvāṃdapohayoḥ bhavatpakṣe yathā loke khapuṣpaśaśaśṛṅgayoḥ niṣedhamātrarūpaṃ ca śabdārtho yadi kalpyate abhāvaśabdavācyā syācchūnyatānyaprakārikā  bhinnasāmānyavacanā viśeṣavacanāśraye sarve bhaveyuḥ paryāyā yadyapoha sya vācyatā   tathā yadi cāpohyabhedenāpohasya bhedastadaupacārika syāt  yasya cāpohasyanīrūpatve dharmabhedena na bhedaḥ  kathantasya bahirbhūtairaporbhedaḥ kriyate  tadāha nanu cāpohabhedena bhedopohasya setsyati na viśeṣaḥ svatastasya parataścaupacārikaḥ  saṃsagiṇopi cādhārā yanna bhindanti bhāvataḥ apohyaiḥ sa vahiḥ saṃsthaibhidyetetyatikalpaneti  nirastaṃ  vyavacchedamātrasya śabdādyaviṣayatvāt yahityādinā ślokaṃ vyācaṣṭe  ādiśabdācchandādiparigrahaḥ  nāsya liṃgamastītyiliṅgarūpādikametaditi niścayajñānaṃ  asati samārope bhavati na hipratyakṣadṛṣṭe rūpādau tadānīmviparītākārasamāroposti  tatkathaṃ vyavaccheva viṣayambhavati iyatā ślokasya pūrvārddhā vyākhyātaḥ  uttarārddhaṃ vyākhyātumāha  samāropaviṣaye tasya niścayajñānasyābhāvāt  tadvayaṃvacchedaviṣayambhavatīti prakṛtenasambandha  etadevāha  yatra bhedesya puṃsaḥ samāropo na tatra bhede samāropaviṣayeniścayo bhavatyasthiro nirātmaka iti vā aniścayāropamanasorbādhyabādhakabhāvataḥ na hi sarvato bhinno dṛṣṭopi bhāvastathaiveti pratyabhijñāyate  kvacit bhedevyavadhānasambhavāt  yathā śukteḥ śuklatvam  yatra bhrāntinimittaṃ tatraivāsyapratipattuḥ smārto niścayo bhavati taddarśanāviśeṣepi  bhrāntiniścayayorbā dhyabā dhakabhāvāta samāropavivekesya pravṛttiriti gamyate tadviveka evānyāpohaḥ  tasmāt tadapi tanmātrāpohagācaraṃ na vastusvabhāvaniścāyakaṃ svarūpeṇa  tathā hi niścayepi apratipattidarśanāt  tasya svabhāvaki kāraṇaṃ    niścayāropamanasorbādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ  niścayajñānasyatadviparītasamāropajñānasya ca bādhyabādhakabhāvataḥ  bādhyabādhakabhāvameva sādhayannāha na hīti sarvataḥ sajātīyādvijātīyācca bhinno dṛṣṭopi bhāvastathaiveti yathādṛṣṭenasarveṇākāreṇa pratyabhijñāyate  niścīyate na hoti sambandha  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ   kvacid bhede kṣaṇikatvādike vyavadhānasambhavāt  bhrāntinimittagataḥ yathā śukteḥsarvato vyāvṛttāyā darśanepi śuktikāditve rajatasādharmyasya bhrāntinimittasyasambhavānna niścayaḥ  yatra tvākāre bhrāntinimittaṃ nāsti tatraivāsya pratipatturanubhavottarakālabhāvī smāta niścayo bhavati  taddarśanāviśeṣepi sarvasvākāreṣu pratyakṣasyāviśeṣepi smārta iti smṛtirūpaḥ nanu tadityullekhenānutpatteḥ kathaṃ smṛtirūpa   satyaṃ  nirvikalpakaviṣayasya svākā reṇaikīkṛtya viṣayīkaraṇāt smṛtirūpa ucyate  yataśca pratyakṣāviśeṣepi samāroparahita eva viṣaye niścayo bhavati tasmāt samāropaniścayayorbādhyabādhakabhāvo gamyate  tato bādhyabādhakabhāvātkāraṇāt samāropaviveke samāropavirahaniścayasyāsya pravṛttiriti gamyate bhavatu nāma samāropaviveke pravṛttistathāpi nānyā pohaviṣayatvamvidhirūpeṇapravṛtterityāha  tadviveka evānyāpohaḥ samāropaviveka eva cānyāpohaḥ  tasmātsamāroparahite vṛttivaśāt tadapīti na kevalamanityaḥ śabda iti niścayajñānaṃpūrvoktena nyāyena tanmātrāpohagocarantadapi pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāviniściyajñānamapitanmātrāpohagocaraṃ na vastusvabhāvaniścāyakaṃ svarūpeṇa  kiṅkāraṇaṃ   tathā hi kasyacidākārasya rūpatvādeniścayepyanyasya kṣaṇikatvādyākārasyāpratipattidarśanāt niścaye ca ayogāt  sāmānyacintāyāvantoṃśasamāropāstannirāse viniścayāḥ tāvanta eva śabdāca tena te bhinnagocarāḥ anyathaikena śabdena vyāpta ekatra vastuni buddhayā vā nānyaviṣaya iti paryāyatā bhavet  ityantaraślokaḥ yadi tu pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvinā niṣcayena vastusvabhāvasya niścayaḥ kriyate tadātatsvabhāvaniścaye ca niraṃśatvād vastunastasyāyogādanyasyākārāntarasyāniścayāyogāt yataśca vastvadhyavasāyenaiva niścayasya pravṛttiḥ śabdasya vā na vastusvarūpagrāhakatvena tasmād yāvanta ekasyāṃśasamāropā rūpāntarasamāropāḥ pravṛttāapravṛttāśca tannirāse samāropanirāsārthantāvanta eva niścayāḥ śabdāśca tāvanta eva svaviṣaye pravarttante  tena kāraṇena te niścayāḥ śabdāśca bhinnagocarābhinnaviṣayāḥ svasvahetutodhyavasitasvasvākārābhinnabāhyaviṣayatvāttenaitad buddhayāropitabuddhistho nārthabuddhyantarānugaḥ nābhipretārthakārī ca sopi vācyo na tattvataḥ pratibhāpi ca śabdārtho bāhyārthaviṣayāṃ yadi ekātmaniyate bāhye vicitrāḥ pratibhāḥ kathaṃ atha niviṣayā etā vāsanāmātrabhāvataḥ pratipattiḥ pravṛttiśca bāhyārtheṣu kathambhavet svāśe bāhyādhimokṣeṇa pravṛttiścetsadā matā śabdārthotāttvikaḥ prāptastathā bhrāntyā pravarttanāditi   nirastaṃ  kalpitaviṣayatveneṣṭatvād vikalpasya anyatheti buddhiśabdābhyāmvastusvarūpagrahaṇe  ekena śabdena vyāpte sarvākāreṇa viṣayīkṛte  ekatraikasmin buddhyā vā niścayātmikayā vyāptenānyaviṣayaḥ  anyaścāsāvākāro viṣayaścetyanyaviṣayaḥ  tasya vastuno nāpara ākāroviṣayabhūto vidyate pratyāyyaḥ  athavā tadvastupratyāyakasyānyasya śabdasya jñānasyasobyasyāpi nānopādherddhārgrāhikārthasya bhedanaḥ nānopādhyupakārāṅgaśakta abhinnātmano grahe sarvātmanopakāryasya ko bhedaḥ syādaniścitaḥ yopi manyate  upādhayaḥ parasparaṃ āśrayācca bhinnā evaṃ tannibandhanāḥśrutayopi tadādhāre tatraiva varttante  tad ayamaprasaṅgaḥ iti  tasyāpinānopādhīnāmupakārāṅgaśaktibhyobhinnātmanaḥ sarvātmanā grahe kṛte upakāryasyako bhevaḥ syādaniścitaḥ vā na viṣaya   iti hetoḥ śabdānāṃ pratīte viṣaye paścāt pravarttamānānāṃ paryāyatāsyāt vṛkṣapādapādiśabdavat   madhuro rasaḥ snigdho guruḥ śīta ityevamādibhinnaviṣayānupātinyāśca buddheḥ pravṛttirna syādityeka viṣayatvaprasaṃgaḥ bhinnaṃ dharmadharmabhāvaṃ pāramārthikandūṣayitumupanyasyannāha  yasyāpītyādi yasyāpi vaiśeṣika sya parasparamāśrayācca bhinnatvānnānā upādhayo viśeṣaṇānidravyatvādayo yasyārthasya ghaṭāde sa nānopādhistasya tata evopādhibhedād bhedinorthasya vidhinaiva buddhigrāhikā niścayātmikā dhīḥ sā ca pratyupādhi bhinnā dhiyaśca viṣayabhedandarśayatā śabdānāmapyarthato darśita eva tadvayācaṣṭe yopītyādinā  upādhayo dravyatvādayaḥ parasparamanyonyambhinnāāśrayāccetyupādhimato bhinnāḥ  tannibandhanā bhinnopādhinibandhanā  śrutigrahaṇamupalakṣaṇamevaṃ buddhayopi  tadādhāre sthityupādhīnāmādhāreṣu  tatraiva cetyupādhiṣveva varttante vācakatayā pravarttante  taditi tasmād  ayamiti śabdajñānāntarāṇāṃ paryāyatālakṣaṇoprasaṃgaḥ uttaramāha  tasyāpītyādi  nānāprakārāṇāmupādhīnāsupakārasyāṅgaṃ kāraṇaṃyāḥ śaktayaḥ  tābhyobhinnātmana upādhimata ekena niścayajñānena grahe niścayesarvātmanā kṛte sati  upakāryasyopādhikalāpasya ko bhedaḥ ka upādhiviśeṣaḥsyādaniścita    sarva eva niścita syāt nanvagnidhūmayoḥ satyapi sambandhe nāgniniścaye dhūmasya niścayo dṛśyate tathādharmaniścaye dharmāniścayo bhaviṣyati nanvidamevādarśananna syāt  niścayapratyayena sarvātmanāgnisvarūpagrahe satiyadyapi bhinnā evopādhayaḥtathāpiśabdajñānāntarāṇāmarthanimittam sa tu tadvān eva tairupalīyate  tasya nānopādhyapakārāśrayaśaktisvabhāvasyasvātmani bhedābhāvāt sarvātmanā grahe ka evopādhibhedoniścitaḥ syāt sarvodhūmādikāraṇatvenaiva niścayāt  dhūmādīnāmapi niścitatvāt  tasmānna niścayena tatsvarūpagrahaṇaṃ  nirvikalpakenāpi tarhi sarvātmanā graho na syād dhūmāpratibhāsādeva tatkāryatvāgrahāt naitadasti  agnehi dhūmajananaṃprati kāraṇatvaṃ pūrvabhāva evocyate  sa capratyakṣa pratibhāsata iti kathaṃ nāgnestatkāryatvagrahaḥ  tenāyamartha     nāgnidhūmayoḥ paramārthataḥ parasparāpekṣitā vidyate  niṣpannā niṣpannāvasthāyāṃ sambandhābhāvāt  kevalamagnau satyeva dhūmo bhavatīti to kāryakāraṇe ucyete  dharmadharmaṇostu parasparāpekṣitvāddhamiṇaḥ sarvātmanā niścaye sarvadharmāṇāṃ sākṣānniścayaḥsyānnārthādākṣepaḥ yadā tu bāhyādhyavasāyako vikalpo bhavati na tu grāhakastadādhyavasitasyārthasyānyavyāvṛttisambhavenārthādanyadharmākṣepo yujyate  parasparāpekṣatveca yāvanna dharmaniścayo na tāvaddhaminiścayo  yāvacca na dharminiścayastāvanna adharmaniścaya ityanyonyāśrayatvañca syāt nanu copādhyupādhimadbhāva āśrayāśrayibhāva evocyate  sa ca samānakālabhāvinoreva  na ca tayorupakāryopakārakabhāvo bhinnakālatvādasya  tatkathamucyate  ekopādhiviśiṣṭa sarvagraha iti sattyaṃ    kintu parairanya eva janyajanakabhāvonyaścopakāryopakārakabhāvaiṣyate  tathā hi  vadaradravyaṃ svahetujanyamapi kuṇḍenopakriyateta evaṃ samānakālabhāvinorayamupakāryopakārakabhāva iṣyata iti tadabhiprāyādidamuktaṃ  yadvādharmo niścīyamānaḥ dharmyāśritatvādevāśrayasya pratītimākṣipati sa cāśritānāṃdharmāṇāmiti sarvaniścayaḥ  tasmācchabdapramāṇāntaravṛtteḥ kalpita eva dharmadharmibhāva   na cāsmin pakṣe dharmabhedābhedakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇāntaravaiyarthyamavastutvenateṣāṃ bhedābhedasya paramārthatobhāvāt  pramāṇāntaraireva ca dharmāntarāṇāṃ kalpanīyatadabhāve kathaṃ dharmabhedābhedakalpaneti yatkiñcidetat tvātyadyapītyādinā kārikāthaṃ vyācaṣṭe  śabdāntarāṇāṃ jñānāntarāṇāmartha upādhimati pratipatto pratinimittaṃ bhinnā evopādhayo yadyapyabhyupagamyante  sa tutadvānupādhimānarthaḥ śabdajñānairupalīyate viṣayīkriyate  tasya tadvato nānopādhīnāmupakārāśrayā yāḥ śaktayastatsvabhāvasya svātmani svarūpe bhevo nāsti  tataścaikopāPopapskatsomaadam g danwg katpādhyupakārakatvena grahaṇāt  na hi tasya svena rūpeṇa gṛhyamāṇasya upakārakatvamanyadevāgṛhītam  atosya yadeva svabhāvena grahaṇaṃ tadevopakārakatvenāpi tayorātmani sambandhādekajñāne dvayagrahaḥ ātmabhūtasya upādhitadvatorupakāryopakārakabhāvasya grahaṇāvekajñāne dvayorapi upādhimatorgragrahaṇamiti ekopādhiviśiṣṭepi gṛhyamāṇe sarvopādhonāṃgrahaṇaṃ tadgrahaṇanāntarīyakatvāt  anyathā tathāpi na gṛhyeta  na hyanyadhidvāreṇāpi he sarvātmanā grahaṇantasminsati ka evopādhibhedastasyāniścitakintu sarva eva niścita syāt  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ  sarvopādhyupakārakatvenagrahaṇāt ekopādhidvāreṇopādhimataḥ svarūpameva grahītaṃ na tūpādhyupakārakatvamiticedāha na hotyādi na hyupādhyupakārakatvamanyadevāgṛhītamityanena sambandhaḥ tasyetyupādhimataḥ svena rūpeṇa gṛhyamāṇasya svarūpādupakārakatvasyābhevāt  yataevamataḥ kāraṇādasyetyupādhimataḥ  yadeva svabhāvena svarūpeṇa grahaṇantadevopakārakatvenāpi grahaṇamiti bhavatvekopādhidvāreṇopādhimataḥ sarvopādhyupakārakatvasya svabhāvabhūtasya grahaḥ upādhīnāntu tasmād vyatiriktānāṃ kathaṃ grahaṇamityata āha  tayorityādi upādhikalāpasyopādhimataśca upakāryopakārakabhūtayorātmani svabhāvenyonyasambandhosambandhādupakāryopakārakasambandhasyātmabhūtatvāditi yāvat  tataścopakārakasvabhāvasyaikasya jñāne sati sambandhād dvayagrahaḥ  upādhyupādhimatorgrahaḥ stadvayācaṣṭe  ātmabhūtasyetyādi  tathā hyupādhimati gṛhīte tasyātmabhūta upakārakabhāvastāvad gṛhītastasmin gṛhīte upādhīnāmapyukāryabhāva ātmadekajñāne dvayorapyupādhyupādhimatorgrahaṇamiti kṛtvā ekopādhiviśiṣṭepi tasminnupādhimati gṛhyamāṇe sarvopādhīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ  tadgrahaṇanāntaroyakatvādityupādhigrahaṇanāntarīyakatvāt  anyathetyupādhīnāmagrahe tathāpi na gṛhyeta  upādhīnāmupakāraka upādhimānityevamapi na gṛhyeta ya eva tadānīṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimitta mupādhistaṃ pratyevopakārakatvamupādhimatogṛhītaṃ na tūpādhyantaropakārakatvamiti cedāha  na hyanya evetyādi  anyopakārakaityanyasyopādherupakārakaḥ svabhāvo yo na gṛhītaḥ kintu sarva eva gṛhīto niraṃśatvādavastunaḥ  sāmānyacintāevānyopakārakaḥ kaścid gṛhītaḥ  na cāpi tathā upakārake gṛhote upakārakāryasyāgrahaṇam  tasyāpyagrahaṇaprasaṅgāt  svasvāmitvavaditi  tasmādarthāntaropādhivādepi samānaḥ prasaṃgaḥ athāpi manyate  yābhiḥ upādhīnupakaroti tāḥ śaktayo bhinnā eva  tato bnāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ dharmopakāraśaktīnāṃ bhede tāmtasya kiṃ yadi nopakārastataḥ tāsāṃ tathā syādanavasthitiḥ syānmatam  upādhimatonapekṣitasambandhina upakāraka ityeva grahaṇaṃ natvasyopakāraka iti tato nopādhīnāṃ grahaṇamityata āha  na cāpītyādi  tathāgṛhīta ityupakāraka ityevaṃ gṛhīte upakārakāryasyopādheragrahaṇaṃ  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tasyāpyukārakasya upakāraka ityevamagrahaṇaprasaṃgāt  etat kathayati    sambandhitvādupakārakasyāntareṇa dvitīyasambandhigrahaṇamupakāraka ityapi grahaṇaṃ nāstīti tathābhūtañca dṛṣṭāntamāha svasvāmitvavaditi  na hi svagrahaṇamantareṇā stisvāmitvasya grahaṇaṃ  yata evamekopādhidvāreṇa pravṛttepyekasmin jñāne śabde casarvopādhīnāṃ grahaṇamupādhimataśca sarvātmanā  tasmādarthāntaropādhivādepiarthāntarabhūtā upādhaya ityevaṃvādepi samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ  śabdajñānāntarāṇāṃ paryāyatāprāpnotīti athāpītyādinā paramāśaṅkate yābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ śaktimānupādhīnupakarotitāḥ śaktayaḥ śaktimataḥ sakāśād bhinnāḥ  tasa iti bhedāt  nāyaṃ prasaṃga itiṃ ekopādhyupakārakaśaktyabhedagrahe sarvaśaktīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ  tadgrahaṇācca sarvopādhīnāmityayaṃprasaṅgo nāsti uttaramāha  dharmopakāretyādi  dharmā upādhayasteṣāmupakārasya yāḥ śaktayastāsāṃśaktimataḥ sakāśād bhedebhyupagamyamāne tāḥ śaktayastasya śaktimataḥ kimbhavanti na kiṃcid bhavanti na tatsambandhinya ityarthaḥ  yadā yadi nopakārastataḥ  śaktimatastāsāṃ śaktīnāṃ  atha sambandhasiddhyarthamupakāra iṣyate  tadā śaktyupakāriṇyoparā vyatiriktāḥ śaktayoṅgīkarttavyāḥ  yābhiḥ śaktīrupakaroti  tāsāṃ casambandhatvasiddhyarthamupakāraḥ kalpanīyaḥ  tatrāparā śaktikalpaneti tathā syābanavasthitiḥ yadi pratyupādhi upakārakatvāni tasya naiva svātmabhūtāni nāpi tata upakāramanubhavanti  kiṃ tasya tā iti  atha yadi svātmabhūtābhiḥ śaktibhirayamekaḥ śaktīrupakurvan ekopādhigrahaṇe ca sarvātmanaiva grahaṇam  tathā hi upādhigrahaṇe tadupakāriṇyaḥ śaktergrahaṇam  tadgrahaṇe tadupakārī svātmabhūtasakalaśaktatyupakāro bhāvogṛhītaḥ sarvā śaktī grahayati  tāścopādhīna grāhayantīti tadavasthaḥ prasaṃgaḥ atha tā api śaktyupakāriṇyaḥ śaktayo bhinnā eva bhāvād  tadā ca upādhīnāṃtacchaktīnāṃ cāparāparāsveva śaktibu aparyavasānenodghaṭanāt sa ekaḥ tābhiḥtadvayācaṣṭe  yadītyādi  upādhimupādhimprati pratyupādhi  upakārakatvāniśaktayastasyopādhimataḥ na svātmabhūtāni  na svabhāvabhūtāni  kintu vyatiriktāni nāpi tata upādhimataḥ upakāramanubhavanti  ātmasātkurvanti  kintasya tā ucyante upādhimataḥ śaktaya iti kasmāducyante  sambandhābhāvāt  sambandhasiyarthamupādhia mataḥ sakāśāt tāsāmupādhyupakāriṇī nāṃ śaktīnāmupakārevāṅgīkriyamāṇe yābhiḥśaktibhirupādhyupakāriṇī śaktīrupakarotyayamupādhimān  yadi tāstasyātmabhūtāiṣyante tadā svātmabhūtābhiḥ śaktibhirayamupādhimān eka ityanaṃśaḥ  upādhyupakāriṇī śaktīrupakurvan iti kiṃbhūtaḥtathā hotyādinā sarvātmanā grahaṇaṃ sādhayati  ekopādhigrahaṇe tayupakāriṇyo upādhyupakāriṇyo vyatiriktāyāḥ śaktergrahaṇaṃ  tadgrahaṇaupādhyupakāriśaktigrahe  tadupakārī upādhyupakāriśaktyupakārī ekasyeva saṃdarśanena pratibhāsanāt vyavacchedāntarāpekṣatvācca bhedoyasmeva sarvvatra dravyabhāvābhidhāyinoḥ śabdayorna tayorvācye viśeṣastena kaścana tasmāt sarvatra dharmadharmābhidhāyi śabde dharmivāciśabdapakṣe bhavati sāmānādhikaraṇyamviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvovā śuklo gauriti  sāmānādhikaraṇye kāraṇamāha  tathetyādi  tathā saṃketānusāreṇetyapratikṣiptabhedāntare vastuni dharmiśabdasya ke tānusāreṇa hetunā  ekasmindharmiṇi yojanaṃ saṃhāraḥ  vyavacchedahetukā dharmā vyavacchedadharmāḥ saṃhṛtāśca te sakalavyavacchedadharmāśceti karmadhārayaḥ  tai karaṇabhūtaivibhāgavataḥ  vibhaktānekadharmavato dharmiṇa ekasyeva śabdasandarśanena pradarśanena buddheḥ pratibhāsanāt  anekadharmavantandharmiṇamekamiva sandarśayantī buddhi pratibhāsata iti yāvat  na tu buddhipratibhāsasandarśito dharmī vastuta ekaḥ    vikalpanirmitasya dharmadharmavibhāga syālīkatvāt  ekasyaivetyapi paṭhanti  tatrāpi pratipattradhyavasāyavaśādeva yuktamiti boddhavyaṃ  tataḥ siddhaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ    yataśca bhedāntarāpratikṣepeṇadhammiśabdaḥ pravṛttastata eva tajjanitāyā buddherapratikṣipta bhedāntarāpekṣatvādbhavati viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo yad gauḥ śuklo nīlo veti  caśabdaśca pūrvavadatītahetvapekṣaḥ idameva vyāpakaṃ sarvavyavahārasya nāparasparaparikalpitaṃ sāmānyaguṇādikāntasyapramāṇabādhitatvādityāha  bhedoyamevetyādi  dravyabhāvābhidhāyinoḥ śabdayoraa yameva bhedo dharmāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇaḥ  sarvatreti  sāmānyasāmānyavati guṇaguṇavati  kriyākriyāvati  sarvasmin viṣaye dharmivacano dravyābhidhāryā dharmavacano bhāvābhidhāyī  yata evantena kāraṇena na tayordravyabhāvaśabdayorvācyeviśeṣaḥ paramārthataḥ kañcanāsti tadvayācaṣṭe  tasmādityādi  niścayapratyayaviṣayatvena karaṇena  na karicadviśeṣaḥ  tathā hi yathā gotvamityukte tatraivāgovyavacchede niścayastathā gaurityukte yadyapyapratikṣiptabhedāntarasyāgovyavacchinnasyābhidhānantathāpyagovyavacchekaścid viśeṣaḥ  ekastamevagamaya toti ayameva bhedaḥ  sāmānyacintājñāpayati pratikṣiptabhedāntaraḥ anyopratikṣepeṇajijñāpayiṣurarthantaṃ taddhitena kṛtāpi vā anyena vā yadi brūyādbhedo nāsti tatoparaḥ etāvantaṃ darśayet tathābhūtajñāpa nāya  pāka iti taddhitenāpi darśayituṃ yogyaṃpacedapa iti kṛdvatā pi svakṛtasamayāntareṇāpi  tathābhidhā namātreṇadamātre niścayonyeṣāntu bhedānāmapratikṣepamātraṃ  sa eva ca śabdārtho yatra śābdoniścayo bhavatīti nāsti bhāvadravyābhidhāyinoḥ śabdayorvācye viśeṣo bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepamātrantu bhidyate  tadevā hai ekastamevetyādi  eka itidharmaśabdastamityagovyavacchinnaṃ  pratikṣiptaṃ bhedāntaraṃ yena dharmaśabdena sa tathoktaḥ anya iti dharmiśabdopratikṣepeṇa tameva piṇḍaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena gamayatīti nāstidravyaniścayamprati bhedaḥ pratikṣepāpratikṣepamātrantu bhidyate  evaṃ gamanandevadattasyagacchati devadatta iti na kaścana bheda ityanyatrāpyevaṃ yojyaṃ yāpi jātiguṇakriyāsambandhabhedena catuṣṭhayī śabdānāṃ vṛttiḥ sāpyanenaivavastugatadharmabhedena saṃgṛhītetyāha jijñāpayiṣurityādi  jñāpayitumicchurarthantambhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇaṃ  taddhitena taddhitapratyayāntena  kṛtāpi vā  kṛtsaṃjñakapratyayāntena vā anyena vā kṛttaddhitavyatiriktena tiṅantenāvyutpanna vāśabdena śuklādinā yadi brūyāt  tato bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇād viśeṣādaparo bhedo nāsti tadvayācaṣṭe  etāvantamityādinā  etāvantamiti pratikṣiptabhedāntaralakṣaṇaṃ kṛtāpi vā  darśayediti sambandhaḥ yadā vādhiśrayaṇādikriyāyāṃ kartṛsthāyāmpacirvarttate  tatraiva ca ghañpratyayastadā pācakatvaśabdena kriyākārakayoḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyobhidhīyata iti pācakatvaśabdena samānārtha pākaśabdaḥ  dvāvapyetau pratikṣiptabhedāntaramapācakavyavacchinnamarthaṃ pratipādayataḥ  yadā tu karmasthaiva kriyā viklṛttiḥ pacerarthastadāpācakatvaśabdasya kathaṃ sambandhābhidhāyitvaṃ  pācakatvapākayobhinnārthatvāt anyena vā kṛttaddhitavyatiriktena tiṅādinā  tathābhūtajñāpanāya  pratikṣiptaarthāntarameva syāt  tathābhūtajñāpanāya śabdasya kṛtasaṃketatvāt nanu ca pācakasya pākakriyāyā na saṃbaṃdhaḥ  yathoktam   na vai pākenānya evapācakaḥ kaścid abhighīyate  yat punarasyābhiṣeyaṃ tabevābhidheyam  tadevapācaka tve nāpyabhidhīyate apratiṣṭhitai mithyāvikalpā dharmāḥ bhedāntarajñāpanāya svayaṃ kṛtena samayena darśayediti sambandhaḥ  yathā devadattena śayyatepaṭasya śuklatvamiti  atrāpi śāyakaśabdasya ya evārthaḥ sa eva pratikṣiptabhedāntaraḥ śayyata ityasyāpi  tathā śukla paṭa iti ya evāśuklavyavacchinno pratikṣiptabhedāntarorthaḥ sa eva pratikṣiptabhedāntaraḥ paṭasya śukla ityasyāpi  tathābhidhānamātreṇa tadeva vastvarthāntarameva paramārthato dharmadharmirūpeṇa vibhaktameva  na punarbhavatīti sambandha  kiṅkāraṇaṃ    tathābhūtasyaiva pratikṣiptāpratikṣiptabhedāntarasyaivaikasya jñāpanāya dharmadharmaśabdasya kṛtasaṃketatvāt yadvā tathābhidhānamātreṇeti arthāntarabhūtadharmābhidhānamātreṇa taddharmasva rūpamparamārthatorthāntarameva bhavati  tathābhūtasyaiva bhedāntaranirapekṣasyaiva tasyaikavyāvṛttasya jñāpanāya dharmaśabdasya kṛtasaṃketatvāt nanu cetyādi paraḥ  sambandha ucyata iti pākakriyāyāḥ pācakasya ca kartuḥsambandhaḥ samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ  tathā hi kṛdantād bhāvapratyayaḥ sambandhasyābhidhāyakodṛṣṭo yathāha  samāsakṛttaddhiteṣu sambandhābhidhānamiti  kṛdantaśca pācakaśabda  na pāka eva kriyātmakaḥ pācakatvaśabdenocyate etaduktambhavati  anyaiva kartṛvyatiriktā kriyānyaśca tayośca sambandhonya eva  tataśca kartṛsthakriyābhidhāne satyapi pacaterna pākapācakatvaśabdayostulyortha iti  na vai pākenetyādinā pariharati  pākena kartṛsthe na vastubhūtenavyāpāreṇa yuktonya eva pākakriyā vyatiriktaḥ pāñcako nāma karttābhidhīyatepācakaśabdena  yādṛśo varṇyate vai śe ṣi kā dibhiḥ kriyā vyatiriktaḥ svatantraḥkartā yatra kriyākārakasambandho vastubhūtaḥ syāt  tasya svatantrasya kartuḥ kriyāvyatiriktasya niṣetsyamānatvāt  na ced vyatiriktā kriyā kartā vā kutassambandhaḥ yasya bhāvapratyayenābhidhānamiti bhāvaḥ  yatpunarasyeti pācakaśabdasyāsyābhiṣeyamapācake vyavacchinnamapratikṣiptabhedāntaraṃ vastumātrantadeva pācaka Jiskaddubrdodpastabuyathā jñāyate kriyā vyatiriktā na tatsamavāyo veti tenānyāpohaviṣaye tadvatpakṣopavarṇanam pratyākhyātaṃ pṛthaktve hi syādoṣo jātitadvatoḥ viśiṣṭasyārthasya śabdarabhidhānādanyāpohepi tadvatpakṣovitaḥ savaḥprasaṃga tulya syāt iti yaduktaṃ tadapi anena prativyūḍham  tatra hiśabdābhidheyaṃ pācakatvenāpyabhidhīyata ityadhyāhāryaḥ  tasyaiva pratikṣiptabhedāntarasyābhidhānāt  na tu sambandhobhidhīyate  tasyāsattvāt  tadeva yathoktaṃ pācakaśabdābhidheyaṃ pākaśabdenāpītyapiśabdāt aparaṃ vyākhyānaṃ  na vai pākeneti pākaśabdenānyāpohavādipakṣe anya evavyatirikta kriyāśrayabhūtaḥ pācakobhidhīyate  yādṛśo varṇyate pareṇa    yaḥ kriyākārakasambandhasyāśrayaḥ syāt  tasyāsiddhatvāt  kintvapācakavyāvṛttirbhedāntarapratikṣepeṇābhidhīyate  tadevāha  yatpunarityādi  yadityapācakavyāvṛttilakṣaṇaṃpratikṣiptabhedāntaramabhidheyaṃ  asyeti pākaśabdasyānantarameva darśitaṃ tadeva pākaśabdābhidheyampācakatvaśabdenāpyabhidhīyate  na sambandhaḥ  tasyāsiddhatvāt apratiṣṭhitairavastubalāyātaṃrata eva mithyāvikalpāḥ kathampunargamyate kriyā vyatiriktā nāsti tatsamavāyo vetyata āha  yathetyādi  tatsamavāyo veti kriyākārakasamavāyaḥ  yataśca vyāvṛttivyāvṛttimatorabhedastena kāraṇenānyāpohaviṣayo jātimān śabdarabhidhīyata iti  tadva atapakṣastatra yo doṣaḥ sonyāpohepi syāditi tadvatpakṣopavarṇanaṃ pratyākhyātaṃ yasmāt pṛthakatve hi jātitadvatorabhyupagamyamāne syāt tadvatpakṣodito doṣaḥ tadviśiṣṭasyetyanyāpohaviśiṣṭasyārthasya śabdarabhidhānāt tadvatpakṣodita ititadvatpakṣe ya uktaḥ  yathā kila sāmānyamabhidhāya tadvati varttamānaḥ śabdosvatantraḥsyātta taśca śabdapravṛttinimittabhūtena sāmānyena vaśīkṛtasya śabdasya vyaktigataparasparabhedānākṣepāttaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt  upacaritā ca tadvati śabdapravṛttirityādiko doṣa ityevaṃ vyāvṛttimabhidhāya tadvati varttamānosvatantro dhvaniriti sarva prasaṃga syāt  tadapi tadvatpakṣopavarṇanaṃ  aneneti vyāvṛttivyāvṛttimatorananyatvena prativyūḍhaṃ pratyākhyātaṃ  yasmāt tatra hi tadvatpakṣe  arthāntaramupābāyeti vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyamupādāyānyatrārthāntare tadvati  sākṣāt sāmānyavatonabhidhānādasvātantryaṃ  ādiśabdādasamānādhikaraṇyopacāradoṣaparigrahaḥ anyāpohapakṣe tu vyāvṛttivyāvṛttimatoraikyānnārthāntaramupādāyārthāntare śabdapraarthāntaramupādāya pravṛttasya śabdasya svātaṃtryābhāvāvidoṣeṇa bādhāb anyasmād vyāvṛttihi vyāvṛttāt nānyā dvayorekābhidhānādityuktam syātakathamidānīṃ ekasya vyāvṛttasya anyānanugamāt anyavyāvṛttiḥ sāmānyam tadbuddhau tathā pratibhāsanāt  na vai kiñcit sāmānyam  śabdāśrayā buddhiranādivāsanāsābharthyāt dharmānasaṃsṛṣṭānapi saṃsṛjantī jāyate  asadarbhākārapratibhāsavaśena sāmānya sāmānādhikaraṇaṃ ca vyavasthāpyate  arthānāṃ ekasya bhedābhāvāt vṛttistato nāstyasvātantrā ntryā didoṣa ityāha  na cetyādi  anyasmādvastunoryā vyāvṛttiḥ sā vyāvṛttānnānyā  dvayordharmadhamivācinoḥ śabdayorekasyavyāvṛttibhedasyābhidhānāvityuktamanantarameva kathamityādi paraḥ  idānīmiti vyāvṛttitadvatoraikye  ekasya vyāvṛttasyasvalakṣaṇasyānanugamāt  arthāntarāsaṃsargāt  kathantasya svalakṣaṇasyātmabhūtāvyāvṛttiḥ svalakṣaṇavadananvayinī sāmānyaṃ syāt  naiva  dṛṣṭā ca sāmānyaṃ tadbuddhāvityādinā siddhāntavādī  sāmānyabuddhau vikalpikāyāṃ tathaikākāreṇapratibhāsanādekākāra eva vyāvartyateneneti vyāvṛttiḥ  sāmānyamucyate  etadāha na vyāvṛtteṣu svalakṣaṇeṣvātmabhūtā vyāvṛttirekā sāmānyaṃ kevalaṃ vyāvṛttasvalakṣaṇānubhavottarakālabhāvī vikalpaḥ prakṛtyā  ekakāryeṣu bhāveṣvekamākāramādarśayannivotpadyate tadvikalpavaśāt sāmānyamāsthīyate  niḥsāmānyeṣvapyanena ca sākṣācchandādiviṣayo darśitaḥ etadeva sphuṭayannāha  na vaṃ kiṃcidityādi  vastubhūtamityabhiprāyaḥ  kayantahasāmānyasāmānādhikaraṇyādivyavahāra ityāha  śabdetyādi  śabda āśrayaḥ sahakārikāraṇatvena yasyāḥ sā vikalpikā buddhiranādivāsanā sāmarthyāt  dharmānasaṃsū ṣṭānapi saṃsṛjantī ekākārāniva kurvāṇā jāyate  tasyā buddherekākārapratibhāsavaśena sāmānyaṃ  dharmadvayayuktaikarṣāmapratibhāsavaśena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca vyavasthāpyate  ayaṃ ca sāmānyādivyavahārosadvyāpi vyavasthāpyate  kathamasadarthab ityāha  arthānāmityādi  svalakṣaṇāṃnāṃ saṃsargābhāvāt sāmānyavyavahārosadarthaḥ ekasya ca svalakṣaṇasya bhedābhāvāt sāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahārosadarthaḥ nanu virūpatayāyaṃ sarvavyavahāraḥ pravṛtta iti kathamanyāpohaviṣaya ityata āha tasya sarvasya sāmānyādivyavahārasyārthāḥ samāśraya ityanena sambandhaḥ  tatkāryantaccaCzimthunpanid sāmānyacinātasya  sarvasya ca samāśrayaḥ  tatkāryakāraṇatayānyebhyo bhidyamānā arthābhavanti samāśrayaḥ  śabdopi aniṣṭād vyāvṛtte pravarttayatyatonyāpohaviṣaya uktaḥ tatra anapekṣitabāhyārthatattvo buddhi pratibhāsa vaśād ekonekavyāvṛttaḥ śabdatadanubhavāhitavāsanāprabodhajanmibhivikalpaiḥ adhyavasitatadbhāvārthaḥ viṣayīkāraṇamanurūpaṃ yeṣānteṣāmbhāvastayā  karaṇabhūtayā  anyebhya ityatatkāryakāraṇebhyobhidyamānā arthāḥ sarvasya sāmānyā  divyavahārasyāśrayo bhavantyataḥ kāraṇād anyāpohaviṣaya ukta  na tvanyāpohastatra pratibhāsate bāhyasyaivaikākārasya vidhirūpatayā pratibhāsanāt  yasmācca niścayaprayuktaḥ puruṣamaniṣṭaparihāreṇāniṣṭādvyāvṛtte svalakṣaṇe pravarttayatyatopi kāraṇād anyāpohaviṣaya ukto na tu pratibhāsāpekṣo vidheḥ pratibhāsanāt tena yaducyate bhaṭṭo dyo ta kā rābhyāṃ   gośabdasyārtha  kimbhāvothābhāvaḥyadi bhāvo kiṃ gaurathāgau  yadi gaurnāsti vivāda  athāgaugaśabdasyāgaurarthaiti atiśabdakauśalaṃ  athābhāvastadayuktaṃ  na hi gośabdaśravaṇādabhāve preṣyasaṃpratipattiḥ  śabdārthaśca pratipattyā pratīyate na ca gośabdādabhāvaṃ kaścitpratipadyatetathāgaurna bhavatītyayamapohaḥ kiṃ goviṣayothāsgoviṣayaḥ  yadi goviṣayaḥ kathaṃgorgavyevābhāvaḥ athāgoviṣayaḥ  kathamanyaviṣayād apohād anyatra pratipattiḥ na hi khadirecchidyamāne palāśecchidā bhavati  athā gaugaṃvi pratiṣedhogaurnabhavatīti  kena goragotvaṃ prasaktaṃ yatpratiṣidhyata iti   apāstaṃ  goviṣayatvād gośabdasya kevalaṃ kalpitaviṣayatvād vivāda yathā vā gopratiṣedhosatyapi samārope tathoktaṃ nāgiti yatkiñcidetat tasmāt sthitaṃmetadvidhireva śabdārtha iti etadeva darśayannāha  tatretyādi  anapekṣitaṃ svarūpeṇa bāhyatattvaṃ yena vikalpabuddhipratibhāsinā dharmiṇā sa tathoktaḥ  buddhipratibhāsavaśāvekonekavyāvṛtta iti anekasmād vyāvṛjñasyaikasya dharmiṇa sandarśanena buddheḥ pratibhāsanāt  tadvaśenaikodharmī anekavyāvṛtto vyavasthāpyate  yaścānekasmād vyāvṛttastasmāt tatra vyāvṛṣttayo dharmabhedāḥ kalpyanta iti bhāvaḥ  sa eva bhūto dharmī śabdaviṣayīkriyate  tathābhūtavikalpapratibhāsajananāya vaktṛbhiḥ śabdasyoccāraṇāt  yataścānyavyāvṛttovikalpapratibhāsaḥ śabdaviṣayīkriyate  tato vidhiviṣayatvaṃ siddhamiti bhāvaḥ Carekriyate  tatraiva ca dharmadharmaṇāveva vyavahāraḥ parasparaṃ tattvānyattvābhyāmavācyatvāviti pratanyate na hi dharmiṇo dharmonyaḥ  anarthāntarābhidhānāt  nāpi sa eva  tadvācināmiva dharmavācināmapi vyavacchedāntarākṣepa prasaṃgāt  tathā ceṣṭāpratyāyanāt saṃketabhedākaraṇam  avācyatvaṃ dharmadhamaṇoḥ śabdārthe  vastuni svalakṣaṇesāmānya lakṣaṇaṃ avācyaṃ avidyamānatvāt na kevalaṃ śabdavikalpairapi viṣayīkriyata ityāha  tadanubhavetyādi  tasyatasya svalakṣaṇasyānubhavastadanubhavastenāhitā vāsanā śaktistasyāḥ prabodhaḥkāryotpādānugaṇyantato janma yeṣāṃ vikalpānāntaviṣayokiyata iti sambandhaḥ ki viśiṣṭaradhyavasitatadbhāvārtha  adhyavasitastadbhāvo bāhyabhāvo yasminvikalpapratibhāse sodhyasavitatadbhāva evaṃ bhūtortho viṣayo yeṣāmvikalpānāntetathā  dṛśyavikalpāvekīkṛtya pravṛtteriti yāvat aadhyavasita tadbhāvārtha iti pāṭhāntarantadādhyavasitatadbhāvaścāsāvarthaśceti karmadhārayaḥ  ekopyanekavyāvṛttodhyavasitatadbhāvārtha iti sambandhaḥtasmād buddhipratibhāsavaśāt  sāmānyādivyavahāraḥ  tatraiva ca buddhipratibhāseyamiti bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇe  vyavahniyata iti vyavahāraḥ karmasādhanaḥ  dharmadharmaṇāveva vyavahāraḥ etaduktambhavati  buddhipratibhāse yau dharmadharmiṇo vyavasthāpyete  tauparasparantattvānyatvābhyāmavācyāditi pratanyate  paramārthatastena pāramārthikadharmadharmitattvānyatvapakṣe yo doṣaḥ pramāṇāntarādivaiyarthyaṃ svātantryādilakṣaṇa uktaḥsa iha na bhavatītyuktambhavati tattvānyatvapakṣayordoṣāntaramapyāha  na hotyādi  dharmiṇaḥ sakāśānnānyodharmaḥ  kiṅkāraṇam  anarthāntarābhiṣā nāt  dharmadharmaśabdābhyāmekasmādevavyavacchinnasyābhidhānāt  nāpi ya eva dharmī sa eva dharmaḥ  kasmāt  tadvācināmiva  dharmavācināmiva śabdānāṃ  dharmavācināmapi vyavacchedāntarākṣepaprasaṃgāt  tathā ceṣṭāpratyāyanāt  dharmaśabdeneṣṭasya pratikṣiptabhedāntarasya bhedasyāpratyāyanāt  saṃketabhedākaraṇaṃ  pratikṣiptabhedāntaraṃ vyavacchedaṃ pratyāyayatidharmaśabda ityasya saṃketabhedasyākaraṇaṃ  etadanantaroktantattvānyattvābhyāmavācyatvaṃdharmadharmiṇoḥ śabdārtha buddhipratibhāsinya uktaṃ  vastunīti bāhyasvalakṣaṇe avidyamānatvāveva tattvānyattvābhyāmavācyaṃ yathāpratibhāsantu śabdādiviṣayo vyavasthāpyate  sāmānyacintānanu ca dharmadharmiṇorabheve bhede ca ṣaṣṭhapādivibhaktirdṛṣṭā tatra bahuṣu dharmeṣudṛṣṭo vacanabheda ekasmin dharmiṇi na yuktaḥ uktamatra  na vai śabdānāṃ svabhāvāyattateti api ca yeṣāṃ vastuvaśā vāco na vivakṣāparāśrayāḥ ṣaṣṭhīvacanabhedādi codyaṃ tāna prati yuktimat yadi ete kvacid praṇinīṣitā vastupratibandhāt dhūmādivat na hi puruṣainiyoktuṃ pāyaṃte  tadā kathaṃ ṣaṣṭhyādaya ityupālambhaḥ syāt yadā punaḥ yadyathā vācakatvena vaktṛbhirviniyamyate anapekṣita vāhyārthatattathā vācakaṃ vacaḥ nanu cetyādi para  dṛṣṭā prayogeṣūpalabdhā  gorgotvamiti ṣaṣṭhī ādiśabdād gavi vyavasthi taṃ gotvaṃ  gotvena nimittena gavi gośabdo varttata ityādivibhaktiparigrahaḥ gotvadravyatvādīnāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ bahutvāt  tatra bahuṣu dharmeṣu gotvadravyatvapārthivatvānīti dṛṣṭo yo vacanabhedaḥ sa na syād    dharmadharmaṇorabhede pāramārthikabhedābhāve dharmāṇāṃ ca paraspararam uktamatreti siddhāntavādī  na vai śabdānāṃ kācid viṣayasvabhāvāyattāvṛttirityādinoktatvāt bhūyaścādhikāryavidhānena pratipādayitumāha  api cetyādi  yeṣāṃ vādināṃvastuvaśā bāco vastvāyattāḥ  na vivakṣāparāśrayāḥ  vivakṣaiva para pradhānamāśrayo yāsāṃ vācāntā vivakṣāparāśrayāḥ ṣaṣṭhī na syād vacanabhedādayaścana syurityevaṃ ṣaṣṭhīvacanabhedādiṣu codyaṃ ṣaṣṭhīvacanabhedādi codyaṃ  ādiśabdāt gorbhāvo gotvamityādi  taddhitapratyayābhāvacodyaṃ  tān vastuvādinaḥ prati yuktimat  ete śabdāḥ ṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ kvaciditi vastvabhedepi praṇinīṣitāḥ praṇetumiṣṭāḥ  vastupratibandhāt  vastvāyattatvāt  ghūmādivat  na hyagnipratibaddho dhūmovahnipratyāyanasamarthastadvaiparītyena jalapratyāyane niyoktuṃ pāryate  tadā vastupratibaddhatveśabdānāmayamupālambhaḥ syādasati vyatireke kathaṃ ṣaṣṭhayādaya iti betadeva nāstītyāha  yadā punarityādi  yad vaco yathā yena prakāreṇa bhedasyābhedasya vā pratipādanāya  ki viśiṣṭamanapekṣitabāhyārthaṃ vācakatvena rūpeṇa vaktuna hi vyatireke ṣaṣṭhī bāhulye karjā di rityevamādi  etadapi puruṣābhiprāyanirapekṣaṃ vastusannidhimātreṇa na svayaṃ pravṛttam  te tu tatra tathā prayuñjata iti tataḥtathā pratītirbhavati  evamanyatrāmapi taiḥ kathaṃcid prayuktāstathaiva pratītihetavobhavanti  tatra puruṣāyattavṛttīnāṃ avastusaṃdaśināṃ vikalpaprabodhahetūbhūtānāṃ śabdānāṃyathābhyāsaṃ vācyeṣu pravṛtticintā  tadvaśād vastuvyavasthānaṃ jāḍyakhyāpanamevakevalam dharmadharmyādiṣu vyāvṛttidena tathākṛtavyavasyāḥ śabdā na punarvāstavādevatibhiviniyamyate  tattatheti tadvacanaṃ yathāyogaṃ vācakaṃ taddyācaṣṭe   na hotyādi  vyatireke vastubhede sati ṣaṣṭhīvibhaktirbāhulyejasādayo bahuvacanapratyayā bhavantīti vaiyākaraṇānāṃ vyavasthānametadapipuruṣābhiprāyanirapekṣamvastusannidhimātreṇa na svayaṃ pravṛttaṃ  saṃketabalenaiva pravṛttamitiyāvat  etadevāha  te tu tatretyādi  te tu vaiyākaraṇādayastatra vyatireke bāhulyeca tatheti  ṣaṣṭhī bahuvacanaṃ ca yathāsaṃketaṃ prayuñjata iti kṛtvā tataḥ ṣaṣṭhyādestathāpratītirbhavati  vyatirekādipratītira nyeṣāmapi bhavati  tathābhūtavyavahāropalambhāt na tu tāvatā vastubalena vyatirekabāhulye ca ṣaṣṭhyādīnāṃ niyamaḥ  evamanyatrāpīti dharmadharmaṇoravyatirekepi ekatve ca vastunaḥ kṛta katvānityatvādīnāṃ kathaṃciditibhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇaṃ dharmadharmiṇorbhedamupādāya  kṛtakatvādiṣu vyāvṛttibhedopalakṣitanānātvamupādāya  yathākramaṃ ṣaṣṭhī bahuvacanādayaste prayoktṛbhiḥprayuktāstathaiva yathāyogaṃ pratītihetavo bhavanti  tatraivamicchāmātranibandhanatve śabdānāṃsthite sati  puruṣāyattavṛttīnāntadicchāvaśena pravṛtteravastusandarśināṃ śabdebhyasvalakṣaṇasyāpratibhāsanāt  yathābhyāsaṃ yasya yathā saṃketābhyāsastathā vikalpaprabodho vikalpodayastasya hetūnāṃ  saṃketānurūpasya śrotṛsantāne vikalpasya kāraṇānāmityarthaḥ  evaṃ bhūtānāṃ śabdānāṃ vācyeṣvartheṣu yeyampravṛtticintā vyatireke ṣaṣṭhyādayaityādikā  naiyā yi kā dīnāntadvaśāditi śabdavaśād vastuvyavasthānaṃ  vyatiriktasya vastunoṅgīkaraṇaṃ  gorgotvamiti yasmāt ṣaṣṭhī tasmāt sāmānyaṃ vyatiriktamityādi  jāḍyakhyāpanaṃ śabdārthavyavasthānabhijñatvakhyāpanameva kevalaṃ tathetyādi paraḥ  tathākṛtavyavasthā dharmadharmyādiṣviti dharme dharmiṇi ca bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepābhyāṃ dharmaghamiśabdāḥ kṛtavyavasthāḥ  ādiśabdād dravyatvapārthivatvānītyādibahuvacanaśabdā vyāvṛttibhedena kṛtavyavasthāḥ  na punarvāstavādeva dharmadharmiṇorvyatirekāt ṣaṣṭhīvastubhedād dravyatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paramārthataeva bhedādvahuvacanamiti  kuta etat    tathetyādi prativacanaṃ  tathā vyavahārā sāmānyacintākuta etat  tathā vyavahārāyogāt na hi dharmadharmiṇoḥ bhede tad rūpatve ca śabdānāṃ yathāvastu pravṛttau sāmānyatatsambandha sāmānādhikaraṇya viśeṣaviśeṣyabhāvā yujyanta iti vakṣyāmaḥ yasya śabdapravṛttibhedaḥ sarvatra vastukṛta eveṣṭaḥ  tasya bdārāḥ ṣaṇṇagarītyādau bhedābhedvyavasthiteḥ khasya svabhāvaḥ khatvaṃ cetyatra vā kiṃ nibandhanaṃ  yadā ekasyā api striya dārā ekasyā api bālukāyāḥ sikatā iti vyavayogāditi  vyavahāraviṣayayordharmadharmiṇorvāstave vyatireke  dharmāṇāṃ ca parasparaṃparaparamārthato bhede sāmānyādivyavahārāyogāt etadevagrahaṇakavākyaṃ na hotyādinā vyācaṣṭe  vyavahāraviṣayayordharmadharmiṇovastutve parasparaṃ  tattvamanyatvaṃ vābhyupagantavyaṃ vastunaḥ prakārāntarābhāvāditi advayamupanyastaṃ  bhede tattvarūpatve ceti pakṣadvayepi doṣodbhāvanārthamanyathā pareṇa vyatirekavastubhedāditi bhedapakṣevalambite tattvapakṣopanyāso na prakaraṇānurūpa syāt tatsambaddha iti sāmānyatadvatoḥ sambandhaḥ  śabdānāmvā yathāvastu pravṛttāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ sāmānyādayo yujyante  etaccāntarameva vakṣyāmaḥ  vastukṛtamiti vastūnāmekānekatvādikaṃ śabdapravṛttibhedamekavacanabahuvacanādīnāṃ pravṛttibhedaṃ  dārāḥ śabdo nityabahuvacanānta pulliṅgaśceṣyate  yatra yadaikastrīviṣayodārā iti śabdastadā bhevyavasthiteḥ  ṣaṇṇagaiṃrīti bahūnānnagarāṇāmekavacanenābhidhānādabhedavyavasthiteḥ kinnibandhanaṃ    bāhyaṃ naiva kiṃcit  ādiśabdātmikatāprāsādamāletyādau bhedābhedavyavasthiteḥ  khasya svabhāvaḥ khatvaṃ ceti khasya svabhāvaityatra vyatirekaṣaṣṭhyā kinnibandhanaṃ  atha tattvamityanenoktena ki yadi khasyasvabhāva ityasya vākyasya khatvamitīyantaddhitavṛttirbhavatītyetkathyate tannāsti  nahi svabhāva ityasminnarthe bhāvapratyaya kintarhi bhāvārtha  na ca taddhitavṛttipradarśanenakiñcit prayojanamastyanyatareṇa vyatirekapradarśanāt atraike vṛttivākyābhyāṃ sarvo vyavahāro vyāpta iti tadvyāptipradarśanārthaṃ dvayamuktamiti anyenyathā vyācakṣate  khasya svabhāva iti vyatireke kinnibandhanaṃ  tathākhatvamiti vyatirekābhidhāyino bhāvapratyayasya kinnibandhanamiti pramāṇavāsikasvavṛttiṭīkā hāranibandhanaṃ yena evaṃbhūtasya bahutvaṃ kathaṃ bhavati śaktibhedāditi cet  sarvatraekavacanavilopaḥ nānāśaktitvāt   evaṃ  yatnaśca vyartha syāt  vastvabhedādanyatra ekavacanamiti cet  i hāpi syāt  tasmād ayaṃ niyamo nirvastukaḥkriyamāṇaḥ śabdaprayoge icchāsvātaṃtryaṃ khyāpayati  ṣaṇṇagarīti kathaṃ bahuṣuekavacanaṃ syāt  na hi nagarāṇyeva kiṃcit  kutasteṣāṃ samāhāra eva  prāsādapuruṣādonāṃ vijātīyānāṃ anārambhāt  teṣāṃ samastānāṃ viśliṣṭānāṃ dravyaṃ asaṃyogācca yadetyādinā vyācaṣṭe  yadā yasmin kāle  yacchandamanye paṭhanti yasmādityarthaḥ  yenaivambhavatīti dārā ityādi bahuvacanambhavati  ekatvādekavacanameva prāpnotīti bhāvaḥ  ekasyā api striyaḥ sikatānāṃ ca bahvyaḥ śaktayastataḥśaktibhedo bahuvacanakāraṇamiti  sarvatreti yatrāpyekavacanamiṣṭamvṛkṣa ityādau ekaśakterarthasyābhāvāt  sarvasya nānā śaktitvāt  evaṃ satyekasminnekavacana mityayaṃ yatnaśca vyartha syāt  satyapi śaktibhede vastvabhedāt  śaktyāśrayasyābhedāt anyatraikavacanaviṣayerthe vṛkṣaḥ paṭa ityādāvekavacanamiti cet ihāmi dārādāvekavacana mekasyāḥ striyā vastvabhedāt  yata evaṃ na vastvaśaktyāśrayo vā śabdapravṛttibhedaḥ  tasmādayaṃ śabdapravṛttiniyamo nirvastuko bāhyavastvanāśrayaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ puruṣecchāyāḥ svātantryaṃ śabdaprayoge syāpayati ṣaṇṇāṃ nagarāṇāṃ samāhāraḥ kriyātmako guṇātmako vā  ekosti tata ekavacanamiti cedāha  nahi nagarāṇyeva kiciditi nagarāvayavidravyasyānabhyupagamātob kutasteṣānnagarāṇāṃ samāhāraḥ kriyātmako guṇātmako vā yata evamabhidhīyeta kriyāguṇayordravyāśritatvāt  kiṃ punadravyamityāha  prāsādetyādi  gṛhādisamudāyonagaraṃ  vijātīyānāṃ ca prāsādīdānāṃ dravyārambhānabhyupagamāt kutastatsamudāyaprāsādādisamudāyo nagaraṃ dravyaṃ syāt  yāvatā prāsādatoraṇapuruṣādīnāṃ samudāyonagaramiṣyate  teṣāṃ prāsādādīnāṃ samastānāmasaṃyogācca kāraṇānna garandravyaṃ saṃyogasahāyānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ dravyārambhakatvamiṣyate  na prāsādapuruṣakuḍyādīnāṃviśliṣṭānāṃ saṃyogosti  yena prāsādādijanyaṃ nagarandravyaṃ syāt syānmataṃ    yadyapi sākalyena prāsādādīnāṃ nāsti saṃyogastathāpi yeṣāṃtāvat prāsādapuruṣādīnāṃ parasparaṃ saṃyogastatsaṃyogātmakaṃ nagarambhaviṣyatyevamapi Namspayinte Spyiltazigrjas pa la yin te Pānini  na saṃyogaḥ  prāsādaḥ svayameva saṃyogasvabhāvaḥ pareṇāsaṃyogācca  tata eva saṃkhyābhāvaḥ tatsaṃyogena puruṣaiśca viśiṣṭā sattā hi nagaramiti cet kimasyāniratiśayāyā viśeṣaṇam  sattāyāścaikatvāt  nagarabahutvepi nagarāṇītibahuvacanaṃ na syāt  dvayasya parasparasahitateti cet  anupakāryopakārayoḥ kavastutvaṃ nagarasyāsiddhaṃ saṃyogasya guṇapadārthatvādityata āha  na saṃyoga ityādi na saṃyogasvabhāvantagaraṃ  tathā kāṣṭheṣṭakādīnāmvijātīyānāṃ kāryadravyānārambhātprāsādopi na dravyātmakaḥ kintu saṃyogasvabhāva iṣyate  saṃyogaśca guṇo nirguṇāścaguṇā iti kutaḥ prāsādasya saṃyogo yena tatsaṃyogātmakaṃ nagaraṃ syāt etadevāha  prāsādasyetyādi  patyarthāntareṇāsaṃyogācca na saṃyogonagaraṃ  cakāreṇānantaranirdiṣṭāt prāsādādīnāṃ viśliṣṭānāmasaṃyogācca nasaṃyogo nagarabhityetat samuccīyate  tadevaṃ prāsādādīnāmubhayathā saṃyogābhāvena nagarasya saṃyogasvabhāvatā nirastā prāsādādīnāṃ yā saṃkhyā tadātmakaṃ nagarambhaviṣyatīti cedāha  tata evasaṃkhyābhāva iti  yasmāt saṃyogātmakaprāsādastata eva kāraṇāt prāsādasyasaṃkhyāyā abhāvo nirguṇatvād guṇānāṃ  saṃkhyāpi hi guṇasvabhāvā  sa cāsausaṃyogaśca tatsaṃyogaḥ  prāsādātmakaḥ saṃyoga ityarthaḥ  tatsaṃyogena puruṣaiśca viśiṣṭāyā sattā sā nagaramiti cet  kimasyāḥ sattāyā ekatvānnityatvācca niratiśayāyā viśeṣaṇaṃ  na hi prāsādapuruṣādaya sattāṃ viśiṣanti  anādheyātiśayatvāt  tasmāt sattā nirviśeṣaṇā  tasyā nagaratve sarvatra nagaratvaṃ syādityabhiprāyaḥ  sattāyāścaikatvāditi  dravyaguṇakarmasvekeṃva sattā vyāpinī  nagarabahutvepinagaravyavasthāśrayāṇāṃ prāsādādisamudāyānāṃ bahutvepītyartha  anyathā sattātmakenagare prakṛte nagarabahutvaṃ kathaṃ syāt  dvayasyeti prāsādapuruṣāde sattāyāścayā parasparasahitatā sā nagaramiti cet  evaṃ hi sati na sarvatra nagarabuddhiḥ prāsādādīnāṃ sarvatrābhāvāt  prāsādādibahutvād bahuvacanaṃ ca siddhamitiparo manyate uttaramāha  anupakāryetyādi  anupakāryopakārakayoḥ sattāprāsādayoḥkassahāyībhāvaḥ  tathā hi dvividhaḥ sahakārārthaḥ parasparātiśayādhānena santāne aviśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādanalakṣaṇa pūrvasvahetoreva samarthānāmutpannānāmekakāryakriyābyedpapo mayinpadagla upakāryānupakārakayoḥkathaṃ nagaramiti ekavacanaṃsyāt  tathābhūtānāṃ kvacidarthe bhinnā śaktiḥ sā nimittamiti cet  na  śaktevastusvarūpāvyatirekāt artha vyatiriktāyā api anupakāropārataṃtryāt  śakterupakāre vā śaktyupakāriṇyāḥ śakterapi vyatirekenavasthānāt apratipattiḥ  tadavyatireke vāādyāyāṃ prasaṃga iti yatkiñcidetat  khasya svabhāvaḥ khatvamiti vyatirekāśrayālakṣaṇaśca  na tāvatpūrvaḥ sattāyā anādheyātiśayatvāt  nāpi dvitīyo yasmād yathāsattā kevalā nagarabuddhijananaṃ pratyasamarthā tathā prāsādādisahitāpi sāmarthya vākevalāpi janayet  yadi ca dvayasya paraspara sahitatā nagaraṃ  tadaikamapi nagaramanekātmakaṃ prāsādādyātmakatvāt  tataḥ puruṣasaṃyogasattānāmbahutvāt  nagaramityekavacanaṃsyāt  saṃyogaśabdena prāsādātmakaḥ saṃyoga uktaḥ tathābhūtānāmiti parasparasahitānāṃpuruṣasaṃyogasattānāṃ kvacidartha iti nagaramiti vijñāne  śabde ca niṣpādye abhinekā śaktirasti   setyabhinnā śaktinimittamekavacanasyeti cet  na  kiṃkāraṇaṃ  śaktervastu svarūpāvyatirekāt  puruṣādibhyo vasturūpebhyovyatirekāt tadvadevānekatvamiti kutastadāśrayamekavacanaṃ  vastusvarūpād vyatireke vā śakterabhyupamyamagāne puruṣasaṃyogasattābhiranupakāryasya śaktirūpasya puruṣādipāratantryannasyāt  tataśca puruṣādīnāṃ śaktiriti sambandho na syāditi bhāvaḥ atha vyatiriktāyā api śakteḥ puruṣādipāratantryasiddhayarthaṃ puruṣādikṛta upakāraiṣyate  tadā śakterupakāre vā puruṣādikṛte iṣyamāṇe  yayā śaktyā puruṣādayaḥprathamaṃ śaktimupakurvate  tasyāḥ prathamaśaktyupakāriṇyā api śakte śaktervyatirekenavasthā syādavyatireke vā ādyāyāmadhye kavacananibandhanatveneṣṭāyāṃ śaktāvavyatirekaprasaṃgaḥ avyatireke ca vastuvadeva bāhulyamiti tadavastho bahuṣu bahuvacanaprasaṃga iti yatkiñcidetat    śaktiparikalpane khasya svabhāva iti vyatirekāśrayāṣaṣṭhī na syāt  ṣaṣṭhīkāraṇatvād bhāvapratyayopyupacārāt ṣaṣṭhīśabdenoktaḥ tenāyamaparorthaḥ khatvamiti vyatirekācayā taddhitotpattirna syāditi khasya svabhāvaḥkhatvamityanayā vyutpattyā bhāvapratyayasyotpattervyatirekāśrayatvaṃ athavā yathāyogaṃ sambandho granthacchedaśca kārya  khatvamiti vyatirekāśrayāṣaṣṭhī ca na syāt na tatra sāmānyam  nāpi vibhutvādayo guṇāḥtathocyate  arthāntarasya tatsvabhāva tvāyogāt  teṣāṃ ca niḥsvabhāvatvaprasaṃgāt  tasyāpi arthāntarasvabhāvatvatimi cet atiprasaṃga syāt  tathāpiapratipattiḥ evaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ padārthānāṃ ṣaṭpadārthavargādiṣvapi vācyāḥ  na hi tatra sāmānyaṃna syāt taddhitotpattirityadhyāhāraḥ  khasya svabhāva iti ṣaṣṭhī na syāditi  nahi khaśabdavācyād arthādanyaḥ svabhāvosti bhāvo vā  yo yathākramaṃ vyatirekaṣaṣṭhyāstaddhitasya vā nibandhanaṃ syāt  khatvaṃ nāma sāmānyamasti tadvyatirekanibandhanamiti cedāha  na tatretyādi  ekātmakatvāt khasya nāsmin khatvasāmānyaṃ   yadyapi sattvaṃ dravyatvaṃ cākāśesti  tathāpi na tat khasya svabhāvaḥ  ghaṭādisādhāraṇatvāt  nāpi sattvadravyatve khatvamityatra bhāvapratyayasya nibandhanaṃ  tayoḥśa    śabda  pratyayākāraṇatvāt  svānurūpajñānābhidhāanibandhanasvabhāvapratyayasya bkāraṇamiṣṭaṃ  nāpi vibhutvādayo guṇā iti  ādiśabdādekatvaparatvādiparigrahaḥ tathocyata iti khasya svabhāva iti  dravyādarthāntarasya vibhutvāderguṇasya tatsvabhāvatvāyogād ākāśasvabhāvatvāyogāt  na hyarthāntaramarthāntarasya svabhāvo yuktaḥ yadi ca vibhutvādaya ākāśa svabhāvāḥ  tadā teṣāṃ ca vibhutvādīnāmākāśasvabhāvatveniḥsvabhāvatvaprasaṃgāt  tathā hi yasteṣāṃ guṇasvabhāva satyākāśameva jātaṃ nacāparasvabhāvostīti niḥsvabhāvatā syāt  teṣāṃ ca niḥsvabhāvatve ākāśasyavyatiriktaḥ svabhāvo na syāditi bhāvaḥ  vibhutvāderapyarthāntarasvabhāvatvamiticedāha  tasyāpītyādi  tasyeti vibhutvāderarthāntaraṃ svabhāvosyeti vigrahaḥ atiprasaṃga iti yattadarthāntaraṃ vibhatvādeḥ svabhāvatveneṣṭantasyāpyarthāntarasvabhāvatvena bhāvyaṃ  anyathā tasyāpi vibhutvāvyatirekāt tadvadeva niḥsvabhāvatāsyāt  tathā cāparāparasvabhāvaparimārgaṇenānavasthānādekasyāpi pratiṣṭhitasvabhāvasyābhāvāt  ādyasyākāśasvabhāvasyāpratipattistataśca sa eva vyatirekābhāvaityabhiprāyaḥ evaṃ  dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ padārthānāṃ vargaḥ  ādiśabdāt prāsādamāletyādayo vācyāḥ kathamasati vyatireke ṣaṣṭhīti  na hi tatra ṣaṭpadāryeṣu sāmānyaṃ sambhavati saṃkhyā saṃyogo vā sambhavati kathamidānīṃ bhedābhāve khasya svabhāva iti na punaḥ khamityeva  khasya arthāntarasādhāraṇarūpāparāmarśana khamiti śabdapravṛttinibandhanaṃ rūpaṃ tathā jijñāsāyā evamucyate  na tu sarvavyāvṛttarūpānābhidhānāt na tadeva rūpaṃ buddhau samarpyate  atīndriyatvaprasaṃgāt  kevalaṃ ayamevamabhiprāyaḥśabdena śrotari vikalpapratibimbādhyastaṃ asaṃsṛṣṭatatsvabhāvaṃ arpayati yadvargaśabdenocyate dravyaguṇakarmasveva sāmānyābhyupagamāt  tathā saṃkhyā saṃyogovā na sambhavati tayorguṇapadārthatvena dravya eva bhāvāt kathamityādi paraḥ  idānomityarthāntarasvabhāvānabhyupagame khaśabdavācyasyabhāvaśabdavācyasya cārthasyāsatyaniścaye kathaṃ svabhāva iti bhedena nirdeśaḥ  na punaḥkhamityeva  bhedanibandhābhāvādabhedenaiva nirdeśo nyāyya ityarthaḥ khasyetyādinā pariharati  khasyeti khaśabdavācyasyārthasyārthāntayeti pṛthityāgena  khaśabdavyāderyatsādhāraṇaṃ rūpamanupāttaviśeṣāntarasyāparāmarśena  tyāgena pravṛttinibandhanaṃ rūpamanyadravyāsādhāraṇaṃ tathā jijñāsāyā atrārthāntarāsaṃsargimevamucyate khasya svabhāva iti  tathā khatvamiti  yathā gamyeta khasyāyaṃsvabhāvo nānyasyeti anena bhedāntarapratikṣepeṇaikavyāvṛttarūpānabhidhānādanyadeva vyatirekābhidhānanimitta muktaṃ  tena ghaṭasyābhāva ityādivyapadeśa siddho bhavati anye punarāhuḥ  khasya svabhāvaṃ pratipādayan svabhāvaśabdo svabhāvavyāvṛtti mātreṇa pratipādayati na tu svabhāvāntarāpratikṣepeṇa  khaśabdastu tameva rūpāntarāpratikṣepeṇa  tataḥ svabhāvāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇena bhedaleśena khasyāyaṃ svabhāvaḥarthāntarasādhāraṇarūpāparāmarśana khaśabdapravṛttinibandhanaṃ rūpamevamucyata itibruvatā svalakṣaṇameva vācyamuktamiti matvā paro brūte ityādi  na tu sarva ityādi netyādi siddhāntavādī  yat sarvasmād vyāvṛttaṃ svalakṣaṇātmakantadeva rūpaṃśabdotthāyāṃ buddhau śabdaiḥ samarpyate  neti sambandhaḥ  kasmāt tasya svalakṣaṇasyendriyabuddhāviva  śābde vijñāne pratyavabhāsane satyamatīndriyatvaprasaṅgāt  pratyakṣatvaprasaṅgāt  kintarha śabdena kriyata iti cedāha  kevalamityādi  ayamiti pratipādakaḥ dṛśyavikalpayorekatvādhyavasāyavipralabdhastathābhūtamasādhāraṇamarthaṃ pratyāyayiṣyāmītyevamabhiprāyaḥ śabdena karaṇabhūtena śrotari yo vikalpastasya prativimbabāhya tayādhya sāmānyacintāyadāha  adṛṣṭāyeṃ hi arthavikalpamātraṃ iti naivaṃ pratipādyapratipādakābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ pratipannaṃ pratipāditaṃ vā bhavati  svargādiśravaṇepi tadanubhavināmiva pratibhāsābhedaḥ  tasmādayaṃ apratipadyamānopibhāvasvabhāvastathābhūta eva vikalpapratibimbe tadadhyavasāyī santuṣyati  tathābhūtatvādeva śabdārthapratīte  tenaṃtadevamucyate  śabda   svarūpamāheti  na punaḥsvarūpapratibhāsasyaiva vijñānasya jananāt kathamivānoṃ ekāntavyāvṛttānāṃ bhāvānāṃ sāmānyamiti teṣāṃ asaṃsargādanyasya cābhāvād iti cet uktaṃ kathaṃ sāmānyamiti  asaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ ekenāsaṃsargaḥ  sa eva tadvyatirekiṇāṃstamākāramarpayati  ki bhūtamasaṃsṛṣṭatatsvabhāvaṃ agṛhītavasturūpaṃ  ācārya diṅa nā ga syāpyetadabhimatamityāha  yadāhetyādi  adṛṣṭārthe svargādiśabdeuccariterthavikalpamātraṃ śroturbhabatyadhyavasitabāhyārthasvabhāvo vikalpo bhavati natu bāhyasvarūpagrāhakaṃ anena cā cāya ṇā pi vidhyarthaḥ śabdārthobhipreta iti darśayati  naivaṃ vikalpaprativimbe śabdena śrotari janite pratipādyapratipādakābhyāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃpratipanaṃ pratipāditaṃ vā bhavati yadi hi śabdena svalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyate  tadā svargādiśabdaśravaṇepi  tadanubhavināmiva  svargādipratyakṣavedināmiva pratibhāsābhedaḥ syāt  śroturapisvargādisvalakṣaṇākārapratipattiḥ syāt  yataśca na śabdāt svalakṣaṇapratipattistasmādayaṃ śrotā śabdādapratipadyamānoṣi bhāvasvabhāvastathābhūta evāsaṃsṛṣṭavastusvabhāvaeva vikalpapratibimbe tadadhyavasāyī svalakṣaṇāghyavasāyī svalakṣaṇameva mayā pratipannamiti santuṣyati  ki kāraṇaṃ    tathā bhūtatvādeva  svalakṣaṇasyāgrahepyadhyavasitasvalakṣaṇarūpatvādeva śabdārthapratipatteḥ  yataśca svalakṣaṇādhyavasāyenaśabdārthasya pratītiste naitadevamucyate śabda svarūpamāheti  arthāntarasādhāraṇarūpāparāmarśena khaśabdapravṛttinibandhamasādhāraṇaṃ rūpamucyata iti vacanāt  na punaḥsvarūpapratibhāsasyaiva vijñānasya jananāt tasmāt sthitametad vidhyarthaḥ śabdārtholīkatvāt paramatād bheda iti kathamityādi paraḥ  ekāntavyāvṛttaṃ rūpaṃ yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ  teṣāmbhāvānāmasaṃsargādanyasya ceti bhāvebhyo vyatiriktasya sāmānyasya uktamiti siddhāntavādī  kīdṛśamuktamityāha  asaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ parasparavyāvṛttābsamānatetyuktam api ca  pararūpaṃ svarūpeṇa yayā saṃkriyate dhiyā ekārthapratibhāsinyā bhāvānāśritya bhedinaḥ  tathā saṃvṛtanānārthāḥ saṃvṛtyā bhedinaḥ svayam amedina ivābhānti bhāvā rūperaṇa kenacit   tasyā abhiprāyavaśāt sāmānyaṃ sat prakīrttitam  tadasatparamārthena yathā saṃkalpitaṃ tathā   nāmekena vijātīyenāsaṃsargaḥ  yathā govyaktīnāmekenāgosvabhāvenāsaṃsargaḥ saevāsaṃsarga  tadvyatirekiṇāntasmādagosvabhāvād vyāvṛttānāṃ gobhedānāṃ samānatāb gotvaṃ  evamanyadapi sāmānyaṃ boddhavyaṃ etaduktambhavati  samānāmiti karttari ṣaṣṭhī tena samānānāmbhāva sāmānyamiti vijātīyavyāvṛttā samānākārotpannā bhāvāḥ sāmānyamityarthaḥ  asyaivaca sāmānyasya liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvantatsambandhaśca vastutvāt  arthakriyākāritvācca pravṛttiviṣayatvaṃ vikalpaviṣayatvaṃ ca yathādhyavasāyaṃ na tu jñānākārasya etadviparītatvāt tadevaṃ samāropapakṣe parokṣaṃ dūṣaṇamparihṛtyānyavyāvṛttipakṣe parokṣaṃ dūṣaṇamanyavyāvṛttyanabhyupagamādeva nirasyānyavyāvṛttā eva bhāvā ekatvenādhyavasīyamānāḥsāmānyamiti ca pratipādya buddhyākārepi sāmānye paroktaṃ dūṣaṇamapanetumāha  apicetyādi  bhāvānāśritya bhedina iti vyāvṛttāni svalakṣaṇamvāśritya dhīrekāryapratibhāsi nyutpadyate  yayā svarūpeṇa svākāreṇaikena rūpeṇa  pararūpaṃ  parasparavyāvṛttaṃvalakṣaṇaṃ sambriyate pracchādyate  diti  kimviśiṣṭayā yā  saṃvṛtyā saṃvriyatenayā svalakṣaṇamiti kṛtvā  samvṛtanānārthā  sthagitanānārthāḥsvayambhedinopi kenacid rūpeṇa vijātīyavyāvṛttyupakalpitena gotvādirūpeṇābhevina ivābhānti saṃsṛṣṭa iva  tena   buddhyā kāraśca buddhistho nārthabuddhyantarānugaḥ nābhipretārthakārī ca sopi vācyo na tatvata ityādi nirastaṃ tasmād buddherabhiprāyavaśāt  ekākārādhyāropavaśāt sāmānyaṃsa kesnaprakīrtitaṃ  buddhyāropita evākāra  sāmānyamuktamiti yāvat  yathā tayā saṃka sāmānyacintābuddhivikalpikā tadanyavyatirekiṇo bhāvānāśritya utpannā svavāsanālpitamāropitaṃ tathā tat sāmānyamasat paramārthena nanu yadyabhinna pratibhāsobhyupagamya te kathaṃ sāmānyamasadityucyate  na   vyaktibhyo bhinnasyābhimatasyābhedena pratibhāsanāt  sarvātmanā cābhede vyaktivadananvaādanugatasya pratītirbhrāntireva  bhedābhede ca tathaivobhayarūpatayā pratibhāsaḥ syāt na ca yatra pratyaye yadaiva gauriti pratibhāsaḥ tadaiva tatra gotvamasyeti pratibhāsaḥ atha syād    yadananugame yasyānugamastattato bhinnaṃ yathā nīlādanīlaṃ śāvaleyānanugame ca gotvasyānugamo vyaktyantare  tasmāt tato bhinnaṃ śāvaleyābhinnagotvagrāhakantarhi pratyakṣaṃ bhrāntaṃ syād bhinnasyānyapramāṇagṛhītasyābhedenagrahaṇāt  na caikasya yenaiva rūpeṇa bhedastenaivābhedo virodhāt  nāpi vastūnāṃ viśeṣarūpatayā bhedaḥ  sāmānyarūpatayābhedaḥ  evaṃ hi viśeṣāṇāmekadeśāditvaṃ syānnaca syāt  sāmānyaviśeṣayośca pratibhāsabhedo na syāt sarvātmanābhinnatvād bhede vānugatavyāvṛttarūpayoḥ parasparāsaṃśleṣeṇaikāntabhinnatvaprasaṅgāt yadi ca prativyakti tadabhinnantadaikaṃ sāmānyamastīti kutaḥ  na ca tatra prathamavyaktidarśanegṛhītamapi dvitīyādivyaktau sa evāyamiti pratīterekaṃ sāmānya mastīti yuktaṃ  sa iti smaraṇāṃśasyānubhūtasāmānyaviṣayābhāvenotpattyasambhavāt  tataśca yathā prathamavyaktau na gṛhītantathā dvitīyādivyaktāvapi pratyekaṃ gṛhītamiti kathaṃ sa evāyamiti jñānasyotpattiḥ syāt  na ca sa iti smaraṇānyathānupapattyā prathamavyaktau nirvikalpakenānyena vā jñānena sāmānyagrahaṇakalpanā yuktā nugata rūpapratibhāsābhāvāt  nāpi dharmarūpatayā tatrāsya grahaṇaṃ yuktamanugataikarūpatvāt sāmānyasya  nāpi pūrvāparavyaktisambandhitayāsya pratyabhijñāpratyakṣeṇagrahaṇamiti śakyate vaktuṃ  idamevetyevaṃ pratyakṣasyotpattiprasaṃgāt  pūrvavyakterasannihitatvācca sannihitārthaniścayalakṣaṇaṃ ca pratyakṣamiṣyate tasmādagovyāvṛttaikaviśeṣānubhavapūrvaka manyasminnagovyāvṛttenubhūyamāne sati saevāyamityekākārasya bhrāntasya pratyayasya vāsanāsāmarthyenotpattestadevāsya nimittaṃkalpayituṃ yuktannānyad  bhrāntatvācca buddharayaṃ sāmānyākāro vyavasthāpyatena vāhyasya    yathāpratibhāsaṃ tu bāhyānāmevārthānāṃ sāmānyamucyate buddhirityādinā kārikāryaṃ vyācaṣṭe  buddhivikalpiketyanena sambandhaḥ tebhya sajātīyebhyonyastasmād vyatirekaḥ sa yeṣāmasti  te tadanyavyatirekiṇaḥ vijātīyavyāvṛttānityartha  svavāsanāprakṛti vikalpavāsanāsvabhāvambhinneṣvabhiasvabhāvamanuvidadhatī  eṣāṃ bhāvānāmabhedamadhyasya svayamevābhinnākāraṃ tānsṛjantī miśrayantī saṃdarśayati sā ca ekasādhyasādhanatayaiva anyebhyo vivekināṃ bhāvānāṃ vikalpasya vāsanātasyāḥ  prakṛtiḥ tadudbhavā  sā ceyaṃ evaṃpratibhāsamānā saṃvṛtiḥ  anayāsvarūpeṇa pararūpasya saṃvaraṇāt  te ca saṃvatabhedā bhinnātmāno pi kena cidrūpeṇābhinnā iva pratibhānti nnapratyayajananasāmarthyantadanuvidadhatī  anukurvatī  evaṃ hi tayā svakāraṇamanukṛtambhavati  yadi bhinteṣvapyekākārotpadyate  eṣāmiti padārthānāṃ  adhyasyetipadārtheṣvāropya bhāvānāmevaikaṃ rūpamiti  tān bhāvān sṛjantī  abhinnānivakurvāṇā sandarśayati  ekarūpāniva darśayatīti yāvad tena yaducyate nanu vikalpasyānubhūtārthāhitavāsanābalotpattāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ kathaṃ sāmānyākārasya vikalpasyotpattiḥ sāmānyasyānanubhūtatvādityata āha  sā cetyādi ekaṃ sadṛśaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhanañca yeṣāmbhāvānāṃ  yathā ghaṭādīnāmekamudakādidhāraṇādi sādhyaṃ  sādhanaṃ ca mṛtpiṇḍādi  te ekasādhyasādhanāstadbhāvastayā  karaṇabhūtayā  anyebhyotatsādhyasādhanebhyo vivekināṃ bhāvānāṃ sā prakṛtiḥ svabhāvaḥbhinnānāmapi prakṛtyā ekākāravikalpajananalakṣaṇaḥ tathābhūtasya vikalpasyaheturyā vāsanā  tasyāśca sā tādṛśī prakṛtiryadevaṃ svarūpaṃ para trāropayantī  eṣābuddhi pratibhāti  vyaktyabhinnasāmānyagrāhiṇī pratibhāsata iti yāvat smārttametadabhedena vijñānamiti yo vadet nūnambandhyāsutepyasti tasya smaraṇaśakyatā    iti mirastaṃ  bhinnānāmevānubhūtānā mekakāryakartṛtvena svaviṣayābhinnākārarthyavat  tadudbhaveti varṇavikalpavāsanāyā vivekibhya svabhāvebhyo yathāsaṃkhyaṃsākṣāt pāramparyeṇa codbhavo yasyāḥ sā tathā  sā ceyamiti buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirityucyate sambriyatenayā buddhyā svarūpeṇa svapratibhāsena pararūpamvasturūpamiti karaṇa sādhanaṃktinaṃ vidhāya  te ca bhāvāstayeti buddhyā  saṃvṛtabhedāḥ pracchāditanānātvāḥ kenacid rūpeṇeti vikalpabuddhyāropitena  pratibhānti vikalpabuddhau  sāmānyacintātadeṣāṃ buddhiparivattināṃ bhāvānāṃ ākāraviśeṣaparigrahād bahiriva parisphuratāṃbuddhipratibhāsaṃ anusandhānaḥ teṣāmeva rūpaṃ sāmānyamucyate kathamidānīṃ anyāpohaḥ sāmānyaṃ iti cet  sa evānyāpohaḥ  tameva gṛddhatītadeṣāmityādi  buddhipratibhāsaṃ vikalpabuddhyākāraṃ  anusandhānaḥ puruṣaistadbuddhyupasthāpitamekaṃ rūpaṃ sāmānyamucyata ityanena sambandha  keṣāṃ sāmānyamucyate buddhiparivarttināmeva  eṣāṃ buddhiparivattināmiti sambandhaḥ  svalakṣaṇānyanubhūyayathānubhavamasau śuklo ghaṭaḥ kṛṣṇonyo vetyevaṃ vikalpabuddhiṣvaspaṣṭāḥ ghaṭākārāstebuddhiparivattino bhāvā ye teṣāmeva sāmānyaṃ sambandhi  na svalakṣaṇānāṃ sāmānyabuddhāvapratibhāsanādasambandhitvācca  buddhiparivattināmeva viśeṣaṇaṃ bahiriva parisphuratāmiti bahiriva pratibhāsamānānāmityarthaḥ  bahiḥsphuraṇe ca kāraṇamāha  ākāraviśeṣaparigrahāditi bāhyārthavikalpasaṃsthānasya spaṣṭasyānukārād bāhyādhyavasāya ityeke etaccāyuktaṃ  na hi sādṛśyanimitto bāhyatvārīpa iti niveditametat tasmādākāraviśeṣo ghaṭādyākārastasya parigrahonubhavastasmād bahirivaparisphuraṇaṃ etaduktambhavati  ghaṭādyanubhavāhitavāsanāsāmarthyena vikalpa utpadyamānaḥ svākāraṃbāhyaghaṭādyabhedenādhyavasyati na tu gṛhṇāti tena śabdavihiterthe kvacit saṃśayobhavatyagrahaṇāt  tatra tu vikalpa svahetuta eva bāhyābhinnaṃ svākārama  dhya vasyati na tu sādṛśyāt sadṛśasyārthasyābhāvādagrahaṇācca nanu buddhiparivattināmapi svarūpe vyatirekeṇa konya eva ākāraḥ pratibhāsateyatsāmānyaṃ syāt satyaṃ tatra lāvat kecidāhurekajñānāvyatirekādekatvanteṣāmiti anyetvāhuḥ pratyekanteṣāṃ svavyaktyapekṣayā sāmānyarūpateti  tadetadubhayamapyayuktamekapratibhāsābhāvāt kevalamekarūpatayā teṣāmadhyavasāyāt paraiḥ sāmānyamiṣṭamiti tadabhiprāyādevamucyate  ācārya sya tu samānā iti pratibhāsobhipretonaika iti tathā ca vakṣyati athavā  astu pratibhāso dhiyāmbhinnaḥ samānā iti tadgrahaṇādi      ti  yadi buddhiparivattināmeva vikalpabuddhisandarśitaṃ rūpaṃ sāmānyantasyaca vidhirūpatvāt kathamidānīmanyāpohaḥ sāmānyamityucyate vikalpānāṃ prakṛtivibhramāt vastugrāhiṇīva pratibhāti  sā hi taba nyavivekiṣubhāveṣveva bhavantī vivekaviṣayeti gamyate nanu bāhyā vivekinaḥ  na ca teṣu vikalpapravṛttiḥ  kathaṃ teṣu bhavatīti vyākhyātā evaṃ vivecayanti na tu vyavaharttāraḥ  te tu svālambanamaiva arthakriyāyogyaṃ manyamānāḥ vikalpyārthāvekīkṛtya pravarttante  tadabhiprāya vaśād evamucyate a sa eveti siddhāntavādī  sa eva vikalpabuddhi vyavasthāpitaḥ pratibhāsamānonyāpoha ucyate  anyaviviktapadārthadarśanadvārāyātatvāt yadi vikalpākāraḥ sāmānyaṃ kathaṃ bāhyānāṃ samānarūpatayā pratītiḥ  yadāha   atha niviṣayā etā vāsanāmātrabhāvataḥ pratipattiḥ pravṛttiśca bāhyārtheṣu kathambhaved    ityata āha tamevetyādi  tamiti vikalpabuddhipratibhāsaṃ gṛhṇatī sāvikalpikā buddhirvastugrāhiṇīva pratibhāti  kasmād vikalpānāṃ prakṛtivibhramātsvabhāvenaiva svākārābhedenārthaṃgrahaṇavibhramāt kathantarhyapohaviṣayetyucyata ityāha  sam hi vikalpikā buddhiradhyavasāyavaśāt tadanyavivekiṣu bhāveṣu svalakṣaṇeṣu bhavantī vivekaviṣayeti gamyate  kāryatona tu vivekasvabhāvaviṣayīkaraṇāt parastvaviditābhi prāyaḥ prāha  nanvityādi  sāmānyād bāhyāḥ svalakṣaṇānītyarthaḥ  evaṃ hi bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ saṃgrahaḥ kṛto bhavati  vivekinaḥ parasparavilakṣaṇā  na ca teṣviti svalakṣeṇeṣu  kathanteṣu vikalpabuddhirbhavatītyucyate vyākhyātāra ityādinā pariharati  te hi yayāvasthitamvastu vyavasthāpayanta evamvivecayanti  anyo vikalpabuddhipratibhāso nyatsva lakṣaṇamiti  na vyavahartāraevaṃ vivecayanti  te tu vyavahartāraḥ svālambanameveti vikalpapratibhāsamevārthakriyāyogyaṃ bāhyasvalakṣaṇarūpammanyamānāḥ  etadeva spaṣṭayati  dṛśyorthaḥsvalakṣaṇamvikalpyorthaḥ sāmānyapratibhāsastābekokṛtya svalakṣaṇamevedamvikalpabuddhyā viṣayīkriyate śabdena codyata ityevamadhimucyā kriyākāraṇya pravarttante tadabhiprāyavaśād vyavahartṝṇāmabhiprāyavaśādevamucyate vivekiṣu bhāveṣu vikalpabuddhirbhavatīti dṛśyavikalpyāvekīkṛtya pravṛtteriti vadatā  na svākāre bāhyāropa ityuktambhavatyanyathā svākāra eva pravṛttiprasaṅgāt  marīcikāyāṃ jalāropādiva  nāpi bāhye svākārāropaḥ  āropyamāṇaphalāthitvenaiva pravṛttiprasaṃgāt jalāthina iva jalabhrāntau  sāmānyacintātathā tatkāritayātatkāribhyo bhinān śabdena pratipādayantītyucyate  tatvacintakāstu pratibhāsabhedādibhyo nābhedamanusandhatte yadi pratipattrabhiprāyonuvighīyate tadānyāpohopi sāmānyaṃ  mā  bhūt nanu dṛśyavilpayorekīkaraṇaṃ kimucyate  yadi dṛśyasya vikalpyādabhedaḥ bāhyepravṛttirna syāt  vikalpyasya dṛśyādabhedaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ śabdārtha syāt  na cadṛśyavikalpyayorekīkaraṇaṃ pratyakṣeṇa tasya vikalpyāviṣayatvāt  nāpi vikalpenatasya dṛśyāviṣayatvāt  atītādau ca dṛśyābhāvāt kathantayorekīkaraṇaṃ atrocyate  arthānubhave sati tatsaṃskāraprabodhena tadākāra utpadyamāno vikalpasvākārambāhyābhinnamadhyavasyati na tvabhinnaṃ karoti  tena vikalpaviṣayasya dṛśyātmatayādhyavasāyād dṛśyavikalpayorekīkaraṇamucyate    darśanārho dṛśyaḥ śakyatevā draṣṭumiti vikalpakadarśanasyāpi yo viṣayaḥ sa dṛśyastenānāgatasyāpyarthasyā bgamopadarśitasya dṛśyatvaṃ siddhantayābhāvasyāpi  ata evābhāvaḥ pratyaya svākārambhāvarūpamapi padārthābhāvāvyatirekeṇādhyasya pratyetītyabhāvaviṣaya ucyate na tvabhāvaṃgṛhṇāti    sarvavikalpānāṃ niviṣayatvāt tatkāritayetyādi  na kevalantadabhiprāyavaśād vikalpabuddhiḥ svalakṣaṇeṣuvivekeṣu bhavatītyucyate  tathā tatkāritayā karaṇenātatkāribhyo bhinnānarthānśabdena vaktāra pratipādayantītyucyate  vyākhyātāropi dṛśyavikalpayoraikyaṃ kimitina pratipadyanta iti cedāha  pratibhāsabhedādibhyaiti dṛśyasya hi spaṣṭaḥ pratibhāsona vikalpasya  vikalpānubaddhasya spaṣṭatvāyogāt  ādiśabdānniruddhepi dṛśyevikalpasyānirodhāt  arthakriyāyāḥ karaṇādakaraṇācca  tattvacintakā nyāyānusāriṇaḥ vyākhyātāraḥ  śeṣaṣaṣṭhī ceyantattvasya cintakā iti  tattvasya tecintakā nātattvasyeti sambandhyantaravyavacchedamātrāpekṣāyāṃ kriyākārakabhāvasyāvivakṣitatvāt   cintayatervā pacādyajantasya tattvaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaṃ kṛtvāsvārthikaḥ kanpratyayaḥ kṛtaḥ  tatotra tṛjakābhyā mityādinā ṣaṣṭhī samāsapratiṣedhonāśaṃkya  nābhedamanusandhatte  dṛśyavikalpayoriti prakṛte yadītyādi codakaḥ  pratipattrabhiprāyonuvidhīyate bāhyeṣu sāmānyavyavasthānaṃ tadānyāpohopi sāmānyaṃ mā bhūta  ki kāraṇaṃ    na hyevamiti  anyāpohaḥśabdena codyata ityevaṃ vyavahartṝṇāṃ nāsti pratipattiḥ  ācāryo pi tulyatāṃna hyevaṃ pratipattiriti cet  na vai kevalaṃ evamapratipattiḥ vyaktivyatiriktāvyatib riktaṃka tvavyāpitvādi bhirākārairapi naiva pratipattiḥ  kevalaṃ abhinnākārāyābuddherya āśrayaḥ sonyāpoha ucyate  tasya vastuṣu sambhavāt avirodhāt  śabdāayivyavahārasya tathā darśanācca  yatheyaṃ buddhiḥ pratibhāti tataḥ na kiṃcidapi vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyam khyāpayannāha na vai kevalamityādi  evamapratipattirityanyāpoharūpeṇa tvayā yathā vyaktivyatiriktādibhirākārairiṣṭaṃ sāmānyantathāpi naiva pratipattiḥ āśrayād vyatiriktaṃ vai śe ṣi kā dīnāmavyatiriktaṃ sāṃ khyā dī nā mādiśabdātpratyekaparisamāptatvādiparigrahaḥ  tatra bhedastāvatsāmānyasya na pratibhāsata eva iha sāmānyamiti buddhyanutpatte  abhedepi vyaktīnāmeva pratibhāsaḥ syānnasāmānyasya  bhedābhede cobhayapakṣabhāvī doṣaḥ syāt  nāpi tatpratyekaparisamāptaṃyujyate  yata ekavyaktāvekasambandhyeva tat syānnānekasambandhi  na caivaṃ sāmānyamane sambandhitvādasya samānānāmbhāva sāmānyamiti vacanāt atha vyaktyantareṣu tasya pratyabhijñānāt tatsambandhitvamevamapi bhūtaguṇavadekamanekasambandhi syānna pratyekaparisamāptaṃ  ekaikasyāṃ vyaktāvanekasambandhitvenāpratīteḥ  pratītau vā tatrānekavyaktipratibhāsaḥ syāt  atha vyaktyantarālepratibhāsanāt pratyekaparisamāptantaducyate  tatkimetāvatā tasyānekasambandhitvamekatra sidhyati  na ca sāmānye pratyabhijñānaṃ yujyata ityapyuktaṃ  tasmānna tasyaa x  tyekaparisamāptirnāpi nityatvamekatvaṃ vyāpitvaṃ ca pratibhāsata iti sthitaṃ yadi vastubhūtasya sāmānyasyāpohasya ca tulyaḥ pratipattyabhāvo vyavahāre  kastahāsyā śrāśraya ityata āha  kevalamityādi  svalakṣaṇānāṃ vijātīyarahitatvamanyāpohaḥ sobhinnākārāyā buddhenimittatvenocyate  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ    tasya vijātīyavirahalakṣaṇasyā nyāpohasya bhinneṣvapi sarvatra vastuṣu bhāvāt tathābhūtasya cānyāpohasya sāmānyabuddhihetutvampratyavirodhāt  tathā hi yathaikamvṛkṣamavṛkṣād vyāvṛttaṃpaśyatyevamanyamapyatastatraikākārā buddhirutpadyate  na cātra bādhakaṃ pramāṇamasti tṛtīyakāraṇamāha  vyavahārasya cetyādi  tathā darśanāditi  anyāpohanibandhanatvena darśanāt  etacca tadanyaparihāreṇa pravarttate   ta i  ti ca dhvanirucyata ityādinā pratipādayiṣyate  yathetyekākārā iyaṃ vikalpabuddhiḥ pratibhāti  sāmānyacintāvyaktayo nānu yantyanyadanuyāyi na bhāsate na hi vyaktayastāḥ parasparaṃ anvā viśanti  bhedābhāvena sāmānyasyaivābhāvaprasaṃgāt  anyacca tābhyonyacca vyatiriktaṃ tathā na kiṃcit buddhau pratibhāsate apratibhāsamānaṃ ca kathamātmanānyaṃ grāhayed vyapadeśayed vā na ca ekasambandhatvāt api sāmānyaṃ syād atiprasaṃgāditi tairuktam  abhitathā bāhyantatsāmānyannāstīti vākyārthaḥ  tato na vastubhūtaṃ sāmānya vikalpadarśanāśraya ityabhiprāyaḥ sāmānyābhāve ca kāraṇamāha  yasmādityādi  vyaktayaḥ svalakṣaṇāni nānuyanti na miśrībhavanti  etenāvyatiriktasāmānyābhyupagamo nirastaḥ vyatiriktanirākaraṇārthamāha  anyadanuyāyīti  anuyāyi yadiṣṭaṃ bhedebhyonyat sāmānyarūpantatpratyakṣabuddhau na bhāsate nanu vikalpapratibhāsepi sāmānye bhedābhedapakṣayorayamananvayādidoṣastulyaeveti kathaṃ sāmānyamiṣyate  samānākārastāvat pratibhāsata eva  yāvadasauna budhyate bhedābhedarahita iti tāvadasyālaṅkāra evāvastutvapratipādanād   ata eva yathāpratibhāsaṃ tvasāvastītyucyate anvāviśanti miśrībhavanti  yadi parasparamanvāveśa syāttadaikarūpāpatterbhedābhāvaḥ  tena kāraṇena sāmānyatyaivābhāvaprasaṅgāt  tena bhedānāṃ samānānāmekākārapratyayanibandhanatvaṃ dharma sāmānyaṃ  tadbhedābhāvena bhavedityarthaḥ  anyaccetivyaktibhyaḥ anya dityasya vivaraṇaṃ vyatiriktamiti  tathā tena rūpeṇa sāmānyabuddhau anenopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sāmānyasyābhāvavyavahāre sādhye svabhāvānupalambhauktaḥ  na cānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sāmānyamabhyupeyaṃ  yasmādapratibhāsamānaṃ casāmānyaṃ kathamātmanā svena sāmānyarūpeṇa  anyamiti sāmānyavantaṃ grāhayet vyapaveśayedvā  svena rūpeṇa  kathamanyamiti prakṛtena sambandha  sāmānyabalādvyaktiṣvabhinnābhidhānajñānavṛttiriṣṭā  tasmāt sāmānyamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptameveṣṭamiti samudāyārthaḥ  evantāvad grāhyalakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalambhānnāstyekamanekasambandhi   bhavatu nāmakamanekasambaddhantathāpi sāmānyarūpatā na yuktetyāha  na cetyādi tairiti vyaktibhedaiḥ ukta miti dvitvādi  saṃyogakāryadravyeṣvapi sāmānyasvabhāvatvaṃ bprāpnotītyaprasaṃgasyoktatvāt  ekamanekasambaddhamityeva kṛtvā na sāmānyaṃ kintvanābhidhānapratyayanimittabhūtamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ na tu sarvamiti cet  kathamanyato nyatrapratyayavṛttiḥ  tatsaṃbaṃdhāditi cet  saṃkhyākāryadravyādau satyapi prasajyeta  asāmānyātmakatvāditi cet  koyaṃ sāmānyātmeti tadeva na vicāritam  tatrasati sambandhe pratyayavṛttiḥ  tataḥ sāmānyamiti uktam  tatra nimittasambhavātaanekasambandhidravyādibhyopi pratyayavṛttiḥ  tataḥ sāmānyātmatā anyathānyatrāpi mā bhūt  viśeṣābhāvāt  tathā ca dravyaguṇasāmānyānāṃ rūpabhinnābhidhānapratyayanimittamakasāmānyaṃ na sarva dvitvādyapi  tasya yathoktaśabdajñānānimittatvāditi cet  kathamanyataḥ sāmānyādanyatra vyaktibhede sāmānyenaikarūpatāmanāpādite  pratyayavṛttirekākārajñānavṛttiḥ tatsambandhāditi paraḥ  tābhirvyaktibhiḥ sambandhādanyatopi sāmānyādanyatrapratyayavṛttiḥ saṃkhyetyā cā yaṃḥ  bhāvalakṣaṇā ceyaṃ saptamī  saṃkhyāyāṃ satyāṃ kāryadravyevayavini sati  ādiśabdāt saṃyogādiṣu sannapratyayavṛttestepi sāmānyaṃ prāpnuvantītisamudāyārtha  asāmānyātmakatvāt saṃkhyādīnānta lena dravye naikākārapratyayavṛttiriti cet nanu sa evāyaṃ sāmānyātmā vicāryate  koyaṃ sāmānyātmeti  saṃkhyādibhyovivekena sāmānyalakṣaṇasyaivāpratītatvāt  naitad vyaktamiti yāvat  tadevāha tatretyādi  tatra koyaṃ sāmānyātmeti pṛṣṭe tvayoktamekasyānekena sati sambandhevyaktiṣvabhinna pratyayavṛttiḥ  tata iti pratyayavṛtteḥ kāraṇādanekasambaddhamekaṃsāmānyamiti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ atra sāmānyalakṣaṇesmābhirucyate  anekasambandhino vidyante yeṣāṃ kāryadravyādīnāṃ  ādiśabdāt dvitvādiparigrahaḥ  tebhyopi tadāśrayadravyeṣvekākārapratyayotpattiḥ syāt  kiṅkāraṇam    nimittasambhavāt  tathā hyanekasambandhādeva nimittāt sāmānyādekapratyayotpattiriṣyate    asti cānekasambandhitvamekapratyayanimittandravyādiṣvapi  tataścetyekapratyayapravṛtteḥ saṃkhyādīnāṃ sāmānyātmatā anyatheti  yathoktasāmānyalakṣaṇayogepi saṃkhyādiṣu sāmānyātmatā yadi neṣyate anyatrāpi sāmānyābhimate mā bhūt  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ  viśeṣābhāvāt  tathā cadravyādī nāmapi sāmānyarūpatāpattau dravyaguṇādīnāṃ rūpasaṃkaraḥ  buddhereva pratibhāsasaṃkaraḥ  tathā ca tahi buddhereva pratibhāso arthajñānarūpatvāt sattayā sāmānyamiticet    tanna  evam jñānāvyatiriktañca kathamarthāntaraṃ brajet jñānasya  rūpaṃ kathaṃ athāntarāṇāṃ sāmānyaṃ tasya teṣvabhāvāt  tadbhāvāṣyavasāyāditi  tathā bhrāntyā vyavahāra iti cet  tatra tatpratibhāsotpatteḥ kimplibandhanam  anāśrayasyotpattau sarvatra syāt  athavā  ekākāre ekajñānaṃ avyatiriktaṃ kathaṃ anyasya punaśanasya vyaktyaiti vikalpabuddherekākārapratibhāsaḥ sāmānyamiti sambandhaḥ  sa ca jñānarūpatvāt jñānavat sanneva  taduktaṃ   sāmānyaṃ vastu rūpaṃ hi buddhacākāro bhaviṣyati vasturūpā ca sā buddhiḥ śabdārtheṣūpajāyate tena vastveva kalpyeta vācyaṃ buddhayanapohakamiti  tannetyādinā pratiṣedhati  yattajjñānarūpaṃ sāmānyamiṣyate  tajjñānāvyatiriktaṃjñānasvalakṣaṇavat kathamathantarambāhyaṃ vrajet  na teṣāṃ sāmānyamiti yāvat tad vyācaṣṭe  jñānasyetyādi  tasya jñānarūpasya teṣvartheṣvabhāvāt satyaṃ    na jñānarūpasya vyaktiṣvanvayaḥ kintu tasmin buddhipratibhāse tadbhāvādhyavasāyāt  bāhyabhā vādhyavasāyāt  tathā bhrāntyā samānavyavahāraiti cet aetacceṣṭameva siddhānta vā di naḥ  kevalaṃ prakṛtyaikakāryā vyaktayotatkāryādvyāvṛttāḥ  tathābhūtāyā vikalpabuddhenimittamityanyāpohāśrayā sā buddhirityabhimataṃ śāstrakārasya parastvevaṃbhūtaṃ nimittaṃ necchati  ata eva siddhāntavādī nimittameva paryanuyuṃkte  tatretyādi  tatra vyaktibhedeṣvavastubhūteṣu vyaktīnāṃ ca prakṛtyā vijātīyavyāvṛttānāmekakāryatvānicchataco  to jñānotpatteḥ kinnibandhanaṃ  naivakiñcit  tathā hi paro vijātīyavyāvṛttānāṃ bhedānāmekapratyayahetutvannecchati na cāsti vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ  anābhayasyetyanimittisya sāmānyajñānasyotpattausarvatra syāditi gaurityekākāraḥ pratyayo vṛkṣeṣvapi syāt jñānādavyatiriktamityāderaparamarthamāha  athavetyādi  pūrvamarthāntaraśabdenaantarabhāvino rūpam  tataśca jñānāntarāt vyaktyantara maviśeṣakaṃ kathaṃ sāmānyaṃbhavet tasmānmithyāvikalpoyamartheṣvekātmatāgrahaḥ na hi arthānāṃ bhedenābhedena vāpi yogyātmanāpi kenacid tulyamiti tathaiṣāṃgrahaṇavikalpopi mithyā itaretarabhedosya bījaṃ saṃjñā yadarśikā yasyetaretarabhedasya pratyāyanārthaṃ atatsādhyebhyo bhinnasādhyān bhāvān jñātvātatparihāreṇa pravarttateti saṃketaḥ kriyate soyaṃ tasyaikātmatāpratibhāsino mithyābāhyamuktamadhunā jñānāntaraṃ nirdiśyate  ata evāha  kathamanyasya punarjñānasyeti kimviśiṣṭasya jñānasya  vyaktyantarabhāvinaḥ  ekasyāṃ govyaktau yadvikalpavijñānantatonyatra govyaktyantareṇa samutpannasya vikalpajñānasyetyarthaḥ  tathā hyanekajñānavyāpanādvā sāmānyambhavet  bāhyavyaktivyāpanādvā  jñānapratibhāsasya tudvayamapyasat  tadāha  tataścetyādi  vyaktyantaramiti bāhyaṃ tasmādityupasaṃhāraḥ na hotyādinā vyācaṣṭe  kenaciditi sāmānyarūpeṇa  tathaiṣāṃ grahaṇamityarthānāṃsamānā iti grahaṇaṃ nanu siddhānta vā dinā pyasya vikalpasya nibandhanaṃ vācyamanāśrayasyotpattausarvatra prasaṃgādityāha  itaretarabheda ityādi  saṃjñā saṃketakriyā yadathikā ya itaretarabhedaḥ  arthaḥ phalaṃ pratyāyyatvena yasya iti kṛtvā sa evambhūta itaretarabhedobhāvānāmanyonyavyāvṛttilakṣaṇosya mithyāvikalpasya bījaṃ saṃjñā saṃketakriyā yavarthikā yasyetaretarabhedasya pratyāyanaphalā yasyetyādinā vyācaṣṭe  yasyetaretarabhedasya pratyāyanāthaṃ saṃketaḥ kriyate atatsādhyebhya ityatatkāryebhyo bhinnāsādhyānbhāvānbhedena jñātvā tatparihāreṇetyetat kāryaparihāreṇa tatkāryeṣu pravarttateti kṛtvā saṃketaḥ kriyate  soyaṃ yathoktaitaretarabhedastasyaikātmatāpratibhāsina ekākārasya mithyāvikalpasya bījaṃ kāraṇaṃ tameva gṛhṇanniti bhedaṃ bhinnamityarthaḥ  etaccādhyavasāyavaśāducyate  na punarvikalpasyavastugṛhaṇamasti  eṣa vikalpa iti sāmānyākāro vikalpaḥ svavāsanā prakṛteritivikalpavāsanāsvabhāvāt  evamityekākāratayā pratibhāti    kathaṃ punabhijñānāṃ svalakṣaṇānāmabhinnaṃ kāryamekākāravikalpātmakaṃ  sāmānyacintāvikalpasya bījam  tameva gṛhṇan eṣa vikalpaḥ svavāsanāprakṛterevaṃ pratibhāti  kha  bhinnānāmabhinnaṃ kāryamkathaṃ punabhinnānāmabhinnaṃ kāryaṃ yena tadanyebhyo bhedāt abheva ityucyate  prakṛtireva tādṛśī bhāvānām ekapratyavamarśārthajñānādyekārthasādhane bhedepi niyatāḥ kecit svabhāvenendriyādivat yathendriyālokamanaskārā ātmendriyamanaskārā rūpavijñānamekaṃ janayantiātmendriyamanorthatatsannikarṣāt vā asatyapi tadbhāvaniyate sāmānye  śiśa byenetyekakāryatvena  tadanyebhyotatkāryabhyo bhedāddhetorvyaktīnāmabheda ityutte ekāsaṃsargastadvayatirekiṇāṃ samānateti vacanāt prakṛtirityādinā pariharati  prakṛtiḥ svabhāva ekākāraṃ pratyabhijñāna bmekapratyavamarśaḥ  anubhavajñānamarthajñānaṃ  ekapratyavamarśaścāryajñānaṃ ceti dvandvaḥ pūrvanipātalakṣaṇasya vyabhicāritvāt  alpājtaratve pyarthajñānaśabdasya na pūrvanipātaḥ kṛtaḥ  te ādī yasyeti vigrahaḥ  ādiśabdād dahanagṛhādikāryagrahaṇaṃ ekapratyavamarśādirevaikortha iti karmadhārayaḥ  tasya sādhane siddhau bhedepi nānātvepiniyatā  kecit  svabhāvena prakṛtyā  indriyādivat  athavaikāntena bhavepi svahetubhyaḥ kecit samānā utpannāḥ kecidasamānā ityetaccoktantatra ye samānā utpannāstetena svabhāvenaikākāraṃ pratyayañjanayanti vināpi sāmānyenendriyādivat  tatraikapratyavamarśajñānasādhane niyatā ityetad dāntikatvenopanyastamarthajñānādyekārthasādhanaityetattu dṛṣṭāntatvenobhayasiddhatvāt ata evādī vibhajyate  yathendriyetyādi  yathendriyālokamanaskārā rūpavijñānamekaṃ janayantīti sambandha  etadvastubalasiddhamudāharati  ātmetyādi parasiddhāntāśrayeṇa  nityamaṇu manaḥ śīghraṃ cetyaṇusvarūpammanaḥ  tatsannikarṣāityātmendriyamanorthasannikarṣāḥ  ātmā manasā saṃyujyate mana indriyeṇendriyamathene ti vacanāt  ātmendriyamanorthāśca tatsannikarṣāśceti dvandvaḥ ātmendriyamanorthāḥ  yathāsvaṃ sannikarṣasahāyā vijñānaṃ janayantīti parābhyupagamaḥ asatyapi tadbhāvaniyata ityekakāryatvaniyate  na hi cakṣurādīnāṃ cakṣurvijñānajanakatvaṃ nāma sāmānyampareṇeṣṭaṃ pādayo bhinnāśca parasparānanvayepi prakṛtyā ekākāraṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ janayanti anyāṃvā dahana gṛhādikāṃ kāṣṭhasādhyāmarthakriyāṃ yathāpratyayam  na tu bhedāviśeṣepijalādayaḥ  śrotrādivad rūpādivijñāne jvarādiśamane kāścit saha pratyekameva vā dṛṣṭā yathā vauṣadhayo nānārthepi na cāparāḥ yathā vā guḍūcīvyaktyādīnāṃ saha pratyekaṃ vā jvarādi śamanādi lakṣaṇānāṃekakāryakriyāvat  na tatra sāmānyaṃ apekṣyate  bhedepi tatprakṛtitvāt  natadaviśeṣepi dadhitrapusādayaḥ tāsu tathābhūtāsu     sāmānyamapi kiṃcit astīti cet  tata eva tadekaṃadhunā dāntikamvyācaṣṭe  śiṃśapādaya iti śiśapākhadiranyagrodhādayaḥparasparānanvayepi  vṛkṣatvasāmānyavirahepi vṛkṣa ityekākāraṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ janayanti  pratyabhijñānādanyāmbā dahanagṛhādikāṃ kāṣṭhasādhyāmarthakriyāṃ śiṃśapādayojanayantīti prakṛtaṃ  yathāpratyayamiti yāvad  agnisahakāripratyayalābhastadādahanaṃ janayanti  gṛhānukūlapratyayasaṃpāte gṛhaṃ  ādiśabdād rathādikāryaparigrahaḥ na tu bhedāviśeṣepi jalādaya  kāṣṭhasādhyārthakriyāsamarthāḥ prakṛtyā teṣāmatatkāryatvāt  atrāpi dṛṣṭāntamāha  śrotrādivad rūpajñāna iti  yathā śrotraśabdādayorūpavijñāne karttavye na samarthā  ādiśabdād rasādivijñāne syādetad  bahūnāṃ pratyekamekakāryakarttṛtvaṃ sāmānyamantareṇa na sidhyatītyatapratyeka mityekaikarūpāāha  jvarādityādi  saheti vyaktyantarasahitāḥ jvarādiśamane ekasmin kārye dṛṣṭā yathauṣadhayaḥ  vā śabda pūrvadṛṣṭāntāpekṣayā na cāparā dadhitrapusā  ṣā dayaḥ yathetyādinā vyācaṣṭe  na tatra jvarādiśamane karttavye sāmānyamoṣadhitvaṃnāmāpekṣante     kiṅkāraṇaṃ    bhedepi tatprakṛtikatvāt  jvarādiśamanakāryasvabhāvatvāt  yadi bhedānāmasāmarthyaṃ syāt  bhavetsāmānyāpekṣā  na tadavia śeṣepi bhedāviśeṣepi dadhitrapusādayaḥ  dadhyeva mandajātandadhitrapusaṃ  dadhi catrapusaśceti dvandvamanye vyācakṣate tāsu guḍūcīvyaktyādiṣu tathābhūtāsvekakāryakāriṇīṣu  kiciditi vyatiriktamavyatiriktaṃ ca taduktaṃ   kāryaṃ syād iti mataṃ cet  tadayuktaṃ aviśeṣāt sāmānyaṃ na tatkāryakṛd viśeṣatra sāmānyamaviśeṣaprasaṅgataḥ tāsāṃ kṣetrādibhedepi dhrauvyāccānupakārataḥ sāmānyāt jvarādiśamanakārya  syāt cet tasya viśeṣābhāvāt vyaktīnāṃkṣetrādibhedepi śīghrapraśamanaghaṭādeḥ viśeṣo guṇasya tāratamyaṃ ca na syāt  ayasāmānye viśeṣosti cet svabhāvabhedad svarūpahānam  dhrauvyāccānupakārataḥsāmānyaṃ na kāryakṛd   yadi hi tad upakuryāt anādheyaviśeṣasya anyānapekṣaṇatvāt svakāryaṃ sarvaṃ sakṛjjanayet tajjananasvabhāvaṃ vā na bhavati  vyaktayastu nirvarttyamānaṃ yatkarma jātistatrāpi sādhanaṃ svāśrayasyābhiniṣpattyai sā kriyāyāḥ prayojike ti tata eva sāmānyāt tadekaṃ jvarādiśama nalakṣaṇaṃ kāryantataścāsiddho dṛṣṭāntaiti bhāvaḥ tadayuktamiti siddhānta vā dī aviśeṣāt sāmānyasyeti  ekatvānnityatvācca aviśiṣṭaṃ sāmānyan na tatkāryakṛditi śamanakāryakṛt  anyathā sāmānyasyāviśeṣāttāsāṃ gūḍūcyādivyaktīnāṃ kṣetrādibhedepi tasyāpi jvarādiśamanakāryasyāviśeṣaprasaṃgataḥ  ciraśīpretyādi  viśiṣṭakṣetrotpannānāṃviśiṣṭakṣetrotpannānāṃ śīghrapraśamanaṃviparītānāṃ cirapraśamanaṃ ādiśabdāccirataraśīghratarādiparigrahaḥ  kṣetrasaṃskārādibhinnānāṃ gūḍūcyādīnāmupayogāddehe ārogyādilakṣaṇasya guṇasya tāratamyaṃca na syāt  sāmānyasyaikyāt  atha kṣetrādibhedena sāmānyasya viśeṣa iṣyate tadā viśeṣe vā sāmānyasyeṣyamāṇe svabhāvabhedaḥ syād viśeṣalakṣa ṇatvād bhedasya tataśca svarūpahānaṃ  sāmānyasvarūpamekaṃ hīyate  dhrauvyācca kāraṇāt sāmānyasyavyaktibhyonupakārato na sāmānya kāryakṛditi varttate  yadi hi sāmānyamupakuryāttadā nityatvāt sahakāribhiranādheya viśeṣasyānyānapekṣaṇatvāt sahakāryanapekṣaṇāttat sāmānyaṃ svakārya sakṛjjanayet  atha na janayet tadā tajjananasvabhāvaṃ nabhavati  ajananāvasthāyā aviśeṣāt kāryakālepi na janayediti yāvat vyaktīnāṃ tvanityānāṃ kāryakṛttve nāyaṃ doṣa ityāha  vyaktayastvityādi
