etaccottaratraniścāyayiṣyate kimpunarityādi paraḥ  bhedo vyāvṛttirlakṣaṇaṃ nimittaṃ yasya tena sāmānyenāvikalpabuddhiparivattirūpamanarthakriyākāri  tena bhedalakṣaṇenasvalakṣaṇādanyadsāmānyena samānamiti pratyeyaṃ nanu tadeṣāṃ buddhipratibhāsamanurundhānairbuddhiviparivattināmeva bhāvānāmākāraviśeṣaparigrahād bahiriva parisphuratāṃ sāmānyamucyata iti pūrvamuktatvāt sandehānuvṛttireva satyaṃ  kintvadhikasya doṣasya vidhānārthaṃ upanyāsa  doṣavijñānārthamāha kiṃcāta iti  itaro yavotyādinā praśnābhiprāyamāha  yadi svalakṣaṇaṃ pratyeyaṃkathaṃ vikalpaviṣayaḥ  tathā hi vikalpabuddhyabhiprāyavaśād bhedalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyaṃvyavasthāpyate tasyā abhiprāyavaśāt  sāmānyaṃ satprakīrtitamiti vacanāt tathābhūtena cet sāmānyena svalakṣaṇaṃ samānaṃ pratyeyaṃ  sadā vikalpasya viṣaya syāt na caitad yuktamathānyadeva buddhiparivatti rūpaṃ samānamiti pratyeyaṃ  atrāpi doṣamāha anyato vā kathamarthakriyā  na hi buddhipratibhāsirūpād arthakriyā sambhavati  sāmānyacintāsvalakṣaṇe cānityatvādyapratīteratādrūpyaṃ teṣāṃ cāvastudharmatā cet naiṣa doṣaḥ  jñānapratibhāsinyarthesāmānyasāmānādhikaraṇyadharmadharma vyavahārāśaṃkā  vastusvabhāvagrahaṇena anubhavāhitavāsanāṃ āśritya yadetatvikalpajñānaṃ utpannaṃ tacca atadviṣayamapi tadviṣayamiva tadanubhavā hitavāsanāprabhavaprakṛteḥ adhyavasitatadbhāvaṃ svabhāvavat  abhinnakāryapadārthebhyaḥ prasūterabhinnārthagrāhī  paramārthatastu tadanyabhedasamākāram  tadanyabhedasya samānākāraḥ tatra arthākāraśca vyavahāriṇāṃ tathādhyavasāya pravṛtteḥ bāhyatvenakatvenārthatataścātatkāribhyo bhedādabhinnā ityucyanta iti kāryadvāreṇa sāmānyavyavasthā naghaṭate  yataśca buddhiparivatti rūpaṃ samānantataḥ svalakṣaṇe cānityatvādisāmānyasyāpratīteratā drūpyamanityādirūpatvaṃ svalakṣaṇasya na bhavet  svalakṣaṇe cānityatvādīnāmapratītesteṣāṃ cānityatvādīnāmavastudharmatā netyādinā pariharati  buddhipratibhāsinyeva rūpe sāmānyādivyavahāra ityayaṃpakṣo gṛhītaḥ  tadāha  jñānapratibhāsiyartha ityādi etacca grahaṇakavākyaṃ  asyaiva vyākhyānaṃ  yadetajjñānaṃ vikalpakamityanenasambandhaḥ  atadviṣayamapi vastusvabhāvaviṣayamapi tadviṣayamiva svalakṣaṇaviṣayamiva  adhyavasitatadbhāvamāropitabāhyabhāvaṃ svarūpaṃ yasya tattathā  yataścādhyavasitatadbhāvamataḥ svalakṣaṇaviṣayameveti manyate  adhyavasitatadbhāvasvarūpatvameva kathamiti cedāha  tadanubhavāhitavāsanāprabhavaprakṛteriti    tasya svalakṣaṇasyayonubhavastenāhitā vāsanā tataḥ prabhava utpādastasya sāmānyasya sā prakṛtiḥ svabhāvoyenādhyavasitabhāvasvarūpambhavatītyarthaḥ  abhinnakāryā ye padārthā ghaṭādayaḥ  ekākārapratyayajñānahetavastebhyaḥ paramparayā prasūterabhinnārthagrāhīva pratibhāti  na tusāmānyavastu bhūtaṃ kiṃcid vyatiriktamavyatiriktamvāsti yat tad gṛhṇīyāt paramārthatastu tadanyabhedasamākāraṃ tebhya sajātīyābhimatebhyonye vijātīyāstebhyobheda bhinna svabhāvaḥ sa eva paramārthena samāna ākāro yasyeti vigrahaḥ  tata evatasyotpattestannivarttanatvācca tadanyabhedastasya samāna ākāra ityucyate tatrānantarokte jñāne eka iveti sarvavyaktyanugata iva  tatkārīvetyartha akriyākārīva  kiṃ punastathā pratibhātīti cedāha  vyavahāriṇāmityādi tathādhyavasāyeti vikalpāṃśameva bāhyatvenakatvenārthakriyākāritvenādhyavasāyab kāritveneti tatkāritveca pratibhāti  anyathā pravṛttirna yuktā  syāt  taccāryakriyākāritayā pratibhāsate  tadatatkāribhyo bhinnamiva  na hi tasyāpitattvamiti vācyaṃ parīkṣānaṅgatvāt  buddhisthāsterthāstena samānā iti gṛhyante kuta ścit vyāvṛtta  iva  pratibhāsanāt  na ca svalakṣaṇaṃ tatrāpratibhāsanāt ta eva kutaścit vyāvṛttā abhinnā api vyāvṛttimantaḥ pratibhānti  svayamavyavahāriṇāṃ pravṛtteḥ  vyavahāribhirityanye paṭhanti  vyavahāribhirityadhyavasāyetyanena pūrvasambandhāt tṛtīyaiva kṛtā  na tu ṣaṣṭhī  na lokāvyayaniṣṭheti ṣaṣṭhī pratiṣedhāt  anyatheti yadi vikalpāṃśe bāhyādhyavasāyo na bhavettadā tathābhūte vikalpe jātepyarthakriyākāriṇī pravṛttirna syāt  tadapi vikalpapratibimbakaṃvyavaharttṛ puruṣādhyavasāyavaśādarthakriyākāritayā pratibhāsate  tataśca tavatatkāribhyo bhinnamiva  vikalpaprativimbakameva tattvaṃ kasmānneti cedāha  na cetyādi  tadvikalpaprativimbakanna tattvaṃ na vastu  kiṅkāraṇaṃ  anarthakriyākāritvena parīkṣāyā vyabhicārasyānaṅgatvāt  etaccānantarameva pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ tatra ye svalakṣa  ṇa  dvārā yātā arthākārā vikalpabuddhau pratibhānti terthāvikalpabuddhipratibhāsinastena bhedalakṣaṇena sāmānyena samānā iti gṛhyante  kutaścidvyāvṛttā  i  ti vijātīyavyāvṛttyā  tathā hi    vikalpapratibhāsinopi vṛkṣabhedā adhyavasitabāhyarūpatvād avṛkṣebhyo vyāvṛttā iva bhāsante  tathānyeti na svalakṣaṇantena samānamiti gṛhyata iti liṅgavacana  vi  pariṇāmena sambandhaḥ kiṅkāraṇaṃ    tatra sāmānyapratibhāsini vikalpa svalakṣaṇāpratibhāsanāt evantāvad buddhipratibhāsinyarthe sāmānyavyavahāra uktaḥ  saṃprati sāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahāramāha  ta evetyādi  ta eva vikalpapratibhāsinorthāḥ  kutaścidmyāvṛttā iva santo yathānutpalād vyāvṛttā utpalabhedāsta eva punaranyatopyanīlādvyāvṛttimantaḥ pratibhānti  tataśca vyāvṛttidvayānugatasyaikasyaiva dharmiṇa pratibhāsanāt sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ayaṃ cānantarānukrānto buddhipratibhāsiṣvaryeṣu sāmānyasāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahāro mithyārtha eva kriyate  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ    svayamasatāmapi vikalpākārāṇāntathā ekākārānugatatvena  vyāvṛttidvayānugatena dharmasvarūpeṇa  vikalpabuddhaghoṣatatpratibaddhajasatāmapi buddhayā upadarśanāt  mithyārtha eva sāmānyasāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahāraḥ sarvaścāyaṃ svalakṣaṇānāmeva darśanāhitavāsanākṛtāyātatvāt nmanāṃ vikalpānāmatatpratibhāsitvepi vastuni pravṛttiḥ maṇiprabhāyāmivamaṇibhrānteḥ nānyeṣām  tadbhedaprabhave satyapi yathādṛṣṭaviśeṣānusaraṇaṃ parityajyakiṃcitsāmyagrahaṇenānyasamāropāta  dīpaprabhāyāmiva maṇibuddheḥ  tena na vikalpaviṣayeṣvarthakriyākāritvam anekākāreṇadarśanāt  ekākāreṇa pratibhāsanāt sāmānyavyavahāraḥ caikasya pratibhāsanāt sāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahāraḥ yadi mithyārtha eva sarvo vikalpaḥ kasmāt kṛtakatvādi dvārāyātā anityānātmādivikalpāḥ pramāṇaṃ nityā vikalpāstu netyata āha  sarvaścāyamityādi sarvo viplava iti sambandhaḥ  viplavo bhrāntiḥ  ayamiti sāmānyādirūpaḥ svalakṣaṇānāmeva yaddarśanantenāhitā yā vāsanā tatkṛtaḥ  paramparayā sarvavikalpānāmvastudarśanadvārāyātatvāt  tathā hi nityādivikalpā api vastudarśanenaivo bsadṛśāparāparotpattidarśanāyātatvāt  tatra tulye sarvavikalpānāmvastudarśanadvārāyātatve  tatpratibaddhajanmanāmanityādivikalpānāmatatpratibhāsitvepisvalakṣaṇāpratibhāsitvepi vastunyavisamvāda  adhyastasyānityādirūpasya vastunividyamānatvāt kevalaṃ svalakṣaṇarūpeṇa na pratibhāsata iti vikalpo vibhramaucyate maṇiprabhāyāmiva maṇibhrāntermaṇisvarūpāgrahepyavisamvādo maṇiprabhāyāmaṇau pratibaddhatvāt  prabhāśrayeṇa ca maṇibhrānterutpatteḥ na tvevannityādivikalpāsteṣāmvastudarśanadvārāyātatvepi vastunyavidyamānasyaivākārasya samāropāt  tadāha  nānyeṣāmityādi  anyeṣāṃ nityādivikalpānāṃ vastuni samvāda ityanena sambandhaḥ  tadbhedaprabhave satyapīti  arthābhedād utpādepi satītyarthaḥ  yathā dṛṣṭo yo viśeṣaḥ kṣaṇikatvādilakṣaṇastasyānusaraṇaṃ niścayaṃ parityajya kiñcitsāmānyamiti vyatiriktasyāvyatiriktasyavā sāmānyasya nānityatvannāmakiṃcidasti  kṣaṇasthāyitvena tathābhūtasya grahaṇād teṣāṃ bhavati ayaṃ anityaḥanityatvamasya  taddharmatāmevāvataranto vikalpā nāneka dharmavyatirekaṃ darśayanti na ca te nirāśrayāḥ  tadbhedadarśanāśrayatvāt  na cāvastudharmatā  tatsvabhāvasyaivanāmiva pratibhāsanāt  yaccoktaṃ  svalakṣaṇe cānityatvādyapratīteratādrūpyamiti tatparihārārthamāha  nāpītyādi  calād vastuno kathamanityoyamarthonityatvamasyeti vā dharmidharmarūpatayā pratītirityata āha  kṣaṇetyādi  svalakṣaṇasya tathābhūtasyeti calarūpasya kṣaṇāpratyupasthānatayā  ekakṣaṇasthāyitvena grahaṇād uttarakālamantyakṣaṇadarśināmetadevambhavatyanityoyamityādi  bhedāntarāpratikṣepavivakṣāyāmanityoyamitiya bhedāntarapratikṣepavivakṣāyāmanityatvamasyetyevaṃ dharmidharmabhāva pratītirbhavati sāmānyalakṣaṇa paramārthatosāvasanapi yathāpratītikathitaḥ  sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca yathāpratītikathitaṃ yasmād vastunyasya śabdārthasya sāmānādhikaraṇyasya ca na sambhavaḥ dharmmadhamivyavasthānaṃ bhedobhedava yādṛśaḥ asamīkṣitatattvārtho yathā loke pratīyate  tantathaiva samāśritya sādhyasādhanasaṃsthitiḥ paramārthāvatārāya vidvadbhivalyate saṃsṛjyante na bhidyante svatorthā pāramārthikāḥ rūpamekamanekañca teṣu buddherupamavaḥ bhedastatoyaṃ bauddherthe sāmānyaṃ bheda ityapi tasyaiva cānyavyāvṛtyā dharmabhedaḥ prakalpyate sādhyasādhanasaṃkalpe vastudarśanahānitaḥ dharmadhamivyavahāraśca jñānapratibhāsinyarthaṃ iti yat prakṛtantatsaṃgrahārthamāha dharmetyādi  ayaṃ dharmoyaṃ dharmoti vyavasthānantayośca bhedosyāyaṃ dharmaḥ kṛtakatvādilakṣaṇaḥ  abhedaḥ kṛtakoyamiti yādṛśaḥ  ayaṃ ca vikalpāropitatvāt  asamīkṣitatattvārthaḥ  anapekṣitastattvārthī vastvartho yeneti vigrahaḥ yathā lokea buddhyārūḍhopyadhyavasitatadbhāvatayā pratīyate taṃ dharmādivibhāgantathaiveti yathālokapratītiḥ pāramārthikā arthāḥ svato na saṃsṛjyante  tato na sāmānyavyavahāro vastuni na bhidyante kṛtakatvādidharmeḥ pratyekaṃ tasya vastunomekatvāyogāt  ataśca teṣvartheṣubahuṣu rūpamekamekasminnarthenekaṃ niyujyanta iti cet sādhyetyādi  sādhyasādhanasaṃkalpe vastudarśanahānitaḥ  kutaḥ svalakṣaṇasya sāmānyaviśiṣṭasya grahaṇaṃ  bheda sāmānyasaṃsṛṣṭo grāhya ityācārya dignāga prabhṛtibhiḥsāmānyasaṃsṛṣṭasya jātiri pra sa  tyādinā jātidvāreṇa ca dravyerthakriyāsamarthe puruṣasya pravṛttirbhaviṣyatīti cedāha taddvāreṇetyādi  aśabdacodite satyapi sambandhe kathaṃ pravarttatetyādinā jātidvāreṇa tadvāneva codyata iti cedāha  tadvaccodana ityādi  vyavadhānamuktamiti liṅgapariṇāmena sambandha  sāmānyena tatra vyavadhānamityuktaṃ sa ca sākṣānna yojyate kasmāt    kintatrānyena vyavadhānetyādinā syānmataṃ    na jāti kevalā vyaktirvā śabdāśrayāḥ pravṛtterāśrayaḥ kevalāyājātarerthakriyāyāmasāmathyaṃ  vyakteśca kevalāyā aśakyacodanatvāt  tasmājjātitadvantau sahitau pravṛttiviṣayastayoreva samastayoḥ śabdārthatvamityata āha  jātinadvatorityādi  pravṛtti viṣayatva iti śabdāśrayāyāḥ pravṛtteviṣayatvebhyupagamyamāne  vyāvṛttitadvantau kinneṣyete pravṛttiviṣayatvenetyadhyāhāraḥ  pramāṇasiddhau hivyāvṛttitadvantāviti bhāvaḥ  vyāvṛtteḥ śabdabhūtāyāḥ buddhiparikalpitatvādavastutvamatovāhadohādyarthakriyāṃpratyasādhanatvātra pravṛttiviṣayatvamiti cet  tadetadasādhanatvaṃjātestulyaṃ sāpi vāhadohādāvasamarthā tadvata iti jātimatorthakriyāsādhanāt pravṛttyabhāvalakṣaṇo doṣo na bhavatīticet bhavatīti cet tulyaṃ tadvyāvṛttimato pi vyāvṛttivādināmiva śābdapratyayaḥ avastugrāhī  sa vibhramavaśāt akārakepikārakādhyavasāyī  vastusaṃvādo tatpratibandhe sati syāt vastūtpatyānyathā naiva vastūtpatterabhrāntiriti cet  naitadevam  atatpratibhāsinastadadhyavasāyācca prabhāyāṃ maṇibhrāntiḥ pratibhāsāt bhrānteḥ  yadi bhrānteḥ saṃvādo neti cet na  yathoktavadeva vyabhicārāḥsyāt  vitathapratibhāso hi bhrāntilakṣaṇam tannāntarīyakatayā hi saṃvādo na pratibhāsāpekṣī tulyamityādi siddhānta vā dī  taditi arthakriyāsāghanatvaṃ evantāvatpratibandhakanyāyenāvidyamānāyā api vyāvṛtteḥ sadbhāvamabhyupagamyaśabdārthatvamuktamācārya dignāgeneti vyākhyāya punavidhimeva śabdārthamāha  avaa stugrā hī cetyādi  yadyavastuviṣayaḥ kathamarthakriyāthinaṃ puruṣaṃ pravarttayatīti cedāha sa vibhrametyādi  sa iti śābdapratyayaḥ  vibhramavaśāt puruṣaṃ pravarttayati  vibhrama evakathamityāha  akārakepi svapratibhāserthakriyāyogyatvāt kārako bāhyorthastadadhyavasāyī yataḥ  kathantarhyanumānādervastusamvāda ityata āha  vastusambāda ityādi tasmin sādhye pratibandhe sati    pratibandha eva kutaḥ  vastutpattyā sādhyavastūtpattyā hetubhūtayā anyathetyasati pratibandhe  naivāsti samvādaḥ śabdādeḥ pratyayasya vastutpattera bhrāntiriti cet  syādetad yadi vastunaścotpadyate vastusamvādi śābdādijñānamiti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhimmanyate  naitadevaṃ  satyapi vastutpattāvatatpratibhāsino vasturūpāpratibhāsinastadadhyavasāyād vastvadhyavasāyād bhrāntitvaṃ  tatovasturūpotpatti bhrāntyorvirodhābhāvāt sandigdhavyatirekitā hetoriti bhāvaḥ maṇiprabhāyāmmaṇibhrāntirmaṇiṃ samvādayatyeva  vyabhicārameva samarthayannāha vitathetyādi  etadāha  yadi bhrānteḥ samvādasya ca virodha syāt tadā bhrānteravastusamvādanaṃ sādhyaṃ pratyavyabhicāra syāt  sa ca nāsti   yasmād vitathapratibhāso bhrāntilakṣaṇaṃ na visamvādane  tannāntarīyakatayeti vastunāntarīyakatayātata utpatteriti yāvat  ayaṃ samvādo na pratibhāsāpekṣī  na vastugatampratibhāsamapekṣate  vastupratibaddhatvenaivātatpratibhāsasyāpi samvādāt tasmāt sthitametad vitathapratibhāsyapi śābdaḥ pratyayaḥ sati vastupratibandhetasya samvādaka iti  sāmānyacintāvastuni yathābhāvaṃ apitacetasaḥ pravṛttau prāhyasya sāmānyasyānarthakriyāyogyatvātapravṛttiḥ tasmin  anyatrāpi pravṛttau atiprasaṃgaḥ  tadvadgrahaṇe ca sāmānya vaiyarthyādayaḥproktāḥ  jātigrahaṇepi sambandhāt śliṣṭābhāsā buddhiḥ pravarttayatīti cet  tasyaikasyāpi svabhāvasthityagrahaṇās na jāti savāniti paravāda evādhīyate gha sāmānyābhāve pratyabhijñāsaṃgatiḥevaṃ hi anvayinopyabhāvāt svabhāvena bhinnārtheṣu saṃvaiṣeti pratyabhijñāpi nasyāditi cet naiṣa doṣa evaṃatha punaryathāvastveva śābdaḥ pratyaya iṣyate  tadā vastuni bāhye  yathābhāvaṃ yathāvastu apitacetasaḥ āropitajñānasya śabdabalādyanyathā vastūtpannajñānasyeti yāvat evaṃ pravṛttāvabhyupagamyamānāyāntasya śābdasya jñānasya sāmānyaṃ grāhyameṣṭavyaṃ svalakṣaṇeśabdena codanābhāvāt  tasya ca grāhyasya sāmānyasyānarthakriyāyogyatvāddhetorapravṛttistasmin vikalpavijñānaviṣaye sāmānye  anyatreti sāmānyādanyatra vyaktāvaśabdacoditāyāmapi pravṛttāvatiprasaṅgaḥ  gośabdādaśvavyaktāvapi pravṛttiḥ syādgotvasāmānyasyāśvavyakteśca sambandhābhāvānnaivamiti cennāśabdacodite satyapisambandhe pravṛttyayogādityādyuktaṃ atha na kevalā jāti śabdena coditeti kintu tadvāniti  tadā taha   bdgrahaṇe cābhyupagamyamāne sāmānyavaiyarthyādayaḥ proktāḥ  vyaktiṣveva sākṣācchandoniyujyatāṃ ki sāmānyeneti sāmānyavaiyarthyamuktaṃ  ādiśabdāda ānantyādidoṣaparigrahaḥ  jātireva śabdena codyate  sā tu jātirvyaktisamavetatvānna śakyatekevalā gṛhītumato vyaktirūpeṇaikībhūtā gṛhyate  tadevāśate  jātītyādi śliṣṭābhāseti svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhyāṃ sambhinnābhāsā buddhirarthakriyākāriṇyāṃvyaktau pravarttayatīti cet  tadā na jātinaṃ tadvān  svena rūpeṇa gṛhyata ityadhyāhāraḥ kiṅkāraṇam  ekasyāpi sāmānyasya tadvato vā yā svabhāvasthitirasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ rūpaṃtasya śliṣṭābhāsayā bhrāntayā buddhayā  aprahaṇāt  tataśca bhrāntāyā buddheḥpravṛttyabhyupamagāt paravāda evānyāpohavādidarśanameva evamityādi paraḥ  anvayina ityanekavyaktigamyasya sāmānyasya naiṣa doṣa iti siddhānta vā dī  ādiśabdādudakāharaṇāntāntāmbhevepi parasparavyāvṛttatvepi vastudharmatayā tāṃ tāṃ jñānāvikāṃ sadṛśīmarthakriyāṃ kuvaṃto dṛṣṭvā tadanye bhyotatkāryebhyo yo viśleṣo vicchinna svabhāvaḥ sa viṣayo yeṣāṃ dhvanīnāntairdhvanijñānādyarthakriyānstāṃstāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhedepi kurvataḥ arthāntad nyaviśleṣaviṣayairdhvanibhiḥ saha  uktametad   vastubhedepi sadṛśārthakriyayā cakṣurādivaditi cet jñānādyarthakriyāmekāṃ teṣu paśyatonyebhyo bhinnā vastudharmatayaiva tade vedamitipratyayaṃ tadvyāvṛttiviṣayadhvanisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ svānubhavavāsanāpravodhāt janayanti anyathā na bhedasaṃsargavatī buddhiḥ syāt  yathā daṇḍiṣu daṇḍaḥ  tatra ekena vaṇḍenayuktā api anyatra sa eveti na  bhavati pratītiḥ api tu tadiheti  naivaṃ pratyabhibhirantarjalparūpaiḥ saha saṃyojyārthān sa  evāyamiti kuryādapi pumān api śabdo bhinnakramonyadarśanepītyarthaḥ  pūrvadṛṣṭādarthādanyasya vilakṣaṇasya darśanepisadṛśārthakriyākāritvena vipralambhādekatvamāropya pratyabhijñānaṃ kuryāditi samudāyārthaḥ kathaṃ punabhinnā abhinnāmarthakriyāṃ kurvantītyata āha  uktametadityādi ekapratyavamarśārthajñānādyekārthasādhane   ityādinā prāguktatvāt  ekāmiti sadṛśīnteṣviti bhinneṣvanyeṣu paśyataḥpuṃsaḥ  anyebhya ityatatkāribhyo vyāvarttamānā bhāvā vastudharmatayaiva vastusvabhāvenaiva  tavevedamityevamākāraṃ mithyāpratyayaṃ janayantīti sambandha  kimviśiṣṭamityāha  tadityādi  tebhyotatkāryebhyo yā vyāvṛttirekārthakriyākāriṇāmarthānāṃ sā viṣayo yasya dhvanestena saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsaktaṃ sābhilāpamiti yāvat yadi vastudharmmatayā janayanti kinna sarvadetyāha  svānubhavetyādi  teṣāmbhāvānāṃ yaḥ svonubhava pūrvamutpannastena yā pratyabhijñānotpattaye vāsanā śaktilakṣaṇāditā  tasyāḥ prabodha kāryotpādanaṃpratyābhimukhyantasyāśca prabodha punastajjātīyapadārthānubhavāt  evaṃlakṣaṇaśca prabodho na sarvakālamato na sadā pratyabhijñānasambhava iti  saṃsṛṣṭabhedamiti pūrvapaścādṛṣṭayorvyaktyorbhedaḥ saṃsṛṣṭa ekīkṛtoyena sa tathā  anyatheti yadyekakāryatvena sādṛśyenaikatvamāropya bhinneṣvapi bhrāntaṃpratyabhijñānaṃ neṣyate  api tvekasāmānyayogāt tadā na bhedasaṃsargavatī  bhedānāṃa saṃsarga ekarūpatāpādanantadvatī buddhirna syāt  bahuṣvekarūpā buddhirna syādityartha na hyekena vaṇḍena yuktā api daṇḍina ekatvena gṛhyante  tadevāha    yathādaṇḍiṇviti  na hītyetadeva vyanakti  tatreti daṇḍiṣu  anyatreti ekasmāddaṇḍinonyasmin daṇḍini  taddaṇḍadravyaṃ yadekadaṇḍini dṛṣṭantadiha dvitīye daṇḍinītyevaṃsyāt  na tu taddvāreṇa sa evāyandaṇḍīti  yadvā yathā bahuṣvekadaṇḍayogāt pratyekamayamapi daṇḍastathā sa evāyanda ṇḍa iti na bhavati pratotistadvat  vyaktī sāmānyacintājñānam  tadevedamityatha katham  anyadasti  tataḥ ekaṃ anekatra paśyatopibhedasaṃsargavat na yuktam  vibhramavaśāt tathā pratibhāsane hi avirodhaḥ nimittābhāvāt vibhramo na yukta iti cet  ta eva tadekārthakāriṇobhāvā anubhavadvāreṇa prakṛtyā vibhramaphalāyā vikalpavāsanāhetutvāt nimittam marīcikādiṣu jalādibhrānter bhinnāvapi abhinnākārasya parāmarśapratyayasyanāmapyekasāmānyayogānna sa evāyamiti pratītiḥ syādapi tu tadiheti bhavatvevamiti cedāha  naivamityādi  tadityādinopasaṃhāraḥ  ekamitisamānamanekatra vyaktiṣu paśyatopi puṃso bhedasaṃsargavat  bhedānāṃ saṃsarga ekākāratātadvajjñānaṃ na yuktaṃ  anyāpohavādinastvayamadoṣa ityāha  vibhrametyādi bhrāntisāmarthyādityarthaḥ  tathetyekarūpatayā vastubhūtamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ pratyabhijñānasyanimittantasyābhāvād vibhramo na yuktamiti cet  ta eveti vyāvṛttā bhāvāstasyajñānāderekasyārthasya kāriṇa karaṇaśīlāḥ  anubhava eva dvāraṃ hetustena prakṛtyāsvabhāvena vibhramaphalāyā bhrāntiphalāyā hetutvānnimittaṃ nanu marīcikādiṣu jalādibhrāṃteḥ sādṛśyamantareṇotpattāvatiprasaṃgaḥ sādṛśyaṃ cediṣyate sāmānyamapi kasmānneṣyata ityāha  marīcikādiṣvityādi prathamenādiśabdena rajvādiparigrahaḥ  dvitīyena sarpādibhrānteḥ  tāveveti jalamarīcikārūpa bhāvo abhinnākārasya tadevedaṃ jalamityevaṃ rūpamparāmarśapratyayasyanimittabhūto yo nubhavastasya janakau kāraṇaṃ bhinnāvapi etaduktambhavatyasadṛśānāntāvanna sādṛśyamasti  sadṛśānāmapi sadṛśamevasvarūpaṃ bhrāntinimittaṃ  na tu sādṛśyaṃ  tathā hi jalānubhavajñānantāva t  jalākāraparāmarśavāsanāmādhatte sā ca vāsanā yathā punarjalasvalakṣaṇānubhavena prabodhyate tathā marīcikākhya padārthānubhavenāpi prakṛtyā  tasya tatsvabhāvatvāt  tato yathājalānubhavājjalākāraparāmarśapratyaya ucyate  tathā marīcikānubhavādapi  ataścatau jalamarīcikākhyau bhāvānubhavadvāreṇa jalabhrāntenimittaṃ bhavataḥ  na cātiprasaṅgaḥ tulyepyajalarūpatve marīcikāsvarūpasya svahetubhya eva sādṛśyotpannatvānna tusādṛśyayogāt sadṛśo bhavatīti sāmānyaprastāve nyāyasyoktatvāt evantāvad udyotaka rā dimataṃ nirākṛtya mī māṃ sa ka mataṃ nirākarttumāha na hotyādi  tathā hi jalajñāne dvayaṃ pratibhāsate jalasāmānyantasya ca deśādisaraṃbnimittānubhavajanako kāraṇam  na tatrānyadeva kiṃcit sāmānyaṃ tathā pratyayabhūtam  sattve vā sadarthagrāhiṇī buddhiḥ bhrāntinaṃ syāt abhūtākārasamāropāv āntiriti cet  na  tatsāmānyaprāhiṇī sābhavati  yameva cākāramiyaṃ āropayati sa eva tasya viṣayaḥ  aviṣayīkṛtasyasamāropo sāmarthyāt  ākārāntaravat  sa ca tatra nāstyata sāmānyaṃ na vidyate mbandhitvantato neti bādhake pratyaye na deśādisambandhitvaṃ bādhyate na jalasāmānyamatob jalajñānaṃ sāmānyālambanamevetyata ucyate  na tatra marīcikāsu anyadeveti bhinnaṃkiṃcit sāmānyaṃ jalasāmānyantatheti jalarūpeṇa  sattve vā jalasāmānyasyābhyupagamyamāne vastubhūtasāmānyagrāhitvena sadarthagrāhiṇī buddhiḥ atha syād  anyadeśādyavasthitajalasāmānyālambikaiva jalabuddhirna bhrāntistaduktaṃ   sarvatrālambanaṃ bāhya deśakālānyathātmakamiti  kathantarhi marīcikāyāṃ jalapratītirbhrāntiranyadeśādyavasthitasya jalasāmānyasyatatra samāropāditi cet  etadevāha  abhūtetyādi  marīcikāsvavidyamānasyajalākārasya samāropād bhrāntiḥ netyādi siddhānta vā dī  tatsāmānyagrāhiṇī anyadeśāvasthitajalasāmānyagrāhiṇī sā jalabuddhirna bhavati  kasmādityāha  yameva cetyādi  yamevākāramityabhūtaṃ  jalākāramiyaṃ jalabuddhistatra marīcikāsvāropayati  āropyamāṇasyāpi kasmād viṣayatvamityata āha  aviṣayīkṛtasyetyādi  etadāha vikalpotpattikāle yatsāmānyaṃ na viṣayīkṛtantena na tasya samāropaḥ  ākārāntaravat  na hyākārāntaramagnyādi tatra samāropyate tasya tadānīmaviṣayatvāt yaścākāro bāhyābhedenāropya te tasyaiva viṣayatvena pratibhāsanaṃ  sa cetyāropyamāṇojalākārastatra marīcikāsu nāsti bādhyamānatvādato sāmānyaṃ jalajñānanna vidyatesāmānyamasyeti kṛtvā  tathā marīcikāvat sattyajaleṣvapi jalākārādhyāropakaṃjalajñānamasāmānyaṃ satītyādi paraḥ  anyadeva jalasāmānyaṃ sati tasya grahe tadāropo jalāropaḥnānyathā  yadi jalasāmānyamantareṇa satyajale jalāropa syāt tadātiprasaṃgaḥ agnyādāvapi jalāropa syāt sati sāmānyagrahe tadāropo nānyathā atiprasaṃgaḥsyāditi  sati ekakāryakāriṇāṃgrahe kinneṣyate  dṛṣṭe sāmānyevaśyaṃ ca vyaktīnāṃ svārtha jananaśaktirabhyupeyātatasta evānyebhyo bhinnā tāvṛśaṃ jñānaṃ janayantīti cet tatra sāmānyena kiṃ karaṇīyam  yathābhāvaṃ asaṃsṛṣṭabheda eva kisa pratyeti avidyāprabhavāt vikalpānāṃna ca vāhyārthamanapekṣya vibhramo bhavati api tu āntaraṃ viplavam  yathā keśādisatīti siddhānta vā dī ekaṃ kārya pānāvagāhanādi tatkaraṇaśīlānāṃ sattyajalānāṃ grahe sati kinneṣyate jalāropaḥ  sāmānyamantareṇa bhinnānāmekakāryakaraṇaśaktireva nāstīti cedāha  avaśyaṃ cetyādi  pratipāditaṃ caitad ekapratyavamarśārthajñānādyekārthasādhana ityatrāntare anye tu na hi tatrānyadeva kiṃcit sāmānyamastītyādikaṃ granthaṃ sāmānyaśabdaṃsādṛśyārthaṃ kṛtvā vyācakṣate  tatteṣāṃ vyākhyānannātiśliṣṭaṃ yattathā pratīyata ityāderavācakatvāt  na hi sādṛśyaṃ jalarūpatayā pratīyata iti yati tata ityekakāraṇaśakteḥ  ta eveti yathokta śaktiṣu yuktā vyaktaya evana tu sāmānyaṃ  anyebhya ityatatkāryebhyaḥ  tādṛśamityekākāraṃ  yathābhāvamitipadārthānativṛttāvanvayībhāvaḥ  yathā svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyavirahi sthitaṃ tadativṛttyā kinna pratyeti vikalpapratyaya  kasmāttatrābhūtaṃ sāmānyamāropayathābhāvamityasyaivārtho saṃsṛṣṭetyādi  asaṃsṛṣṭa ekarūpatāmanā  apannaḥ  bhedaḥ parasparaṃ viśeṣo yasya bhāvasya sa tathā  aśaktireṣā  yathāvasthitagrahaṇūṃprati vikalpānāṃ  kasmāt avidyāprabhavāt  bhūtārthagrahaṇaṃ vidyā  tadvirodhād vikalpa evāvidyā  prabhāva evaṃ prabhavaśabdenoktaḥ vikalpasāmarthyādityarthaḥ  yathāsthitavastvagrahaṇaṃ hi vikalpasya svabhāvaḥ prakṛtyābhrāntatvāt tasya vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ vināśa eva vikalpasya vibhramonayukta iticedāha  na cetyādi  vikalpasvarūpamevātrāntaro viplava ukta  vikalpasyaivatatsvarūpaṃ yenāsau bāhyasādharmyamanapekṣya vibhramo bhavatītyarthaḥ  keśādyākārābhrāntiḥ keśādivibhramaḥ  sa yathā bāhyārthānapekṣaḥ sannabhūtākāropagrahaṇamāntara viplavamāśritya bhrānto bhavati  tadvad vikalpopyabhūtasāmānyākāragrahaṇādityayamatrārthobhipretaḥ  bhrāntibījamāntaro viplavastasmādutpatterityayaJvibhramaḥ bhrāntirevāyaṃ vyaktiṣvekākārapratibhāsaityuktaṃ athavā  astu buddheḥ pratibhāsaḥ abhinnapratibhāsādhorna bhinneṣvitipratibhāso dhiyāṃ bhinnaḥ samānā iti tadgrahāt astu pratibhāso dhiyāṃ bhinnāḥ samānā iti tāsāṃ grahaṇāt  naiva tāsuabhinnaḥ pratibhāsaḥ samānā iti grahaṇāt  na hi ekapratibhāse samānāiti yujyate  kintarhi  tadevedamiti dvayasya sambandhāditi cet  na prapratibaddhasya sambandhāyogāt pratiprasaṅgācca  tāḥ samānā iti cet kathamanyonyasya sāmyam  tatsambandhāditicet  na adhunāstyekapratibhāso vyaktiṣvityāha  athavāstvityādi  yaduktam abhinnapratibhāsā dhorna bhinneṣvityetadastu  iṣṭamevaitadityarthaḥ  yataḥ pratibhāso dhiyāṃ sāmānyabuddhīnāṃ bhinnaḥ  kiṅakāraṇaṃ    samānā iti tāsāṃvyaktīnāṃ grahaṇāt naivetyādinā vyācaṣṭe  tāsviti sāmānyabuddhiṣu abhinna ityeka  pratibhāsosti  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ  tāsāṃ vyaktīnāṃ samānā iti grahaṇāt nanu samānā iti grahe satyekapratibhāsaḥ kasmānna yujyata evetyata āha  nahītyādi  kintarhi tadeveti yatpūrvadṛṣṭantadevendṛśyata ityevaṃ syānna tu pūrvaṇedaṃ samānamiti bhedādhiṣṭhānatvāt samānavyavahārasya  dvayasyetyādi  yadi sāmānyamevaa kevalantā bhirbuddhibhirgṛhyate tadā bhavedayaṃ doṣaḥ  kintu sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaśca dvayamapisāmānyabuddhyā gṛhyate tato dvayasya grahaṇādadoṣaḥ  yatastenaiva sāmānyena yuktāviśeṣāḥ samānā iti gṛhyanta iti tathāpītyā cā ryaḥ  dvayasya grahaṇepi kalpyamāne tadiheti syāt  tat sāmānyaṃyatpūrvaṃ vyaktau dṛṣṭantadiha vyaktyantare dṛśyata ityevaṃ syānna tu samāna iti vyaktibhyaekāntabhinnatvāt sāmānyasya  tadevetyarthāntarabhūtaṃ gotvādikaṃ tāsāṃ vyaktīnāṃsāmyaṃ yena tāssamānā iti cet  anya sāmānyāt sānyasya svalakṣaṇasya kathaṃkena prakāreṇa sāmyaṃ  na kenacidityabhiprāyaḥ  tathā hi vyaktirūpānukārātsāmānya vyaktīnāṃ sāmyaṃ kalpyeta  tacca nāsti vyaktibhyotyantaṃvilakṣaṇatvāt sāmānyasya  nāpyanenānye samānā yena tatsāmyaṃ syāt  na hi vyaktirūpānukārādinā sāmyaṃ kintu tatsambandhāt  vyaktibhiḥ sambandhāt  sāmānyaṃvyaktīnāṃ sāmānyamiti cennaitadevaṃ  kiṅkāraṇam  apratibaddhasya vyaktāva sāmānyacintākathantā bhinnadhīgrāhyāḥ samāśvedekakāryatā sādṛśyaṃ nanu dhīḥ kārya tāsāṃ sā ca vibhidyate grahaṇadarśanāt  śrāsu abhinna pratibhāsaḥ nanu prāsvabhinnapratibhāsa na tad darśane bhedābhedapratibhāsāt na samānā bnāyattasya tābhiranupakṛtasyetyarthaḥ  samavāyalakṣaṇena sambandhena sambandhāt sāmānyasyasāmyebhyupagamyamānetiprasaṃga saṃkhyāsaṃyogakāryadravyāṇāmapi sāmānyarūpatā syāt tataśca tatsambandhāt saṃkhyeyādiṣu samānapratibhāsaḥ syāt kathamityādi paraḥ  samānā iti grahaṇād vyaktiṣu pratibhāsabheda sādhyate taccaitad viruddhaṃ  yasmāt samāicetā vyaktayaḥ kathambhinnadhīgrāhyā evetisāvadhāraṇaṃ  abhinnadhīgrāhyā api prāpnuvantītyarthaḥ  tathā hi yatra kiñcitsāmānyaṃ kaścicca viśeṣastatra samānā iti grahaṇaṃ yuktamanyathā ghaṭapaṭādivadubhedapratibhāsaḥ syānna samānā iti tadyācaṣṭe  nanvityādi  āsu vyaktiṣvityanena viśeṣarūpamāha  abhinnaḥpratibhāsaḥ siddha ityadhyāhāryaḥ anena ca sāmānyasya rūpamuktaṃ tadevaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇarūpagrahaṇād vyaktayaḥ samānā gṛhyanta iti samudāyārtha  tatki samāneṣvekānekapratibhāso vidyate yenaivamucyate  yadi syādiheti buddhiḥ syādityuktaṃ  sāmānyātmakatvād viśeṣāṇāṃ samānā iti pratibhāsaiti cet  nanvanugatapratibhāsābhāve sāmānyamastīti kutaḥ  na ca samānarūpānyathānupapattyā sāmānyakalpanā yuktā  svahetubhya evaṃ keṣāṃcit samānāmevotpatteḥkeṣāṃcidasamānāṃ na ca sāmānyāt teṣāṃ samānarūpatā yujyata ityuktaṃ tena yaducyate bhaṭṭena na cāprasiddhasārūpyānapoha viṣayātmanā śaktaḥ kaścidapi jñātuṃ gavādīnaviśeṣataḥ athāsatyapi sārūpye syādapohasya kalpanā gavāśvayorayaṃ kasmādagopoho na kalpyate śāvaleyācca bhinnatvaṃ bāhuleyāśvayossamaṃ sāmānya nānyadiṣṭaṃ ca kvāgopohapravarttanaṃ apohyānapi cāśvādīnekadharmānvayādṛte bpratīyante iti cet na hi ekakārya tā sādṛśyenaiva  arthajñāne dvāvākāroṃdṛṣṭau  śradṛṣṭeadṛṣṭe yathā arthadvaya kalpanena svayameva ekakāryā vyaktayaḥkalpanāviṣayatāṃ upagatāḥ  tasmādanayā vyabhicāreṇa tathā ropyata itina doṣaḥ dhīḥ kāryaṃ tāsāṃ sā ca vibhidyate tadvat pratidravyaṃ tatpratibhāsinopi jñānasya  vyakti  bhedāt kathaṃna nirūpayituṃ śakyastadapoho na sidhyatī ti   apāstaṃ  sāmānyamantareṇāpi svahetubhya eva gavādīnāṃ samānāmutpatteryadināma sārūpyamarthāntarabhūtaṃ neṣyate sarūpāstviṣyanta evaṃ te  evaṃrūpāśca yena bhavantyaśvādayaste sarveviśeṣeṇāgorūpatayā niṣidhyanta iti na kācit kṣatiḥ ā cā ryastu na nāma svahetubhya samānā utpannāstathāpi na sāmānyabalātsamānā iti pratītiri ti darśayannāha  netyādi  taddarśana iti vyaktigrāhiṇajñāne  sāmānyajñāne vā bhinnābhinnayoriti viśeṣasāmānyayoḥ  ekakāryatāsādṛśyamiti  ekakāryataiva sādṛśyaṃ sāmyaṃ tenaiva samānā vyaktayaḥ pratīyanta ityarthaḥ natu pāramārthikena sāmānyena  tenaikakāryatā sādṛśyaṃ yeṣānta evāpoha viṣayā yeṣāṃtvekakāryatā nāsti tepohyā iti siddhaṃ  yathā caikāntabhinnā apyekakāryaṃ kurvantitathoktaṃ prāk kasmānna sāmānyena samānā pratīyanta ityāha  na hītyādi  arthajñāna ityanubhavajñāne dvāvākārau bhinnau  arthadvayakalpanena samānāsamānakalpanena  kalpanāviṣayatāmityekatvāropavikalpaviṣayatāṃ  tatheti samāna rūpatayā  śranayāvikalpabuddhayā nanvityādi paraḥ tāsāṃ vyaktīnāṃ dhīḥ kārya sā ca vibhidyata ityetāvān kārikābhāgaḥ pratibhāvamityetadapekṣya paṭhitaḥ  evambhāvaṃ prati  tadvadityādi vivaraṇaṃ tatpratibhāsinopi vyaktipratibhāsinopi jñānasya  tadvadvayaktibhedāt  kathamekakāryā vyaktayo naiva     syādetat  nānubhavajñānenaikakāryāḥ vyaktayaḥ kintu yattadvikalpakamekalokavārtika sāmānyacintāekakāryā  taddhi tāsāṃ kāryaṃbhidyate  ghaṭādeḥ udakāharaṇādi yadekakāryatadapi pratidravyaṃ bhedāt bhidyata eveti  bhinnānāṃ naikakāryatā iti cet nāyaṃ doṣaḥ  evameka pratyavamarśasya hetutvād dhīrabhedinī ekadhī hetubhāvena vyaktīnāmapyabhinnatā niveditamidaṃ yathā vastūnāṃ na svabhāvasaṃbandha  tatra ekākārā buddhirbhrāntireva  tāṃtāṃ krameṇa bhedino vikalpahetavo bhavantaḥ padārthā narūpādhyāropeṇa tadapekṣayetyata āha  taddhītyādi  taddhayanubhavajñānantāsāṃ vyaktīnāṃkārya na vikalpavijñānantasya vyaktyabhāvepi bhāvāt  tasyaiva ca vikalpasya samānāityevamutpadyamānasya vyaktiṣu kiṃ sāmyaṃ  paṭādīnāṃ śītāpanayanamityevamādiparigrahaḥ  pratidravyamityavyayībhāvāt ṣaṣṭhyā ambhāvaḥ  dravyasya dravyasya yo bhedastasmād bhedāt kāraṇabhedād bhidyata iti yāvat netyācā ryaḥ  ekapratyavamarśasyeti svaviṣayasyaikākārapratyayasya hetutvāddhīnivikalpikā savikalpikā vābhedinī bhāti  ekadhīhetubhāvenetyadhyavasitaikarūpāyā buddherhetutvena vyaktīnāmabhinnatā bhāti etaduktambhavati  pratyekaṃ yadyapi vyaktisvarūpa grāhiyo dhiyo bhinnāsta athāpi pratyabhijñayā tāsāmekatvamadhyavasīyate  anena caikakāryatāsādṛśyena vyaktīnāmekatvaṃ  na tvekaparāmarśahetutvenānubhavajñānānāmekatvamupacaryate  nāpi tathābhūtānubhavajñāna hetutvena vyaktīnāmekatvamupacaryate  skhalitapratyayaviṣayatvābhāvādupacaritopacārābhāvācca  vṛttyarthānurūpaśca kārikāryo nasyāt  nanu yadyekakāryatāsādṛśyena vyaktīnāmekatvādhyavasāya kathantarhi buddhīnāmekatvādhyavasāya  ekakāryatvābhāvāt  atha tāḥ svabhāvata ekatvāvasāyaṃ janayantivyaktayopyevambhaviṣyantīti kimekakāryatāsādṛśyena vyākhyātaḥsattyam    ācārya dignāgā bhiprāyeṇaivamuktamityadoṣaḥ  tasmādekatvādhyavasādekatvamiṣyate na paramārthata ityata āha  niveditamityādi  sarvabhāvāḥsvabhāvena vyāvṛttibhāgina  pra vā    ityatroktatvāt  tatretyasaṃsargiṣubhedeṣu  ekākārā buddhiratasmiṃstadgrahād bhrāntireva atha syāt  sāmānyamantareṇa bhrāntarevāyoga ityata āha  tāntvityādi tāmbhrāntimbhedinaḥ padārthā vyāvṛttāni svalakṣaṇāni krameṇa janayanti na sākṣāt  janayantīti niveditam  sa tveṣāmabhinnotatkārisvabhāvavivekaḥ  itijñānādeḥ kasyacidekasya karaṇāt tadapi pratidravyaṃ abhinnam prakṛtyā prabhedāvaskandino hetutvāt abhinnaṃkhyāti  tathābhūtahetvabhedādhyavasāyasya jñānādyarthasya hetutvāt vyaktayopi  prakṛtyāa ekraṃ pratyayaṃ saṃsṛṣṭākāra svabhāvabhedaparamārthānupacaritaṃ janayantīti prasakṛmniveditam evaṃ cet ekakāryavastubhedaḥ svabhāva ta iti prakṛtyā  cakāro niveditamityasyā nukarṣaṇārthaḥ  etadapi tatraivaprastāve niveditaṃ  krameṇeti yaduktantasya vyākhyānaṃ vikalpahetavo bhavanta iti vikalpakāraṇatvādanubhavajñānamvikalpa  vikalpahetoranubhavajñānasya hetavo bhavantaityarthaḥ vyaktayonubhavajñānaṃ janayanti taccaikākārāṃ bhrāntimityayaṃ kramārthaḥ sa tveṣāmityādinā kā rikā rthamāha  sarveṣāmbhāvānāmbhedonyā pohaḥ  kiṃsvabhāvotatkārivivekaḥ sa eṣāmabhinna ityucyate  kasmād    jñānāderarthasyendriyasyodakāharaṇādeśca kasyacidityātmānurūpasyaikasya karaṇāt yadvā  nanu buddherevāyamabhinnākāraḥ kathaṃ vyaktīnāmityata āha  satvākāra eṣāṃ bāhyānāmabhinnastathaiva pratīteḥ    pratītireva kutaḥ  jñānādeḥkasyacidekasya karaṇāt    sa cākāṃro bhedonyāpoha ityucyate na sāmānyaṃ kiṅkāraṇam    pratatkārisvabhāvaviveko yataḥ etaduktambhavati  prativyaktigariti pratyayenātatkārisvabhāvavivekotatkārisvabhāvavivikta eva svabhāvo viṣayīkriyate  na tvarthāntarabhutaṃ sāmānyantenabheda ityucyate  etatpaścārddhasya vyākhyānaṃ  nanu kathaṃ jñānāderekatvamityāha  tadapītyādi  pūrvārddhasyaitad vyākhyānaṃ tadapi jñānādikāryamabhinnaṃ khyātīti sambandha  prakṛtyeti svabhāvena abhedāvaskandina ityabhedādhyavasāyinaḥ  tathābhūtetyādinā vyaktīnāmapivikalpaṃ prati pāramparyeṇa kāraṇatvamāha  abhedāvasāyo vidyate yasmistasya jñānādeb rityanubhavajñānasyodakādyāharaṇādeścārthasya hetutvāt kāraṇāt krameṇa vyaktayopyekaṃ pratyayaṃ janayantīti sambandhaḥ  kimviśiṣṭamityāha  saṃsṛṣṭākāramityādi saṃsṛṣṭo vyaktiṣvāropita eka ākāro yena sa tathā  svabhāvabhedonyatryāvṛttaṃ rūpaṃ sa eva paramārthonupacaritosyeti vigrahaḥ  pāramparyeṇa vyāvṛttasvalakṣaṇadvārāyātatvād vikalpasya nanu ca tāntu bhedinaḥ padārthā ityādināyamarthonantaramevoktaḥ eva sā cātatkāryaviśleṣaḥ sāmānyacintātadanyasyānuvarttinaḥ adṛṣṭeḥ prativedhāccana hi dṛśyaṃ vibhāgena na pratibhāsata iti  sati vā kvacidpratāśritaṃ kathaṃ jñānaheturityetadapyuktam  saṃketopi na yuktaḥ  tasmāt saṃketastadvidarśikaḥ eva yuktaḥ  yoyaṃ anyonyaṃ vivekaḥ  bhāvānāṃ tatpratītaye saṃketopisattyaṃ    kintu krameṇa vikalpahetavo bhavanta ityādyasyaivārthonena sphuṭīkṛtaḥ ekakāryabhedavastubhūtaṃ sāmānyambhaviṣyatītyata āha  sā cetyādi  sā caikakāryatā atatkāryebhyo viśleṣo vyāvṛtta eva svabhāvo na vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ  kiṃ kāraṇantadanyasya svalakṣaṇādanyasyānubattinonvayino vastuno vyaktivyatirekeṇā dṛṣṭeḥpratiṣedhācca pūrvoktāt na hotyādinā vyācaṣṭe  dṛśyamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ vibhāgena vyaktibhyobhedena  sati vā sāmānye nityatvādanādheyātiṣa   śa yatvena kvacid vyaktayantareanāśritaṃ kathaṃ jñānahetuḥ  naiva  āśrayavyaṃgyasya tasya jñānahetutvamiṣṭamityabhiprāyaḥ  etadapyuktamityanena sambandhanīyaṃ  asyāpi prāguktatvāt yata evambhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ nāsti  tasmāt saṃketopītyādi  tadityanyāpohaḥsambadhyate  tasyāsyāpohasya vikalpena svākārābhedenādhyastasya vit jñānaṃ tatpūrvako lābharaca  tadvit  saivārthaḥ phalamiti viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ  sa  mayasyāsti saṃketasyeti matvarthīyaṣṭhan  vikalpādhyavasitabāhyārthapratipattyarthamitisamudāyārthaḥ  sarvaścārambhaḥ phalārtha iti vidirlābhārthopyākṣipta evānyathāsaṃketakaraṇasya vaiyarthyāt nanu tadvidartho yasyeti bahuvrīhiṇā bhavitavyaṃ lāghavāt  bahubrīhiṇoktatvānmatvarthasya tadvibhā  gā nutpattilaghavatvaṃ  tathā ca bhāṣya uktaṃ karmadhārayādbahuvrīhirbhavatītyādi naiṣa doṣaḥ  idamapi tatroktaṃ  kvacitkarmadhāraya eva sarvasādhanādyartha iti ākṛtigaṇatvācca sarvasādhanādestatrāyantadvidarthikaśabdo draṣṭavyaḥ  pramāṇavārttikasvavṛttiṭīkā kriyamāṇotatkāritivekena pravṛtyā eva śobhate avivekena pravṛttyarthatayā śrutiḥ yadi tatpratītyartho na saṃketaḥ tasya vyavahārakālepi asaṃsparśānnānyaparihāreṇa pravarttata na hi teṣāṃ tebhyaḥ sa vivekaḥ śabdena codyeta sā ca śrutiḥ akāryakṛtitatkāratulyarūpāvabhāsinī dhiyaṃ vastu  pṛthagbhāvamātrabījāmanathikām  yoyamityādi vivaraṇaṃ  anyonyaṃ vivekonyavyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvo bhāvānāntatpratītaye tanniścayārthaṃ svapratibhāsedhyavasitabāhyarūpe saṃketopi kriyamāṇa śobhetayuktiyuktatvāt    kimarthaṃ kriyata ityata āha  atatkārītyādi  vivakṣitārthakriyākāriṇo ye na bhavanti teṣāṃ viveke na parihāreṇa pravṛttyarthatayā  atatkāriṣupravṛttirmābhūdityarthaḥ amumevārthaṃ vyatirekamukheṇa   na  draḍhayannāha draḍhayannāha  yadītyādi  tasyānyaparihārasya pratītyartho yadi na saṃketastatkāriṇī tadanyaparihārasya vyavahārakālepyasaṃsparśāt  yadvā yadi na tatpratītyarthaḥ saṃketa iti vijātīyavyāvṛttasvabhāvaa pratītyarthaḥ saṃketaḥ tadā tasyānya vyāvṛttasya svabhāvasya vyavahārakālepi na kevalaṃsaṃketakālesaṃsparśācchabdenāviṣayīkaraṇānnānyaparihāreṇa pravarttata etaduktambhavati  yadā vidhirūpeṇānyavyāvṛtortho viṣayīkṛtastadānyavyavacchedaḥ pratīyeta  etadevāha  na hotyādi  viveka iti viviktaḥ svabhāvaḥ teṣāntatkāriṇāntebhya ityatatkāryebhyaḥ  yadi hi tasya vivikta sya svabhāvasyaatītaye saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ syādevaṃ vyavahārepi śabdena cogheta  tathā cānyaparihāreṇapravarttateti saṃketopi tadvidarthika eva yuktaḥ nanu ca śabdajanitā buddhiḥ svākārameva bāhyatayādhyasya grahaṇādalīkā tataśca tajjanakasya śabdasya kathamvastusamvādaḥ kathaṃ cānyāpohaviṣayatvamityataāha sā cetyādi  anyāpohaprati pattyarthaṃ yā saṃketikā  sā ca śrutiḥ  dhiyaṃjanayantyapīti sambandha  kimviśiṣṭām    akāryakṛti  avāhyarūpe svākāre tatkāri tulyarūpeṇārthakriyākāri bāhyaikarūpeṇāvabhāsodhyavasāya iti tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ sa yasyā vidyata iti paścāt matvarthīyaḥ  sāmānyacintājanayantyapyatatkāriparihārāṅgabhāvataḥ vastubhedāśrayāccārthe na visaṃvādikā matā tatonyāpohaviṣayā tatkartrāśritabhāvataḥ ekaṃ tamākāramāropyārtheṣūtpadyamānāṃ miyyāvabhāsitvāt prakāryakāriṇamavi kāryakāriṇamivādhyavasantīṃ vastupṛthagbhāvamātrabījāṃ samānādhyavasāyāṃmithyāṃ janayantyapi śrutiḥ tadanyaparihārāṅgabhāvāt paramārthataḥ tadvyatireetaduktambhavati  svākāramabāhyaṃ bāhyamivādhyavasyantīmiti yāvat etena pravṛ ttya  rtha  tvaṃ śruterākhyātaṃ vastubhūtasāmānyamantareṇa kutastasyā utpattiriti cedāha  vastvityādi vastūnāmpṛthagbhāva itaretarabhedastanmātraṃ bījakāraṇaṃ pāramparyeṇa yasyāḥ sā tathoktā  yataścānugataṃ rūpaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ caikīkṛtya gṛhṇātyatonathikāṃ janayantyapiśrutira na visamvādikā  kasmād  atatkāriparihārāṅgabhāvataḥ  vijātī yāvyavacchedahetubhāvataḥ etaduktambhavati yadyanyavyāvṛttavastvadhyavasāyinīṃ buddhi janayecchutistadātadanyavyāvṛtta eva svalakṣaṇe puruṣaṃ pravarttayatīti samvādikā syāt  saṃketakāle caśruteritaretarabhinna eva svabhāva āśrayastatrāsyāḥ saṃketitatvāt  tadevampāramparyeṇa vastubhedāśrayācca kāraṇādarthe  na visamvādikā matā  vyavahārakālepyanyavyāvṛttasyaiva vastunaḥ prāpaṇāt nanu vidhirūpeṇa vastvadhyavasāyātkathaṃ śruteranyāpohaviṣayatvamityata āha tata ityādi  yataścātatkāriparihārāṃgabhāvataḥ śrutervastubhedāśrayatvaṃ ca tataḥkāraṇādanyāpohaviṣayā  etadeva dvayamāha  tatkartrāśrita bhāvata iti  tasminnapohekartṛbhāvataḥ āśritabhāvaśca svārthābhidhānadvāreṇārthādatatkāriparihārāṅgabhāvatastasminnapohe kartta bhāvaḥ śruteḥ  vyavahārakāle saṃketakāle ca vastubhedāśrayadvāreṇapravṛttestasminnapohe śruterāśritabhāvaḥ eketyādinā kāriṃkārthamāha  tamityekamākāraṃ svapratibhāsinamāropyāyeṃṣvadhyasyotpadyamānāṃ  sa ca svapratibhāso  mithyāvabhāsitvādakāryakārī  tame bvaṃbhūtamapi kāryakāriṇamivādhyavasyantīṃ  anenākāryakṛtī tyādi vyākhyātaṃ vastupṛthagbhāvamātra manyavyavacchedamātraṃ yasyā buddheriti vigrahaḥ  mithyābuddhi janayantyapi śrutiḥ    kasmānmithyābuddhirityata āha  samānādhyavasāyāmekākārāpramāṇavārttikasvavṛttiṭīkā kiṣu praryeṣu na visaṃvādiketi tathā hi teṣu sa vyatireko bhūtaḥ sarvathābhyupagamanīyatvāt  vyatirib ktasyāvyatiriktasya ca sarvathāyogāt  tasya vastuni niveśane śabdajñānābhyāṃdūrotsṛṣṭameva vastu syāt tadviṣayābhimatasya tatsvabhāvāt anyasya vastudharmasyāpi kvacidasaṃsparśāt  tata eva sā śrutiranyāpohaviṣayetyucyate śranyavyāvṛtteṣvartheṣu vyāvṛttibhedaṃ viśeṣeṇopādāya niveśanāt vyavahādhyavasāyāṃ  tadanyaparihārāṅgabhāvāt  vivakṣitādarthā danyasya parihārāṃgabhāvatayāvyavacchedāśrayabhāvataḥ  paramārthato vastutaḥ  tadvayatirekiṣvatatkāryavyatirekiṣuna visamvādiketyucyate  tathā hyanityakṛtakādiśrutayo yathābhūtasya nityādivyāvṛttasya vastuno vyāvṛttimupādāya saṃketitatvād vyavahārepi tathā bhūtasyānyaparihārāṅgabhāvena prāptihetavo bhavanti  tena yathārthadarśanā nyāyātatvācchruterapi samvādaḥyadvā yathābhūte vyavacchede sā śrutiḥ saṃketitā tasya paramārthatosti vastuṣusadbhāva itīyatā leśenāvisamvāditvaṃ na tu dhūmādivacchabdānāmāvaśyako vastunipratibandhasteṣāmicchāmātrapratibaddhatvāt avisamvāditvameva samarthayannāha  tathā hotyādi  teṣu bhāveṣu sa vyatirekovyavacchedo bhūtaḥ satyaḥ  kutaḥ  sarvathā sāmānyābhyupagamepyavaśyaṃ vyavacchedasyābhyupagamanīyatvādanyathā vyavacchinnasvabhāvābhāve sāmānyasyaivābhāvaprasaṅgādityuktaṃ  sāmānyoktāpi tatra bhūta iti cedāha  naika ityādi  eka sāmānyapadārtho vyaktervyatirikto vaiśeṣi kā dīnāmavyatiriktaḥ sāṃ khyā nāṃ na teṣu bhūtaiti sambandha  kasmāt  sarvathā vyatiriktasyāvyatiriktasya ca pramāṇabādhitatvenāyogādasambhavāt  bādhakampramāṇaṃ prāguktaṃ vakṣyate ca yadi punaryathā pratibhāsamapi sāmānyaṃ śabdena codyeta tadā tasya sāmānyasyavastunyavidyamānasya samāveśane śabdena viṣayīkaraṇe  tasya vā sāmānyasya pramāṇabādhitasya vastuni bāhye niveśanebhyupagamyamāne dūrotsṛṣṭamevātyantaviprakṛṣṭameva vastu syāt  kutaḥ  śabdajñānābhyāṃ śabdāt taduktācca jñānādityarthaḥ  yadvāśabdajñānābhyāṃ dūramutsṛṣṭaṃ tyaktaṃ syāt  kutaḥ  tadviṣayābhimatasya śabdādiviṣayābhimatasya  tasyeti sāmānyasya vastusvabhāvāt  anyasya sāmānyavyatiriktasya vastudharmasya vastusvabhāvasya svalakṣaṇasyāsaṃsparśādagrahaṇāt  yataśca svalakṣaṇannagṛhṇātyatha ca svākārābhinnamadhyavasyati  tata eva sā śrutiranyāpoha viṣayetyucyate  sāmānyacintārepyanyaparihāreṇa pravarttanācca śravṛkṣavyatirekeraṇa vṛkṣārthaharaṇe dvayam anyonyāśrayamityekagrahābhāve dvayāgrahaḥ saṃketāsaṃbhavastasmāditi kecit pracakṣate yadi eko vṛkṣovṛkṣebhyo bhinnaḥ tasya śravṛkṣāgrahaṇe tathā grahaṇāsāmarthyātnanu vidhirūpeṇa bāhyasyaivādhyavasāyāt kathamanyāpohaviṣayetyucyata ityāha anyetyādi  vijātīyavyāvṛtteṣvartheṣu vyāvṛttibhedamvijātīyavyacchinnasvabhāvamaviśeṣeṇopādāya vijātīyavyāvṛttamātraṃ rūpamāśritya sajātīyavyaktiṣu śabdasya niveśanāt saṃketakaraṇādityarthaḥ  anenānyāpohāśritatvaṃ śruterākhyātaṃ  anya aparihāreṇa pravarttanādityanyāpohaṃ prati karttṛ bhāvaḥ śruteruktaḥ   avṛkṣetyādinā parasya codyamāśaṃkate    anyāpohavādinaḥ kila na vidhirūpeṇa vṛkṣārthasya grahaṇaṃ nāpya vṛkṣārthasya  kintvanyonyavyavacchedena  tatra  abūkṣavyatirekeṇa vṛkṣārthagrahaṇe vṛkṣaśabdasya yorthastasya grahaṇebhyupagamyamāne  dvayaṃvṛkṣāvṛkṣagrahaṇamanyonyāśrayaṃ  tathā hyavṛkṣārthavyavacchedena vṛkṣārthagrahaṇe satyavṛkṣagrahaṇapūrvakaṃ vṛkṣagrahaṇamaṃgīkṛtaṃ  agṛhītasyāvṛkṣasya vyavacchetumaśakyatvāt  avṛkṣasyāpi grahaṇaṃ vṛkṣārthavyavacchedeneti tatrāpi vṛkṣagrahaṇapūrvakamavṛkṣagrahaṇamāpatitaṃ vṛkṣamagṛhītvā tadvayavacchedenāvṛkṣārthasya vyasthāpayitumaśakyatvāt  evaṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣayormadhye ekasya vṛkṣasyāvṛkṣasya vā grahābhāve dvayāgrahaḥ yataśca dvayorapyagrahastasmāt kāraṇādanyavyavacchinnerthe śabdasya yaḥ saṃketauktastasyāsambhava iti kecidācakṣate  tathā cāho dyo taka raḥ  sa yāvaccāgānta pratipadya te tāvadagavi pratipattirna yuktā  yāvacca gānna pratipadyate tāvadgavītyubhayapratipattyabhāva iti etamevārtha mbha ṭṭo pyāha siddhaścāgaurapohyeta goniṣedhātmakaśca saḥ tatra gaureva vaktavyonanyo yaḥ pratiṣidhyate sa cedagonivṛttyātmā bhavedanyonyasaṃśrayaḥ siddhaśced gaurapohyārthaṃ vṛthāpohapravarttanaṃ gavyasiddhe tvagaurnāsti tadabhāvepi gauḥ kuta iti tasmād vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyameṣṭavyaṃ  tatra vidhirūpeṇaiva saṃketa iti te manyante and the sun ispramāṇavārttikasvavṛttiṭīkā śravijñātavṛkṣeṇa tadvyavacchedarūpasya pravṛkṣa sya apibuddhāvanārūḍherthe saṃketo na samartha iti ye  codayantiteṣāmavṛkṣāssaṃkete vyavacchinnā na vā yadi  praparijñānāccaatha vyavacchinnāḥ kathaṃ jñātāḥ prāg vṛkṣagrahaṇādṛte na hi tadā pratipattā vṛkṣamapi na vetti pravṛkṣa mapi na vetti tajjñānāyaiva tadarthitayā upagamāt  sa ca tadajānānaḥ kathaṃ saṃketevṛkṣavyayadītyādinā vyācaṣṭe  tasyetyavṛkṣabhedalakṣaṇasya vṛkṣasya  evantāvanna vṛkṣasyagrahaṇaṃ nāpyavṛkṣasyetyāha  avijñātetyādi  avijñāto vṛkṣo yasya puṃsastenatadvaghavacchevarūpasyeti vṛkṣavyavacchedarūpasya buddhāvanārūḍhartha iti  yadi vṛkṣāvṛkṣaubuddhāvārūḍhau syātāṃ tadāvṛkṣaparihāreṇa vṛkṣe saṃketaḥ syāt  anārūḍhe ca vṛkṣevṛkṣecārthe kathaṃ saṃketaḥ teṣāmityādinā parasyāpyayandoṣastulya ityāha  tataśca yastasya parihāromamāpi sa eveti bhāvaḥ     ya ekamityādinā vyācaṣṭe  anyavyavacchedena saṃkete kriyamāṇe ye vādinaekamvastu sāmānyamabhyugamyetaretarāśraya doṣaṃ codayanti  teṣāntatrāpi vastubhūte sāmānye vṛkṣatvalakṣaṇe saṃkete kriyamāṇe dvayī kalpanā avṛkṣā vyavacchinnāna veti  yadi vyavacchinnāstadā te jñātā aṅgīkartavyā  ajñātānāṃ vyavacchedābhāvāt tacca jñānanteṣu na yujyate  tadāha  kathamityādi  kathaṃ jñātā vṛkṣārthagrahaṇād ṛte b ityetāvān kārikābhāgaḥ  prākchabdastu miśrakavyākhyānenopāttaḥ  vṛkṣārthagrahagamvinā prāg vṛkṣārthagrahaṇādavṛkṣāḥ  kathaṃ jñātā ityarthaḥ  ye tu prākśabdaṃkā rikāyāṃ paṭhanti tairarthaśabdo na paṭhitavyaḥ  na hyavṛkṣaniścayakāle vṛkṣārthagrahaṇamastyavṛkṣagrahaṇapūrvakatvāt vṛkṣagrahaṇasya    na ca vṛkṣaniścayamantareṇa vṛkṣāthaṃgraho yuktastasyāpi vṛkṣagrahaṇapūrvakṛtvāt  etadevāha  na hotyādi  tadeti saṃketakāle pratipattā  yasmai saṃketaḥ kriyate  kasmānna vettītyāha  tadityādi tasya vṛkṣāvṛkṣasya jñānāyaiva tadarthitayā saṃketārthitayopagamādupasthitatvāt  kathaṃnāma saṃketottarakālaṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣau jñāsyāmīti  yadvā tadathitayopagamāditi saṃketāthitayā pravṛteḥ  ato nāsti saṃketakāle vṛkṣāvṛkṣajñānaṃ pratipattuḥ  sa ca vṛkṣāvṛkṣa sāmānyacintāvacchedaṃ pratipadyeta  prapratipattau ca parihṛtatadanya niveśaśabdāt anirākaraṇe teṣāṃ saṅkete vyavahāriṇām   na syāt tatparihāreṇa pravṛttivṛkṣabhedavat na hi saṃketakālaḥ parārthavyavacchedena niveśitācchandāt vyavahārakāleśravṛkṣaparihāreṇa pravṛttirna yuktā śiśapādibhedavat  śratha avidhāya niṣidhyānyat pradaśyaikaṃ puraḥ sthitam   majānānaḥ kathamavṛkṣavyavacchedaṃ pratipadyeta saṃkete  naiva pratipadyeta  avṛkṣavyavacchedāpratipattau ca satyāmaparihṛto na vyavacchinnastadanyastasmād vṛkṣādanyo yasminvṛkṣārthe so parihṛtatadanyastasminniveśassaṃketaḥ  saptamīti yogavibhāgātsamāsaḥ  sa yasmin śabdestīti matvarthīya iti  aparihṛtatadanyannirdeṣṭuṃśīlamasyeti ṇinirvā avṛkṣādavyavacchinnerthe saṃpramugdharūpe saṃketitāditiyāśvat aparaḥ prakāraḥ  vṛkṣādanyastadanyastasminniveśaḥ saṃketaḥ  aparihṛtaścāsautadanyaniveśaśceti karmadhārayaḥ  sa yasyāsti vṛkṣaśabdasyeti pūrvavat  avṛkṣādavyavacchinnatvād vṛkṣārthasya  tatra saṃketyamānasya śabdasyāvṛkṣepi niveśa prasaktaḥ vṛkṣabhedeṣviveti samudāyārtha   tasmādevaṃbhūtād vṛkṣaśabdād vyavahāriṇāṃ puṃsāṃ vyavahārakā le tatparihāreṇāvṛkṣaparihāreṇa niyate śākhādimati pravṛttirna syāt  kintvaviśeṣeṇa vṛkṣāvṛkṣayoḥpravṛttirbhavet  kimvat  vṛkṣabhedavat  na hi vṛkṣaśabdāt prakaraṇādirahitādvṛkṣaviśeṣe khadirādau tadanyavṛkṣaparihāreṇa pravṛttirbhavati  saṃketakāle teṣāmavyavacchedāt na hotyādinā vyācaṣṭe  saṃketakāla saṃketaśabdenokta  parārthavyavacchedenetiparasmādavṛkṣād vṛkṣād vṛkṣārthasyāvyavacchedena  dvitīye tu vyākhyāne parasminnavṛkṣe vṛkṣaśabdasya saṃketāvyavacchedeneti vyākhyeyaṃ  niveśitāditisaṃketitāt  tatparihāreṇāvṛkṣaparihāreṇa vṛkṣavadityasya vyākhyānaṃ śiśapādibhevavaditi  śiśapādaya eva bhedā iti viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ vatiḥ saptamyarthe sūtretu vṛkṣabhedā iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ  śiśapādayo hi bhedā vṛkṣasya bhedā bhavantītyanurūpaivavṛttiḥ teṣu ca yathā vṛkṣaśabdānna parasparavyavacchedena pravṛttistathā sūtravibhāgaeva vyākhyātaṃ arthatyādinā parābhiprāyamāśaṃkate  avidhāyāniṣidhyānyaditi pratiṣedhadvayaṃamientas yra ak jevṛkṣoyamiti saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ tat pratipadyate vyavahārepi tenāyamadoṣa iti cet na hi vastusāmānyavādinā kiṃcid vidhīyate  śratha kiñcit puraḥsthitaṃvastvekaṃ pradayaṃ vṛkṣoyamiti saṃketaḥ kriyate tena saṃketakāle tathādṛṣṭamevārthaṃ tatsaṃvandhinaṃ vā vyavahārakālepi pratipadyata iti tulyaḥ prasaṃga syāditicet  na hi tulyaḥ  evaṃ tatrāpi taruḥ  meveti prasaṃgo na nivattate ekaṃ pradayaṃ ayamapi vṛkṣoyameva vṛkṣa iti vādyapi śrayamapīti vāayameveti prakāradvayena tayośca sa eva doṣaḥ  dṛṣṭa viparītasya sujñākecit paṭhanti saṃkete viṣayamabhighāyātonyaccāniṣidhyeti taccāyuktamivadṛśyate vidhipratiṣedhau muktvā śabdapravṛttyasambhavāt  ekasya hi pradarśanamabhidadhatāvidheraṅgīkṛtaḥ  tataścāvidhāya pradarśyatipadadvayaṃ vyāhataṃ syāt  tasmādavidhāyetyatraivanaññ draṣṭavyaḥ  avidhāya niṣidhyānyaditi pāṭhaḥ  niṣidhyānyat pūrvantadvayavacchedenāparaṃ saṃketavi ṣayamavidhāya pratiṣedhapūrvakaṃ vidhimakṛtvā vidhimātrameva kevalaṃkṛtvetyarthaḥ ata  eva pradaśyakamiti vṛttāvapi na kasyacid vyavacchedena kiṃcidvidhīyata ityanyaniṣedhapūrvakameva vidhānaṃ pratiṣedhati  kevalastu vidhiraṃgīkṛtaeva  ekamiti sāmānyaṃ  etena sāmānye saṃketakaraṇāt sarvavyaktiṣu kṛta ityācaṣṭe vṛkṣoyamiti saṃketasvarūpandarśayati  yadvastu pradarśya saṃketaḥ kṛtastat pratipadyatevyavahārepi  tena kāraṇenāyamanantarokto vastusāmānyavādinodoṣaḥ  tathādṛṣṭamevārthamiti sāmānyaṃ yatra saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ  tatsambandhinaṃ veti sāmānyasambandhinamāśrayaṃ  tatrāpīti vidhinā kevalenāpi saṃkete kriyamāṇe dvau vikalpa vṛkṣoyamitisaṃketaṃ kurvāṇaḥ tarurayamapīti vidadhīta  tarurayameveti vā  ādye pakṣe tarutvamanyasyāpyaniṣiddhamiti vyavahāre niyamena pravṛttirna syāditi sa eva prasaṅgaḥ athatarurayameveti tadā sa evātaruravyavacchedoṅgīkṛtaḥ  tataśca saṃketakāle pratipadyamānenakathaṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣau jñātāviti tadavasthaḥ prasaṅgaḥ  tadāha  prasaṃgo na nivarttata iti ekamityādinā vyācaṣṭe  ayamapi vṛkṣoyameva vṛkṣa iti  gatimitiprakāraṃ  tayośceti dvayorapi prakārayoḥ  na doṣa ityādi paraḥ  dṛṣṭopaṭākāronubhūtastadviparītasya tato vilakṣaṇasya sujñānatvāt  sāmānyacintānatvādadoṣaḥ  ekaṃ hi kiṃcid paśyatonyatra tadākāravivekina buddhimanubhavataḥyathānubhavaṃ tatonyo vaidharmyaniścayaḥ  tad vivecane tataḥ sa śrayameva vṛkṣa itipradarśya vyutpāditaḥ  yatraiva taṃ na paśyati tamevāvṛkṣaṃ svayaṃ pratipadyate nevaṃ saṃbhavati vyavacchedavāde  ekatra dṛṣṭasya  rūpasya kvaciv ananvayāt dṛṣṭapratipattau anyasminna syāt tathā pratītiriti cet evaṃ tarhi tatrāpi tulyametad  yasmādetadeva grahaṇakavākya mekaṃ hotyādinā vyāṃcaṣṭe  ekaṃ hi kiṃcit sāmānyaṃvṛkṣatvādikampaśyatonyatra tatsāmānyarahite vilakṣaṇe vastuni tadākāravivekinīṃyathā paridṛṣṭākāravilakṣaṇākārāmbuddhimanubhavataḥ puṃso yathānubhavantato yathā paridṛṣṭādanyadityevaṃrūpo vaidharmyaniścayo vailakṣaṇyaniścayaḥ etena vaidharmyaniścayasya svabhāva uktaḥ     tadvivecana iti vyāpāra  pūrvadṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthavivecana pṛthagbhāvasya vyavasthāpayati  tatonyadityanenaiva tadvivecane siddhe yatpunastadvivecanagrahaṇantatspaṣṭārthaṃ tatraitasmin krame sati yathānubhavavaidharmyaniścayavān sa pratipattā  yaṃ śākhādimantamarthaṃmviśiṣṭasāmānyavantamākārāntarād vivecayati  taṃ purodhāyāyamevavṛkṣa iti pradarśya vyutpāditaḥ saṃketaṃ grāhito  yatraiva taṃ saṃketānurūpaṃ sāmānyātmānannapaśyati  tamevāvṛkṣaṃ svayameva śabdavyāpāramvinā pratipadyate  tadevamākārānta brāt svayameva vivekenāvadhāritaṃ sāmānyātmānamupādāya saṃkete kṛte sarvāsu sajātīyavyaktiṣu kṛto bhavati  sāmānyasya sarvatrānvayāt  ayameveti cāvadhāraṇāt saṃketekṛte dṛṣṭaviparītasya sujñānatvāt  tatonyatrāvṛkṣa iti niścayo bhavatīti nayathoktadoṣaḥ anyāpohavādinopye vamiti cedāha  nedamityādi  ekatra saṃketakāle dṛṣṭasyāsādhāraṇasya rūpasya kvacid vyaktyantarenanvayādananugamāt  tataśca saṃketakāle yo vṛkṣa ityevaṃ gṛhīto bhedastasyānyatra darśanannāsti  tatra saṃketakāle dṛṣṭepaścād dṛśyamāne ca svalakṣaṇe yad bhinnapratibhāsi darśanamutpannantena hetunā  vṛkṣāvṛkṣayoḥ pratipattau kriyamāṇāyāṃ vyaktyantare pyanyasmin vṛkṣabhedepi na syāttathā vṛkṣaiti pratītiḥ  tathā hi yo vṛkṣabhedaḥ saṃketakāle kathayan arthāntaravyavacchedamākṣipaleva varttate  ekagatabhedacodanāyā hi tadanyavyāvṛttināntarīyakatvāt sa eva bhedaḥ tadvyāvṛtyā gato bhāgaḥ  tadgateḥ tadupādhitvāt  sa viśiṣṭotattyaktvā niveśyata nāgena kathamityāha  arthāntaravyāvṛttyā tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāgo gamyata iti  tathāśabdorthāntaranivṛttiviśiṣṭāneva bhāvānāhetyādinā  ādigrahaṇācchabdārthāntarāpohaṃ kurvatī śrutirabhidhatta ityādi parigrahaḥ sa hotyādyasyaiva samarthanaṃ  sa hi vṛkṣaśabdastambhedamavṛkṣavyāvṛttaṃ svabhāvaṃ kathayannārthāntarasyāvṛkṣārthasya vyavacchedamākṣipanneva varttate  kiṃ kāraṇam  ekagatabhedasyetyādi  yathā hi vṛkṣabhedā eva khadirādayaḥ svabhāvenaivāvṛkṣebhyo bhinnā evamavṛkṣā api vṛkṣebhyaḥ bhedasya dviṣṭhatvāt  tatra vṛkṣaśabdenaikagatasya vṛkṣārthagatasyabhedasya bhinnasya svabhāvasyaikākārapratibhāsino yā codanā tasyāstadanyavyāvṛttināntarīyakatvāt  tasmād vṛkṣārthādanyasyāvṛkṣasya yā vyāvṛttistannāntarīyakatvāt  evaṃ hyavṛkṣād vyāvṛttarūpo vṛkṣārthobhihitaḥ syād yadyavṛkṣārthasyatatra nivṛttirgamyeta  sa evānyasmād bhidyamānasya vikalpabuddhipratibhāsī bhedobhinna svabhāvaḥ  tadvayāvṛttyārthāntaravyāvṛttyā yathoktanyāyenārthād gamyamā anayā  gato ca buddho bhāgo vastuna ityukta ityadhyāhāraḥ  vyāvṛttavastudarśanadvārāyātatvād vasturūpatvenādhyavasāyācca vastubhāgo gata ityucyata ityabhiprāyaḥ etaduktambhavati  atatparāmarśajananebhyo vyāvṛttarūpantatparāmarśajananeṣvāropitaikatvaṃ vikalpabuddhipratibhāsanamevākāramavibhaktabāhyādhyātmikabhedaṃ śabdapratipādayati śābde jñāne tasyaiva pratibhāsanāt  tañca pratipādayannanyavyāvṛttimaryādākṣipati  atonenābhiprāyeṇoktamā cā rye ṇānyavyāvṛttyā gamyate tasyavastunaḥ kaścid bhāga iti  na punaranyavyāvṛttyā śabdārthabhūtayā viśeṣaṇarūpayābāhyasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāgo gṛhyatenyavyā vṛtterevābhāvāditi  evantāvadanyavyāvṛttyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāga ityetatsamarthitaṃ adhunā śabdārthāntaranivṛttiviśiṣṭāneva bhāvānāhetyetatsamarthayannāha  tadgaterityādi  tadgateranyanivṛttigatestadupādhitvādasti bhedopādhitvāt  sa evagata ityarthe kasmiṃścid nārthāntaravyāvṛttiḥ yayā viśiṣṭā ye śabdaścodyantedaṇḍivat nimittabhūtā  bhidyamānayordvayorbhedasya ubhayagatatvāt ekagatabhedādhānepi nāntarīyakastadanyākṣepo bhavati tasmāt na tayoviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ  ekabhedābhidhānepi anyavyāvṛttigatiḥ  anvayavyatirekacodanayābhedastadviśiṣṭo gata ityucyate  ācārye ṇeti yadvā  tasya yathoktasya vastubhedasya śabdād gateḥ pratipatteḥ sāvadhāraṇatvenatadupā dhitvāt  sā tadanyanivṛttirupādhirarthākṣepād yasyāstadgateḥ sā tathoktā tadanyanivṛttināntarīyakatvameva tadupādhitvaṃ etaduktambhavati  yārthāntaravyāvṛttirarthād gamyate tannāntarīyakatvātsa evabhedaḥ śabdād gamyamānonyavyāvṛttyā viśiṣṭo gata ityucyata ācāryeṇeti nanvarthāntaravyāvṛttiḥ śabdapravṛttinimittabhūtā  yayā viśiṣṭā bāhyā arthāgavādiśabdaścodyante apratīte  daṇḍivaditi vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ  yathā daṇḍadvāreṇatadvān daṇḍītyucyate  naivaṃ vyāvṛttidvāreṇa vyāvṛttimāniti  kasmād vyāvṛttirarthāntarabhūtā netyāha  dvayorhotyādi  yasmād dvayovṛkṣāvṛkṣayoḥ parasparambhidyamānayoryo bhedastasyobhayagatatvāt  vṛkṣāvṛkṣagatatvād vṛkṣāvṛkṣabhinnasvabhāvatvādityarthaḥ  tenaikagatabhedābhidhānepi  avṛkṣāpekṣayā vṛkṣagato yo bhedaḥ  bhinnaḥsvabhāvastasya śabdenābhidhānepi nāntarīyakastadanyākṣepo bhavati  avṛkṣāpekṣayāvṛkṣagatasya bhedasyāvṛkṣanivṛttilakṣaṇasya vṛkṣāpakṣayāpyavṛkṣagatasya vṛkṣanivṛttilakṣaṇasyākṣepo bhavati  itiśabdo hetau  asmāddhetostadupādhitvāt tadviśiṣṭo gataityuktamityadhyāhāraḥ  na tayorityekagatasya bhedasya tadanyavyāvṛtteśca naviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ kaḥ punarayamekagato bhedaḥ kā ca tadanyavyāvṛttiryenānyavyāvṛttināntarīyakasyaikagatabhedasya śabdāt pratyayo bhavatīti cet ucyate vṛkṣaśabdavācyastāvad vikalpabuddhipratibhāsī śākhādimadākāraḥ sarvab vṛkṣeṣvabhinnarūpa ivātadrūpebhyo bhinna iva bhā samāna eva gato bhedo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaityarthaḥ  evaṃ ghaṭādiśabdavācyopyekagato bhedo draṣṭavyaḥ  tambhedaṃ ca pratipādayanśabdo vijātīyanivṛtti prasajyapratiṣedhalakṣaṇāmarthād gamayati sā tadanyavyāvṛttiḥ nanu yadyanyavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭo vastubhāgo na gamyate kimarthantarhyanyavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭa ityādhuktamityāha  ekabhedābhidhāna ityādi  yaścāyaṃ yathā vibhaktaekaga to bhedaḥ sa eva śabdena codyate  tatpratītirevānvayagatiḥ  yā tvarthād sāmānyacintāvyavahārāṅgatāṃ śabdānāṃ darśayan tadvyāvṛttyā gamyate   ityatopi vyatirekauktaḥ  ata eva śabde tadanyavyāvṛttiḥ svārthābhidhānaṃ ca na vyāpāradvayam svārthasyābhidhānādeva tadanyavyāvṛttigatiḥ svārthasya bhedarūpatvāt  na hyanvayovyāvṛttimato nāpyananvayino vyāvṛttiḥ  ekānvayasya parihāryābhāve tathaika banyavyāvṛttigatiḥ sā vyatirekagatiḥ  evamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śabdorthavānbhavati  tenānvayavyatirekacodanayānvayasya sākṣādarthāttu vyatirekasya codanādraṣṭavyā  tayā codanayā vyavahārāṅgatāṃ śabdānāṃ darśayannācārya diṅa nā ga āhatadvayāvṛttyā gamyate vastubhāga iti  tathā tadviśiṣṭo vetyāha  vyāvṛttiśabdenavyatireka uktaḥ  vastubhāgaśabdenānvayaḥ  anenaitadapi vyākhyātaṃ śabdāntarāpohaṃkurvantī śrutiḥ svārthamabhidhatta ityarthaḥ  tatra yosāvekagato bhedo vikalpabuddhipratibhāsīvyākhyātaḥ sa eva svārthastatrārthāntaravyāvṛttirarthāntarāpohaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhalakṣaṇastaṃkurvatītyarthād gamayantītyarthaḥ yadi cānyanivṛttipurassaraiva vṛkṣādiśabdapravṛtti stadānvayavyatirekacodanayetyādivyākhyānaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt tasmādvidhireva śabdārthaḥ yata evaikabhedābhidhānerthādanyavyāvṛttigatirata evetyādi  svārthasya bhedarūpa tvāditi  yo vṛkṣaśabdasyārtha śākhādimadākāra  vikalpapratibhāsī sa bhedarūpaḥ bhinnasvabhāvobhedākāravyāvṛttatvāt svayaṃ  aḍho bhedarūpasya svārthasyābhidhānābevārthādanyavyāvṛtti gatirevaṃ hyavṛkṣād bhedarūpasyaiva vṛkṣārthasya gatirbhavet yadyarthāt tatra vṛkṣanivṛttirbhavatīti  tasmāt svārthābhidhānameva śabdasyavyāpāronyavyāvarttanantvarthāditi na śabdasya vyāpāradvayaṃ nanu vidhāyakena vākyenānvayamātrampratipādyate nānyasya vidhānaṃ pratiṣedho vā niṣedhakenāpi niṣedhamātrameva kevalaṃ pratīyate nānyasya vidhānaṃ pratiṣedho vetyata āha na hyanvaya ityādi  pratiniyatasyārthasya vidhānamanvayo yathā vṛkṣaṃcchindhīti tatrāvṛkṣasyārthānnivṛttirvyatirekaḥ  sa yatra na vidyate sovyatireka evaṃ bhūtonvayona me sti  kintu sarva eva sa vyatirekaḥ tena yaducyate bhaṭṭo dyotakarābhyāṃ   vidhirūpaśca śabdārtho yena nābhyupagamyate na bhaved vyatirekopi tasya tatpūrvako hyasāvitiSlokavārtikaparihārasyāpikvacit sthityabhāve niṣphalacodanatvāt sa cāyaṃ bhedorūpaḥ  rūpavatvena kevalaṃ darśanaṃ buddhiviplavaḥ nirastamiṣṭatvāt  ananvayo vānvayarahito vā vyatireko na hīti sambandhaḥ tatra viśeṣasya pratiṣedho vyatirekaḥ  tatrārthāccheṣagatiranvayaḥ  ekānvaya ityādinaitadeva samarthyate  ekānvayasyetyekasya vidhānasya parihāryābhāve vyavacchedyābhāveniṣphalacodanatvāt yadi vṛkṣañchindhītyukterthādavṛkṣasya na tatra vyavacchedastadā vṛkṣaśabdaprayogoa niṣphala syāt  yadvā kimvṛkṣañchinami utānyamiti śroturjijñāsāyāṃ satyāṃvṛkṣañchindhītyuktenyaniṣedhaḥ pratīyata evānyathā parihāryābhāve niṣphalamabhidhānaṃsyāt  tathā yadāpyākāṃkṣārahitaḥ śrotā vṛkṣañchindhīti śabdena codyate tadāpi vṛkṣaeva pravarttate nānyatra  vaktā hi vṛkṣa evāyaṃ pravarttate nānyatretyanenābhiprāyeṇaśabdaṃ prayukte  vivakṣānugamanaṃ ca dhvaneḥ  tasmānnāsti vyatirekarahitonvayastathaṃkaparihārasyetyekapratiṣedhasya pratiṣedhasyaivaikasyetyarthaḥ  kvaciditi pratiṣedhena viṣayīkṛtevastuni sthityabhāve niṣphalacodanatvāt  tathā hi surāviṣayasya pānasya pratiṣedhe yadi surāyā anyatrāpi pānasya nāvasthānaṃ syāt  tadā sarvasmin viṣaye niṣiddhasyapānasya viśeṣe pratiṣedhonarthakaḥ  tatra surā  peyeti surāpānamātrasya pratiṣedhe caritārthatvād vākyasya yadyapyudakādipānaṃ śabdena na vidhīyate  tathāpi surāyā anyatrapānasyāvasthānanna nivāryata ityarthādanvayagatiranyathā surāgrahaṇamanarthakaṃ syāt  yadvākimudakādivat surā pātavyā kimvā neti praśne surā na pātavyetyukte suraivetipratīternodakādipānavidhānaṃ prakṛtaniṣedhyate  tena sarvatra vidhi pratiṣedharūpasyaiva śabdārthatvaṃ katarhi vidhipratiṣedhaparyudāsavākyānāmbhedaḥ  mahānbhedaḥ  vidhāyakaṃ hivākyavidhi prādhānyenābhidhāyānyaniṣedhakamarthāt  niṣedhakaṃ ca niṣedhaṃ prādhānye nābhidhāyārthādanyavidhānamāha  paryudāsapratipādakantu vākyaṃ pratiṣedhapūrvakamanyavidhānaṃprādhānyenāhetyastyeva viśeṣa iti nanu yadyanyanivṛttirarthāt pratīyate saiva tarhi pāramārthikī bhāvānāmastiyayā viśiṣṭā gṛhyanta ityevaṃ kasmānneṣyate  kiṃ punarevantadgatestadupādhitvāttadviśiṣṭo gata iti vyākhyāyata ityata āha  sa cāyamityādi    yo bhedovyāvṛttilakṣaṇa ācārya diṅa nāgena viśeṣaṇatvaṃnābhimataḥ sa cāyamarūpo niḥsva sāmānyacintātenaivāparamārthosāvanyathā na hi vastunaḥ vyāvṛttirvastu bhavati bhedosyāsmāditīraṇāt rūpaṃ hi paramārthaḥ sa bhedo yadi rūpaṃ syāt tadrūpaṃ pratadrūpaṃ vā  tādrūpyanānyastato bhidyate  na ca tasya rūpaṃ anyasya syāt bhāvaḥ  nāsya vyatiriktamavyatiriktamvā rūpamastīti kṛtvā  kathantarhi bhāvānāṃvijātīyād bheda iti pratītiriti cedāha  rūpavattvena bhāvasambandhitvena tasyabhedasya kevalandarśanampratītiviplavo bhrāntiḥ  kevalamiti tathābhūtabāhyanirapekṣaṃ    kā rikā yā mapyevaṃ vyākhyānaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ nanu yadi rūpavattvena darśanaṃ kathaṃ buddhiviplava ityata āha  tenavetyādi rūpavatvena bhāvasambandhitvena yaddarśanambhedasya tenaivāparamārtho na vastubhūtosattvāt  asāviti bhedaḥ prasajyarūpaḥ  anyathetyevamaniṣyamāṇe  na hi vastunaḥsvalakṣaṇasya sambandhinī vyāvṛttirvastu bhavati  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ    bhedosyāsmāditoraṇāt etaduktambhavati  yadi hi sā vastubhūtā syāt tadā vṛkṣebhyovṛkṣavyāvṛttirabhinnā bhinnā vā syāt  yadyabhinnā  asmādavṛkṣād vṛkṣasya bheda iti vyatireka  bpratītirna syāt  palāśāccaikasmādavṛkṣavyāvṛtterabhinnatvāt  dhavādīnāmavṛkṣavyāvṛttirna syāt  palāśavat tatsvabhāvāyā vyāvṛttesteṣvananugamāt  athapalāśād bhinnā sā  tatrāpyavṛkṣavyāvṛtteḥ sakāśāt palāśasya vyāvṛttiḥ syādavṛkṣavyāvṛtteśca vyāvarttamānasya palāśasyāvṛkṣarūpatā syādavṛkṣavat  tataścāsmādavṛkṣādasya vṛkṣasya bheda iti pratītirna syādiṣyate ca  tasmāttadvyāvṛttirna vastu bhedosyāsmāditīraṇāduccāraṇādityarthaḥ  upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat pratīterapi grahaṇaṃ rūpaṃ hotyādinā vyācaṣṭe  hi yasmāt  rūpaṃ kimucyate paramārthaḥ  vastusvabhāvaḥ  bhedonyavyāvṛttiyaṃdi rūpaṃ syād yadi svabhāvo bhavet  tadityavṛkṣādvyāvṛttirūpaṃ  tadrūpamiti yattadvayāvṛttaṃ palāśasvalakṣaṇaṃ tadātmakaṃ  atadrūpaṃ vetitatonyadityarthaḥ  vastunastattvānyattvānatikramādityarthaḥ tādūpya ityādinā prathamapakṣe doṣamāha  tādrūpye palāśādanyattve yayā vyāvṛttyāsāmānyabhūtayā sarve vṛkṣabhedāḥ vyāvṛttā dṛṣṭāstasyāstādūpye palāśādananyatvebhyupagamyamāne tadeva palāśasvalakṣaṇameva vyāvṛttiriti kṛtvā palāśa evāvṛkṣād bhinnaḥprāpnoti nānyo dhavādiḥ  tata ityavṛkṣād bhidyeta  kikāraṇamityāha  na hītyādi  avṛkṣāddhi vyāvṛttiḥ palāśasyaiva rūpaṃ  na ca tasya rūpa manyasya dhavādeḥna tadeva bhedasya rūpaṃ cet  anyadeva rūpaṃ syāt  tataśca bhāvastasmādvyāvartteta  tataḥ tasya bhedo na syāt  yo yadbhedāda vyāvarttate tat tadeva bhavatoti sosya bheda iti ca na syāt  na hyanyonyasya bhedo bhavati sambandhī sati vā sambandhitve kāryakāraṇabhāvāt tajjanitaṃ rūpaṃ bheda iti śraviśeṣātsvakāraṇānāṃ kāryāṇi sarvāṇi vyāvṛttayaḥ syuḥ  bhedasyārthāntaratve ca tatopyasyabhedostīti bhedopādhitvāt dravyāntaravat na bhedaḥ syāt syāt na tadevetyādinā dvitīyapakṣopanyāsaḥ  na tadeva palāśasvalakṣaṇameva tasyabhedasya rūpaṃ    rūpaṃ ca svabhāvaścāsau bheda iṣyate  tatonyadeva palāśād vyāvṛttirūpaṃ syāt  yadvā rūpaṃ cānyadeva bhedasya syāt  tataścānyattvāt kāraṇāt bhāvaḥ palāśātmakastasmādavṛkṣavyāvṛttirūpād vyāvartteta  tataḥ kāraṇāt ūṣmādityavṛkṣāt tasya palāśasya bheda iti na syāt  yasmād yat khalu vastu yato bhedo yadbhedastasmād vyāvarttate  tattadeva bhavati  avṛkṣavyāvṛtterbhavati avṛkṣavyāvṛtteravṛkṣanivṛttirūpāyā nivarttamānampalāśasvalakṣaṇamavṛkṣamiva syādavṛkṣavat  mā vā bhūd vṛkṣāvṛkṣayorekatvantathāpi sosya bheda iti ca na syāt yadi cāyamavṛkṣād bhedaḥ palāśādanyaḥ syāttadayama vṛkṣād bhedosya palāśasyasambandhīti na syāt  na hotyādyasyeva samarthanaṃ  anyaḥ svatantronyasya sambandhībhedo dharmarūpo bhavati  sati veti sambandhitvebhyupagamyamāne vā  sambandha kāryakāraṇabhāvoṅgīkarttavyaḥ  bhinnayoḥ kāryakāraṇamantareṇa sambandhāyogāt  tatravyāvṛttimān kāraṇaṃ vyāvṛttiḥ kāryaṃ  iti heto rūpaṃ vastvantarameva tajjanitantenavyāvṛttimatā svalakṣaṇena janitaṃ bheda iti  pādā   padā rthāntarasya nāma kṛtantasmāt kāryatvenābhimatād bhedākhyāt padārthādaviśeṣādanyatrāpi kāraṇānāṃ yānikāryāṇi tāni sarvāṇi vyāvṛttayo bhedāḥ syuḥ  na caivaṃ  tadānyatrāpi bhedābhimatebheda iti vyapadeśo mā bhūt atha kāryaṃ bheda iti nocyate kintu bhedaḥ kārya ityucyate  tadāpyāha  arthāntaratve ca bhedasyābhyupagamyamāne  tatopi vyāvṛttimatopyasya bhedasya bhedosti anyathā bhedasyārthāntaratvameva na syāt  tataśca palāśasyāvṛkṣād yo bhedastasyabhedasya palāśād bheda iti kṛtvā sa bhedo bhedopādhiḥ sa palāśād bhedaḥ upādhi viśeṣaṇaṃ yasya bhedasya sa bhedopādhistadbhāvastattvantasmādasāvavṛkṣādbhedaḥ palāśasya na bhedaḥ syāt  dravyāntaravat  yathā hi dravyāntaraṃ ghaṭādika sāmānyacintāna hi bhedopādhivadeva bhedaḥ śrayamata iti viśeṣanirdeśāt  tataścopādhyabhāve bhedasyaivābhāvaḥ syāt  tato nānyattvam  nāpyanyathābhāvāt bhāvemapyaghaṭāpekṣayā yo bhedastadupādhitvānna palāśasya bhedastadvat  svatantratvādityabhiprāyaḥ nanu yadi nāma bhedopādhirbhedastathāpi kimiti palāśasya bhedo na bhavatītyataāha  na hītyādi  ayamata iti viśeṣanirdeśāt  ayamavṛkṣād bhedaḥ  ata ityavṛkṣāt  asyetyetadapekṣaṇīyaṃ  asya  palāśasyāyaṃ bhedosmādavṛkṣādityevaṃ viśeṣanirdeśāt pāratantryeṇa nirdeśāt palāśasya sambandhī bhedo dharmaḥ sidhyati  pāratantryeṇa ca nirdeśo bhedasyābhede sati sidhyati bhedāntarapratikṣepeṇa  na tvarthāntaratvebhedasya  arthāntaratve hi bhedopādhitvād ghaṭavanna palāśasya bhedaḥ syāt  tataścāsmādasya bheda iti viśeṣanirdeśo na syāt  tadevaṃ vyatirekapakṣevṛkṣād bhedasyāpipalāśād yo bhedaḥ sopi rūpavāniti tasyāpi svāśrayād bhedena bhavitavyaṃ  tathāca sarvabhedānāṃ bhinnasvabhāvatayā bhedopādhitvena svayanna rūpabhedateti na kaścid bhedaḥsyāt etadevāha  tataścetyādi  upādhyabhāva iti vyāvṛttilakṣaṇasya dharmabhūtasyopādherabhāve sarvasya svabhāvāntaratvena dharmitvād bhedasyai vābhāvaḥ syāt tasya dharmirūpatvāt yopi manyate  yadi rūpavatī vyāvṛttiḥ syāt syāt tattvānyatvapakṣabhāvīdoṣo yāvatā nīrūpā sāsti tayā ca bhāvā viśiṣṭā gṛhyanta iti tadayuktaṃ tadgatāveva śabdebhyo gamyatenyanivarttanaṃ na tatra gamyate kaścidviśiṣṭaḥ kenacitpara    pra vā iti granthavirodhāt  nīrūpasya cāstitvavirodhācchaśaviṣāṇavat  nīrūpatvā deva ca na tasyāḥ pratyakṣaṃ grāhakaṃ nāpyanumānaṃ  sambandhābhāvāt nāpi niyatarūpānyathānupapattyā tatkalpanā sambandhābhāvādeva  svahetubhya evaca niyatarūpāṇāmutpannatvāditi sarvabhāvā svabhāvena vyāvṛttibhāgina ityatrāntarebhihitatvāt nāpi ca sāipratipannā viśeṣaṇambhavitumarhati  na hi daṇḍāpratītau daṇḍīti pratītirbhavati  nāpi sā kvacidāśritā nīrūpatvāt  na cāsambaddhamviśeṣaṇambhavati nāpyanyanivṛttigrahaṇapurassaraṃ vṛkṣādiṣu vṛkṣaśabda pravarttatepratītirityuktatvāt nivṛttenarūpatayāpratipannatvena saṃketasyāpravṛtteśca  kathaṃ śabdaviṣayatvantasmāparamārthaḥ  kathantahi abhinnasya vastunaḥ śabdena codane tasyaivānyato bhedātvyarthāni na syuriti cet  naiṣa doṣaḥ  yasmātekārthaśleṣaviccheda eko vyāpriyate dhvaniḥ liṅgaṃ vā tatra vicchinnaṃ vāhuyaṃ vastu na kiñcana yasyābhidhānato vastusāmarthyādakhile gatiḥ danubhavadvāreṇa vṛkṣoyaṃ nāvṛkṣa ityevaṃ niścaya utpadyate  tenānyanivṛttiḥ pratiṣedhasb vikalpena kalpitā  yathāsaṃketaṃ ca vṛkṣādau śabda pravarttamānorthādanyanivṛttimākṣiti  anyanivṛttivikalpamākṣipatītyarthaḥ  tenānyanivṛttyā viśiṣṭo  vastubhāgogamyata ityucyata iti yadi vyāvṛttayaḥ sāmānyabhūtā bahirvastutvena neṣyante  nāpi paraparikalpitaṃsāmānyamevaṃ sati bāhyamvastveva vācyamāpatitaṃ  tatra ca doṣa ityāha  kathantīti abhinnasya niraṃśasya vastunaḥ śabdena codane upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat liṃgena pratipādane tasyaivābhinnasya vastuna ekasmād bhinnasya punaranyatopi bhedāt  tathā hi yenasvabhāvena na śabdokṛtakād bhinnastenaiva mūrttānityatvācca  tasyānaṃśatvāt  anaṃśasyaca vastunaḥ kṛtakaśabdenaikasyākṛtakād bhedasya bhinnasya svabhāvasya codane  tathāliṃgena pratipādane sarva dagatessarvebhyo bhinnasya svabhāvasya pratipatteḥ  tatrānaṃśevastuni kathaṃ śabdapramāṇāntarāṇi vyarthāni na syuḥ  ekena śabdena codane śabdāntarāṇāṃvaiyarthyaṃ syāt  ekena liṅgena pratipādane pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ vaiyarthyaṃ syāt yasmādityādinā pariharati  tasmād yo yena dharmeṇa viśeṣaḥ saṃpratīyata ityādinā prāgevedaṃ codyamparihṛtamadhikavidhānārthantu punarupanyāsaḥ artheṣvākārāntarasamāropotheṃślaṣaḥ  sa ca pratipattibhedenānekaḥ  tatreti buddhipratibhāsini dharmiṇi bāhyabhinnatayākhyeyāste  bāhyatayādhyastasyaiva buddhayākārasyaśabdavācyatvāt na punarbāhyambuddhayākāro vā kevala śabdavācyaḥ svalakṣaṇatvāt tatra dharmiṇi vidhirūpatayā svārthapratipattidvāreṇaikārthaleṣa vicchedepanayana ekodhvanirvyāpriyate    liṅgaṃ caikārthaśleṣavicchede vyāpriyate  tatra svārthābhidhānadvāreṇa samāropavyavacchede śabdapramāṇāntarāṇāṃ sāphalyamiti yāvat  na punarjñānād vyatiriktambāhyamvastu svalakṣaṇaṃ  svalakṣaṇād vā vyatiriktambāhyamvastu sāmānyalakṣaṇasvācyaṃ kiñcanāsti  yasya vastunobhidhānatokhile vastusvabhāve gatirbhavet  sāmānyacintākurvannānāphala śabda ekādhāro bhavatyataḥ yathā bāhyāntarbhedasaṃsṛṣṭayā buddhayā svasyaiva kriyāyogyamadhyavasāyaśabdārtha upayujyataṃ iti pūrvoktavat  taistaṃbhrāntikāraṇaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭarūpa ivapratibhāsamāne yathāsaṃketa vyavacchedārthaṃ tatraiva te vyāpriyante  na hyekasādhyamapivyavacchedamanyaḥ karoti saṃketapratiniyamāt  naiva vicchinnaṃ kiñcid vastuprakṣipyate  yasyābhidhānāt vastubalena sarvathā gatiḥ syāt śabdānāṃ  buddhiviṣayatvāt tatra ca śravastuni vastusāmarthyābhāvāt  tathābhūtenāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ samyagvastusāmarthyād vastuvaśāt  yataśca śabda svābhidhānadvāreṇa vyavacchedaṃ karotitataḥ kāraṇāt taṃ taṃ vyavacchedaṃ kurvannānāphalaḥ śabdo bhavatyekādhāraśca  kathaṃ arthakriyāyogyamadhyavasāya  anarthakriyākāriṇāpi svābhāsamarthakriyākāritvenasvalakṣaṇarūpattvenādhyasyetyarthaḥ  tatraiveti buddhipratibhāse bāhya tayādhyaste  kiṃbhūte  ataistaṃrbhrāntikāraṇaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭarūpa iva bhāti   sadṛśāparotpattyādibhirbhrāntihetubhinityādyākāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭarūpa iva pratibhāsamāne  tenityādiśabdāḥ yathāsaṃketaṃ yasya yasya samāropasya vyavacchedārthaṃ svapratibhāse saṃketaḥ kutaḥ  tasya tasya pratiyogino vyavacchedāya vyāpriyante saṃketānurūpameva pratipādayannāha  na cetyādi  hyarthe caśabdaḥ  yato yathāsaṃketaṃvyāpārastato na hyekaśabdasādhyaṃ vyavacchedamanyaḥ śabdaḥ karoti  kiṅakāraṇaṃ  api cetyādi  tatkāryaparicodane ekakāryatāparicodanārthaṃ yadvaikakāryāṇāṃ paricodanārthaṃ  ekakāryeṣu bhedeṣvekasya bhāvarahiteṣvapi samā ekāśrutiḥ  kṛtā saṃketitā  vṛddhairvyavahārajñaiḥ samastā prapi tathākārā  kiñcit kāryaṃ teṣāṃtatra viśeṣābhāvāt prapārthikā viśeṣacodaneti sakṛt sarveṣāṃ niyojanārthaṃeṣāmabheda iti yāvat  etena tatkāryatāpītyādi kā ri kā bhāgo vyākhyātaḥ yathetyādinā cakṣurādau yathā rūpavijñānaikaphala ityādi vyācaṣṭe  śrātmendriya     tadrūpavijñānaṃ kāryaṃ yeṣāntāni tatkāryāṇi teṣāṃ sāmānyama viśeṣeṇaika kāryakaraṇasāmarthyantasya codanā prakāśanā  tasyāḥ sambhave sati    kena punaḥ prastāvenacodanāsambhava ityāha kuto rūpavijñānamityaviśeṣeṇa sāmagrīgate praśne satītyarthaḥvyavahāralāghavārthamekena śabdena bahūnāṃ pratipādanārthaṃ rūpavijñānasya hetuścakṣurādikalāpaḥ saraḥ śaro vetyevaṃ śrutiniveśayediti sambandhaḥ api nāmetyādinā vyavahāralāghavameva vyācaṣṭe  taddhetūnāṃ cakṣurvijñānahetūnāṃ  na cātreti cakṣurādau  yenānugāminā rūpeṇakaṃ cakṣuvijñānaṃ janayanti tathābhūtaṃ sāmānyañcakṣurādīnānnāsti  sattā vidyata iti cet  tasyāstahiṃsarvatrāviśeṣāt sarvatra cakṣurādivijñānaṃ syāt  na ca sambandhibhedāt sattāyā bhedonityatvenānādheyātiśayatvāt  kevalantadarthatayā rūpavijñānaikakāryatayā bhāvāścakṣurādayaḥ  pratadarthebhyo rūpavijñānājanakebhyo bhinnā iti kṛtvā bheda evātatkāryebhyovyāvṛttireva  eṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāmabheda sarveṣāmatatkāryavyāvṛttestulyatvāt yathācakṣurādīnāmabhedaḥ sarveṣāmatatkāryavyāvṛttestulyatvāt  yathā cakṣūrūpādiṣvekaṃsāmānyaṃ vināpyekakāryatvakhyāpanāyaikaḥ śabdo niveśyate  evaṃjātīyāḥ sarvaityādi  samūhasya santānasyāvasthāviśeṣasya ca vācakāḥ śabdā samūhasantānāvasthāviśeṣaśabdāḥ  tatra samūhābhidhāyinaṃ śabdamadhikṛtyāha  ye samastāityādi  ye rūparasagandhādayassamastāḥ kiñcidekamudakādyāharaṇādi kāryaṃ  teṣāṃrūpādīnāṃ  tatra kārye kāraṇatayā viśeṣābhāvāt  sarveṣāṃ hyekaṃ kāryamiti kṛtvātenaikakāryatvena viśeṣābhāva ucyate  na tu svalakṣaṇasyāviśeṣāt teṣāmekakāryakaraṇaśaktikhyāpanamātre karttavyepāthikā viśeṣacodanā  prati sāmānyacintāghaṭa ityekaṃ śabdaṃ teṣu prayuṃkte lokaḥ  tepi sajātīyādanyataśca bhedāviśeṣepitatprayojanāṅgatayā tadanyebhyo bhidyanta iti bhedāt tasmāt śraviśeṣeṇapratoyanta  tatra ghaṭasya rūpādaya ityapi ghaṭasvabhāvā rūpādayaḥ  udāharaṇa bviśeṣādikāryasamarthā iti  sāmānyakāryamānasādhane prasiddhanātmanā vā rūpādiśabda prasiddhā viśiṣṭakāryasādhanabhūtākhyaviśiṣṭāḥ te ca evamucyantesya na punaratra yathāvaṇitalakṣaṇaṃ dravyaṃ śranyad kiñcidapi  tasya tāvṛśasyārūpādibhinnena śabdena codanāniṣphaleti kṛtvā sakṛdekakālaṃ sarveṣāṃ kvacit kāryeniyojanārthaṃ rūpādiviśeṣeṣūdakadhāraṇādikāryasameṣu ghaṭa ityekaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṃkteyaṃ lokaiti vyavaharttā   nanu bhinnā evaṃ rūpādayaḥ kathamekasmād ghaṭaśabdād abhedena pratīyanta iticedāha  tepītyādi  sajātīyād rūpādanyataśca rasāderbhedāviśeṣepi  tatprayonāṅgatayā  viśiṣṭodakādyāharaṇakāryāṅgatayā  tadanyebhya iti tatkāryakaraṇāsamarthebhya paṭādibhyo bhidyanta iti bheda evaiṣāmabhedastatobhedāt  tasmādabhedādaviśeṣeṇaidha sāmānyenaivaikasmād ghaṭaśabdāt sarve rūpādayaḥ pratīyante yadi rūpādaya eva kevalā ghaṭo na tu tadvyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ  kathantarhi ghaṭasya brūpādaya iti vyatireka iti cedāha  tatretyādi  ghaṭasya rūpādaya ityapi yovyatirekastasyāyamartho ghaṭasvabhāvā rūpādayo na paṭādisvabhāvā iti etadeva vyācaṣṭe  udaketyādi  udakāhāraṇasya viśeṣo ghaṭādanyenāsādhyatvaṃ  ādiśabdādanyasyāpi ghaṭa sādhyasya kāryasya parigrahaḥ  tasmin kāryesamarthāḥ saptamīti yogavibhāgātsamāsaḥ  ayamatrārtha  rūpādiśabdā rūpādīnrūpasādhyakāryamātraśaktiyuktāṃnaviśeṣeṇa pratipādayanti  ghaṭaśabdastu viśiṣṭakāryaśaktiyogena paṭādisvabhāvebhyopi rūpādibhyo bhedena viśiṣṭān rūpādīnāha  atoghaṭasya rūpādaya iti śabdadvayavyāpāreṇa sāmānyaviśeṣākārabuddhayutpatteḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvo vyatirekavimatiśca prayujyata iti  etameva sāmānyetyādināha sāmānya kārya rūpādimātrasādhyantasya siddhiḥ sādhanantasmin prasiddhenātmanā svabhāvena  itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇā tṛtīyā  hetau vā  itthaṃbhūtena rūpeṇa hetunā vā rūpādiśabda karaṇabhūtaiḥ prasiddhāssantaḥ  viśiṣṭa kārya ghaṭasādhyaṃ ghaṭasādhyamevodakāharaṇādi  tasya sādhanaṃ sādhyateneneti kṛtvā  tathābhūtā ākhyā saṃjñā yasya sa tathātena viśiṣṭāḥ  ta iti rūpādaya evamucyanta iti na punaratra rūpādisaṃhatau hyatra vā ghaṭa iti vyavahāre yathāvaṇṇitalakṣaṇamitinupalambhāt  ekavacanagrahaṇaṃ tu ekaśaktisūcanārthaṃ saṃketaparataṃtraṃ vā  tathāhetuphalaviśeṣabhūtāḥ kiṃcid ekaṃ sādhayanti sādhyante ca tepi sakṛt pratītyarthaṃbrohyādiśabdaiḥ kṛtasaṃketā  pūrvavat kathyante yapi pṛthak samastā vā kvacit sakṛdeva pratyāyanārthaṃ upayujyante tevarūpādivyatiriktandravyaṃ  tasyāvayavinastādṛśasyeti rūpādivyatiriktasya  upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaścāvayavī parairiṣṭo dārśanaṃ spārśanaṃ dravyamiti vacanāt  tenopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvenābhyupagatasya rūpādivyatirekeṇānupalambhāditi vākyārthaḥ yathāvāntareṇāpyavayavinaṃ paramāṇava eva pratyakṣasya viṣayastathā dvitīye paricchedepratipādayiṣyate yadi rūpādaya eva saṃhatā ghaṭa kathantarhi bahuṣu ghaṭa ityekavacanamiti cedāha ekavacanamityādi  yathā bahuṣvekaḥ śabda ekaśakti sūcanārthastathaikavacanamapi  teṣāṃrūpādīnāmekasminnudakāharaṇakārye yā śaktistasyāḥ sūcanārthaṃ  ekakāryakarttṛ tvenateṣvekatvamāropyaikavacanamityarthaḥ  na punasteṣvekā śaktividyate  anapekṣitabāhyāthaṃmakavacanaṃ saṃketaparatantramvā  etacca yeṣāṃ vastuvaṃśā vāca    ityādināpratipāditaṃ  santānābhidhāyinaḥ śabdānadhikṛtyāha  tathetyādi  hetuśca phalaṃ kaścicchabda ityucyata ityadoṣaḥ  yathā ca ghaṭasya rūpādayaḥ ghaṭa iticaikavacanaṃ yena nibandhanenoktaṃ  tathā brīhe rūpādayo brīhiriti naikavacanaṃ draṣṭavyamataevāha  pūrvavadvācyamiti tadanyasmāt ghaṭāderbhedenaśabdaiḥ kṛtasamayāḥ  tathā kāraṇāpekṣayā anekopi ekena vyavahārārthameva yathā śavalāyā apatyāni bahulāyāścāpatyāni  śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakaḥkṛtako veti diparamāṇavaḥ pṛthagiti nīlapītādayaḥ parasparānapekṣāḥ samastā veti parasparasahitāḥ kvaciditi cakṣurvijñāne svadeśe parasyotpattipratibandhe vā sakṛdeva pratyāyanāyeṃ ekasmācchabdād bahūnāṃ niścayārthaṃ  tatra ye samudāyaśabdā eveti cet    na  ekasyāpiparamāṇoḥ sapratighādiśabdarabhidhānāt kāryadvāreṇa śabdapravṛttimuktvā kāraṇadvāreṇāha  yarthaṃkakāryā rūpādayasvakāryacodanāyāṃ  tadudakadhāraṇādyekaṃ kāryaṃ yasya rūpādisāmarthyasya tasya codanāyāmekaśakticodanāyāmityarthaḥ  tadanyasmāt ghaṭāderbhedena ghaṭādiśabdaḥ  ādigrahaṇādbrīhyādiparigrahaḥ  kṛtasamayā khyāpyanta iti prakṛtaṃ  tathā kāraṇāpekṣayāpyanekortha  ekena śabdena kṛtasamaiyaḥ khyāpyata iti vacanapariṇāmena sambandha vyavahārārthameva lāghavenetyarthād draṣṭavyaṃ  yathā śavalāyā gorapatyāni kāraṇamātrāśrayeṇāha  kṛtako veti  kāraṇāyattajanmanaḥ prayatnānantarīyakasyānyasya ca sarvasya kṛtaka ityabhidhānāt evantāvadvidhimukhenoktaṃ tathā tatkāryapratiṣedhenācākṣuṣaḥ śabdaḥ  pranityonātma iti ca tatkāraṇa pratiṣedhenāsvāmikaḥ śūnya iti  evamanyadapi yathāyogam  śūnyab nityādiśabdānāṃ buddhau yathākathitaṃ samīhitākāraṃ vikalpya tadvyavacchedenavyapadeśaḥ kriyate  sarve hi śabdārthā buddhisamīhā nirdiṣṭavibhaktitvāt pratiṣedhamukhenāha  tathetyādi  tasya cākṣuṣasya nīlāderyat kāryañcakṣurvijñānantasya pratiṣedhenācākṣuṣaḥ śabdaḥ  na samarthañcakṣurvijñānaṃ pratītyevamacākṣuṣaśabdenasāmānyenocyate  anityaśabdopi nityavyavacchedena vyavasthā pyamānaḥ  tatkāryapratiṣedhenaiva  tathā hi nityaṃ parairvastveveṣṭantaccāsādhyasādhanabhūtaṃ vyavahārapathaṃ nāvataratīti sādhyasādhanaṃ cāṅgīkartavyaṃ  nityakāryapratiṣedhenānityaḥ  ātmaśabdopikvacit kārye svatantrasya khyāpanāya kṛta ityanātmaśabdotatkāryavyavacchedena syāt evaṃ kāryapratiṣedhenābhidhāya kāraṇapratiṣedhenāha  tadityādi  tasya sasvāmikasyāśūnyasya ca yatkāraṇantasya pratiṣedhenāyaṃ śabdādiko bhāvosvāmikaḥ śūnyaiti vyavahārārthaṃ khyāpyata iti sambandhaḥ  tathā hi svatantreṇātmādinā yodhiṣṭhitassa sasvāmika parairiṣyate  evamaśūnyopi tathābhūtenādhiṣṭhātrādhiṣṭhitatvādevādhiṣṭhitā cādhiṣṭhātavyasvīkaraṇamanyathādhiṣṭhātṛtvāyogāt  tasmāt sasvāmikādiśabdā kāraṇadvārapravṛttāḥ pareṣāṃ  na pratikṣaṇaviśarāruṣu bhāveṣu sāmagrīmātrapratibaddheṣu vyavasthitasvabhāvaḥ kaścidadhiṣṭhātāsti yatpratibaddhāssaṃskārāḥ pravarttante tatosvāmikāḥ śūnyāśca yathoktakāraṇapratiṣedhena cetyādi  athavā kiṃśabda pratikṣepe   keyaṃ vṛttirna kācidityarthaḥ  tathā hi vṛtteḥ svāśraye ādheyatā vā syāt  yathākuṇḍe ādhāre badarāṇi varttanta iti  vyaktirvā tasya sāmānyasyāśraye vṛttiḥ yasmādupakāradvāreṇaivādhārādibhāvaḥ tasmādayamāśrayaḥ śāvaleyādiḥ  svātmani sāmānyasvabhāvenupakurvāṇa sāmānyasyānapekṣasyādhāra iti yā cita kamaṇḍa na me tat  maṇḍanamalaṅkāro maṇḍayatenenetikṛtvā
