atreti sāmānye na hotyādinā vyācaṣṭe  svopādānadeśa eva jananaṃ jananaviśeṣaḥ sa lakṣaṇaṃyasyādhārabhāvasya sa tathā  tasyājanyatvāditi sāmānyasya nityatvenājanyatvāt tadabhāvenyāśrayābhāvepi sāmānyasyāvasthiterhetorā śrayavaśena na sthitiḥ sāmānyasya athetyādinā vyācaṣṭe  tasyeti sāmānyasya tadabhāvepoti vyaktyabhāvepivyaktiśanye deśe sāmānyasya sthānāt  yadi hi vyaktiśūnye deśe sāmānyaṃ na bhavettadātatrāpūrvavyaktyutpāde sāmānyasambandho na bhaveta  na hi tasyānyata āgamanaṃ niṣkriya  sāmānyacintāna hi janakatvāt sāvyayuktaivatasya tadbhāvepi sthānāt  patanadharmāṇāṃ dhvastūnāṃ pātapratibandhātprajanakasya hi sthāpakatvaṃ syāt  atrāpi yadi pātaprabandhaṃ na paryanuyuṃjītasthāpayitrā kriyate pāta pratibandhaḥ tatorthāntaram  prarthāntaratve tatraṃvāsyopayoga iti kaḥ patataḥ pratibandhaḥ  pratibandhādapātepi tulyaḥ paryanuyogonavasthā ca tasmād pātābhāva kathaṃ kenacit kriyate  prabhāvaṃ karotīti cet btvāt na ca bhinnadeśāvasthitā vyaktistasya sāmānyasyādhāro bhinnadeśatvāt   aekatvāt sāmānyasya nāsti bhinnadeśateti cet  sarvāstahi vyaktaya ekajātimatyaekadeśāḥ prāpnuvanti  na ca sarvā jātimatyaḥ syuḥ  ekasya kathambhinnadeśāvasthitatvamiti cedayamaparosya doṣostu patanadharmetyādinopacayahetumāha  hi śabdaścārthe  apiśabdobhyupagamasūcanārtha  abhyupagamyāpyayaṃ prakāra  sāmānye vyavasthāpayitumaśakyaḥ  sāmānyasyāpatanadharmmatvādityevamarthamupanyāsaḥ  na tvajanakasya sthāpakatvaṃ sambhavati ata evāha atrāpītyādi  atrāpi pātapratibandhāt sthāpakābhyupagame yadi nyāyavādī kaścit pātapratibandhaṃ na paryanuyuñjīta  tadā bhavedajanakopi sthāpakaḥ svasamayānurodhenetyākūtaṃ  atrāpyayaṃ paryanuyogaḥ sambhavati  yaḥ sthāpayitrā kriyatepātapratibandhaḥ sa sthāpyasyātmabhūto vā syāt tatoryāntaraṃ vā pātābhāvamātramvā na tāvadātmabhūtastatsvabhāvasyānyato niṣpattyabhyupagamāt nāpyarthāntaramityāha arthāntaratvebhyupagamyamāne tatraiva pratibandherthāntarabhūtesyādhārasyopayoga iti kaḥpatato badarādeḥ pratibandho vighāta   naiva kaścit  tataśca kuṇḍādisthamapibadarādi patedeveti bhāvaḥ  ādhārakṛtenārthāntareṇa pātapratibandhena badarāderapāta kriyata iti cedāha  pratibandhādapātepītyādi  pratibandhākhyāt yadārthādbadarāderapātebhyupagamyamāne tulyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ  yoyaṃ pratibandhākhyena padārthenāpātaḥkriyate sa kiṃ badarāderātmabhūtorthāntaramvā  arthāntaratve tatraivāsya pratibandhasyopayogaityādi  sarvamanantaroktaṃ tulyaṃ atha tenāpyapātākhyenārthena badarāderapātaḥ kriyate tatrāpi tulya paryanuyogaityāha  anavasthā ceti tasmādityādinā tṛtīyapakṣopanyāsaḥ  sa pātābhāvaḥ kathaṃ kenacit kriyate nābhāvo nāma kaścit kāryaḥ  tasya kenacit kriyamāṇe bhāva eva syāditi prabhāvasyāyogya tvāt  tasmād bhāvakriyāpratiṣedha nirdeśobhāvaṃ karotītyarthaḥ tathā cāyamapi prakāryatvāt kenacit pratibaddhaḥ  tenāyaṃ kenacidapratibaddhatvātna kadācidapi tiṣṭhet  tasmād pātapratibandha ityasāvapi kṣaṇikānāṃ bhāvānāṃupādānena samānadeśasyotpādanam  astu nāma pātināṃ tatpratibandho janakaḥgatimato dravyasya sthāpakaḥ kaścid  akriyasya ki lakṣaṇāṃ sthiti kurvāṇaḥsthāpaka syāt  sthitihi tasya svarūpāpracyutireva  sā ca nāśrayāyattānaiva kenacit  abhāvasyākāryatvāditi bhāvaḥ  kathantarhyabhāvaṃ karotīti vyapadeśaiti cedāha  abhāvamityādi  abhāvaṅkarotīti vyapadeśe nābhāvo nāma kaścitkārya iṣyate  kasmādityāha  tasyetyādi  tasyetyabhāvasya kāryatvād bhāva evasyādityabhiprāyaḥ nanu yathā ghaṭavat kāryatvāt paṭasya na ghaṭarūpatā  tathā bhāvavannābhāvasyakāryatvādabhāvarūpatā bhaviṣyatīti cet  na  ghaṭāderapi hi bhāvarūpatvambhavanadharmatvādeva  taccābhāvepyastīti kathaṃ na bhāvarūpatvamabhāvarūpatvena pratibhāsanānna bhāvarūpateti cet  na  abhāvasya pratibhāsābhāvāt  abhāvānāmparasparavibhāgapratīterghaṭābhāva paṭābhāva ityatra paṭādīnāmbhedo nābhāvānāmekatvena pratibhāsanādityuktaṃ  yata evantasmād bhāvasya yā kriyā tasyāḥpratiṣedhanirdeśobhāvaṃkarotīti ata eva spaṣṭayati  bhāvaṃ na karotīti yāvaditi  yāvānevāsya vākyasyārthastāvānevābhāvaṃ karotītyasyāpītyarthaḥ  tathā ceti  pātapratibandhasyābhāvab mātratvenākāryatve ayamiti kuṇḍādiḥ  tena kāra ṇenāyamiti badarādiḥ kenacitkuṇḍādinādhāreṇa pratibaddhaḥ  pātādanivārito na kadācittiṣṭhet  sadaiva patedityarthaḥ  tasmādityādinopasaṃhāraḥ  apiśabdādādheya ityanenāpi vyapadeśenakṣaṇikānāṃ pūrvakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītenopādānena samānadeśasyottarakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītasya kāryasyotpādanamucyate  tasmāt sāmānyeyamapi prakāro na sambhava tīti khyāpanāyābhyupagamyaitaduktaṃ pātapratibandhādajanakopi sthāpaka iti tamevāsambhavandarśayitumāha  astu nāmetyādi  pātināmbadarādīnāntatpratibandhaḥ pātapratibandhostu nāmājananasvabhāvaḥ  tatkaraṇāditi pātapratibandhakaraṇāt gatimato dravyasyeti sakriyasya sāmānyasya punaramūrttatvādakriyasya kiṃ lakṣaṇāṃ sthitikurvāṇa āśrayaḥ sthāpaka syāt  na hi sāmānyasya pātosti yena tatpratibandhaḥ sāmānyacintānityatvāt  sāpi prayuktaivabhedābhedavivecane prastu nāma śrāśrayahetukā sāmānyasthitirapi  sā ca sāmānyādanyānanyāvā  śrapratibaddhatve tadeva tasyāḥ sthitikaraṇaṃ cet sāpi sāmānye pratibaddheti kiṃ sāmānyena kṛtaṃ syāt  pratibaddhaiva cet tadā kaḥ pratibandhaiti vācyam  sthitikaraṇapratītyā cet tatrāpi tulyaḥ prasaṃgaityanavasthāca syāt  tata upakārasyānavadhāraṇāt sā hi tasthitirityapratītiḥjananaṃ cet anupakāriṇyāḥ kimatrāśrayeṇāpekṣitane  apekṣeti hi tatpratisthitirbhavet  kintu sthitirhi tasya sāmānyasya svarūpāpracyutirevocyate  sā casvarūpāpracyutirnāśrayāyattā sāmānyasya nityatvāt  abhyupagamyāpyucyate sāpyāśrayāyattā sāmānyasya sthitirayuktaiva  sāmānyāt tasyāḥ sthiterbhedābhedavivecane  anyattvānanyattvavicāre kriyamāṇe astu nātyādinā vyācaṣṭe  āśrayahetuketyāśrayāyattā  seti sthitiḥ tāmevāśrayādanyāṃ sthiti sa āśrayaḥ karoti na sāmānyaṃ  sā sthiti sāmānyepratibaddhā tataḥ sambandhasambaddhāt sāmānyamupakṛtamevetyata āha  sā cetyādi setyarthāntarabhūtā sthitiḥ  na hi tasyāḥ sāmānya pratibandhakāraṇaṃ kiṃcidastikiṃ sāmānyasyāśrayeṇa kṛtambhavatītyadhyāhāraḥ abhyupagamyata eva sthiteḥ sāmānya pratibandha iti cedāha  pratibandhe cetyādi pratibandhe vābhyupagamyamāne  sthitikaraṇaṃ cet  āśrayeṇa janitā yā sthitistasyāḥsthiteḥ sthitiḥ sāmānyena kriyate  tataḥ sāśrayajanitā sthitiḥ sāmānyepratibaddheti  tatrāpi sthiteḥ sthitikaraṇe tulyaḥ prasaṅgaḥ  yā sā cāśrayapratibaddhāyāḥ sthiteḥ sāmānyena sthitiḥ kriyate sā āśrayahetukāyāḥ sthiterātmabhūtā vābhaved vyatiriktā vā  ātmabhūtatve āśrayeṇaiva sā kṛteti kathaṃ sāmānyena kriyatevyatiriktatve ca saiva sthiti sāmānyena kṛtā āśrayajanitāyā ādyāyāḥ sthiteḥkiṃ sāmānyena kṛtaṃ syāt  atha sāmānyena dvitīyā sthitiḥ kriyate  sā āśrayeṇajanitāyāṃ sthitau pratibaddhā  tadā kaḥ pratibandha iti vācyaṃ  sāmānyajanitāyāḥsthiterāśrayajanitayā sthityāparā tṛtīyā sthitiḥ yata iti tulyaḥ prasaṅgaḥ ityanavasthā syāt  tatonavasthānādāśrayajanitāyāṃ sthitau sāmānyakṛtasyopakārasyānavadhāraṇādasya sāmānyasya sambandhinīyamāśrayeṇa janitā sthitirityapratītiḥjananaṃ cetpratibandha iti prakṛtaṃ  na sāmānyenāśrayajanitāyā sthitera parā sthitiḥ akriyate  kintu saivādyā sthitirjanyata iti  tadā kevalaṃ sāmānyaṃ samarthaṃ sthitia bandha   sa ca prādheyātiśayasya sāmānyasyāyukta iti kevalaṃ janayeditināstyanya śrāśrayaḥ sthitihetuḥ devā sāmānyāt tatsthatisvarūpameva tat  tacca nityamastīti bhasthitirasya hi kenacit kriyate  tasmād na sāmānyasyāśrayaḥ  tadasyāśrayona sthitiḥ śratha punaḥ śravyaktasya sattve tu tadvyaktihi vyaktyā pratyayahetu bhūta  tvā  t tatra sthitibhūtopi na yuktaḥ  yasmāt vijñānotpattiyogyatvāyātmanyanyānurodhi yat tad vyaṅagyaṃ yogyatāñca kāraṇaṃ kārakaṃ matam prāgevāsya ca yogyatve tadapekṣā na yujyate karotu kimāśrayeṇa śāvaleyādinā sthitikaraṇāyāpekṣitena  na hyanupakārariṇyapekṣāyuktā  tasmādapekṣeti hi tatpratibandhaḥ  asminvastunyasyāpekṣeti yeyamapekṣā sātasminnapekṣye pratibandhastadāyattatā  sa ca pratibandho nityatvādanādheyātiśayasyāyukta iti kevalaṃ sāmānyaṃ  sthiti janayediti nāstyanya āśrayaḥ sthitihetuḥ tataśca sthitikaraṇādāśrayassāmānyasyādhāra ityetadayuktamiti bhāvaḥ  evambhedābhedavivecana iti yaduktantato bhedapakṣastāvadapanītaḥdvitīyapakṣamāśrityāha abheda ityādi  sāmānyādabhede vā sthiterabhyupagamyamāne svarūpameva tatsthitirūpaṃ sāmānyasya    tacca svarūpaṃ sāmānyasyanityamastīti na sthiti rasya sāmānyasya kenacidāśrayeṇa kriyate  yata evantasmādityādi  tadityādinopasaṃhāraḥ  taditi tasmādasyeti sāmānyasya tadevaṃ vṛttirādheyatā vyaktiriti yatpakṣadvayamuktantata ādyasya nirāsaḥ kṛtaḥ vyaktetyāśrayeṇa jñānasyākāraṇatvāt tadvayaktestenāśrayeṇa prakāśanaṃ yat  tadevatatrāśraye sāmānyasya vṛtti syāt  netyā cā ryaḥ  ātmani svaviṣaye vijñānotpādanaṃ  tatra yogyatvaṃ sāmānyantadarthamanyānurodhi  kāraṇāntarasāpekṣaṃ yattadvastu vyaṅgyaṃ pratītaṃ  tasyāśca svaviṣayajñānajananayogyatāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ yatpradīpādi tadvayaṅgyasya kārakameva janakameva  pūrvamayogyasya paścād vijñānajananayogyasya ghaṭāderutpādanāt yadi puna pradīpādisannidhānāt prāgapi ghaṭādi svākārajñānajananayogyantadā prāgevāsya ca ghaṭāderyogyatve tadapekṣeti pradīpāpekṣā  sāmānyasya nityatvāda sāmānyacintāsāmānyasyāvikāryasya tatsāmānyavataḥ kutaḥ na kārakād vyañjakasya kaścid viśeṣaḥ  aparaṃ svaviṣayasyacabhāvaṃ janayantrevavijñānotpādanasamartha sajātīyopādānāpekṣaṃ anapekṣaṃvyañjaka ucyataiti paratra hi janya jñānajananaśaktiranākṣiptā janyasyeti jananamātraṇakārakatvam yadi hi yato yaḥ vijñānotpādanayogyatāṃ pratilabhate sa natajjanyaḥ  tasya sā yogyatā svabhāvabhūtā hi prāgevāstīti vijñānotpādanaṃvikāryasya  taditi yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ vyaṅgyatvaṃ sāmānyavata ityāśrayātsakāśāt kutonaivetyarthaḥ  aparamiti svasantānādanyambhāvameva janayan vyañjaka ucyate  kimbhūtaṃsvaviṣayasya vijñānotpādanasamarthaṃ  sajātīyopādānāpekṣamiti svasantānasaṅga hītapūrvakṣaṇasāpekṣaṃ  yathāndhakārāvasthitaghaṭādikṣaṇasāpekṣamvijñānajananasamarthamuttaraṃghaṭakṣaṇañjanayatprakāśakaḥ nanu pradīpakāryatve ghaṭasya pradīpoyacayapi ghaṭasyopacayopi syāditi cet na upādānagatād vibhedāt kāryasya bhedo na sahakārigatāt  sahakārikāraṇaṃca pra dīpādirvyaṅgyasya ghaṭasyeti kuto mahatvādiprasaṅgasya  yadvābhivyaktābapi kriyamāṇāyāṃ tulyoyaṃ prasaṅga iti yatkiñcidetat  na ca vyaṅgyakṣaṇasadṛśasyakṣaṇasya mṛtpiṇḍādutpattirapi tu pradīpādeveti kutonyādṛśāt tādṛśasyotpattiḥ anapekṣaṃ ceti  yathā sajātīyopādānāpekṣaṃ svaviṣayavijñānajananasamartha śabdaṃ janayannabhighātaḥ  na hyabhighātāt prāk chabdosti yena samānajātīyāpekṣa śabdo bbhavet  śabdopi hi vyaṅgyaḥ parariṣyata ityevamuktaṃ yadi tarhi kāraka eva vyañjakaḥ kastarhi kārakavyañjakayorhetvoviśeṣa ityataāha paranetyādi  vyañjakādanyasmin kārakatvenābhimata ityarthaḥ  jñānajananaśaktiranākṣiptā janyasya  na hi svaviṣayavijñānajananasamarthameva kārya kārakeṇabījā dinā janyate  tato jananamātreṇa kārakatvaṃ svaviṣayavijñānajananasamarthakāryotpādanalakṣaṇena tu viśeṣeṇa vyañjakatvamiti yadyapi vyañjakād vyaṅgyo vijñānotpādanayogyatāṃ pratilabhate tathāpi na janyataiti cedāha  yadi hotyādi  yata iti vyañjakāt  sa cet vyaṅgyaḥ  tasyetivyañjakasya sā yogyatāsya vyaṅgyasya vyañjakasannidhānāt prāgevāsti  yatobna tamapekṣate  tasya hi parabhūtatve saiva tato bhūteti sthitivatprasaṃgaḥ  taṃvyaṅgyaṃ nāpyanyat kriyate evaṃ prakiñcitkatvena pratiṣedhaḥ tato vyāhatametat tattu na dhūmādirjanakothakāryatvād vyañjakaḥ  satyaṃ hi janakaḥ na tu dhūmamapekṣyāgnivijñānaṃ janayati  tathā bhūtasyāgneḥ sākṣādajanakatvāt kevalaṃ tatropādānamapekṣya jñānaṃ utpadyeta na tu viṣayabalena asatyapi tasminparamparayā liṅgānusāriṇā bhāvāt vāpi sāmānyākārāvabhāsi jñānaṃ na teṣāṃ sannihitaviṣayatā  naviṣayabalenotpattiriti pratipāditaṃ pratipādayiṣyate ca  tataḥ sākṣādupayogenavyaṅgyasya svabhāvabhūtā sā  yathāvyaṅgyaḥ prāgevāsti tathā tatsvabhāvabhūtāpiyogyatā  tamapekṣata iti vyañjakaṃ  vyaṅgyād vyatiriktaiva yogyatā vyañjakenakriyata iti cedāha  paretyādi  asyāmiti yogyatāyāṃ  saiva yogyatā  tata itivyañjakāt sthitivatprasaṅgaḥ  yaduktam  anyā cet sthitistāmevāśrayaḥ karotītyādi tadihāpi prasajyeta  tamiti vyaṅgyaṃ  nāpi vyaṅagyādanyat tatkaraṇevyaṅagyasya na kiñciditi kṛtvāpekṣyata ityanenopakāritvamuktaṃ  akiṃcitkaratvenatatpratiṣedhastato vyāhatametat yaduktaṃ  janaka eva vyañjaka iti tasya tattvityādinā vyabhicāramāha na hi dhūmognerjanakotha ca kāryatvāttasya vyañjakaḥ  ādiśabdād balākādisalilasya  satyamityādinā pariharati  na tu dhūmaṃ liṅgama pekṣyāgnirātmanisvalakṣaṇe jñānaṃ janayati  kasmāt    tathābhūtasyānumeyatvenābhimatasyāgneḥ sākṣādajanakatvāt  anyathāgnisvalakṣaṇākāratvāt pratyakṣāt pratibhāsāviśeṣa syāt kevalamityādinopādānakāraṇameva tasya sākṣājjanakamityādarśayati  liṅgajñānamupādānaṃ  na viṣayabalenāgnisvalakṣaṇabalena  kiṅkāraṇam  asatyapitasmin vahnau pūrvadhvastepi bhāvādagnijñānasya  kathamityāha  paramparayetyādi liṅgānusārī liṅgānusmaraṇavikalpastena  tathā hi kasyacit puruṣasya kvaciddhūmandṛṣṭavato dhvaste dhūme vahnau ca kathamapi tatra dhūmānusmaraṇavikalpa utpanne paścādanvayavyatirekānusmaraṇādabhūdatra dhūmastasmād vahnirapyatrāsīdityevaṃ paramparayāgnijanya dhūmādagnijñānamutpadyata eva nāpītyādinā pūrvoktamatraiva yojayati  sāmānyākārāvabhāsi cānumānajñānaṃ na sannihitaviṣayatā  vinaṣṭepi hi viṣaye anutpanne ca sambhavāt  yadāpi sanni hito viṣayastadāpi na viṣayabalenotpattiriti niveditaṃ prāk na hi vikalpā sāmānyacintāsvaviṣayavijñānajanana sāmathryena tatra hi paramapekṣeteti avaśyaṃ tata ātmapratilambhaḥ na cāyamātmapratilambhaḥ sāmānyasya kutaścit saṃbhavati  tasmāttat kutopi na vyaṅgyam  naiva sāmānya vyaktiyogyatā prāptamiti atha sāmānyamasti svāśrayasamavetaṃ tadā svāśrayasamavāyāpekṣaḥ tadātmanyanyatravā vijñānaheturiti uktam tatra janyajanakayo  āśraya śrayilakṣaṇasamavetoyaṃkaḥ svayamavāyāpekṣo vijñānahetuḥ tena janyasya eva syāt taddheto bhāvasyaprāgbhāvāt paścācca tato bhāvāt  nittyaṃ tadbhāvasadbhāva iti prāgapisamayāyāt vijñānodayaprasaṃgāt na hi vyaktiḥ sāmānyasya saṃskārāt vyañjikā  kintahi  tagrāhiṇa ayathābhāvameva pravarttanta ityādinā  bhāvābhāvānavidhānācca sāmarthyantra prati abhāsa dityādinā tṛtīye paricchede   pratipādayiṣyate ca  sākṣādupayogenasvarūpānukāri vijñānajananasāmarthyata  tatreti svaviṣayajñānajanane  paramiti pradīpādikaṃ  tata ityapekṣyāt pradīpādeḥ etaduktambhavati  na sarvo vyañjako janaka ityucyate  kintu svākārajñānajanakasya paraṃsya sāhāyyaṃ yaḥ pratipadyate sa eva  tato nāsti vyabhicāra iti sāmānyamapi svākārajñānajananāśrayamapekṣata iti vyaṅgya miṣṭantatastenāśrayādupalambhayogya ātmā labdhavyaḥ  na cāyanātmapratilambhaḥ sāmānyasya kutaścitsambhavati pācakatvādisāmānyamityata āha  tatsambandhītyādi  tatsambandhisvabhāvavaiguṇyāt  pācakatvādisāmānyasambandhisvabhāvavaiguṇyāt  sa iti sāmānyasamavāyaḥ  tasyeti puṃsaḥ  na hyaviguṇe svabhāve sthitasya tatsambandho na bhavettatraiva ca sāmānyasamavāyaviguṇe svabhāve sthitasya dravyasya paścāt sāmānya samavāyo bhaviṣyatīti duranvayandurbodhametat  phalasyāpyāmrādeḥ pūrvaṃ paścācca yadyekasvabhāvatā tatrāpi tulyaṃ codyaṃ  sāmānyasambaddhameva tadā dravyaṃ kriyopakārāpekṣantusāmānyaṃ vyanakti   kriyopakārāpekṣyasya vyañjakatvevikāriṇaḥ  nāpekṣātiśayepyasya kṣariṇakatvātkriyā kutaḥ karmopakāramapekṣya dravyasya pācakatvavyañjakaṃ cet svabhāvāśrayoyamanādheyātiśayād aviśeṣādhāyini kāspekṣā  atiśaye vā karmaṇaḥ kṣaṇika tvāt  apratikṣaṇaṃ svabhāvabhūtasyānyasthānyasyātiśayasyotpattestadapi kṣaṇikaṃ syāt  tataḥsvotpattisthānavināśinaḥ kutaḥ kriyā kamapekṣya vyañjakaṃ syāt nanu kathamekavastutvābhāve vastuni jñānaśabdau pravarttate yathā pācakādiṣvititathā sā ca prāṅanāstīti na prāk sāmānyābhivyaktirityata āha  kriyopakāretyādi  pākādilakṣaṇā kriyā  tatkṛto ya upakārastadapekṣasya sāmānyaṃ prativyañjakatvebhyupagamyamāne  tasya dravyasyākṣaṇikatvādavikāriṇonapekṣā sahakāriṇaṃ prati atha vikriyeta tadāpyatiśayasya dravyasya kṣaṇikatvamāpadyate  kṣaṇikatvāccotpādānantaraṃ dhvaṃsinaḥ kṛtaḥ kriyā  yena tadupakārāpekṣaṃ jātervyañjakaṃ syāt karmopakāretyādinā vyācaṣṭe  adhiśrayaṇādilakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ karma  tatkṛtaupakārotiśayastamapekṣya sthira svabhāvasya pūrvasvabhāvādacalatonatiśayāt svabhāvāntarānupādānāt  aviśeṣādhāyini karmaṇi  kāpekṣā  naiva  atiśaya vādravyasya kriyākṛtebhyupagamyamānetiśayādhāyakasya karmaṇaḥ kṣaṇikatvāta tasyāpyupakāryasya dravyasya svabhāvabhūtenānyenātiśayenotpattavyaṃ yadi kriyākṛtotiśayo na svabhāvabhūto dravyasya tadarthāntarasya karaṇād dravyaṃnaivopakṛtaṃ syāt tasmād yathākriyākṣaṇaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ svabhāvabhūtasyānyānyasyātiśayotpattestadapi dravyaṃ devadattādi kṣaṇikaṃ syāt  tata iti kṣaṇikatvāt svotpattisthānavināśinaḥ svasminnevotpattideśe vināśinaḥ puṃsaḥ kṛtaḥ pākalakṣaṇākriyā  yadapekṣantat kriyāsāpekṣaṃ pācakādidravyasāmānyasya vyañjakaṃ syāta nanu ca prathamādikriyākṣaṇadvāreṇa dravyasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ kriyābhāve ca kathaṃ kṣaṇikatvamiti cet  na  yataḥ kriyāsambandhotpannānāṃ kṣaṇānāmanyasyāḥ kriyāyāssāmānyābhivyañjikāyā abhāvādityarthaḥ tasmāt sthitametad yathā vastubhūtā jātirnāstīti  kathantarhotyādi paraḥ yathetyādi siddhānta vā dī yathā pācakādiṣu pācakatvādisāmānyannāsti tathātat teṣviti na vā cetaḥ yathā teṣvapīti yathā teṣu na vṛttiriti parīkṣitam kintarhi te animitte na syātām  nānimitte śratha kimiti cet bāhyatattvaṃnimittena  yathāsvaṃ yo yo vāsanāprabodhāt vikalpotpattiḥ tataḥ śabdā bhavanti yathāsvaṃ darśana na punavakalpābhidhānayorvastusattāśraya ityuktaprāyametat vāsanāvaśāt virodhirūpasamāveśena parāparadarśanepi tadanvayidarśanāt  na ca tatratannivandhanasvabhāvaḥ kvacidapyasti  parasparavirodhinorekatra sthityasambhavāt aniyamena syād  tadanimittaṃ bhavaddhi kvacid bhavet kvacicca na bhaveditina niśceyam a prasādhitamatha ca tatra pravarttate anvayinau jñānaśabdau  tathānyatrāpyantareṇa sāmānyantaubhivaṣyataḥ tadvadityādi paraḥ  teṣviti pācakādiṣu sāmānyamvinā kathamanvayinorjñānaśabdayorvṛttiriti tatonvayajñānaśabdavṛtteḥ pācakādiṣvapi pācakatvādisāmānyamastīti cintitametadanantaraṃ  tathā teṣu pācakatvādi sāmānyaṃ sa na sambhavatīti yadyanvayi rūpannāsti tatkimidānīmanimitte te śabdajñāne syātāṃ  netyādisiddhānta vā dī  astyeva tayonimittaṃ yat pareṇeṣyate tasya pratikṣepaḥ  tadevāha kintaharhotyādi  vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyambāhyatatvaṃ nimitte te na bhavataḥ  kintahitayornimittamityata āha  yathāsvamityādi  yo ya ātmīyo vāsanāprabodhastasmādanvayino vikalpasyotpattiḥ  tato vikalpotpatteḥ sakāśād yathāvikalpaṃśabdā bhavanti  na punavakalpābhidhānayorvastusattā  anvayipadārthasattāsamāśrayaityuktaprāyametata  avaśyaṃ caitadeṣṭavyaṃ  tathā hi yathāsvaṃ samavāyavāsanāvaśātsiddhāntāśrayeṇa jñānavāsanānurodhād virodhirūpasamāveśena parasparaviruddharūpādhyāropeṇa pradhāna kāryamī śva ra kāryamahetukaṃ samvṛttimātraṃ jagadityevaṃ sarvabhedeṣvanvayinostayo riti jñānābhidhānayoḥ  aparāparadarśanepīti parasparabhinnānāmarthānāndarśanepi na ca tatreti pradhānādikāryatvena parasparaviruddhena rūpeṇa kalpiteṣvartheṣu tannibandhanaḥ śabdajñānayonibandhanaḥ  kasmānnāstītyāha  parasparavirodhinorityādi aniyamenetyādi paraḥ  sarvaṃ sarvatrānvayi jñānamabhidhānaṃ ca syāt etadeva sādhayannāha   na hyanimittamityādi nanu yathāsvaṃ vāsanāprabodhād vikalpotpatterityādinā tayoranimittatvaṃ pratiṣiddhamityanavakāśameva codyaṃ  evammanyate  āntarameva nimittantayoriṣyate tasya canimittasya kenacidāsattiviprakarṣābhāvāt  sarvatra sarvavikalpahetutvaṃ syāditi  sāmānyacintāna hyānimittaṃ tad  vāsanā viśeṣa nimittatvāt tathābhūtaṃ vāhyaṃ na prakāśitamapotyuktam  na cāsati tasminna bhavitavyam  suptatai mirikādyupalabdheṣu artheṣugraṃthavaropitarūpaviśeṣe tathā vikalpasyotpatteḥ  na ca te tadutpattyā bisatsu sarvatra sarvākārā bhavanti  vibhāgenaiva tathaivopalabdhānāṃ vikalpanāt ekabhāvenātra svabhāvenāpi ekajñānakāyaṃ kvacid bhāva eva bhedāditi saṃkṣepaḥ śranyaccatulye bhede yayā jāti pratyāsattyā prasarpati kacinnānyatra saivāstu śabdajñānanibandhanam iti saṃgrahaślokaḥ na hyanimitte bhavadityatra bāhyanimittābhāvādanimittamiti draṣṭavyaṃ nānimitte iti siddhānta vā dī  aviśiṣṭanimitte  na bhavata ityarthaḥ ata evāha  vāsanāviśeṣanimittatvāditi  yathābhūtadarśanadvārāyātā vāsanāsā tatraivādhyavasitatadbhāvamvikalpaṃ janayati  na sarvatreti samudāyārthaḥ  tathābhūtamityanvayi rūpaṃ  na cāsati tasminnanvayini bāhye nimitte vikalpena na bhavitavyambhavitavyameva tadeva suptetyādinā sādhayati  suptaśca taimirikaśca tābhyāmupalabdheṣvartheṣugavādiṣu keśamakṣikādiṣu ca yathākramaṃ  abhāveṣu śaśaviṣāṇādiṣu  samavāyavāsanā yathā svaṃ siddhāntaṃ saṃketavāsanā tadbalenāropitarūpaviśeṣe pradhānakāryādiṣu tathā vikalpotpatteranvayino vikalpasyotpatteḥ  na hyeteṣu yathokteṣu bāhyamanvayi brūpamasti  svapnatimiropalabdhānāmevāsattvāt  teṣāṃ cāsattvaṃ tṛtīye paricchede pratipādayiṣyate  siddhāntasamāropitasya tu parasparavirodhinoryugapadekatretyādinā pratipāditamevāsattvaṃ  na ca te vikalpā svapnādyupalabdheṣvasatsuvastubhūtānvayirūpamantareṇāpyutpadyaṃta iti sarvatrārthā sarvākārā bhavantyapi tupratiniyatā eva  niyamahetuṃ cāha  vibhāgenaivetyādi  tathaivopalabdhānāmitivibhāgenopalabdhānāṃ  vibhāgenaiva vikalpanāt  suptatimirāvasthāyāntāvadbhrāntajñānārūḍhānāmarthānāṃ vibhāgenopalambha  siddhāntāropitānāmapi yathāsvaṃsiddhāntaśravaṇakāle  śaśaviṣāṇamityādiṣvapi  śaśaviṣāṇaṃ bandhyāsuta itivyavahāravyutpattikālenāditvād vyavahāravāsanāyāḥ  uktaṃ cātretyādi ekapratyamaśarthajñānādyekārthasādhana  ityatra api ca yathā dhavakhadirādayaḥ parasparabhinnāstathā gavādayaḥ  tatra tulye bhedekha sāṃkhyamatanirāsaḥna nivṛttiṃ vihāyāsti yadi bhāvānvayoparaḥ ekasya kāryamanyasya na syāda tyantabhedataḥ yadyete bhāvā nivṛttyanyānvayisvabhāvena kenacit śūnyāḥ bahano bhāvā ekakāryatāyāṃ na syuḥ  yo hi tajjananasvabhāvaḥ na hi sonyasya  yosti na sajanakaḥ vyatirekasya niḥsvabhāvatvāt  yajjanakaṃ tad vastu tajjanakasyānyatrākasmād vṛkṣatvaṃ dhavādiṣveva varttate na gavādiṣviti pṛṣṭena pareṇaitadeva vaktavyaṃbhāvaśaktireva sā dhavādīnāṃ yena ta eva vṛkṣatvaṃ prati pratyāsannā na gavādaya iti tadā tulye bhedye yathā pratyāsatyā bhāvaśaktilakṣaṇayā jātiḥ kvacitsvāśrayābhimatertharāśau  prasappati  vyāpya varttate  saiva bhāvaśaktiranvayiśabdajñānanibandhanamastu  kiṃ sāmānyena kalpitena tena yaducyate viṣayeṇa hi buddhīnāṃ vinā notpattiriṣyate viśeṣādanyadicchanti sāmānyantena tad dhruvaṃ tā hi tena vinotpannā mithyā syuviṣayāvṛte na tvanyena vinā vṛttissāmānyasyeha duṣyatīti tadapāstaṃ  na hi yathā sāmānyamantareṇa keṣucit sāmānyavṛttiriṣyate tathā sāmānyamvinā sāmānyabuddhiriṣyatāmiti parobhyupagamaṃ kāryate  yena tāhi tena vinotpannā mithyā syuriti parasyottaraṃ syāt  kevalaṃ yathā parasyasāmānyamantareṇa keṣucita padārthaṣu yayā pratyāsatyā sāmānyavṛttiḥ saivabhrāntānvayijñānaśabdanimittamastu kiṃ sāmānyenetyayamarthotra vivakṣita iti nakaściddoṣaḥ tasmāt sthitametadvyāvṛtterevaikatvādhyavasāyād bhāveṣvanvayo nānyasyeti atra sāṃkhyaḥ prāha  na nivṛttimityādi  bhāvānvayo bhāvānāmekarūpatvaṃ apara iti vastubhūtaḥ  tadekasya bījasya yatkāryantadanyasya pṛthivyāderna syāt kasmāt  tayorbījapṛthivyoratyantabhedataḥ  yadyeta ityādinā vyācaṣṭe  eṣāmiti bhāvānāṃ yathā bījādekādīnāmekamaṃkurākhyaṃ kāryaṃ  yo hotyādinā tadeva sādhayati  yo hi tasya bījasyāṃkurajananabhāvāt anyena na syādutpannamyadi tajjanakasvabhāvo yaḥ sa evānyasyāpi syāt tena svabhāvena tatratatosbhinnaḥ syādityasti svabhāvānvayaḥ yadyekātmatayāneka  kāryasyaikasya kārakaḥ pisostīti vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ yadyaneka ekasvabhāvatvāt ekasya kārakaḥ teṣāmabhinna svabhāvaḥ sa hiekasannidhānepyasti hetvavaikalyāt ekopi janakaḥ syāt nāpaityabhinaṃ tad rūpaṃ viśeṣāḥ khalvapāyinaḥ nahi tasyābhinnasvabhāvasya arthāntarepi viśeṣosti  viśeṣe satyabhedaasvabhāvo na hi sonyasya pṛthivyāderasti  yosti buddhyāropito vyāvṛttilakṣaṇo na asa janakaḥ  kasmād  vyatirekasyānyavyāvṛttilakṣaṇasya niḥsvabhāvatvāt  tasmādbījasvalakṣaṇameva janakaṃ yacca janakarūpantadeva vastu  tajjanakaṃ cetyaṅkurajanakaṃsvalakṣaṇaṃ  aparatreti pṛthivyādau  aparaṃ pṛthivyādikamaṃkuraṃ janayet  sa hītyādi hi śabda evakārārthaḥ  tasyeti bījasya  anyasya pṛthivyādeḥ  sa pṛthivyādistenāṃkurajananena bījasvabhāvena tato bījādabhinnaḥ syāt  ityastisvabhāvānvayaḥ tena kecit svabhāvabhedepi prakṛtyaikakāryakāriṇa indriyādivadityayuktamuktamiti yadītyādinā siddhānta vā dī  ātmaikatrāpīti  kāraṇakalāpasya yenābhinnenātmanā janakatvamiṣyate  sa ātmā teṣāṃ kāraṇā nāmmadhye ekatrāpi kāraṇestīti  tenaikena kāryaṃ kṛtamiti kṛtvā vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ nanu vyāvṛttivādinopyantyāvasthāyāṃ sarveṣāṃ janakatvāt kāraṇāntaravaiyathyaṃ naitadasti  samuditānāmeva teṣāntādṛśaṃ sāmarthya kṣaṇikānāṃ  hetupratyayāyattasannidhitvāt  parasya tu nityavādinaḥ sadā tad rūpamastīti bhavetkāraṇāntarāṇāmānarthakyaṃ  ata evoktamekatrāpi sostīti kāraṇāntaravikalāvasthāyāmapītyarthaḥ yadītyādinā vyācaṣṭe  anekaḥ padārtho yadyekasvabhāvatvādekasya kāryasya kārakaḥjanakaḥ sa teṣāṃ kāraṇābhimatānāmabhinno janaka svabhāva ekakāraṇasannidhānepyasti  tataśca sarvasyāmavasthāyāmavaikalyāt kāraṇasya yatra tatrāvasthitireko pijanaka syāt   etadeva draḍhayannāha  yasmādityādi  ekasminnapi bījādau sannihite nāpatyabhinnaṃ tatkāryajananaṃ sāmānyarūpaṃ  viśeṣā vyaktibhedā apāyinaḥ  na hi tasyāhāneḥ  sa hi tatrāpyastīti naikasya sthitāvapi tasyāpāyosti  ye viśeṣāavasthābhedāsteṣāṃ sahasthitiniyamābhāvāt syādapāyaḥ na ca te janakā iṣṭāḥ  sahakāriṇāṃ hi ekasvabhāvatayā janakatvābhyupagamāt tasmād janakasya sthānāt asthāyinojanakatvāt ekasthitāvapi kāryotpattiḥsyāt na ca bhavati  tataḥekāpāye phalābhāvād viśeṣebhyastadudbhavaḥ aneka sahakārisādhāraṇaṃ kārya ekaviśeṣāpāyepi na syād sarvaviśeṣā pāyepi syāt  nanvakhilepyabhinna rūpe na bhavati  kāryaṃ hi kutaścid bhāvadharmīna syāt ya bhavati tattasya vaikalyāt  na cābhinnasya ekasya sthitāvapi vaikalyamasti  avikale tasmin abhavat tasyājanakatāṃ sūcayati bhinnasya kāryajananasvabhāvasya bījādarthāntarepi pṛthivyādau viśeṣosti  kiṅkāraṇam viśeṣe satyabhedahāneḥ  sa hyabhinno janakābhimataḥ svabhāvastatrāpi bījepikevalestīti naikasya sthitāvapi tasyetyabhinnasya rūpasya janakābhimatasyāpāyovināśosti  traiguṇyasya sarvātmanā sarvatra sarvadā sattvāt  ye viśeṣā avasthābhedāsteṣāṃ sahasthitiniyamābhāvāt syādapāya etaccābhyupagamyoktaṃ anyathā nityādavasthāntaravyatiriktānāṃ viśeṣāṇāmapi kathamapāyaḥ  na ca te janakā iti viśeṣāḥ kasmānneṣṭā ityāha  sahakāriṇāmityādi  tasmādekasminnapi bījādau sthite janakasyātmanaḥ sthānāt asthāyina iti viśeṣasya  eka sthitāvapīti bījāderanyatamasya sthitāvapi kāryotpattiḥ syāt  na ca bhavati kāryotpattiḥ  tataḥ sāmānyasthitepi sahakāriṇāmmab dhye ekasya viśeṣasyāpā ye  phalābhāvād viśeṣebhyastadudbhavaḥ kāryodbhavaḥ na sāmānyāt  tatkāryamaṅkurādikaṃ  kiṃ bhūtaṃ  aneka mityādi  anekasya sahakāriṇaḥ sādhāraṇaṃ  anekasahakārijanyamityartha  eka viśeṣāpāyepīti sahakāriṇāmanyatamabhedāpāyepi  anena vyatirekamāha punarityādinānvayaṃ  tasmād viśeṣeṣvevānvayavyatireko kāryasya na tusāmānye  tadāha  nanvavikala iti  ekaviśeṣasthitāvavikalepyabhinnerūpe tatkāryanna bhavati  kāryaṃ hītyādinaitadeva vibhajate  kutaścid bhāva utpādasa eva dharmaḥ  sa yasyāsti tat tadbhāvadharma  kadācit yatra bhavati tattasya janakasya vaikalyānna cābhimnasya rūpasya janakābhimatasya sahakāriṇāṃ madhye  ekasyasthitāvapi vaikalpamasti  avikale tasmin sāmānyarūpe kāryamabhavata tasya sāmā sāmānyacintāyatsākalyavaikalyābhyāṃ tata eva kāryasyotpattiḥ tasmin sati bhavato niyamaḥsyāt  tadanyasmādutpattikalpanāyāṃ hi atiprasaṅgāt  tasmād viśeṣā evajanakā na sāmānyam  tatasta evaṃ vastu sa pāramārthiko bhāvo ya evārthakriyākṣamaḥ idameva hi vastvavastulakṣaṇaṃ artha kriyāyogyatāyogyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ  obarthakriyāsamartho yogyorthaḥ saca nānveti yonveti na tasmāt kāryasaṃbhavaḥ tasmād sarva sāmānya prakriyāyogyatvāt na vastviti vastu viśeṣaeva tata eva taniṣpatteḥ svabhāvānanvayāt tarhi ekasya janakaṃ rūpaṃ tadanyasya nāstīti prajanakaḥ syāt nyasyājanakātmatāṃ sacayati    nanu na sāmānyameva janakamiṣyate yenāyandoṣaḥ syādapi tu anekātmatayājanaka ityuktamityatrāha  yatsākalyetyādi  yeṣāṃ ca viśeṣāṇāṃ sākalyavakalyābhyāṃ kāryambhāvābhāvavat  tata eva viśeṣebhyaḥ kāryasyotpattiḥ  tasmin satītihetubhāvayogye viśeṣe sati bhavataḥ kāryasya  tadanyasmā diti  viśeṣādanyasmātsāmānyādatiprasaṃgāt sarvaḥ sarvasya kāraṇaṃ syāt  yata evaṃ tasmād viśeṣā evajanakāḥ  na sāmānyaṃ janakaṃ  tatojanakatvāt ta eva viśeṣā vastu  paramārthasanta ityarthaḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ    yasmāt pāramārthiko bhāvaḥ paramārthasannityarthaḥ sa evārthakriyākṣamaḥ idameva hotyādinā vyācaṣṭe  arthakriyāyogyatā nitya ityādinopāttabhede sādhyesmin pradhānādike dharmaṇi  bhaveddheturananvayaḥ  nāsya sādhyadharmaviśeṣaṇadṛṣṭāntenvayostītyananvayaḥ  yata evaṃ   sattāyāntena sādhyāyāmviśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavet anye tu sattāyāmityādi paścād dharmādau vyākhyāya  pūrvārddhamupāttabhedamityādipaścād vyācakṣate  śabdacintāsattāyāṃ tena sādhyāyāṃ viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavet sa hi dharmī pradhānalakṣaṇa eko nittyasukhādyātmakonyo vā yathākathañcidapiviśeṣitaḥ tatsvabhāvaḥ siddhaḥ syāt  sa ca tathā nānveti nan yaḥ sattā mātrānvayī siddhaḥ na tena siddhena kimapi  śragnyādiṣu na evaṃprasaṃgaḥ tatrāpi nāgnisattāyāṃ kaścid vivādaḥ  viśiṣṭādhāraviśeṣaṇābhimata   asthānanvayād asiddhiḥ na baisa ādhārī viśeṣīkaroti  tadayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇād ityuktaṃvakṣyate ca sa ho tyādinā vyācaṣṭe  eko mūlaprakṛterbhedābhāvāt  nityo niranvayavināśābhāvāt  triguṇatvātmakatvāt sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaḥ  anyo veti kattṛtvādiyuktaḥ  yathākathaṃcidapīti  yathoktaṃrddha samastairvyastairvā viśeṣitaḥ tatsvabhāva iti yathokta viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasvabhāva    sa ca dharmī tatheti viśiṣṭenasvabhāvena nānveti sapakṣe  tathā bhūtasya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇosiddheḥ  na tena siddhenetisattāmātreṇa  sattāmātre vivādābhāvāt  nanvityādi paraḥ  evaṃ prasaṅga iti yaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣavikalpena sattāyāmuktaḥ  taduktaṃ   viśeṣānugamābhāva sāmānye siddhasādhyate ti yasmāttatrāpyagnyādiṣu sādhyeṣu nāgnisāttāyāṃ kaścidvivādostyagnimātrasyasiddhatvāt  na ca tena siddhena kiñcit tasyāpravṛttyaṅgatvāt  deśādiviśiṣṭohyagniḥ pravṛttyaṅgaṃ nāgnimātraṃ  sa eva tahi sādhya ityāha  viśiṣṭa ādhāroyatrāgnyādikaṃ sādhyate sa viśeṣaṇaṃ yasyāgnyādikasya sa viśiṣṭādhāra viśeṣaṇaṃ   tasya  sādhyatvenābhimatasya  sapakṣenanvayādasiddhiḥ netyā cārya  na baisa ādhāro viśeṣaṇabhāvena gṛhītopi tamagnimviśeṣīkaroti  yenānvayaḥ syāt  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ  tadayoga ityādi  tasya dharmasyatasmin dharmiṇyayogo ya āśaṃkitastasya vyavacchadena viśeṣaṇāt  etacca pakṣadharma  ityatroktaṃ  vakṣyate ca caturthe paricchede  nanu ca vyāptigrahaṇakāle pradeśāyogavyavacchinno vahnirasiddhaḥ  tatsiddhauvā kimarthonvayānugamaḥ  katham  asiddho yasmāt  yatra yatra dhūmastatra ta  trāgni riti vyāptiṃ pratiyatā sāmānyenābhimatadeśāyogavyavacchinnopi bahnirākṣipta eva kevalamidānīmasmindeśe vahrirityevaṃ viśeṣapratītyarthamanvayānugamanamiṣyate ang ka sa pamama sadv te madhe me me me me me me plagempakkan ppramāṇavāttikasvavṛttiṭīkātasmāt tatra sāmānyasyaivāyogavyavacchedena sādhanam  na tathātra kvacitsattāsiddhiḥ  pradhānādiśabdavācyasyaivārthasyābhāvāt nirviśeṣeṇaiva sā sattā kathaṃ sa vijñātavyobhidhātavyo niścetavyaśceti sopi siddha eva  tatkimidānīṃ jñeyaṃ prastīti siddhirastu  tathāpi ki siddhaṃ syāt  anyatra tadevāgnisāmānyaṃ tatra na siddhamiti sādhyate tatrāpi tadayogavirahiṇā sāmānyenānvayo na siddha eva na vai kaścit tathābhūtenārthenānvayaṃ karoti  tasmāt paraṃ pratipādayatā yatradhamastatrāgniriti dhūmognināntarīyakognyavinābhāvī darśanīyaḥ sa tathāgnimātreṇa vyāptaḥ siddho yatraiva svayaṃ dṛśyate tatraivāgnibuddhi janayati  tatra sādhyanirdetasmādityupasaṃhāraḥ  tatreti pradeśādau  tadayogavyavacchedeneti tasmin pradeśādaub dharmaṇi sādhyadharmasyāyogavyavacchedena sāmānyasyāgnimātrasya sādhanāt  nāstyanvayadoṣaḥ  nāpi siddhasādhyatā pradeśāyogavyavacchedasyāsiddhatvāt  pradhānādike dharmiṇyayogavyavacchedena sattāmātraṃ sādhyamiti cedāha  na tathetyādi  kvaciditi pradhānādike dharmaṇi  kasmāt    pradhānādiśabdavācyasyaivārthasya traiguṇyādilakṣaṇasyaivābhāvāt  niviśeṣeṇaiva sā sattā  viśeṣaṇabhūtasyādhārasyābhāvāt   kathamityādi paraḥ  sopi dharmī kathaṃ vijñātavyaḥ  jñātvā ca śabdenābhidhātavyaḥ  abhihitaḥ pramāṇena niścetavyaḥ  tasmājjñeyatvādibhiḥ sopi siddhaeva  tasmin sattā sāmānyaṃ sādhyate  tatkimidānīṃ jñeyanniviśeṣaṇamastītyetāvatā pradhāna sya siddhirastu  jñeyādyartho hi pradhānārtha śabdārtharūpa syānnanityādiguṇopetaḥ  pradhānantāvatsiddhambhavatyanye ca dharmā anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ setsyaṃteiti cedāha  tathāpi jñeyatvādinā ki siddhaṃ syāt  naivābhimatasya pradhānasya svalakṣaṇasya siddhi syāt  asya śabdārtharūpatvāt  agnyanumānepi tarhyagnimātraṃ siddhamityasādhyaṃ syādityāha  anyatra tu tadevāgnisāmānyaniyatādhāramasiddhantatra deśe na siddhamiti sādhyate nanu tatrāpi tadayogavirahiṇeti tena pradeśenāyogastadayogastena virahaḥpradeśena yoga ityarthaḥ  sosti yasya sāmānyasya tattathoktaṃ  tenānvayo na siddhaḥ netyādinā pariharati  na vai kaścinyāyajñaḥ tathābhūtena pradeśasambandhināgnisāmānyena vyāptiṃ karoti  tasmāt paraṃ prativādinaṃ pratipādayatā dhūmognināntarīyakognyavinābhāvī darśanīyaḥ  yatra dhūmastatrāgnirityevaṃ  sa dhūmastatheti sarvopasaṃhāravyāptipradarśanenāgnimātreṇa vyāptaḥ siddho yatraiva pradeśe śabdacintāśena na kiñcit prayojanam  tatra darśanāt sambandhākhyānamātrācceṣṭasya siddhaḥ tadanirdeśe ca kathaṃ tadviśiṣṭenvayaḥ  tad śrayaṃ agnyavinābhāvitayā siddhaḥ  arthātagnireva pradeśenāyogaṃ vyavacchinatti  tasmāt sa nirupākhyespi syāt yadi nirupākhyābhāvānna pratiṣedhaviṣayatvam  tataḥ kiṃ vidhiviṣayosti tadapi neti cet  kathaṃ na sa pratiṣedhaviṣaya   vidhinivṛttirūpatvāt pratiṣedhasya miti viruddhatāṃ  tatra vastudharmasādhye  kimviśiṣṭetanmātravyāpini  tena ca sādhyadharmeṇa liṃgasya vyāptiḥ  kathaṃcidityanvaya makhenayorabhāva iti nāyaṃ prasaṃgaḥ  vyāptau dharmisamāśraye vāniścite sati tatsvabhāvatayā gamako na sa kaścidapi gamakaḥ syāt  ataeva svadharmeṇa vyāptaḥ siddha  bsvabhāvo gamako vācyaḥ na hi prakāśatayā pradīpo hi prakāśakaḥ tadrūpāpratipattau svāmarthakriyāṃ karoti siddhaḥ svabhāvo gamako vyāpakastasya niścitaḥ taddharmaniścayādevavyāpitvaniścaye hi taddharmiṇo dharmaḥ gamyasvabhāvaḥ  śrayaṃ nivṛttāvapi tannivarttakaḥ  tasyāyaṃ vyāpako dharmaḥ svayaṃ nivarttamāno vyāpyasya tasya dharmasya nivarttakaḥ yadyasyābhāve na bhavet evaṃ hyasya vyāpakaḥ siddho bhavati tasmād etena gamakalakṣaṇena dvividhasyāpi sādhanaprayogasya gamakalakṣaṇaṃvyatirekamukheṇa   na  vā yadi niścīyate  na virodhavyabhicārau  na viruddhatvasanai kāntikatvamvā  iti hetornāyaṃ prasaṃgosiddhi  ddha viruddhānaikāntikalakṣaṇaḥ aniścitāyāntu sādhyadharmeṇa liṅgasyāvyāptau  dharmasamāśraye vā pakṣadharmatvevāsniścite sati tatsvabhāvatayā niścitatrairūpyasvabhāvatayā yo gamakobhimatoheturna sa kaścid gamakaḥ  ata eva kāraṇāt svadharmeṇa svena sādhyarūpeṇa vyāptaḥsādhyadharmiṇi siddho niścito hetusvabhāvo vācyaḥ etadeva draḍhayannāha  na hotyādi  prakāśatayā prabhāsvaratayā ghaṭādīnaprakāśayanyadā kadācid ghaṭādyudarāntarvartī bhavati tadā tadrūpāpratipattau prabhāsvaratā pratipattausatyāṃ svāmarthakriyāṃ ghaṭādiprakāśanalakṣaṇāṃ na hi karoti gamakasvarūpamabhidhāyādhunā gamyasvarūpamāha  vyāpakastasyeti  yosau gamakovyāpyaḥ svabhāvastasya vyāpakaḥ svabhāvaḥ niścito gamyaḥ taddharmetyādinā vyāṃcaṣṭe  dharmiṇo dharmo gamya    kīdṛśastasya gamakatvenābhimatasya vyāpakatvena niścitaḥ  kathaṃ punarvyāpakatvena niścita ityāha taddharmaniścayādeva vyāpyadharmaniścayādeva iyatā gamya gamakayoḥ svarūpandarśitaṃ nivarttyanivarttakayorapi svarūpamāha  tasyetyādi  ayamiti vyāpako dharmaḥsvayaṃ nivṛttau satyāṃ tasya vyāpyasya nivarttakaḥ tasyetyādinā vyācaṣṭe  ayaṃ vyāpako dharmaḥ svayanivarttamānastasya vyāpyasyanivarttaka iti sambandha  kiṅkāraṇaṃ  yasmādevaṃ hyasyāyaṃ sādhyo dharmo vyāpakaḥsiddho bhavati  yadyasya vyāpakasyābhāve vyāpyo na kāraṇaṃ   yasmāt sādharmyeṇāpi hi prayogerthāt sāmarthyāt  sādhyavipakṣāddhetorvyāvṛttirvaidharmyantasya gatiḥ tadeva sāmarthyamāha  asatītyādi  tasminniti vaidharmye  evaṃ hi sādhyenānvito he tuḥ syād yadi sādhyābhāve na bhavet  tathā vaidharmya iti vaidharmyaprayoge tasminnityanvaye yadi hi sādhyena hetoranvayaḥ syāt tadāyaṃ sādhyanivṛttau nivartteta etacca vya ti re ka cintā yāmvakṣyāmaḥ  anityatve yathā kāryaṃ  anitya eva kṛtakatvaṃ  etaccānvayina udāharaṇaṃ akāryamvā  avināśinīti vyatirekiṇa udāharaṇaṃ  tenāyamartho bhavati   avināśini vināśābhāve sati  akāryaṃ kṛtakatvanna bhavati  tadevāha anenetyādi  anayorityanvayavyatirekiṇo  yatkiñciditi sarvopasaṃhāreṇa śabda  cintāvyāptaṃ kathitamiti śabdopi kṛtakatvavacanasāmarthyādevānittyaḥ śabda iti bhavati tasmānnāvaśyaṃ pakṣo nirdeśya   śrayaṃ hi anvayī prayogaḥ vyatirekespi iti anityatvābhāve kṛtakatvasyābhāvaḥ  śabda kṛtaka ititatsvabhāvasiddhaḥ  tadabhāve na bhavataḥ kṛtakatvasya śabde ca bhāva khyātau tadātmanobhāvaḥ sāmarthyāt siddhaḥ pūrvat pratijñāvacanaṃ prakṛtaka iti anvayastu arthāpattyā siddhaḥ  tadātmaniyatasya tannivṛttau tannivṛtteḥ  niyamaṃprasādhya nivṛttirvaktavyā sā cet siddhā tadātmaniyamaṃ arthādākṣipatīti siddhonvayaḥ vyāptikathanenārthānnityād vyāvṛttiḥ kṛtakatvasyokteti vyatirekamatiḥ  śabdaścakṛtaka iti pakṣadharmakathanaṃ  pakṣa kasmānnocyata ityāha  kṛtakasyetyādi  anityatvena vyāptaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ yadā śabdena kathitantadā niyamena svaṃ vyāpakaṃ sannidhāpayatīti sāmarthyādevānityaḥ śabda iti bhavati  tasmānāvaśyamityādi  itisādharmyaprayoge vaidharmyavantaṃ prayogamāha  vyatirekepītyādi  etaccākāryamvā vināśītyetasya vivaraṇaṃ  ihāpi na pratijñāvacanaṃ  yasmāt siddhasvabhāvatayā niścitayānityasvabhāvatayā hetubhūtayā  tadabhāva ityanityatvābhāve sati na sādharmyaprayogavat nanvatra vaidharmyaprayogenvayo nokta ityāha  anvayastvityādi  anvayamantareṇa vaidharmyasyānupapattirarthāpattiḥ  kiṅkāraṇaṃ    na hotyādi svabhāvasya heturasti yadi sarvajanmināṃ anityatāsiddheḥ janmināmeva svabhāvo vināśī  na vaijanma nāśasvabhāvahetu na cāhetoḥ svabhāvaniyamaḥ  tasmānnātra hetoḥ kvacitsvabhāvapravibhāgaḥ  tadabhāvāt phalasya sato vā nāstītyasamānam  seyaṃ vināśasyanirapekṣatā kvacit kadācit bhāvavirodhinī tadabhāvaṃ sattathā sādhayati  yo hisyādetat  na hetukṛtaḥ svabhāvabhedo bhāvānāṃ kintu svabhāva eva kasyacit  tādṛśasvabhāvonyasya cānyādṛśa ityāha  na cetyādi  ākasmikaiti nirhetuka  anapekṣasyāhetoḥ  kvaciddeśe  kvacitkāle  kvacicca śālibījādau dravye śālyaṃkurotpādanasya svabhāvasya niyamo na syāt  kintu sarvvasyasarvadā sarvatra bhavedapekṣābhāvāt  tasmād deśādikamapekṣya bhavanniyamo hetumānitigamyate  yathā śālibījādīnāṃ svabhāvaniyamastathātrāpi kṛtakeṣu satsu vāniyamaheturvaktavyo yato niyāmakāddhetoḥ kṛtakāssanto vā keci naśvarātmānojātā nānye syādetad  yadi nāma niyāmako heturna śakyate darśayituntathāpi sambhāvyataityāha  na cātra loke naśvarasya svabhāvasya niyāmako heturasti  na sambhāvyataeveti yāvat  sarveṣāṃ janmavatāṃ nāśasya siddhedṛ ṣṭatvāt  aniyatahetuko vināśaiti yāvat yadi sarvajanmināṃ vināśasiddhirevantarhi sattvāditi hetu ranaikāntika syāttadāha  janmītyādi  janmavatāmeva svabhāvo nāśī nājanmavatāṃ  nākāśādīnāṃsatāmapīti paro manyate  ā cā rya āha  na vai janmeti  na hi janmavaśād bhāvasyasvabhāva utpadyate  tasmānna janma nāśasya hetuḥ  nāpyākāśādau sattvamastītyāha na cetyādi  ahetorākāśāde svabhāvaniyamaḥ svarūpaniyamohetordeśakālaprakṛtiniyamā yogāt  yataśca sarvajanmināṃ vināśasiddhirākāśādīnāṃ cāsattvaṃ tasmānnātra kṛtakeṣu satsu vā hetornaśvarānaśvarajanakatvena svabhāvapravibhāgaḥ tadbhāvāddhetupravibhāgābhāvāt phalasya kṛtakasya sato vā naśvarānaśvarapravibhāgonāstītyasamānaṃ yavabījādinā  seyamvināśasya nirapekṣatā kvacid vastuni kadācit kāle vināśasya yo bhāvastena virodhinī karoti tadabhāvaṃ  tasya kvacita śabdacintāsvabhāvanirapekṣaḥ tasya kvacit kadācicca sattāyāṃ tatkāladravyāpekṣaḥ tadapekṣatvātiti nirapekṣa eva na syādityuktam  avināśasya svabhāvaḥ sa tadanapekṣatvātnirhetuka syāt sattāhetubhāvādeva tathotpatteḥ  sattā hi bhavataḥ tādṛśasyaiva bhāvasyābhāvāt nāvaśyaṃ sataḥ kutaścid bhāva iti cet atha sattaiva ākasmikīti neyaṃ kasyacitkadācicca vināśasyābhāvaṃ svabhāvena sattayā sādhayati  sarvatra sarvakālambhāvaṃsādhayatīti yāvat  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ  yo hītyādi  tatkāladravyāpekṣa iti yasminkāle bhavati yatra vā dravye  taṃ kālaṃ dravyañcāpekṣata iti nirapekṣa eva na syādityuktaṃprāk nanu vināśakahetvanapekṣatvena vināśasyānapekṣatvaṃ na tu kālādyanapekṣatvena   tatkathamucyate tatkāladravyāpekṣa iti nirapekṣa eva vināśo na syāditi  yadica kālānapekṣo vināśaḥ dvitīyepi kṣaṇe vināśo na syāt tatkālāpekṣatvāt dravyānapekṣatve ca kasya tarhi vināśa syāt evammanyate  jātasya tadbhāvenyonapekṣaṇāditi vacanāt  dvitīya evakṣaṇe vināśo bhavati nānyasmin kṣaṇe   tathā sarvasya jātasya bhavati nadravyaviśeṣasya  tena dravyāgnapekṣatve kasya tahi vināśo bhavatu   iti nirastaṃ  kālāntare dravyaviśeṣe ca nāśasya bhāve kālāntarasyadravyaviśeṣasya ca vināśakatvameva syāt  vināśasya tadbhāva eva bhāvāt tasmāt tatkāladravyāpekṣatve nirapekṣa eva na syādityucyate tahīti paraḥ  netyā cāryaḥ  sattāyā yo heturbhāvastasmā deva tathotpatternaśvarasvabhāvasyotpatteḥ  etadeva spaṣṭayati  sato hi bhavata iti sattāṃpratipadyamānasya tādṛśasyaiva naśvarasvabhāvasyaiva    bhāvāt  nāvaśyaṃ sataḥ padārthasyakutaścit kāraṇād bhāva utpādana iti cet  keciddhi santopi notpattimantoyathākāśādaya iti paro manyate  ākasmikītyahetukā  neyaṃ sattā kasyacidarthasyakadācit kāle kvacid dravye virameta nanu ca ghaṭādīnāṃ svahetutaḥ sattāniyame kathamākāśādisattāprasaṅgaḥ sattyaṃ    kintu na kasyacid virametetyasyāyamarthaḥ  na sa kaścid bhāvoyatsvabhāvosāvākāśādirna syāt sarvātmakaḥ prasajyata ityeke  tadayuktaṃ   yadi hi ghaṭādirūpamākāśe syādahetukaṃ syāt tasya mṛtpiṇḍādikamantareṇa bhāvāt tasmānneyamākāśādessattā  kasyacidātmāde kadācit kāle kvacid deśe b kadācit kvacit virameta  tasmānneyaṃ kasyacit kadācit  yasya yatra kiṃcitna pratibaddham  seyaṃ sattā kvacidapratibandhinī cet na niyamavatī syāt  tasmāneyaṃ sattākasmikī kvacit atha kathamahetuko vināśa ukta iti cet  jātasya tadbhāvenyasyānapekṣaṇatvāt  na cātra vināśo nāma kaścid bhāva eva hi nāśaḥ sa eva hi kṣaṇasthāyī jātaḥ  tasmād mandāḥ tatsvabhābaṃ tadūrdhvaṃ vyavasyantina prāk darśanepi pāṭavasyābhāvāt ityuktam  tatsāmarthyāt avidyā tadvaśenāvidyāhatadṛṣṭe nāśavat paścād vināśyaḥ  tadayaṃ vināśaḥ  sattāvyatirekeṇavirameta  deśakāladravyaniyatā na bhavedityarthaḥ etadeva draḍhayannāha  taddhītyādi  taddhi vastu  kiṃcidupalīyetāśrayet yasya yatra kiṃcidutpādādikaṃ pratibaddhamāyattaṃ  na copalīyeta yasya yatrāpratibaddhaṃ seyaṃ sattā kvacidapratibandhinī cet  dravyakālāpekṣayā na niyamavatī syāt  tathācākāśasyeyaṃ sattā nātmanaḥ  ātmanassattā na kālasyetyādi na syāt  yataścaivantasmāntreyaṃ sattākasmikī kvacinnityābhimateṣvapi yadi sattāhetoreva vinaśvarasyotpādaḥ kathamidānīmahetuko vināśa ukta itivyāghātamāha jātasyetyādinā pariharati  jātasya niṣpannasya tadbhāve vinaśvaratābhāvejanakāddhetoranyasyānapekṣaṇāt ahetuko vināśa uktaḥ  uktaṃ cātra prāk yathā na vināśo nāmānya evakaścid bhāvāt kintu bhāva eva hi nāśaḥ nanu ca pradhvaṃsābhāvo nāśaḥ sa kathambhāvasvabhāvo bhavatītyāha sa eva hotyādi  yasmāt svahetoreva kṣaṇasthāyī jātastasmād bhāva eva nāśauktaḥ  ya eva sattākālo bhāvasya tamevaikaṃ kṣaṇaṃ sthātuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa tathā  napunarutpadya kṣaṇamapi tiṣṭhati  yadi tiṣṭhenna kadācinna nivartteteti vakṣyāma yadyekakṣaṇasthāyī bhāvo vināśaḥ kasmāt pravāhavicchedāt prāgapi tathā naniścīyateniścayāccākṣaṇikaḥ sa ityāha  tamasyetyādi  taṃ nāśasvabhāvamasyaghaṭāderāsaṃsāramavidyānubandhāt mandā udhvaṃ pravāhavicchedakāle vyavasyanti na prākūsattākāle  darśanepīti naśvarasvabhāvasya satyapi darśano  na darśanakāledhyavasāyosti  avidyā sāma  sadṛśāparotpattyā ca darśanapāṭavasyābhāvāt yataśca santānavicchedakāle nāśasvabhāvasya niścayastasmāt tadvaśena niścaya śabdacintānānyamapekṣata ti tadvyāpī  vināśakāraṇānapekṣoyaṃ kathaṃ patipadyeteti cettaddhetorasāmarthyāt  prabhāvakāriṇaḥ kriyāyāḥ pratiṣedhācca śabdaḥ kimu  kathaṃhisāmarthyābhāva iti cet  siddhe hi bhāve kārako na taṃ karoti  anyakriyāṃ tasya nakiñciditi tadatadrūpasya kiṃcitkaratvāt tadatadbhāvokiṃcitkaropi nāpekṣate kriyāpratiṣedhastu kathamiti cet  vināśa iti hi bhāvasyābhāvante manyante tad ayaṃ vināśaheturabhānaṃ karotīti prāptam  tatra yadyabhāvo nāma kaścit kāryasvabhāvaḥ syāt  sa eva bhāva iti nābhāvaḥ syāt  tasmādabhāvaṃ karotīti bhāvaṃvaśena  paścāditi yasmin kāle nāśasvabhāvasya niścayastatkālopādhirevasa bhāvasya vināśasvabhāvo vyavasthāpyate  dṛṣṭāntamāha  vikāretyādi yathā viṣadravyaṃ gṛhītamapi bhrāntisadbhāvāt prāganavadhāritamajñaiḥ puruṣaiḥ paścādviṣakṛtasya vikārasya lālāsrutyāderdarśanena viṣaṃ vyavasthāpyate tadvat  etāvanmātreṇāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto na tu māraṇaśaktirgṛhītā paścādavadhāryata iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ taditi tasmād ayamvināśa iti sambandhaḥ  vastuno yā sattā tadvyatirekeṇa nakiṃcid vināśakāraṇamapekṣata iti tadvyāpī sattāvyāpī kathamityādi paraḥ  asāmarthyācceti prativacanaṃ  taddhetoriti nāśahe toḥ cakārādakārakatvācca  etadeva vivṛṇvannāha  abhāvakāriṇa ityabhāvakāritayābhimatasya kriyāyāḥ kārakatvasya pratiṣedhācceti  avastukārī yobhimataḥsokāraka eva bhavati  asāmarthyandarśayitumāha  siddhe hotyādi  nāśaheturbhāvādabhinnamvā vināśaṃ kuryāttatonyamvā  na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhe hi bhāve kārakonāśahetustambhāvaṃ na karoti siddhatvādeva  nāpi dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ  yato nāpyanya bkriyāntasya bhāvasya na kiñcit  tadavasthatvāt  tadatadrūpetyādi  bhāvarūpasyatatonyasya ca vināśasya kāraṇācyākiñcitkaro vināśaheturato nāpekṣyata itisiddhamasāmarthya kriyāpratiṣedhastu kathamityāha  vināśa iti hi bhāvasyābhāvante hetumannāśavādino manyante  asmābhirbhāvasvabhāva eva vināśa ityu ktaṃ  taditi tasmādayaṃ vināśa hetuvināśaṃ karotyabhāvaṃ karotīti prāptaṃ  tatraitasmin prāpte sati yadyabhāvo nāma kaścit svabhāvaḥ kārya syāt  tadā kāryatvādaṃkurādivat sa eva bhāvaiti nābhāvaḥ syāt  atha yathā ghaṭo ghaṭarūpeṇa kārya paṭaśca paṭarūpeṇa kāryo na tukāryatvād ghaṭaḥ paṭo bhavati  tathā bhāvo bhāvarūpeṇa kāryobhāvopyabhāvarūpeṇakārya syāt  na tu bhāva eva bhavatīti  tadayuktambhavatīti hi bhāvo na bhavatītia na karotīti kriyāpratiṣedhosya kṛtaḥ syāt  tathāpi prathamakicitkaraḥ kimitinivarttyate  siddhā vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣā bhāvasya  tasmāt asāmarthyācca taddhetorbhavatyeva svabhāvataḥ cābhāvastenābhāvo bhāvavirodhī na cābhāvarūpatayā tasya pratibhāsanādabhāvarūpatā  bhavanadharmatvenābhāvarūpatayā pratibhāsa eva na syāditīdameva codyate na ca parasparaviviktarūpatayābhāvānāṃ pratibhāsaḥ  yataścābhāvasya nīrūpatvādakāryatvantasmādabhāvaṃ karotīti bhāvaṃ na karotīti vākyārtha syāt  tena kriyāpratiṣedhosya nāśahetoḥ kṛtaḥ syāt  tathāpi kriyāpratiṣedhepyayaṃ vināśaheturakiñcitkaraḥ  kimiti nāśepekṣyate bhāveneti siddhā vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣā bhāvasya nanu nirhetukepi vināśe kathamvināśaṃ pratyanapekṣā bhāvasya  svabhāvo hi satasyetthaṃ yenāpekṣya nivarttate virodhinaṃ    yathānyeṣāṃ pravāho mudgarādikaṃ  tenapūrvamvirodhinobhāve nānivṛtteḥ kathaṃ kṣaṇikatvamiti tadayuktaṃ  yato virodhyapekṣasvabhāvatvaṃ yadi vastuno na pūrvamapi tadāsya pūrvottararūpayorbhedād nityatvameva  atha pūrvamapi sa svabhāvosti tadā pūrvamapyasya nivṛttiḥsyāt  atha tadā virodhyabhāvānna nivarttate  kathantarhi virodhyapekṣasvabhāvatvaṃ  satyeva virodhiṃni  virodhyapekṣasvabhāvatvasya bhāvānnānyadā  yadivirodhī vastuno nopakārakaḥ kathantantadapekṣate  upakāre vā virodhisannidhānepyaparasya bhāvasyotpattiriti pūrvako bhāvastadavastho dṛśyeta  virodhe sannidhānābhāvenānivṛtteḥ  atha nivarttate  na tarhi virodhyapekṣayā bhāvasya nivṛttiḥ  yadica na bhāvamvināśayati kathamvirodhī  na ca kṣaṇikavādināṃ virodhisannidhānesattā no nivarttate  kintarhi notpadyate  tathā hi nirodhamupagacchanneva ghaṭomudgarādisahakāryapekṣaḥ kapālajanakatvena sadṛśakṣaṇānārambhako bhavatīti santānānutpattirna tu virodhinamapekṣya pravāho nivarttate  yataśca pūrvasantānenotpitsorbhāvasyavirodhisannidhāne santānānutpattirata evaṃ mandamatīnāṃ sahetukanāśādhyavasāyoa mudgarādau ca viro dhitvāvasāya iti sarvaṃ susthaṃ  tasmānnirapekṣatvādeva yatra nāmakvacid bhavaddṛṣṭo vināśastatraiṣa svabhāvata eva bhavati nanvahetukepi nāśe yadaiva ghaṭādernāśaḥ pratīyate tadaivāhetuka syānna pūrvamapratīterathakakṣaṇasthāyitvena ghaṭāderutpatteḥ pūrvamapi nāśa     nanu yathaikakṣaṇasthāyitvenotpattiḥ svahetubhyastathā nekakṣaṇasthāyitvenāpyutpattiḥ syāt  vicitraśaktayohi sāmagryo dṛśyante  tatra kācit syādapi yānaśvarātmānaṃ janayedityāha  śabdacintāyatra nāma bhavatyasmādanyatrāpi svabhāvataḥ soyaṃ kvacit sattādarśananirapekṣatvāt svabhāvaḥ syāt  tathānyatrāpisvabhāvabhāvī viśeṣābhāt asmādityādi  asmācca svabhāvamātrabhāvādanyatrāpi deśādivyavadhānenādṛṣṭe  tathā dṛṣṭe  virodhi sannidhānāt pūrvamapi svabhāvata eva vināśo bhavati evammanyate  yeṣāntāvadvināśo dṛśyate teṣāṃ yadi na pratikṣaṇaṃ vināśaḥ syāttadā vinā śapratītireva na syāt  tathā hi yadi dvitīye kṣaṇe bhāvasya sthitistadāsau sarvadaiva tiṣṭhet  dvitīyepi kṣaṇe kṣaṇadvayasthāyī svabhāvatvāt  tadāca tenāparakṣaṇadvayaṃ sthātavyaṃ  aparasminnapi kṣaṇe kṣaṇadvayasthāyisvabhāvatvādaparasmin kṣaṇevasthānaṃ syādevamuttarottare kṣaṇe draṣṭavyamityāsaṃsārambhāvasyasthitiḥ syāt atha prathame kṣaṇeṃ bhāvasya kṣaṇadvayasthāyī svabhāvo dvitīye kṣaṇa ekakṣaṇasthāyī tathāpi tayoḥ svabhāvayorbhedāt kṣaṇikatvaṃ syāt  na tvevamapi prathame kṣaṇe bhāvasyānekakṣaṇāvasthāyisvabhāvādakṣaṇikatvaṃ syānnāsaṃsāraṃ sthitiprasaṅgādityuktatvāt nanu dvitīyepi kṣaṇe bhāvasyottarakṣaṇānavasthānepi pūrvakṣaṇasthāyī rūpābhedenapūrvamapi sthānāt kṣaṇadvaya sthāyitvamastyeveti cet   na  pūrvambhāvasya hyeṣa svabhāvo yadekasmin kṣaṇe tiṣṭhatyanyasmin kṣaṇe sthāsyati  sa eva cetsvabhāvo dvitīye kṣaṇe tadāpyekasmin kṣaṇe tiṣṭhatyanyasminkṣaṇe dvayaṃ sthāsyatītyevamuttarottarakṣaṇepi draṣṭavyamiti na vināśo bhāvasya syāt dṛśyate ca  tasmād vināśapratītyanyathānupapattyā pratikṣaṇavināśānumānaṃ adṛṣṭeṣu tarhi kṛtakeṣu kathaṃ pratikṣaṇavināśitvānumānaṃ vināśasyaivādarśanāt naiṣa doṣo yasmāt teṣāmapi prathame kṣaṇe ya eva svabhāvaḥ sa eva cet dvitīyādikṣaṇe tadābhūtvā bhavanameva prathamakṣaṇavat  atha prathame kṣaṇe tasya janmaiva na sthitidvitīyeca kṣaṇe sthitireva na janma  evamapi kṣaṇikatvaṃ syāt  janmajanminoḥsthitisthitimatoścābhedāt  na ca dvitīye kṣaṇe janma vinā sthitiryuktā  janmacenna tadāsthitistasyā dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvitvāt  dvitīyādau kṣaṇepyevamiti sarvatrotpattireva na sthitiriti kṣaṇikatvaṃ  kiṃ ca parasparabhinnasyāparāparakālasambandhitvasya kṛtakād bhāvādabhinnatvāt kṣaṇikatvameva soyamityādinā kā rikārthamāha  ayamiti vināśaḥ  kvacid ghaṭādaumudgarādisannidhāne tathānyatrāpīti mudgarasannidhānāt pūrvamapi  evandeśādi byā kācid bhāvaviṣayā dvidhaivānumitistataḥ svasādhye kāryabhāvābhyāṃ saṃbandhaniyamāttayoḥ tasmāt bhāvaviṣayānumānaṃ dvividhameva kāryaliṅgaka svabhāvaliṅgakaṃ ca yathāsvaṃ viśeṣaka vyāpi sādhye ligini tayoreva pratibandhāt yathoktapūrvam    anupalabdhicintāka anupalabdheḥ prāmāṇyampravṛtterbuddhipūvatvāt tadbhāvānupalambhane  pravartitavyaṃ netyuktānupalabdheḥ pramāṇatā tṛtīya stu heturanupalabdheraviśeṣeṇa kvacidarthe gamaka ityucyate  sattāniścayadhvanivyavahārapratiṣedhe hi sarveva liṅgam vyavadhānepi  yatpūrvamupanyastantatra dvau vastusādhanāviti tadupasaṃharanāha  tata iti tasmādyā kācid bhāvaviṣayā kāryasvabhāvābhyāṃ liṅgābhyāṃ dvidhaivānumitiḥ  kasmāttayoḥkāryasvabhāvayoreva svasādhye sambandhaniyamāt  kārya liṅgaṃ yasyā anumiteḥ  evaṃsvabhāvo liṅgaṃ yasyā iti vigrahaḥ  yathāsvaṃ vyāpini sādhya iti kāryasya kāraṇaṃvyāpakaṃ sādhyaṃ    svabhāvasyāpi svabhāvo vyāpaka sādhyastasmin sādhye liṅginitayoreva kāryasvabhāvayoliṅgayoḥ pratibandhāt  anupalabdhimadhikṛtyāha  pravṛtterityādi  pravṛtteḥ  sanniścayaśabdavyavahāralakṣaṇayoḥ buddhipūrvatvāt pramāṇapūrvatvāt  tadbhāvānupalambhane tasya pravṛttiviṣayasyabhāvasya pratyakṣānumānābhyāmanupalambhane prekṣāvatā pravattitavyaṃ netīyatā leśenādṛśyaviṣayāyā apyanupalabdhe ruktā pramāṇatā  tṛtīyastu heturanupalabdhigamaka ityucyataiti sambandha  aviśeṣeṇeti dṛśyaviṣayetyamumviśeṣantyaktvā sāmānyena kvacidarthesādhye  sanniścayetyādinā tamevārthadarśayati  pramāṇapṛṣṭhabhāvī saditi vikalpaḥsanniścayaḥ  tatpṛṣṭhabhāvyeva saditi dhvaniḥ sacchandaḥ  tathaiva sadityanuṣṭhānaṃsadvyavahāraḥ teṣāṃ pratiṣedhe hi sarveva dṛśyaviṣayādṛśyaviṣayā ca nanu kā rikā yāṃ pravṛttirityuktantatkathaṃ vṛttau sanniścayetyādi vyākhyāyataityāha  sanniścayāddhītyādi  yasmāt satāṃ vidyamānānāṃ niścayācchandavyavahārāḥ śabda cintāsanniścayāddhi śabda vyavahārāḥ pravarttante  tasmāt te pravṛttirityuktam tathā hyanupalabdhirevāsatāmasattvamityuktam  tacca pratipattṛvaśāduktaṃ na vastuvaśāt  yāvadatrāpratipattiḥ tāvadatra svabhāvosya nāsti  satāpi tena tadarthākaraṇāt  vastutastu anupalabhyamāno na sannāsan  satāmapi svabhāvā divipra bkarṣādanupalambhāt tasyāsatsvapi tulyatvāt  tat pratipattuḥ pramāṇābhāvāt upalabdhilakṣaṇametat sattvaṃ tannivṛttaṃ svanimittān śabdavyavahārān nivarttayati tena yāpīyamanupalabdhirupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānāṃ sāpi vastutopyasattvarūpāpravṛttiyogyatvāt  tasyā api atra viṣaye tulyaṃ prāmāṇyam  asanninnaścayaphalāpi sā pravartante tasmātta sanniścayaśabdavyavahārāstrayopi pravṛttyaṅgatvāt puruṣapravṛttanimittatvāt pravṛttirityuktaḥ  tasmānna sū tra vṛ ttyorvyāghāta iti kimpuna kāraṇamupalambhanivṛttau sadvyavahāro nivarttate  tathā hyanupalabdhireva dviprakārāpyaviśeṣeṇāsattvamityuktaṃ prāka  taccāsattvamviprakṛṣṭāyāmanupalabdhaupratipattṛvaśāduktaṃ  pratipattā hyanupalabhyamānannāstītyadhyavasyati  na vastuvaśāt  tathā hi viprakṛṣṭerthe sattvamasattvañca sandigdhaṃ  tasmāt tāvaddhi savitrakṛṣṭo bhāvosya pratipatturnāsti yāvadatrāpratipattiḥ  kasmāt    satāpi tena viprakṛṣṭenārthenānupalabdhena tadarthākaraṇāt  tasya puṃsoryākaraṇāt  sannapyasatkalpaḥvastutastvanupalabhyamāno na sannāsan  kasmāt    satāmapi kadācitsvabhāvādiviprakarṣādanupalambhānnāsattāniścayaḥ  kvāpi sattāniścayastasyāsyānupalambhasyāsatsvapi tulyatvāt  taditi tasmāt  etat sattvamiti sambandhaḥ kimbhūtamanupalabdhilakṣaṇandeśādiviprakṛṣṭaṃ pratipattuḥ pramāṇābhāvāt  pratyakṣānumānābhāvānivṛttanna vastuvaśāt  kiṃ karoti  svanimittān śabda vyavahā arān nivarttayati upalabdhilakṣaṇamityanye paṭhanti  upalabdhireva sattvamupacārāt tathābhūtaṃsattvaṃ nivṛttamityarthaḥ yenaivantena kāraṇena yāpīyamanupalabdhiḥ  keṣām  anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānāṃ  yā vastutopyasattvarūpā  apiśabdāt pratipattṛvaśādapi  kiṃkāraṇam  apravṛttiyogyatvādasadvyavahārayogyatvāt  tasyā apyanupalabdheretatsadvyavahārapratiṣedhakatvena tulyaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ  atra viṣaye sadvyavahārapratiṣedhe yeyamanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānu palabdhirasanniścayaphalāpi sā  asanniścayaḥprasattāyāṃ tallakṣaṇo yadupalabdhiyogyaḥ sakaleṣvanyeṣu kāraṇeṣu san nopalabhyeta na punaḥ pūrvāsattāsādhanī śāstrādhikārāsambaddhā bahavorthā atīndriyāḥ  aliṅgāśca kathanteṣāṃ sabhāvonupalabdhitaḥ tadabhāvasādhanenupalabdhimātreṇa sarvārthānāṃ pramāṇatrayanivṛttyā siddhaṃ syāt iti  tasya śāstra sya nivṛttihi na hyabhāvasādhano tasya kvacidadhikāre pravṛtteḥ śāstrapravṛttau hi puruṣārthasādhanopāyaṃ kamapyāśritya pravṛttau  anyathāsaṃbaddha pralāpasya śraprāmāṇyāt tatra prakaraṇepi bahavorthā nāvaśyaṃ nirdeśyā yathā pratyātmaniyatā puruṣacetasaḥkasyacidaniyatanimittabhāvivṛttayaḥ  deśakāla viprakṛṣṭeṣu upadhānadravyabhedavat phalaṃ yasyā iti vigrahaḥ      asattāyāmityādinā vyācaṣṭe  asattāyāmapyaniścayepi yasmānna hyastisambhavo yadupalabdhiyogyo bhāvaḥ sakaleṣvanyeṣūpalambhakāraṇeṣu san vidyamāno nopalabhyeta  na punaḥ pūrvā viprakṛṣṭaviṣayānupalabdhirasattāsādhanī  tathā hi pratyakṣānumānāgamanivṛttilakṣaṇaivānupalabdhiḥ  tatra śāstrasyādhikārosmin prakaraṇetatrāsambaddhā anāntarīyakā bahavoryāḥ svabhāvādiviprakarṣiṇaḥ śāstre nādhikriyantaiti yāvat  pratyakṣasyāpi na te viṣayā ityāhātīndriyāḥ  nāpyanumānasya yasmādaliṅgā  naiṣāṃ liṅgamastītyaliṅgāḥ  teṣāmatīndriyāṇāmarthānāṃ pramāṇatrayānivṛttilakṣaṇāyā anupalabdhitaḥ kathamabhāvaḥ  naiva      soyamiti vādī  sarvārthānāmiti deśakālasvabhāvaviprakarṣiṇāṃ pramāṇatrayanivṛttyeti pratyakṣānumānāgamanivṛttyā  tasyeti śāstrasya kvacit puruṣārthānupayoginyarthenadhikāre viniyogābhāve pravṛtteḥ  yasmācchāstraṃ hotyādi  anyathetipuruṣārthānupayoginamarthamāśritya śāstrapravṛttau  abaddhapralāpasyāsambaddhābhidhāyinaḥśāstrasyāprāmāṇyāt syādetat    sarva evārthā puruṣārthopayogina ityatrāha  tatretyādi  tatraprakaraṇa iti puruṣārthacintāprastāve  pratyātmaniyatā iti pratipuruṣaniyatāḥ etena puruṣāṇāmānantyādānantyaṃ cetovṛttīnāmāha  aniyatānnimittād bhavituṃśīlaṃ yāsāmiti vigrahaḥ  anenaikasminnapi puṃsi nimittabhedād bahutvaṃ  evaṃbhūtāścetovṛttayo nāvaśyaṃ sākalyena pratipadaṃ nirdeśyā aśakyatvāt  kāladeśavyavahitā vā puruṣārthānupayogino dravyaviśeṣā nāvaśyaṃ nirdeśyāstato na tacchā śabdacintāna tacchāstraṃ viṣayīkaroti  na ca tathā viprakṛṣṭe svasāmarthyopadhānāt jñānotpādanaśaktirnāsti sa cāvaśyaṃ kāryopalambhasya cāpyabhāve yenānuminoti na ca te pramāṇatrayanivṛttāprapoti na niścayasāmarthyam  tasmāt sarvānupalabdhihi na nivṛttiniścayasyasādhanī  tad iyaṃ hi straviṣayīkaroti  tāśca cetovṛttayaste ca viśeṣāstāniti puliṃgenoktāḥ pumān striye ti puṃsa śeṣaṃ kṛtvā nāpi pratyakṣasya viṣayā ityāha  na cetyādi  tathā viprakṛṣṭeṣviti deśādiviprakṛṣṭeṣu svasāmarthyopadhānāt  svarūpasannidhānāt  jñānotpādanaśaktirnāsti etenātīndriyā ityetad vyākhyātaṃ anumānasyāpi na te viṣayā ityāha   sa cāvaśyamityādi  eṣāmiti bdeśādivyavahitānāṃ  yeneti kāryopalambhena  na ca ta iti viprakarṣiṇaḥ sarvetyadṛśyānupalabdhirapi  nivṛttiniścayasyābhāvaniścayasya  yata evantadititasmāt  iyamityadṛśyānupalabdhissadasanniścayaphalā neti  sanniścayaphalā nabhavati sadvyavahāranimittā na cāpyasanniścayaphalā sandehāt  iti heto syādvānupalabdherapramāṇatā  vyavasāyaphalatvāditi sādhyesvabhāvānupa lambha evāpramāṇamucyate  kāraṇānupalambhastu pramāṇameva nanu viprakṛṣṭaviṣaye kāraṇānupalambha eva niścetumaśakyastatkathaṃ kāryābhāvaṃsādhayet  sattyam  etāvad vaktuṃ śakyate sidhyet yathā śiśapāyā vṛkṣatvam tadbhāva pratīyeta hetunā yadi kenacit yadi asya vyāpakasya ca svabhāvasyābhāvaḥ kutaścid gamakāddhetoḥ sidhyet tadabhāvenaiva svakārye na vyāpye nivartteta tadabhāvāsiddhau nivṛttāvapi saṃśayātkha svabhāvānupalabdhiḥkathaṃ bhāvasya svayamanupalabdherabhāvasiddhiḥ dṛśyasya darśanābhāvakāraṇāsambhave sati  bhāvasyānupalabdhasya bhāvābhāvaḥ pratīyate deśaḥ vyācaṣṭe  kaściditi vyāpakānupalambhaḥ  yadyanupalabhyamāno vyāpakaḥ svabhāvosya vyāpyasya siddhaḥ syāt tadā bhavet pramāṇaṃ  kāraṇavyāpakānupalambhaśca bhavet pramāṇaṃ yadi tadabhāvastayoḥ virodhāccābhāvasādhanād bhavatu nāmavaṃvidhāyā anupalabdherabhāvagatiḥ  kathaṃ na syāt  dṛṣṭāntāb pekṣābhāvāt  na hyasyāṃ kācidapi sattā  kinna vyomakusumā dhanupākhyamitiadṛṣṭāntaḥ  tadasaditi kathaṃ kṛtastadihāpyanirupākhye nāsti  tasmād sadvyavāhārammākuviti pratipādyate  kimiva nirupākhyavat  yathā śaśaviṣāṇādāvasadvyavahāranimittasya dṛśyānupalambhasya bhāvādasadvyavahārastathehāpīti anyadveti śaśaviṣāṇādau      atha yadidamācārya di gnā ga prabhṛtibhiruktaṃ  na santi pradhānādayonupalabdheriti tatra prayoge  ā cā rya āha  kathaṃ ca na syāditi codakaḥ svābhiprāyeṇāha  tadarthetyādi  tadarthasya pradhānārthasya niṣedhe satipradhānādidharmavācinobhidhāna syāprayogāt  na hi vācyamantareṇa vācakasyaprayogosti  yadā ca pradhānādiśabdānāmaprayogastadā na santīti pratiṣedhavācyeva śabdovaśiṣyate  tasya ca pratiṣedhyāsaṃkīrttane niviṣayasya pratiṣedhasyetipratiṣedhavācina śabdasyāprayogāt  tathā ca na santi pradhānādaya iti dvayorapipratijñāpadayoraprayogāt  kutra ki sādhyata iti vyarthānupalabdheḥ sādhanayogaḥ pradhānādīnāṃ ca pakṣabhūtānāmabhāvād pakṣadharmo hetuḥ syāt  pratijñāpadayorvā parasparaṃ virodhastathā hi pradhānādaya iti prayogāt tadarthasannidhānaṃ  punarna santītivacanāt teṣāmasannidhānaṃ  ete ca sannidhānāsannidhāne yugapadekatra virudhyete Run bahiphyirnaiṣa doṣaḥ evaṃadavāsodbhuta vikalpapariniṣṭhitaḥ śabdārthastrividho dharmī bhāvābhāvobhayāśrayaḥ tasminbhāvānupādāne sādhyesyānupalambhanam  tathā heturna tasyaivābhāvaḥ śabdaprayogataḥ niveditaṃ tāvat yathā ete śabdā na svalakṣaṇaviṣayāḥ  anādikālīnavāsanāprabhave vikalpe pratibhāsinamarthaṃ viṣayatvenātmasāt kurvanti vaktustu tadvikalpabhājaḥ śrotuśca yathā pratibhāsi vastu pratipādana samīyāprayogāt  tadākāravikalpajananāt na copādānakārya pratyaye pratibhāsirūpaviṣayatvena tat śakyaṃ niścetum naiṣa doṣa iti parihāra  yasmādanādervāsanā yāssamudbhute vikalpe pariniṭhitassamāruḍhaḥ śabdārthaḥ sa ca bhāvābhāvobhayāśritatvāt trividho dharmaḥ  tasminśabde vāhyapradhānādiko bhāvonupādānamasyeti tasmin bhāvānupādāne sādhye asyeti buddhiparivattinaḥ pradhānādidharmiṇaḥ  tatheti bāhyapradhānādyupādānatvea nānupalambhanaṃ hetuḥ  vāsanopādānatvenopalambhana mevātrānupalambhanaṃ  na tasyaivavikalpapratiniṣṭhitasya dharmiṇobhāvassādhyate  kasmāt    pradhānādiśabdānāṃprayogataḥ  tanniṣedhe hi niviṣayatvācchabdaprayoga eva na syāt niveditamityādinā vyācaṣṭe  yadi hi svalakṣaṇamaṃbhidheyaṃ syāt tadā svalakṣaṇapratiṣedhe śabdārthasya pratiṣedhāt tadvācina śabdasyāprayoga syāt  yāvatā niveditametad yathaite śabdā na svalakṣa ṇaviṣayā iti  kintvanādivāsanāyāḥ viduṣaḥ svanidānāvabhāsinamarthaṃsūcayatīti  buddhirūpavāgvijñaptyorjanyajanakabhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ  tataḥ śabdātpratipattiravinābhāvāt   nupakārakatvaprasaṃgāt  tadā yogyatāyāṃ ca svataḥ svarūpeṇa śabdasya yogyatvertha evaśabdasvabhāvaḥ pratītijananayogyaḥ kineṣyate  kiṃ pāramparyeṇeti yāvat  tasmānnayogyatā sambandho na ca sārthapratītihetuḥ  samavāyādevārthapratīteḥ bauddhasyāpi tarhi samayaḥ kathaṃ śabdārthayossambandhaḥ  kathaṃ ca na syātpuruṣeṣu vṛtteḥ  asyārthasyāyaṃ vācaka ityarthakathanaṃ samayaḥ  sa ca puruṣeṣu varttatena śabdārthayoḥ  na cānyadharmonyasya dharmośvadharma iva goḥ    ācārya stu na kevalaṃ samayo na sambandhonyopi bhāvika sambandhonāstītyāha  netyādi  tathā hi bhāvānāṃ rūpaśleṣo vā sambandha syāt pāratantryaṃ vā parasparāpekṣaṇaṃ vā  tatrāmiśrāṇāmparasparabhinnānāṃ na kaścidrūpaśleṣalakṣaṇassambandhaḥ  teṣāmabhedaprasaṅgāt  ekatvāpatteḥ  tathā siddhānāṃniṣpannānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ na kaścit pāratantryalakṣaṇa sambandha    siddhe pāratantryāb yogāt  parasparāpekṣālakṣaṇopi sambandho nāstītyāha  anapekṣaṇācceti siddhasya sarvanirapekṣatvāt  ka yadi tarhi śabdārthayornāsti sambandha kathantarhi śabdārthapratītiḥ kathaṃ ca śābdaṃ jñānamanumānentarbhāvyate  samayo vā tadā kiprayojana iti āha  arthaviśeṣetyādi  arthaviśeṣo yaḥ pratipādanābhiprāyeṇa viṣayīkṛtaḥtasya samīhā pratipādanecchā  tayā preritā janitā vāk sūcayati prakāśayatisvanidānapratibhāsanamarthaṃ  vācaḥ svanidānaṃ pratipādanābhiprāyaḥ  tatprakāśinaṃ kasyasūcayati  ata idamiti viduṣaḥ  ataḥ pratipādanābhiprāyāt sakāśādidamvacanamāgatamiti yo vidvān tasya padādarthamatiryadyapyanumānaṃ vākyāttvarthapratītiḥ pramāṇāntaraṃ apauruṣeya  cintāsambandhāgrahāt  na cātrāvinābhāva upayogīti tadapāstaṃ  avinābhāvamantareṇa vācyavācakabhāvasyābhāvāt yadapyuktaṃ  kathaṃ śabdādarthapratipattiḥ  kathaṃ ca śābdaṃ jñānamanumānentarbhavatīti  tatparihṛtaṃ  kha idānīṃ samayaprayojanamāha  tadākhyānamityādi  tadākhyānamavinābhāvākhyānaṃ samayaḥ  ākhyāyateneneti kṛtvā  tata iti samayāt pratyāyakasyārthapratipādanāṅgasyāvinābhāvalakṣaṇasya siddheḥ pratīte  upacāreṇa samayasya sambandhākhyānāt sambandhavyapadeśaḥ  na tu punaḥ sa eva samayo mukhyaḥ sambandhaḥ tena puruṣaprayatnakṛtādupakāraviśeṣāt sahitāvasthāyāmarthapratipādanasāmarthyalakṣaṇenātiśayenātiśayavatāmarthapratītilakṣaṇe kāryaviśeṣa upayogāt nityavādinastu pratyekamavayaveṣu samartheṣvekasmādapyavayavādarthapratītevyarthā syādanyasyāvayavasya kalpanā evantāvatsāvayavavākyapakṣe doṣa uktaḥ atha punarekamevānavayavamvākpaṃ syāt  tatraikatvepi hi vākyasyābhyupagamyamāne  tasyābhinnasya nirbhāgasya kramaśaḥ krameṇa gatyasambhavāt  grahaṇāsambhavātkālabheda eva na yujyate  yato na hyekasya krameṇa pratipattiryuktā ki kāraṇaṃ   gṛhītāgṛhītayorabhedāt  na hi tasya gṛhītāt svabhāvādagṛhītonyaḥ  svabhāvostiyasya krameṇa grahaṇaṃ syāt  bhavatvakrameṇa vākyasya grahaṇamiti cedāha  krameṇacetyādi  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ  sarvasya vākyasya yo vyavahārakālo vaktuḥ śrotuśca śravaṇatasyānekakṣaṇanimeṣānukramasamāpteḥ  aneka kṣaṇoyasminnakṣinimeṣe sonekakṣaṇanimeṣa tasyānukramaḥ paripāṭistenānukramaṇotpatteḥb kāraṇāt kāla smaraṇakālaśca varṇānāmidaṃ krameṇa grahaṇaṃ vākyasya tvakrameṇaiveti cedāha  varṣṇetyādi varṇarūpāsaṃspaśino varṇarūpavyatiriktasyaikabuddhikṣaṇapratibhāsinaḥ śabdātmanopratibhāsanāt  etadeva kutaḥ  varṇānukramapratīte  varṇānukrameṇaiva vākyasya pratī apauruṣeya cintāvarṇānu tadaviśeṣepyanukrama kṛtatvād vākyasyānukramavatī vākyapratītiḥ kamopakārānapekṣaṇe tairyathākathañcit prayuktairapi yatkiṃcid vākyaṃ pratīyeta vināpi vā varṇairanukramavadbhira kramasyopayogāt  akrameṇa ca vyāhatuṃmaśakyatvāt  gatyantarābhāvācca  naiva vākye varṇā  santi tavekaśabdarūpaṃvyaṃjakā nukramavaśādanukramavad varṇavibhāgavacca pratibhātīti cevanna  na  kamavatāteḥ  na hi kramapratibhāsaṃ varṇakṛtaṃ muktvāparo krama pratibhāsassampadyate śrotrajñāne  itaraca nākramasya vākyasya pratibhāsa  yatastadaviśeṣepi tvanmate na teṣāṃvarṇānāmaviśeṣepi varṇānukramakṛtatvād vākyabhedasyānukramavato vākyapratītirnayugapadbhāvinī  varṇānukramopakārānapekṣaṇe  varṇānukramakṛtamupakāraṃ vākyaṃ yadināpekṣeta  tadā tairvarṇairyathākathaṃcit tatkramairanyakramairapi prayuktairyatkiñcidvākyaṃ pratīyeta  sarostīti prayukte rasostīti pratīyeta  varṇopakārānapekṣatvād vināpi vā varṇairvākyaṃ pratīyeta  na ca varṇopakārāpekṣayā vākyapratītiḥ ki kāraṇaṃ  tairvarṇairanukramavadbhirasya vākyasyopakārāyogāt  kramavadbhiḥ kramavānevopakāraḥ karttavyastathā copakāryasya kramavattvaṃ syāt  na caivamiṣyate akramā eva varṇā vākyasyopakārakā bhaviṣyantīti cedāha  akrameṇacetyādi akrameṇa varṇānāṃ vyāharttumuccārayitumaśakyatvāt  na ca kramākramopakāravyatirekeṇānya prakārostīti gatyantarābhāvānnopakārakā varṇāvākyasyeti sthitaṃ  naiva vākye varṇāḥ santi  naiva varṇātmakaṃ vākyaṃ  kintarhivaṇebhyorthāntaramekameva śabdarūpaṃ vākyaṃ  vyañjakā dhvanayonukramavanto viśiṣṭenānukrameṇa vyañjayanti na vyutkrameṇa  taduktaṃ yathānupūrvīniyamo vikāre kṣīrabījayoḥ tathaiva pratipattṛṇānniyato buddhiṣu kramaḥ     tena yathākathañcit prayuktarityādiradoṣa iti vyañjakānukramavaśāt tadekamapi vākyaṃ vyaktyanukramādanukramavat  sphoṭarūpāvibhāgena varṇānāṃ nādarūpāṇāṃ grahaṇād varṇavibhāgavacca puruṣasya pratibhāti paramārthatonukramavarṇavibhāgābhyāṃ rahitamapi  taduktaṃ nādasya kramajanyatvānna pūrvī nāparaśca saḥ akramaḥ kramarūpeṇa bhedavāniva jāyate vyañjakenākramasya vyaktiḥ pratyuktā  vyaktāvyaktavirodhāt  avarṇabhārgavavākyessakalāviṇo vākyagatirna syāt  ekasya sa   śa kalābhāvāt saka tasmādabhinnakāleṣu varṇavākyapadādiṣu śabdakālasvabhāvaśca nādabhedād vibhidyata iti  atrottaramāha anukramavatetyādi  evammanyate  avadhāraṇarūpā vābhivyaktiranavadhāraṇarūpā vā  tadāvadhāraṇarūpābhivyaktirakramasya vākyasyānukramavatā vyañjakena pratyuktā pratikṣiptā   ki kāraṇaṃ    vyaktāvyaktarūpayoravadhṛtānavadhṛtarūpayorekatra virodhāt  na hyavadhṛtarūpādanyadanavadhṛtaṃ rūpāntaramekasyāsti yena tatpaścād vyajyeta  tena yaducyate  prathamena varṇenābhivyaktasyānavadhāraṇādavadhāraṇārthamanyeṣāmvarṇānāṃ vyāpāra iti tadapāstaṃ  prathaa menaiva varṇanāvadhāraṇarūpayā vyaktaniṣpāditatvāt  anavadhāraṇa rūpāyāṃ vyaktausamastavarṣṇetyādinottaramvakṣyati atha syād  varṣṇebhyo bhinnameva vākyaṃ pratibhāsate na tu dhvanisaṃsṛṣṭaṃtaduktaṃ   kaiścid dhvanirasamvedyaḥ svatantronyaiḥ prakalpita iti atrāpyāha avarṣṇetyādi  avidyamānā varṇarūpā bhāgā yasmin vākyetasminnabhyupagamyamāne puruṣasyāsakalāviṇo samastavarṇānukramaśrāviṇaḥ khaṇḍaśaśroturityarthaḥ  kadācidapyasa kalasya vākyasya gatiḥ śrutirna syāt  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ varṇavyatiriktasyaikasya vākyasya śakalābhāvād bhāgābhāvāt  bhavati caloke katipayavarṇaśravaṇe pūrvavākyabhāgaśravaṇapratītiḥ  atha varṇairbhāgavato vākyasyābhyupagamot  katipayavarṇaśravaṇe pūrvavākyabhāgaśravaṇamiṣyate tadayuktam  ekatvād vākyasya yadi pūrvabhāgaśravaṇantadā saṃkalaśrutiḥsarvātmanā vākyasya śravaṇaṃ syāt  pūrvabhāgāvyatirekāt  atha na sakalaśrutistadā na vā kasyacichutiḥ syāt  pūrvasyāpi bhāgasya śrutirna syād vākyavyatiriktatvāditi tena yaducyate ma ṇḍa ne na  vyañjakasādṛśyācca vākye tadātmagrahaṇābhimānastena nāśravaṇaṃ sakalaśravaṇaṃ veti    tadapāstaṃ  sakalāsakalavarṇabhāgapratipattikāle niṣkalasya vākyasyānavalaśrutirna vā kasyacit  samastavarṇasaṃskāravatyāntyayā buddhyā vākyāvadhāraṇamityapi mithyā  tasyāvarṇarūpasaṃsparśinaḥ kasyacit kadācidapratipatteḥ ṇāt  na hi vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ sādṛśyamvarṇāvarṇātmakatvena visadṛśatvāt tatkathaṃvākye varṇātmagrahaṇābhimāna iti yatkiñcidetat anye tvanyathā vyācakṣate  athopakāryopakārābhāvenāyuktamapi kramavadvyañjakānuvidhānamakramasya vākyasyābhyupagamyate  tataścāsakalaśrutirityata āha sakaletyādi  khaṇḍaśa śroturapi sakalasya niṣkalasya vākyasya śrutiḥ syāt atha neṣyate tadā navā kasyacit puṃsaḥ syāt  sakalavarṇāśrāviṇopi na vāniṣkalasya vākyasya śrutiḥ syāt  antyāvasthāyāmapi yugapad varṇānāmaśravaṇenabhāgasyaiva śravaṇāt atha syād    yathā śloka ekadā prakāśito nāvadhāritonyadā prakāśanetvavadhāraṇasaho bhavati  puna puna prakāśane tvavadhāryate  tathā vākyaṃ pūrvadhvanibhāvānabhivyaktamapi nāvadhāritaṃ  tena pūrvapūrvavākyābhivyaktyāhitaistu saṃskārabakyāvadhāraṇaprati pratyayabhūtairantya varṇaśravaṇakāle tadavadhāryate  tasmād varṇenānukramavatākramasya vākyasya vyaktiryujyata eva  taduktaṃ yathānuvāka iloko vā soḍhatvamupagacchati āvṛttyā na tu sa granthapratyāvṛttinirucyate pratyayairanupākhyeyairgrahaṇānuguṇaistathā dhvaniḥ prakāśite śabde svarūpamavadhāryate nādairāhitabījāyāmantyena dhvaninā saha āvṛttaparipākāyāmbuddhau śabdovadhāryata iti etadevāha  samastetyādi  samastairvarṇaiḥ pratyekaṃ vākyābhivyaktipūrvakā yekṛtāḥ saṃskārā vidyante yasyā buddhessā tathā  tayā samastavarṇasaṃskāravatyāntyayāuntyavarṇaviṣayayā buddhyā niṣkalasya vākyasyāvadhāraṇami tyapi kalpanā mithyā  bkiṃ kāraṇaṃ    tasya vākyasyāvarṇarūpasaṃsparśinaḥ  varṇarūpasaṃsparśarahitasya śrotrajñāne kasyacit puruṣasya kadācidapyapratipatteḥ prativarṇoccāraṇaṃ pratibhāsābhāvaityarthaḥ ślokasya tūccāraṇaṃ pratibhāsosti atha syād  varṇātmakameva vākyantenendriyajñānaviṣayamevetyata āha bvarṇānāṃ cākrameṇāpratipatteḥ kutokramamekabuddhigrāhyaṃ nāma  na cāntyavarṇapratipatterūrdhvamanyamaśakalaṃ śabdātmānamupalakṣayāmaḥ  nāpi svayamayaṃ vaktā vibhāvayati  samāptaphala śabdontyāyāṃ buddhaubhātītyevaṃ yadi syāt  sādhu syādityevaṃ kalyāṇakāmatayā mūḍhamatiḥ sva pnāyate nahi smaryamāṇayorapi padavākyayoḥ varṇāḥ kramaviśeṣeṇa vibhāvyante  māyāṃbuddhau paurvāparyābhāvād  padavākyabhedānāṃ ca tatkṛto bhedo na syāt nāpi varṇākramaṃ śabdarūpaṃ paśyāma ityuktam varṇānāṃ cākrameṇāpratipatteḥ krameṇaiva pratipatteḥ kāraṇāt kutoṛ mamekabuddhigrāhyamvākyannāma atha syād  antyavarṇapratipatterudhvaṃ mānasena jñānena niravayavasya vākyasyāvadhāraṇamastyeveti cedāha  na cetyādi  antyavarṇapratipatterūrdhvamanyamvarṇavyatiriktamaśakalamakhaṇḍaṃ nivibhāgamityarthaḥ  śabdātmānaṃ na copalakṣayāmaḥ nāpi svayamayamvaktā yathoktaṃ śabdātmāna svibhāvayati  tathā hi tadāpivākyama vadhārayan varṇānukramameva bāhyarūpatayāvadhārayati  na tu varṇavyatiriktannivibhāgamvākyamavadhārayati  kevalamayaṃ vaktā yathā mayoktaṃ samāptakalaḥ śabdontyāyāmbuddhau bhātītyevaṃ yadi syāt  sādhu me syāditi yā kalyāṇakāmatābhipretārthāśaṃsā  tayā mūḍhamatiḥ svapnāyate  asvapannapi svapne vyavasthitamivātmānamācarati  adhikaraṇācce ti vaktavyamiti saptamyantādapi kyaj kyaj vidhānepyetadvaktavyaṃ smaryaṃta ityeke  anye tvāhuḥ  svapnavānevābhedopacarāt  athavā matvarthīyasyārśa ādidarśanena vidhānāt  svapnaśabdenoktaḥ  tena kartturevopamānāt kyaj pratyayaḥ  supta ivācarati svapnāyata itiyāvat  anenopahasati smaraṇajñānena tarhi padavākyamakramaṃ gṛhyata iti cedāha  na hotyādi  na hiusmaryamāṇayorapi padavākyayoḥ sambandhino varṇāḥ padavākyayorbhedavyavasthāpakākramaviśeṣamantareṇākramāyāmekasyāṃ buddhau na hi vibhāvyante kintvanubhavakramavatsmaraṇamapi krameṇaiveti yāvat  yadi tvakramāyāmantyāyāṃ buddhau padavākyayorvarṇāḥkramaviśeṣamantareṇa vibhāvyante  tadā tasyāmakramāyāṃ buddhau paurvāparyābhāvād varṇāyugapadeva vibhāvyanta iti kṛtvā teṣāṃ padavākyabhedānāṃ padabhedānāṃ vākyabhedānāṃca tatkṛto varṇapaurvāparyapratibhāsakṛto bhedo viśeṣo na syāt  varṇānāṃ kramasati vā tad anittyaṃ vā syāt nittyaṃ vā anityaṃ yatnasambhūtaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ kathanna tat avaśyaṃ hi anittyaṃ kutaścid hetumad bhavati  tadvattāyā ākasmikatvedeśādiniyame na syādityuktam tacca prayatnapreritānyaviguṇakaraṇānāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ anyathā vā na dṛṣṭam  tathākāraṇadharmadarśanāt puruṣavyāpāra eva kāraṇamataḥ pauruṣeyaṃ syāt nityopalabdhirnityatvepyanāvaraṇasambhavāt  atha tacchrabdarūpaṃ nityaṃ syādupalabhyasvabhāvaṃ ca  sa svabhāvastasya kadācinnāpaiṃtīti nityamupalabhyeta  yadi na kutaścidapi sāmarthyāt pracyavet  evaṃ sahinittyaḥ syād  tasya jñānajananasāmarthyasya jananātmakatvāt  arthāntaratvasyaprāgeva niṣiddhatvāt viśeṣapratibhāsādeva padavākyānāmparasparambhedastadabhāve sa na syāditi yāvat nāpyakramamityādi na vidyate varṇakramo yasmin śabdarūpe tadakramaṃ śabdarūpa svarṇebhyonyanna paśyāma ityuktaṃ  tasyāvarṇarūpasaṃsparśinaḥ kasyacidapyapratipatterityuktatvāt jātisphoṭastu jātyabhāvādeva nirastaḥ  sati vā tasminnavarṇakrameśabdarūpe  tacchabdarūpamanityamvā syāt nityamvā  vastuno gatyantarābhāvāt yadyanityantadā puruṣaprayatnasambhūtaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ kathaṃ na tadvākyaṃ  pauruṣeyameva syāt avaśyaṃ hyanityamutpattimaditi kutaścit svahetorbhavati  tathā hyākasmikatve aheturahitatve satva   śabda  syābhyupagamyamāne deśādiniyamaḥ  ādiśabdāt kālavastuniyamo na syādityuktaṃ tacca vākyaṃ puruṣaprayatnena preritānyaviguṇāni karaṇāni yeṣāṃ puṃsānteṣāmbhavad dṛṣṭaṃ punaranyathā vaktukāmatābhāve karaṇavaiguṇye vā neti  na dṛṣṭamiti puruṣavyāpārānvayavyatirekalakṣaṇasya kāraṇadharmasya vākyaṃ prati darśanāta puruṣavyāpāraeva vākyasya kāraṇamataḥ kāraṇāt pauruṣeyamapi vākyaṃ    atha nityantad vākyaṃ tadāsya nityatvebhyupagamyamāne nityopalabdhirvākyasyasyāt  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ  tasya nityasya sato nāvaraṇasambhavāt  āvaraṇābhāvāt arthatyādi vyākhyānaṃ  atha tacchabdarūpamvākyātmaka nnityaṃ syādupalabhyasvabhāvaṃ ca  upalabhyaḥ svabhāvosyeti vigrahaḥ      sa upalabhyaḥ svabhāvastasya vākyasya kadācitrāpaiti na hīyata iti kṛtvā nityamupalabhyeta  yasmādevaṃnāpi tasyopalabhyātmanaḥ kiñcidupalambhāvaraṇaṃ sambhavati  tasya satopitadātmānamakhaṃḍayataḥ sāmarthya tiraskārāyogāt  na hi tatra atiśayotpādanāsamarthaḥkiñcitkaro nāma  prakiṃcitkaraścāvaraṇaṃ anyadveti vicāritaprāyametat miṣyate na brūsaḥ te kiñcid atiśāyayantīti  api tu na sarve ghaṭakṣaṇāḥ sarvasyaindriyajñānahetavaḥ  parasparasahitāstu viṣayendriyālokāḥ ekena viśiṣṭakṣaṇāntarotpādāt vijñānahetavaḥ  anuṣakāryasya anapekṣāyogāt  śaktasvabhāvasyanittyaṃ jananaṃ ajananaṃ vānyasya sarvadā syādityuktam  te ca pratighātinānyenāhi sa nityaḥ syād na kutaścidapi jñānajananalakṣaṇādapi sāmarthyāt pracyavet ki kāraṇam    tasya jñānajananasāmarthyasya tadātmakatvānnityaśabdasvabhāvāt nāpi śabdājjñānajananasāmarthyamarthāntaraṃ yasmādarthāntaratvasya prāgeva niṣiddhatvāt bhāvānupakārakatvaprasaṅgādityatrāntare stimitena vāyunāvaraṇānnityaṃ nopalabhyanta iti cedāha  nāpītyādi tasya bāhyasyopalabhyātmano dṛśyasya kiñcidupalambhāvaraṇaṃ sambhavati  tatsiddhaupramāṇābhāvāt  satopi vā vidyamānasyāpi cāvaraṇasya tadātmānamakhaṇḍatayonityaśabdātmānamapracyāvayataḥ  sāmarthyatiraskārā yogāt  jñānajananaśaktyabhibhavāyogāt  yasmānna hi tatra śabdātmanya tiśayamanutpādayannāvaraṇābhimataḥkiñcitkaro nāma  akiṃcitkaraścārthaḥ kaḥ kasyāvaraṇaṃ jñānavibandhakamanyadvetiprakārāntareṇopaghātakaṃ naiveti yāvat  nirloṭhitaprāyametat  vicāritaprāyametatprāk  akiñcitkarasyāvaraṇatvandṛṣṭamiti kathayannāha paraḥ  kuṇḍyādaya ityādi  kuḍyādayo ghaṭādīnāṃ kamatiśayamutpādayanti  kamvā sāmarthyātiśayaṃ khaṇḍayanti yenāvaraṇa miṣyante  tasmād yathā tetiśayamanutpādayanto ghaṭādīnāmāvaraṇamiṣyante  tathā nityasyāpi śabdasya kiṃcidāvaraṇambhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ na brūma ityādinā pariharati  te kuḍyādayaḥ kañcid ghaṭādikama tiśāyayanti viśiṣṭaṃ svabhāvaṃ kurvantīti na brūmaḥ  kaścantahmavaraṇamucyanta ityāha śrapi tu na sarva ityādi  na sarvaghaṭakṣaṇāssarvasya puruṣasyendriyajñānahetavaḥ   kintarhi  parasparasahitāstu viṣayendriyālokāḥ parasparato viśiṣṭakṣaṇāntarotpādāt kāraṇād vijñānahetavaḥ  kiṃ kāraṇam  anupakāryasyab parairanādheyātiśayasya parampratyanapekṣā yogāt  paraiścānādheyātiśayaḥ śaktasvabhāvo apauruṣeya  cintāvyavahitānyonyasyopakāriṇaḥ śravyavadhānadeśayogyatāsahakāritvāt teṣāṃ anyonyātiśayotpatteḥ  vyavadhāne sati hetorabhāvāt samarthakṣaṇānantarānutpatteḥ vijñānānutpattiḥ  tasmāt pūrvotpannasya samarthasya nirodhāt  sati ca kuḍyenyasyotpitsoḥ kāraṇābhāvenānutpatteḥ kāryakāraṇajñānānutpattiriti kuḍyādaya śrāvaraṇaṃjñeyāḥ  na punaḥ prāk pratibandhāt athavā bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikānāmanyonyopakārocintyatvād hetupratyaya sāmarthyasyāsarvavidā tena yadindriyaviṣayayormadhye sthitamāvaraṇaṃ vijñānotpattivaiguṇyatāratamyena tadpratiśāyayedapi vā syādaśaktasvabhāvo vā  tatra śaktasvabhāvasya nityaṃ kāryajananaṃ syādajananamanyasyetyaśaktasvabhāvasya syādityuktaṃ prāk  te ca skandhebhyaḥ pudgalasyeti koyamityādinā pratiṣedhati  koyaṃ pratibandho nāma pudgalasya skandheṣu yenapratibandhena  sa ca na syāditi skandhasvabhāraca pudgalo na syāt  nānyasvabhāvaścaskandhebhyaḥ anyaḥ svabhāvosyeti vigrahaḥ skandhebhyaḥ pudgalasya janma tadeva janma pratibandha iti cet bin Campramāṇavāttikasvavṛttiṭīkātetyapi kāryakāraṇabhāva eva śabdāntareṇoktaḥ syānnārthabhedaḥ keypt en de bote ya dasahāyā bhaapratyākhyātaḥ  kasyacid bhāvānabhyupagamāt yathā keṣāñcideveṣṭaḥ pratigho janmikā nāṃ tathā nāśasvabhāvo bhāvānāṃ nānutpattimatāṃ yadi  atha syād    bhavatu nāma nāśa svabhāvaniyamaḥ phale nānitye rūpabhedosti bhedakānāmabhāvataḥ  eteneti svabhāvapratipādanena  ahetukatvepi nāśa syāṅagīkriyamāṇe sa nāśaḥprathamamabhūtvā bhavatītyevamabhūtvā nāśasya bhāvataḥ kāraṇāt tasya nāśasyāṃkurādivatsattā syāt  nāśitvaṃ ceti  sattānāśitvadoṣasya yat prasañjanantatpratyākhyātametenaiva yopītyādinā vyācaṣṭe ahetukepi nāśesya nāśasyābhūtvā bhāvāt sattānityatvaṃ ca durnivāraṃ kṣaṇasthitirdharmo yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ sa tu kṣaṇasthitidharmasvabhāva utpattimatāmeva bhāvānāmbhaviṣyati  na tvanutpattimatāmākāśādīnāṃ yasmānna hi svabhāva ityeva kṛtvā sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāvo janakoyaṃ neti svabhāvaniyamāddhetoḥ svabhāvaniyamaḥ phaleyaṃ pratighoyaṃ neti  nānitye tū nānityatvaviṣaye kṛtakānāṃ rūpabhedosti yena kasyacinnaca pudgala  cintāna vai pratighonyo vā svabhāvokasmāt pratiniyamavān  yādṛśī tu svahetoḥśaktisthitiḥ  tādaśaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti hetusvabhāvaniyamāt phalasvabhāvaniyamaḥ ākasmika tvepyasyokte doṣaḥ pratighātmatā hetusvabhāvapratiniyamavanna naśva arajananapratiniyatasvabhāvaṃ bhāvaṃ paśyāmo yena tajjanmā tathā syānnānyaḥ    sarvākārajanmanāṃ vināśadarśanāt nanvimapyaniśceyameva sarvākārajanmāno naśyantīti  tāsāmaniḥśeṣadarśanāt  vicitraśaktayo hi sāmagyo dṛśyante  tatra kācit syādapi yānaśvaśvaraḥ svabhāvaḥ syānnānyasya  ki kāraṇam  anityasvabhāvasya bhedakānāṃhetūnāmabhāvataḥ  sarveṣāmvinaśvarasvabhāvasya jananāditiyāvat nanu nāśasvabhāvo bhāvānānnānutpattimatāṃ yadīti codyaṃ prakṛtaṃ  na ca tatrānitye rūpabhedosti bhedakānāmabhāvata ityayamparihāro yuktaḥ  na hyākāśā dīnāṃsvahetukṛto vinaśvarasvabhāvonutpattimattvāt  tatkathaṃ
